src: mansfield het tien jaar gelede, toe hy n 23jarige entrepreneur was, n geleent heid van die hand gewys om op n plaas te werk waar hy suurlemoene aangekoop het om weer te verkoop.
tgt: diniso was born with a disability in her left leg and has to wear a brace for support.

src: ngv is ’n sprong na beter gesondheidsorg vukuzenzele unnamed die minister van ge sondheid, dr. aaron motsoaledi, sê dat die wysigingswetsontwerp op nasionale gesondheidsverse kering (ngv) die gehalte van gesondheidsorg in suidafri ka sal verbeter.
tgt: plans to drastically change tb treatment vukuzenzele unnamed patients with multidrug resistant tuberculosis (mdrtb) will now be able to receive life changing treatment as the department of health begins its rollout of bedaquiline.

src: motsoaledi het onlangs n voorligtingsessie toege spreek waar hy die ngvwy sigingswetsontwerp en die wysigingswetsontwerp op mediese skemas bekend ge maak het.
tgt: according to the department’s drug resistant tb director, norbert ndjeka bedaquiline will replace the old regimen, which makes use of injections to administer mdrtb treatment.

src: die wetsontwerpe maak voorsiening vir beter toegang tot gesondheidsorg deur die ngv .
tgt: "this means that for the first time, an injectionfree regimen will be recommended for all patients with rifampicin resistant tuberculosis in south africa.

src: die bekendstelling van hier die twee wetsontwerpe bete ken dat suidafrika een stap nader daaraan is om univer sele gesondheidsorg te bied, wat beteken dat die ngv bin nekort wet sal wees.
tgt: the introduction of bedaquiline has earned south africa the top spot as the first country in the world to dispense this type of treatment.

src: die ngv is n finansie ringstelsel waarvolgens alle suidafrikaanse burgers toegang tot noodsaaklike ge sondheidsorg sal kry, ongeag hulle werkstatus en vermoë om n direkte finansiële by drae tot die fonds te maak.
tgt: the department says bedaquilline has been hailed for its effective treatment and short turnaround time.

src: motsoaledi sê die regering is pynlik bewus daarvan dat sommige mense glo daar is n behoefte om die sukkelende openbare gesondheidsorg stelsel eers op te knap voor dat daar oor die ngv gepraat word.
tgt: "treating patients with drug resistant tb was difficult with old medicines, which had many negative side effects and over long periods often up to 24 months."

src: hy sê die regering is bewus van die probleme wat ervaar word met swak gehalte en ondoeltreffendheid in die openbare gesondheidsorg stelsel.
tgt: in addition, the treatment is revered for reducing the number of deaths and having fewer side effects in comparison to its injectable counterpart, which resulted in hearing loss for many mdrtb patients.

src: yoliswa se kralewerk lei na sukses dale hes n voorliefde vir kreatiwiteit het daartoe gelei dat fuma n florerende besigheid geskep het.

src: olisa fuma het n merkwaardige pad gestap, van armoede in die ooskaap, tot die ont dekking van n passie vir kuns en handwerk, wat daartoe ge lei het dat sy werksessies aan bied om haar vaardighede met werklose vroue te deel.
tgt: this is made possible by the gauteng department of education as it has launched the rhodesfield engineering school of specialisation with a focus on aviation.

src: fuma is in n township buite queenstown in die ooskaap gebore en het n klein huisie met 15 gesinslede gedeel.
tgt: the department’s mec panyaza lesufi said he was pleased to unveil another groundbreaking school of specialisation, which is situated close to the or tambo international airport in kempton park.

src: "my gesin kon nie bekos tig om my skool toe te stuur nie.
tgt: "the school is one of 29 schools of specialisation, which have been redesigned to address skills shortages to meet the economic demands of gauteng cities," said the mec.

src: ek moes sonder formele onderrig my eie weg vind om n inkomste te verdien," sê fuma.
tgt: the school, which was previously known rhodes field technical high school, offers compulsory subjects that include pure mathematics, pure physical science, engineering, graphics and design.

src: plaaslik is 'lekker' vir oorsese besoekers dale hes inwoners van die georgemunisipaliteit se townships in die weskaap sal danksy die dine with localsinisiatief aan oorsese toeriste 'n aand bied om te onthou.
tgt: new health centre for port nolloth jauhara khan the seaside town of port nolloth in the northern cape will soon benefit from a fullservice community health centre project which promises to enhance access to quality healthcare.

src: die inisiatief, wat saamval met toerismemaand, maak gebruik van ses spanne wat uit die townships van them balethu en pacaltsdorp gekies is om gasheer te wees vir oorsese toeriste deur 'n drie gangmaaltyd voor te berei en te bedien.
tgt: the project is being implemented by the independent development trust (idt) on behalf of the northern cape provincial department of health at a cost of about r150 million and is expected to open soon.

src: ter voorbereiding het die spanne opleidingsessies by gewoon waar hulle meer ge leer het oor toerisme en spy seniering.
tgt: once completed, the building will comprise all primary health facilities including a trauma unit, radiology, dispensary, psychiatric ward, maternity wards and paediatric wards.

src: hulle het vaardighede ge leer wat hulle sal help om hul eie ondernemings te begin en te bestuur, met die einddoel om suksesvolle inkomstever dieners binne die toerismebe dryf te word.
tgt: consultation rooms will be used for reproductive health services, a psychologist, dietician and other services once constructed.

src: nomzamo entile (31), wat deel is van die ses spanne, lei die explore our hoodspan, wat in thembalethu geleë is.
tgt: work on site also encompasses the construction of facilities for support services including administration and waiting areas, ambulance quarters and parking bays, overnight accommodation for paediatric mothers, a mortuary, kitchen and dining area, stores and maintenance area.

src: hy sê dat daar van die lan delike onderwysassistente verwag word om die las van onderwysers by landelike skole te verlig deur te help met samewerkende kurri kulêre aktiwiteite soos die koördinering van huiswerk klubs, wiskundeklubs, lees klubs, kreatiewe kunsklubs en landbouprojekte.
tgt: part of his job is to liaise with stakeholders including pilots, airports management, air traffic controllers and the south african weather services in order for him to design efficient flight procedures.

src: volgens childline south africa, ’n niewinsgewen de organisasie wat kinders teen alle vorms van geweld beskerm en ’n kultuur van kinderregte in suidafrika skep, moet ouers op ’n posi tiewe manier met hul kinders kommunikeer.
tgt: child abuse, recognise the signs allison cooper if you suspect a child is being abusedyou have a legal obligation to report it to the south afri can police services’ fami ly violence, child protec tion and sexual offences unit.

src: jy kan kinders help deur hulle te prys as hulle hulp aanbied of wanneer hulle hul verbeel ding gebruik; prys ook hulle intelligensie en spelerigheid; moedig hulle aan om te praat, laat hulle spesiaal voel en laat hulle weet dat hulle spesiaal is.
tgt: signs of emotional abuse can include apathy; depres sion; hostility or stress; lack of concentration; eating dis orders; headaches, nausea and abdominal pains; and suicide attempts.

src: die wetlike beëindiging van n huwelik dale hes as jy alles probeer het om jou huwelik te laat werk, is n egskeiding die beste alternatief vir sowel jy as jou maat.
tgt: the legal end to a marriage dale hes when you’ve tried everything to make your marriage work, a divorce may be the best option for both you and your partner.

src: egskeiding is moeilik en stresvol vir gesinne en die regsproses kan verwarrend wees.
tgt: divorce is difficult and stressful for families, and the legal process can be confusing.

src: n egskeiding is wanneer n huwelik amptelik in n geregshof beëindig word.
tgt: a divorce is when a marriage is officially ended in a court of law.

src: daar is twee soorte egskeidings: onbestrede — waar albei partye saamstem dat n egskeiding moet plaasvind; en bestrede — waar die partye nie saamstem oor n egskeiding of die voorwaardes daarvan nie.
tgt: there are two types of divorce: unopposed – where both parties are in agreement that a divorce should take place; and opposed – where the parties do not agree on a divorce or its terms.

src: josephine peta, senior regsadministrateur by die departement van justisie en grondwetlike ontwikkeling se kantoor van die gesinsadvokaat, verduidelik dat die egskeidingsproses begin wanneer n dagvaarding uitgereik word.
tgt: josephine peta, senior legal admin officer at the department of justice and constitutional development’s office of the family advocate, explains that the divorce process starts when a summons is issued.

src: "n persoon wat sy of haar huwelik wil ontbind, kan n egskeidingsdagvaarding by n hooggeregshof of streekhof kry, of n prokureur nader om hulle met die proses te help.
tgt: "a person who wants to have their marriage dissolved can get a divorce summons at a high or regional court, or they can approach an attorney to assist with the process.

src: die eggenoot wat met die egskeidingsprosedure begin, word die eiser genoem, en die ander gade is die verweerder," sê peta.
tgt: the spouse who starts the divorce proceedings is referred to as the plaintiff and the other spouse is the defendant," said peta.

src: peta verduidelik dat die egskeidingsdagvaarding aan die volgende vereistes moet voldoen: aandui dat daar geen redelike kans bestaan om die verhouding te herstel nie; voorsiening maak vir die verdeling van gesamentlike besittings of die afdwinging van die voorwaardes waaroor ooreengekom is in die voorhuwelikse ooreenkoms wat aan die begin van die huwelik onderteken is; en bepaal watter reëlings getref sal word vir die egpaar se kinders, soos byvoorbeeld by wie die kind gaan woon.
tgt: peta explained that the divorce summons must: state that there is no reasonable chance of restoring the relationship, make provision for the division of joint belongings or the enforcement of the terms agreed upon in the antenuptial agreement signed at the beginning of the marriage, and set out what arrangements will be made for the couple’s children, such as who the child will live with.

src: "die dagvaarding moet ook aandui dat die verweerder 10 dae het — in die geval waar hy of sy in dieselfde omgewing as die eiser woon, of 20 dae — indien die partye in verskillende provinsies woon, om op die dagvaarding te reageer," voeg peta by.
tgt: "the summons must also state that the defendant has 10 days – in the case where he or she lives in the same area as the plaintiff, or 20 days – if the parties reside in different provinces, to answer the summons," peta added.

src: sodra n saak geopen is, word dokumente aan die eiser teruggegee, wat twee stelle van hierdie dokumente aan die balju in die omgewing waar die verweerder werk of woon, moet voorsien.
tgt: once a case has been opened, documents are handed back to the plaintiff, who has to deliver two sets of these documents to the sheriff in the area where the defendant works or lives.

src: "die balju sal dan die dokumente persoonlik aan die verweerder voorlê en n relaas van betekening – n geskrewe dokument wat bewys dat die dokumente aan die verweerder beteken is – uitreik.
tgt: "the sheriff will then serve the documents personally on the defendant and issue a return of service, proving that the documents were served.

src: waar daar kinders betrokke is, moet die kantoor van die gesinsadvokaat in kennis gestel word," verduidelik peta.
tgt: where there are children involved, the office of the family advocate must be informed," peta pointed out.

src: na n tydperk van 10 of 20 dae kan die eiser die egskeiding op die hofrol plaas.
tgt: after a period of 10 or 20 days, the plaintiff may enrol the divorce on the court roll.

src: in betwiste egskeidings moet die verweerder die dagvaarding beantwoord deur n kennisgewing van voorneme om die saak te verdedig.
tgt: in contested divorces, the defendant must answer the summons by notice of intention to defend the matter.

src: "sodra dit gedoen is, moet hy of sy ook binne n bepaalde tydperk n pleidooi indien.
tgt: "once that is done, he or she must also file a plea within a specific period.

src: n pleidooi is n verklaring waarin die verweerder op die bewerings in die dagvaarding reageer.
tgt: a plea is a statement in which the defendant responds to the allegations in the summons.

src: nadat n pleidooi ingedien is, kan die eiser ook op die pleidooi reageer of n kennisgewing van vasgestelde voorlegging indien.
tgt: after a plea is filed, the plaintiff can also reply to the plea or file a notice of set down.

src: "die saak sal dan vir verhoor op die rol geplaas word," sê peta.
tgt: "the matter will then be enrolled for trial," peta concluded.

src: vwat is n verstekegskeiding?
tgt: vwhat is a default divorce?

src: n hof sal n egskeiding by verstek toestaan indien n dagvaarding op die gade uitgedien is en hy of sy nie binne die toegewese tydperk reageer nie.
tgt: a court will grant a divorce by default if a summons has been served on the spouse and he or she does not respond within the allocated time period.

src: ektopiese swangerskap is n mediese noodgeval allison cooper vroue wat n ekto piese swangerskap gehad het, is deeglik bewus van die hartseer wat dit kan veroorsaak omdat dit met urieneen bloedtoetse positief toets vir swangerskap.
tgt: ectopic pregnancy is a medical emergency allison cooper the medical complications of ectopic pregnancies bring much heartache to expecting mothers.

src: dit is die mening van dr bushy mhlari, senior registrateur ektopiese verloskunde en ginekologie by die dr george mukhari akademiese hospitaal.
tgt: this is according to dr bushy mhlari, the senior registrar ectopic obstetrics and gynaecology at dr george mukhari academic hospital.

src: hy verduidelik dat n ektopiese swangerskap nie soos nnormale swangerskap binnein die baarmoeder ontwikkel nie.
tgt: "in ectopic pregnancies, the fertilised egg implants on other body surfaces.

src: hy sê dat, met n normale swangerskap, die bevrugte eier wat in die fallopiese buis deur die sperm bevrug is, deur die buis tot in die ryk baarmoederholte beweeg, waar dit aan die endometriale voering heg en die baba ontwikkel.
tgt: in 98 percent of cases, the location of ectopic pregnancies is in the fallopian tubes.

src: "by ektopiese swangerskappe vestig die bevrugte eier op ander liggaamsoppervlakke.
tgt: uncommon locations include the ovary, abdominal cavity, cervix and the broad ligament," said dr mhlari.

src: wanneer dit gebeur, kan die embrio nie oorgeplant word en normaal ontwikkel nie, en is die vrou se enigste opsie om die swangerskap te beëindig.
tgt: when this happens, the embryo cannot be transplanted and ending the pregnancy is the woman’s only option.

src: dr mhlari sê dat n vrou n groter kans op n ektopiese swangerskap het, as sy: beskadigde of abnormale fallopiese buise het, byvoorbeeld, as gevolg van vorige buisin feksies weens seksueel oordraagbare infeksies of buisoperasies; voorheen n ektopiese swangerskap gehad het; onvrugbaar is; veelvuldige seksmaats het; sigarette rook.
tgt: he explained that an ectopic pregnancy is not located in the cavity of the uterus, where a pregnancy is normally located.

src: "gebarste ektopiese swangerskap is n lewensgevaarli ke toestand en is die grootste oorsaak van swangerskapverwante moedersterftes in die eerste drie maande van swangerskap.
tgt: adding that normally, after fertilisation of the egg by the sperm which occurs inside the fallopian tube, the fertilised egg travels through the tube to the rich uterine cavity where it attaches to the endometrial lining and the baby develops.

src: die voorkoms van ektopiese swangerskap is ongeveer twee persent in die algemene bevolking," verduidelik dr mhlari.
tgt: dr mhlari said a woman has a higher chance of an ectopic pregnancy if she has; damaged or abnormal fallopian tubes, such as from past tubal infections from sexually transmitted infections or tubal surgery; had a previous ectopic pregnancy; has infertility; has multiple sexual partners; smokes cigarettes.

src: tekens van 'n ektopiese swangerskapvolgens dr mhlari kom die simptome vroeg in die swangerskap voor, soms nog voordat die vrou besef dat sy swanger is.
tgt: "ruptured ectopic pregnancy is a lifethreatening condition and is the leading cause of pregnancyrelated maternal death in the first three months of pregnancy.

src: "n ultraklankskandering word dan gedoen om te bevestig of die baarmoeder leeg is en om vas te stel waar die embrio in die vrou se liggaam is," sê dr mhlari.
tgt: this is followed by dizziness, a drop in blood pressure, fainting, shock and death if treatment is delayed," he said.

src: behandeling van 'n ektopiese swangerskap"sodra n ektopiese swan gerskap gediagnoseer is, moet dit behandel word om te voorkom dat dit verder groei, want die vrou se lewe is in gevaar as die behandeling vertraag word," sê hy.
tgt: to diagnose an ectopic pregnancy, a blood or urine pregnancy test is done to confirm that the woman is pregnant.

src: bou n nasie wat omgee vir kinders vukuzenzele unnamed geagte me desuidafrika ners, daar is n gesegde in baie afrikakulture wat stel dat dit n ge meenskap vat om n kind groot te maak.
tgt: building a nation that cares for children vukuzenzele unnamed there is a proverb common to many african cultures which says that it takes a village to raise a child.

src: dié idee — dat die breër gemeen skap vir die ontwikkeling, welstand en veiligheid van elke kind verantwoordelik is — gaan deur my gedagtes wanneer ek aan die onlangse tragiese en hoogs ontstellende dood, op n skoolkamp, van 13jarige enock mpianzi, dink.
tgt: this idea – that the broader community has a responsibility for the development, wellbeing and safety of each child – comes to mind when i think about the tragic and deeply upsetting death of 13yearold enock mpianzi on a school camp recently.

src: enock is nie die enigste kind wat sy lewe verloor het in omstandighede wat voorkom kon word as volwassenes die nodige voorsorgmaatreëls getref en verantwoordelikheid geneem het.
tgt: sadly, enock is not the only child to lose his life for reasons that were entirely preventable, if only adults had exercised due care and responsibility.

src: dit laat n mens dink aan n ander 13jarige kind, keamohetswe shaun seboko, wat onlangs in n magaliesburgse laerskool se swembad verdrink het, en die twee kinders wat by laerskool lekgolo in limpopo oorlede is toe n trok in n muur vasgery het wat op hulle geval het.
tgt: one thinks of another 13yearold, keamohetswe shaun seboko, who recently drowned in the swimming pool of a magaliesburg primary school, and the two children who died at the lekgolo primary school in limpopo when a truck crashed into a wall that collapsed on them.

src: n mens dink ook aan die talle kinders, soos sesjarige nathlia pienaar, wat in die kruisvuur van ’n bendeoorlog op die kaapse vlakte gesterf het.
tgt: one thinks also about the many children, like 6yearold nathlia pienaar, who are killed in the crossfire of gang wars on the cape flats.

src: ons onthou ook die tragiese dood van michael komape en lumka mkethwa wat dood is toe hulle in puttoilette geval het.
tgt: we remember also the tragic deaths of michael komape and lumka mkethwa, both of whom died after falling into pit latrines.

src: dit was heeltemal onnodig dat al hierdie jongmense, en baie ander, hul lewens verloor het.
tgt: all of those young lives, and the lives of many others, need never have been lost.

src: al dié tragedies kon voorkom word as die nodige maatreëls om die kinders se veiligheid te verseker, getref was.
tgt: all these tragedies could have been prevented if measures had been taken to keep these children out of harm’s way.

src: dit lyk vir my asof ons, as n samelewing, ons kinders in die steek laat.
tgt: it seems to me that, as a society, we are failing our children.

src: te veel kinders bevind hulself in gevaarlike situasies, hetsy op n tydelike vlot op n rivier of alleen in n gehuggie met n paraffienlamp.
tgt: too many children find themselves in dangerous situations, whether it is on a make shift raft on a river or being left alone in a shack with a paraffin lamp.

src: ons kinders se lewens word in gevaar gestel wanneer kontrakteurs opgrawings onbeskerm laat, skoolinfrastruktuur nie onderhou word nie, of skoolvervoer oorlaai word.
tgt: when contractors leave excavations unprotected or school infrastructure is not maintained or school transport is overcrowded, the lives of children are put at risk.

src: daar kom egter nog meer nalatigheid en verwaarlosing voor.
tgt: but there is more than negligence and neglect at work.

src: baie kinders word deur seksuele prooisoekers, kriminele bendes en dwelmverkopers geteiken, juis omdat hulle kwesbaar is.
tgt: many children are targeted by sexual predators, criminal gangs and drug sellers precisely because they are vulnerable.

src: as n samelewing, moet ons meer toegewyd wees en aktief betrokke wees by die beskerming van ons kinders teen dié en ander gevare.
tgt: as a society, we need to be more diligent and more active in protecting our children from these and other dangers.

src: ons moet gesamentlik n verantwoordelikheidskultuur opbou.
tgt: as a society, we need to build a culture of responsibility.

src: ons moet vir onsself, ons kinders en ander verantwoordelikheid aanvaar.
tgt: we need to be responsible for ourselves, for our children and for others.

src: ons moet verseker dat ons kinders in n veilige, versorgende en stimulerende omgewing kan grootword; ons moet ook besef dat dit ons plig is om almal wat ons ken en die mense met wie ons omgaan, te beskerm en versorg.
tgt: just as we need to ensure that children are able to grow up in a safe, nurturing and stimulating environment, so too must we feel a duty to protect and care for all those who we know and interact with.

src: ons moet ook hierdie verpligting op ons land se paaie voel.
tgt: we must feel this duty of care on the road.

src: ons verwelkom die afname in padsterftes oor die feesseisoen, maar die aaklige werklikheid is dat meer as 1 600 mense in net n maand en n half op ons paaie gesterf het.
tgt: while we welcome the drop in road fatalities over this festive season, the grim reality is that over 1,600 people died on our roads in just a month and a half.

src: dit is kommerwekkend dat meer as 9 000 motoriste vir oortredings, insluitend dronkbestuur, oorskryding van die spoedgrens en roekelose en nalatige bestuur in hegtenis geneem is.
tgt: it is disturbing that over 9,000 motorists were arrested for offences including drunk driving, speeding, and reckless and negligent driving.

src: n verantwoordelikheidskultuur beteken dat ons almal die verkeersreëls moet nakom en voetgangers en ander padgebruikers se regte moet respekteer.
tgt: a culture of responsibility means that we should all drive safely and respect the rights of pedestrians and other road users.

src: n verantwoordelikheidskultuur beteken dat pa’s by hulle kinders se lewe ns betrokke moet wees.
tgt: a culture of responsibility means that fathers need to be present in the lives of their children.

src: te veel vroue moet hulle kinders alleen grootmaak, wat dikwels hulle en hul kinders se moontlikhede beperk.
tgt: too many women have to raise children on their own, which often limits their prospects and those of their children.

src: n verantwoordelikheidskultuur beteken ook dat ons veilige seks moet hê en nie onsself of ander aan miv moet blootstel nie.
tgt: a culture of responsibility also means that we should practice safe sex and not expose ourselves or others to hiv .

src: ons moenie alkohol en dwelms misbruik nie.
tgt: we should not abuse alcohol or use drugs.

src: ons moet gesonde lewens leef sodat ons siektes wat grootliks voorkombaar is kan vermy en langer kan leef.
tgt: we should seek to live healthy lives so that we avoid diseases that are largely preventable and live longer lives.

src: sodanige kultuur behoort veral deur diegene in posisies van gesag en invloed, hetsy godsdienstige leiers of politici, tradisionele leiers of beroemdes, omarm te word.
tgt: such a culture should be embraced in particular by all those in society who occupy positions of authority and influence, whether they are religious leaders or politicians, traditional leaders or celebrities.

src: hulle behoort, deur hulle woorde en dade, daarna te streef om n beter samelewing te skep waarin almal waardeer en versorg word.
tgt: through their words and actions, they should seek to build a better society in which all are appreciated and cared for.

src: dit is verkose amptenare en staatsamptenare se verantwoordelikheid om die veiligheid en welstand van burgers te verseker.
tgt: elected officials and public servants are entrusted with the responsibility to ensure the safety and wellbeing of citizens.

src: hulle moet seker maak dat daar voldoende en veilige skoolinfrastruktuur is.
tgt: they must ensure that there is adequate and safe infrastructure in schools.

src: hulle moet vinnig optree wanneer daar n onderbreking in watertoevoer in gemeenskappe is of wanneer foutiewe straatligte aangemeld word.
tgt: they must act quickly when there is an interruption to water supply in a communities or when faulty streetlights are reported.

src: hulle moet seker maak dat gesondheidsen veiligheidsregulasies toegepas word en dat die oppergesag van die reg gehandhaaf word.
tgt: they must ensure that health and safety regulations are enforced and that the rule of law is maintained.

src: ons moes soms uitermatige stappe neem, bykomend tot die werk wat steeds regoor die regering — op alle vlakke — gedoen word, om uiting te gee aan dié verantwoordelikheid.
tgt: in addition to the ongoing work that is taking place across government, at all levels, to give effect to this responsibility, we have sometimes had to take extraordinary measures.

src: ons het, as antwoord op die kinders wat gesterf het of seergekry het toe hulle in puttoilette geval het, die safeinisiatief geloods om die voorsiening van behoorlike toilette aan alle skole in die land, te bespoedig.
tgt: in response to the deaths and injury caused by children falling into pit latrines, we launched the safe initiative to accelerate the provision of appropriate toilets to all schools in the country.

src: ons het die suidafrikaanse nasionale weermag na dele van kaapstad ontplooi om die polisie in hul pogings om bendegeweld te verminder, te ondersteun.
tgt: we deployed the south african national defence force to parts of cape town to support the police in their efforts to reduce gang violence.

src: ons het, meer onlangs en saam met die burgerlike gemeenskap, n noodreaksieplan geloods om geweld teen vroue en kinders te beëindig.
tgt: more recently, we have, together with civil society, embarked on an emergency response plan to end violence against women and children.

src: dit is egter duidelik dat daar baie meer is wat ons, as regering en samelewing, moet doen.
tgt: yet, there is clearly much more that we need to do, as government and as a society.

src: ons prys die individue en organisasies wat die verantwoordelikheid vir ander se welstand op hulself neem.
tgt: we applaud those individuals and organisations who have taken upon themselves responsibility for the wellbeing of others.

src: daar is mense soos ralph bouwers en mark nicholson, wat ontspanningsaktiwiteite vir jongmense in lavender hill in kaapstad reël om te verhoed dat hulle na die bendewêreld terugkeer.
tgt: there are people like ralph bouwers and mark nicholson, who organise recreation activities for young people in lavender hill in cape town to keep them from turning to gangsterism.

src: daar is moeders, susters en dogters wat as vrywilligers diens doen by operation bobbi bear, n organisasie in amanzimtoti, kwazulunatal wat toevlug aan mishandelde kinders bied.
tgt: there are the mothers, sisters and daughters who work as student volunteers with operation bobbi bear, an organisation in amanzimtoti in kwazulunatal that offers shelter to young children who have been abused.

src: daar is talle geloofsgebaseerde groepe, soos die konferensie van suiderafrikaanse katolieke biskoppe, met wie ek vergader het, wat my vertel het van die werk wat hulle doen in antwoord op die armes se behoeftes, om gesinne te ondersteun om meer om te gee en versorgend te wees en ook om jong mense te help om die talle uitdagings wat hulle in die gesig staar, te hanteer.
tgt: there are many faithbased groups like the southern african catholic bishops’ confer ence, who i met recently who told me about the work they are doing to respond to the needs of the poor, to support families to be more caring and nurturing and to assist young people in confronting the many challenges before them.

src: dié suidafrikaners wys vir ons die weg.
tgt: these south africans are showing us the way.

src: hulle herinner ons, deur hul voorbeeld, wat dit beteken om verantwoordelikheid vir onsself en ander te neem.
tgt: through their example, they are reminding us of what it means to take responsibility for ourselves and for others.

src: ons land het heeltemal te veel tragedies ervaar.
tgt: this country has witnessed far too many tragedies.

src: te veel jongmense is oorlede, te veel kinders het seergekry en is getraumatiseer.
tgt: too many young lives have been lost, too many children hurt and traumatised.

src: die besonderhede van aahv en aav silusapho nyanda daar is hulp vir kinders wat aan aandagafleibaarheiden hiperaktiwiteitsversteurings lei.
tgt: the ins and outs of adhd and add silusapho nyanda there is help available for children who suffer from attention deficit and hyperactivity disorders.

src: the brains of preschool children grow at an incredible rate and help lay the foundations of language, thinking and social and emotional development.
tgt: the brains of preschool children grow at an incredible rate and help lay the foundations of language, thinking and social and emotional development.

src: children from upington in the northern cape are benefiting from 10 early childhood development (ecds) centres recently launched by the department of social develop ment (dsd).
tgt: children from upington in the northern cape are benefiting from 10 early childhood development (ecds) centres recently launched by the department of social develop ment (dsd).

src: fiveyearold lithemba bacela, who lives with cerebral palsy and has a speech impairment, is better able to indicate what she feels and needs, thanks to her time at one of these centres, oasis skills development centre’s ecd unit.
tgt: fiveyearold lithemba bacela, who lives with cerebral palsy and has a speech impairment, is better able to indicate what she feels and needs, thanks to her time at one of these centres, oasis skills development centre’s ecd unit.

src: lithemba lives in paballelo with her mother, elizabeth bacela, who said her child’s communication skills have improved since she started at the centre last year.
tgt: lithemba lives in paballelo with her mother, elizabeth bacela, who says her child’s communication skills have improved since she started at the centre last year.

src: elizabeth said the stimulation area has been particularly beneficial.
tgt: elizabeth said the stimulation area has been particularly beneficial.

src: "lithemba can now indicate when she is thirsty, hungry or has wet herself".
tgt: "lithemba can now indicate when she is thirsty, hungry or has wet herself.

src: the oasis ecd centre is one of 10 that received a new building from the national lotteries commission (nlc) as part of the commission’s legacy project.
tgt: "the oasis ecd centre is one of 10 that received new buildings from the national lotteries commission (nlc) as part of the commission’s legacy project.

src: this countrywide initiative is aligned with the national development plan’s commitment to improving education, innovation and training, and con tributing to the goal of ensuring that all children have at least two years of preschool education.
tgt: this countrywide initiative is aligned with the national development plan’s commitment to improving education, innovation and training, and ensuring that all children have at least two years of preschool education.

src: the centre accommodates children who live with a variety of conditions, including autism, down syndrome, cerebral palsy and foetal alcohol syndrome.
tgt: the centre accommodates children who live with a variety of conditions, including autism, down syndrome, cerebral palsy and foetal alcohol syndrome.

src: each of the four classes at the ecd centre has 10 to 15 pupils, says acting chairperson of oasis skills development centre marina johannesen.
tgt: each of the four classes at the ecd centre has 10 to 15 pupils, says acting chairperson of oasis skills development centre marina johannesen.

src: the department contributes a subsidy of r20 per child, which covers children between the ages of two and seven and those who are 18 years of age and above.
tgt: the department contributes a subsidy of r20 per child, which covers children between the ages of two and seven and those who are 18 years of age and above.

src: in 2015, the dsd donated a stimulation centre, computer lab and a bus to transport pupils to and from school.
tgt: in 2015, the dsd donated a stimulation centre, computer lab and a bus to transport pupils to and from school.

src: "once a week, therapists from the local hospital come to the centre to assess and treat the children,"says johannesen.
tgt: "once a week, therapists from the local hospital come to the centre to assess and treat the children,"says johannesen.

src: the new building, donated recently is an additional blessing for the centre.
tgt: the new building, donated recently is an additional blessing for the centre.

src: speaking at the launch, department of social development deputy minister hendrietta bogopanezulu called on the public to include children living with disabilities in dialogues about issues that affect them.
tgt: speaking at the launch, social development deputy minister hendrietta bogopanezulu called on the public to include children living with disabilities in dialogues about issues that affect them.

src: silusapho nyandaas n kind wat aan aandagafleibaarheidhiperaktiwi teitsversteuring (aahv) of aandagafleibaarheidsversteuring (aav) lei, nie behandel word nie, kan dit langtermyn negatiewe gevolge vir sy/haar gesond heid hê.
tgt: silusapho nyandaif a child who suffers from attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (adhd) or attention deficit disorder (add) is not treated, the conditions could have longterm negative impacts on their health.

src: dit is volgens dr khatija jha zbhay, hoof van die eenheid vir kinderen adolessentepsigiatrie by townhill hospitaal in pietermaritzburg, kwazulunatal.
tgt: this is according to dr khatija jhazbhay, who heads up the child and adolescent psychiatry unit at townhill hospital in pietermaritzburg, kwazulunatal.

src: sy verduidelik dat dié kin ders as volwassenes n hoër risiko loop om aan ander geestestoestande, soos angs en depressie, te ly en om middels te misbruik.
tgt: she explained that as adults, these children could be at an increased risk of other mental conditions, such as anxiety and depression, and could also misuse substances.

src: aahv en aav beïnvloed kinders se akademiese vordering en hulle gedrag kan ander pla.
tgt: adhd and add affect children’s academic progress and their behaviour could annoy others.

src: sulke kinders is dikwels ook ongewild, beland gereeld in die moeilikheid en is geneig tot ongelukke.
tgt: children could also be disliked, get into trouble and be prone to accidents.

src: "elke kind se omstandighede is uniek en nog besig om te ontwikkel.
tgt: "each child’s circumstances are unique and developing, so it’s important to do a comprehensive clinical assessment to recognise other factors that could be impacting their development, as well as the strengths that can be built on to assist them to reach their full potential," said dr jhazbhay.

src: dit is dus belangrik om n omvattende kliniese assessering te doen om vas te stel of daar ander faktore is wat hulle ontwikkeling kan beïnvloed, asook die sterk punte waarop daar gebou kan word om hulle te help om hul volle potensiaal te bereik," sê dr jhazbhay.
tgt: she explained that adhd and add are neurodevelopmental disorders that present with behavioural difficulties, such as inattention.

src: sy verduidelik dat aahv en aav neuroontwikkelingsversteurings is met gedragspro bleme, soos onoplettendheid.
tgt: this shows in the form of: making careless mistakes not completing tasks losing things being easily distracted and forgetful examples of hyperactivity or impulsiveness include: fidgeting tapping hands or feet squirming in their seat blurting out answers and getting up when expected to remain seated.

src: wees aangeskakel en skakel af silusapho nyanda daar is verskeie dinge wat suidafrikaners kan doen om elektrisiteit te bespaar en beurtkrag te vermy.
tgt: be switched on and switch off silusapho nyanda there are various things that south africans can do to save electricity and avoid loadshedding.

src: die waarnemende stasiebestuurder van eskom se matimbakragstasie, oba keng mabotja, sê dat die tekort aan voldoende krag in suidafrika n impak op mense se lewens het, omdat normale aktiwiteite tydens beurtkrag nie kan plaasvind nie.
tgt: a mpumalanga emerging farmer is ploughing ahead, having already won a prestigious award and secured a substantial contract for her maize.

src: die jeug is die toekoms van ons land vukuzenzele unnamed om met jong mense gesprek te voer, laat my altyd energiek voel.
tgt: young people are sa's real jewels vukuzenzele unnamed engaging with young people always leaves me energised.

src: dit is opwindend om insig te kry in hul strewes en oorwinnings en hul visie oor wat gedoen kan word om hierdie land te verbeter.
tgt: it is exciting to gain insight into their struggles and triumphs and their vision for what can be done to improve this country.

src: ons kan nie ontken dat die jeug 'n belangrike teenwoordigheid in die psige en weefsel van ons land is nie.
tgt: there is no denying that youth are a significant presence in our nation’s psyche and fabric.

src: in teenstelling met die persepsie dat hulle selfvoldaan, polities apaties of selfbehep is, bevestig plaaslike en internasionale studies dat jongmense regdeur die wêreld altyd meer positief is oor hul vooruitsigte.
tgt: far from the perception that they are complacent, politically apathetic or selfabsorbed, local and international studies consistently affirm that young people around the globe are always more positive about their prospects.

src: volgens die bevindinge van 'n peiling deur ipsos pulse of the people, wat in januarie vrygestel is, voel 61% van suidafrikaners tussen 15 en 17 jaar optimisties oor 2020. ek twyfel nie dat dit 'n sentiment is wat gedeel word deur die jeug in die algemeen nie, en veral die groep wat aan die begin van die millennium gebore is en nou hul volwasse lewe begin; diegene wat die jeug ama2000 noem.
tgt: according to the findings of an ipsos pulse of the people poll released in january, 61% of south africans aged 15 to 17 feel optimistic about 2020. i have no doubt this is a sentiment shared by youth in general and especially the cohort born at the turn of the millennium who are now beginning their adult life, the ones the youth call ama2000.

src: dit is die seuns en dogters wat ná demokrasie gebore is.
tgt: they are the sons and daughters born after democracy.

src: hoewel hulle nie persoonlike ervaring van die gruweldade van apartheid het nie, leef hulle saam met die nalatenskap van rasseongelykheid, ruimtelike onreg en armoede.
tgt: while they have no direct experience of the atrocities of apartheid, they continue to live with its legacy of racial inequity, spatial injustice and poverty.

src: hierdie jongmense is vol vertroue, selfversekerd en vol ambisie.
tgt: these young people are confident, selfassured and brimming with ambition.

src: hulle ken hul regte en is nie bang om daarop aan te dring nie.
tgt: they know their rights and aren’t afraid to demand them.

src: die jeug van ons land verteenwoordig energie, hoop, pret, potensiaal, toekoms en vryheid.
tgt: our country’s youth represent energy, hope, fun, poten tial, future and freedom.

src: hulle is digitale boorlinge wat vlot is in die gebruik van moderne tegnologieë en loopbane wil betree wat nie eens bestaan het toe hul ouers jonk was nie.
tgt: they are digital natives fluent in the use of modern technologies and look to enter careers that did not even exist at the time of their parents.

src: aan die vooraand van die staatsrede het ek die voorreg gehad om met 'n groep sulke dinamiese jongmense te gesels tydens 'n intergenerasiedialoog wat deur die nasionale agentskap vir jeugontwikkeling belê is.
tgt: on the eve of the state of the nation address i had the privilege of interacting with a group of such dynamic young people at an intergenerational dialogue convened by the national youth development agency.

src: ons het kwessies wat vir die jeug baie belangrik is bespreek, en maniere ondersoek om ons perspektiewe en optrede te belyn.
tgt: we discussed the issues that are most important to young people and examined ways in which we could align our perspectives and actions.

src: uiteraard het toegang tot werk en geleenthede die agenda oorheers.
tgt: naturally, access to employment and opportunities dominated the agenda.

src: van die 1,2 miljoen jongmense wat elke jaar tot die arbeidsmark toetree, is daar byna twee derdes wat nie werk of studeer nie.
tgt: of the 1.2 million young people entering the labour market each year, almost twothirds remain neither working nor studying.

src: die deelnemers aan die dialoog het die feit verwelkom dat die kwessie van jeugindiensneming op die hoogste regerings vlakke aandag geniet.
tgt: the participants in the dialogue welcomed the fact that the issue of youth employment was receiving attention at the highest levels of government.

src: maar die refrein was welbekend: hulle was op verskillende maniere gereed en kon bydra tot die ekonomie, onder meer as entrepreneurs, maar burokratiese rompslomp en 'n gebrek aan finansiering verhoed hulle om dit te doen.
tgt: but the refrain was familiar: they were ready and able to contribute to the economy in various ways, including as entrepreneurs, but bureaucratic red tape and lack of funding prevents them from doing so.

src: in dié verband het bright hlongwane van youth in business south africa vir my gesê daar moet meer geld vir jong entrepreneurs beskikbaar gestel word.
tgt: as bright hlongwane from youth in business south africa told me, there needs to be more funding extended to young entrepreneurs.

src: hulle wil graag sien dat 'n verskeidenheid finansiele instellings, soos instellings wat ontwikkelingsfinansiering voorsien, private beleggers en privateekwiteitsfirmas, sowel as kommersiële banke, krediet aan ons jong entrepreneurs verleen en vertroue in hulle stel.
tgt: they would like to see a variety of financial institutions, developmental financial institutions, angel investors, private equity firms as well as commercial banks extending credit and taking a bet on young entrepreneurs.

src: om ons land te laat vooruitgaan en floreer, moet ons alles in ons vermoë doen om te verseker dat jongmense op 'n betekenisvolle manier aan ons ekonomie kan deelneem, hetsy in formele indiensneming of in eie diens.
tgt: for our country to prosper and thrive we must do all within our means to ensure young people can participate in our economy in a meaningful way, whether it is in formal employment or selfemployment.

src: dit was dus gepas dat ek hierdie platform kon gebruik om die presidensiële intervensie vir jeugindiensneming te loods, wat 'n strategiese nasionale visie en plan is waarin prioriteitsoptredes uiteengesit word om jeugwerkloosheid die hoof te bied.
tgt: it was therefore fitting that i could use this platform to launch the presidential youth employment intervention, which is a strategic national vision and plan which sets out priority actions to address youth unemployment.

src: dit sluit 'n nasionale loopbaannetwerk in wat kandidate met werksgeleenthede verbind wat by hulle vermoëns pas.
tgt: this includes a national pathway management network that matches candidates with work opportunities.

src: dit stel jongmense in staat om toegang tot geleenthede te kry, aangesien sommige van hulle nie toegang tot netwerke het wat geleenthede vir hulle ontsluit nie.
tgt: this will enable young people to have access to opportunities as some of them do not have the networks that make easy access to opportunities possible.

src: gespesialiseerde kort gefokusde kursusse in vaardighede waaraan werkgewers tans ’n behoefte het, word gereël.
tgt: specialised short focused courses in skills that employers need now will be organ ised.

src: dit is daarop gerig om aandag te gee aan die probleem van 'n wanverhouding tussen die bestaande opvoedkundige, opleidingsen ontwikkelingsprogramme en die vereistes van die ekonomie.
tgt: this aims to address the problem of a mismatch between the existing educational, training and develop ment programmes and the requirements of the economy.

src: ons verwelkom die werk wat reeds op hierdie gebied gedoen word, soos die program wat tans deur die departemente van landbou, grondhervorming en landelike ontwik keling asook samewerkende regering en tradisionele sake onderneem word om 1 000 jong studente in die vrystaat op te lei in landbouen ander vaardighede.
tgt: we welcome the work already being done in this area, such as the programme currently underway through the departments of agriculture, land reform and rural development and cooperative governance and traditional affairs to train 1,000 young students in the free state in agricultural and other skills.

src: talle jongmense wil hul eie ondernemings begin.
tgt: many young people want to start their own businesses.

src: hulle het egter nie die tegniese vaardighede wat hulle kan help om dit te doen nie.
tgt: they lack the technical skills that can help them start their own businesses.

src: hierdie ingryping sal die groei van jong entrepreneurs ondersteun.
tgt: the intervention will support the growth of youth entrepreneurs.

src: entrepreneurskap is beslis nie 'n wondermiddel nie, maar ek is oortuig daarvan dat dit een doeltreffende en bewese manier is om identiteit en doel, 'n gevoel dat hulle êrens behoort en hoop vir die toekoms aan die jeug te verleen.
tgt: entrepreneurship is certainly not a panacea, but i am convinced that it is one effective and proven way to confer identity and purpose, a sense of belonging, and hope for the future for the youth.

src: die presidensiële jeugdiensprogram bied aan jongmense geleenthede om iets terug te gee aan hul gemeenskappe.
tgt: the presidential youth service programme provides opportunities for young people to give back to their communities.

src: hierdie inisiatief is daarop gerig om veranderinge te bewerkstellig en ’n grootskaalse uitwerking te hê, in teenstelling met gefragmenteerde programme wat ’n beperkte uitwerking het.
tgt: this initiative is designed to effect change and make an impact at scale, as opposed to fragmented programmes that have had limited impact.

src: ek het ook in die staatsrede aangekondig dat ons 1% van die nasionale begroting opsy sal sit vir 'n jeugindiensnemings inisiatief.
tgt: i also announced in the state of the nation address that we will set aside 1% of the national budget for a youth employ ment initiative.

src: 'n aantal programme en projekte word ontwerp om hierdie nasionale uitdaging aan te pak.
tgt: a number of programmes and projects are being designed to address this national challenge.

src: die jeug van ons land sien dit duidelik as 'n land van geleenthede en belofte, ondanks die struikelblokke wat hulle teëkom.
tgt: the youth of our country clearly see this as a land of opportunity and promise, despite the obstacles they encounter.

src: die afgelope week alleen het ek verskeie jong suidafrikaners ontmoet wat my trots maak op hoe ver ons gekom het en wat ons bereik het.
tgt: in the past week alone i have met several young south africans who make me proud of just how far we have come and what we have achieved.

src: daar is jong sportmense soos gholfwonderkind sim ‘tiger’ tshabalala, wat net net agt jaar oud is en reeds internasionale gholftoekennings inpalm.
tgt: there are young sports people like golfing prodigy sim ‘tiger’ tshabalala who is racking up international golfing awards at the tender age of 8. he is ranked 7th in the world in his age group and has won the us kids golf tournament twice.

src: ek was verheug toe graad 11leerder sinoyolo qumba van orange farm aan my skryf oor wat in die sona van hierdie jaar moet wees.
tgt: my spirits were lifted when grade 11 learner sinoyolo qumba from orange farm wrote to me about what should be in this year’s sona.

src: sy het eindelik by ons toespraak skryfspan aangesluit in die konsepfases.
tgt: she actually joined our speechwriting team in the drafting process.

src: daar is passievolle aktiviste soos ayakha melithafa van eerste rivier in die weskaap, wat vanjaar die wêreld ekonomiese forum in davos bygewoon het om 'n beroep op wêreldleiers te doen om vas te staan vir klimaatgeregtigheid.
tgt: there are passionate activists like ayakha melithafa from eerste rivier in the western cape, who attended this year’s world economic forum in davos to call on world leaders to stand firmly for climate justice.

src: toe ek kennis gemaak het met michelle nkamankeng, wat op 11jarige ouderdom afrika se jongste skrywer is en onder die tien voorste jongste skrywers ter wêreld is, was ek verstom.
tgt: i was bowled over when i met michelle nkamankeng who, at 11 years old, is africa’s youngest author and is ranked among the top ten youngest writers in the world.

src: sy het sewe boeke geskryf, waarvan die eerste een reeds op die ouderdom van ses jaar die lig gesien het.
tgt: the author of seven books and wrote her first book at the age of 6 years old.

src: soos professor jonathan jansen gesê het: 'sy is selfversekerd, welsprekend, insigryk en passievol'.
tgt: as professor jonathan jansen said: "she is confident, articulate, insightful and passionate."

src: dit is hierdie jongmense wat die ware juwele van ons land se toekoms is, en wat ons daaraan herinner dat ons vryheid gewen is deur die opofferings van die jong mans en vroue wat vasberade was dat nie net hulle nie, maar ook diegene wat na hulle sou kom, in die lig van vryheid moet lewe.
tgt: it is these young people who are the real jewels of our country’s future and who remind us that our freedom was won through the sacrifices of the young men and women who were determined that not only they, but those who came after, should live in the light of freedom.

src: ons moet aanhou om saam te werk as regering, die sakewêreld, die arbeidsektor en die burgerlike samelewing om te verseker dat die las van werkloosheid nie ons jongmense neerdruk, hul gees verpletter en hulle moedeloos maak nie.
tgt: we must continue to work together as government, business, labour and civil society to ensure that the burden of unemployment does not continue to weigh down our young people, crush their spirits and cause them to become despondent.

src: ek is vol vertroue dat die aksies wat ons in die sona uiteengesit het, 'n nuwe mylpaal vir jeugontwikkeling sal verteenwoordig.
tgt: i am confident that the actions we outlined in the sona will represent a new frontier for youth development as frantz fanon said, it is to each generation to discover its mission.

src: bmw sluit aan by die geveg teen ggg vukuzenzele unnamed bmw groep suidafrika het vyf bmw i3motors oorhandig, wat deur gemeenskapsgebaseerde sorgwerkers gebruik sal word om slagoffers van geslagsgebaseerde geweld te bereik.
tgt: bmw joins the fight against gbv vukuzenzele unnamed bmw group south africa has handed over five bmw i3 cars that will be used by communitybased care workers to reach victims of genderbased violence.

src: die voertuie is deur president cyril ramaphosa en duitse kanselier, angela merkel ontvang.
tgt: the vehicles were received by president cyril ramaphosa and german chancellor angela merkel before being hand ed over to the south african business coalition on health and aids (sabcoha) to manage on behalf of the multisectoral interim steering committee on genderbased violence and femicide (gbvf).

src: hulle is aan die suidafrikaanse sakekoalisie oor gesondheid en vigs (sabcoha) oorhandig om dit namens die multisektorale tussentydse loodskomitee vir geslagsgebaseerde geweld en vrouemoord (gggv) te beheer.
tgt: the automotive group’s contribution demonstrates the growing partnership between government and civil society, which includes the business sector and international partners, in the fight against gbvf.

src: die motorgroep se bydrae demonstreer die ontwikkelende vennootskap in die stryd teen gggv tussen die regering en burgerlike samelewing, wat die sakesektor en internasionale vennote insluit.
tgt: the initiative is part of the automotive industry transformation fund (worth r6 billion), which was established to increase participation in the sector by previously and historically disadvantaged groups, including women, youth and people with disabilities.

src: die inisiatief is deel van die motorindustrie se transformasiefonds (wat r6 miljard werd is), wat gestig is om die motorwaardeketting te transformeer en deelname aan die sektor deur voorheen en histories benadeelde groepe te bevorder, insluitend vrouens, die jeug en mense met gestremdhede.
tgt: speaking at the vehicle handover ceremony, held at the bmw group production plant in rosslyn, tshwane, president ramaphosa said the vehicles will help to save lives.

src: hy het sy dank teenoor bmw uitgespreek omdat hulle die eerste maatskappy is om voertuie te skenk en het ander aangemoedig om hulle voorbeeld te volg.
tgt: he expressed his gratitude to bmw for being the first company to donate the vehicles, and encouraged others to follow suit.

src: "dié praktiese uitdrukking van goeie korporatiewe burgerskap stuur n baie goeie en duidelike boodskap wat ons wil hê baie ander maatskappye ook moet opmerk en aanvaar.
tgt: "this practical expression of good corporate citizenship is sending a very good and clear message that we would like many other companies to also notice and adopt,president ramaphosa said.

src: "die bestaan van bmw suidafrika demonstreer gevestigde en sterk ekonomiese verbintenisse tussen [duitsland en sa]," sê president ramaphosa.
tgt: emergency response plan to address gbvfgovernment has been im plementing an emergency response plan to address gbvf.

src: noodreaksieplan om gggv die stryd aan te sêdie regering is besig om n noodreaksieplan om gggv die stryd aan te sê, in werking te stel.
tgt: a national strategic plan on gbvf, which outlines a range of measures to tackle gbvf, has also been developed.

src: "die plan fokus op die versterking van voorkomingspogings en om die veiligheid van en geregtigheid vir die vrouens en kinders van ons land te verseker.
tgt: "the plan focuses on strengthening prevention efforts, and ensuring safety and justice for the women and children of our country.

src: die plan het ook te make met ekonomiese bemagtiging, n gebied wat só belangrik is dat ons, as die regering, daarop gaan fokus," sê president ramaphosa.
tgt: the plan also touches on economic empowerment, an area that is so important that we, as government, will be focusing on," president ramaphosa said.

src: produksiegroephoof en voorsitter van bmw suidafrika, dr milan nedeljkovic, sê dat n totaal van 4 000 mense in suidafrika direk deur die bmwgroep in diens geneem word, insluitend vier uit vyf bestuurders wat plaaslik is.
tgt: group head of production and chairman of bmw south africa, dr milan nedeljkovic, said 4 000 people in south africa are directly employed at bmw group, and four out of five managers are local.

src: nedeljkovic sê dat daar ook meer as 40 000 mense indirek, deur die maatskappy se nutsmaatskappye in suidafrika, in diens geneem word.
tgt: in addition to this, more than 40 000 people are employed indirectly through the company’s utilities in south africa.

src: "ons eerste formele opleidingsfasiliteit in bmw sa het sy deure in 1978 geopen en sedertdien het meer as 2 000 mense opleiding deur bmw ondergaan en werk by bmw gekry.
tgt: "our first formal training facility in bmw sa opened its doors in 1978 and since then, more than 2 000 have gone through training with bmw and received jobs at bmw," nedeljkovic said.

src: beplan jou finansies slim dr rufaro mucheka die nuwe jaar is n ge leentheid vir n nuwe begin, om betekenisvolle doelwitte te stel, nuwe gewoontes te skep en jou vorige finansiële bestedingsgewoontes aan te pas om n meer volhoubare toekoms te verseker.
tgt: plan your finances wisely dr rufaro mucheka the new year is an opportunity for a fresh start, to set meaningful goals, create new habits and adjust your past financial spending habits to ensure a more sustainable future.

src: dit lyk asof die ekonomiese toestande van 2020 selfs moeiliker as dié van 2019 gaan wees, en dit is dus noodsaaklik dat jy jou persoonlike finansies noulettend en objektief bekyk.
tgt: the economic conditions for 2020 look likely to be even tougher than in 2019, so it is imperative that you take a hard and objective look at your personal finances.

src: om finansiële onafhanklikheid te bereik is n uitstekende doelwit, maar baie min mense weet waar om te begin.
tgt: achieving financial independence is an admirable goal, but very few people know where to start.

src: n paar goeie finansiële gewoontes sal jou help om jou nuwe jaar met sukses aan te pak.
tgt: having a few good financial habits in place will help you set your new year up for success.

src: om te verseker dat jy jou finansiële doelwitte bereik, kan jy smurtdoelwitte (smart, in engels) vir n finansieel geborge toekoms toepas,.
tgt: in order to ensure that you achieve your financial goals, you can adopt smart goals for a financially secure future.

src: dit beteken dat doelwitte gestel moet word wat: spesifiek is meetbaar is uitvoerbaar is relevant is tydsgebonde is.
tgt: this means setting goals that are: specific measurable achievable relevant timebound.

src: dit is ook belangrik dat jy jou finansies noukeurig beplan.
tgt: in addition, it is important that you plan your finances carefully.

src: hier is n paar nuttige wenke:stel jou finansiële doelwitte dink na oor jou finansiële dissipline in 2019 en stel nuwe doelwitte vir 2020. vereffen jou skuld gebruik enige oorblywende fondse of bonusse en salarisverhogings om jou skuld te vereffen, aangesien jy baie rente kan spaar deur skuld vinniger af te betaal.
tgt: here are some tips to help you along:set your financial goals reflect on your financial discipline in 2019 and set new goals for 2020. settle your debts put any spare funds or bonuses and salary increases towards eliminating debt, as paying off debt quicker could save you a significant amount of interest.

src: pas jou begroting aan, soos nodig maak die nodige aanpassings op jou begroting, verhoog jou spaargeld en verminder jou besteding, namate jy jou bestedingsgewoontes naspoor.
tgt: adjust your budget as needed as you track your spending habits, make necessary adjustments to your budget, increase your savings and decrease your spend ing.

src: spaar ‘n deel van jou salarisverhoging, as jy een kry, eerder as om jou lewenstylbesteding te verhoog.
tgt: if you receive a salary increase, allocate some to your savings rather than increasing your lifestyle spending.

src: hersien jou versekeringspolisse – evalueer jou lewe, gesondheid, gestremdheid en korttermynversekering om te verseker dat die bedrae aan jou behoeftes voldoen.
tgt: review your insurance policies – eval uate your life, health, disability and shortterm insurance to ensure that the amounts match your needs.

src: praat met n oop gemoed met jou huweliksmaat oor geld huwe liksmaats is geneig om finan siële kwessies vir mekaar weg te steek.
tgt: freely talk with your spouse about money there is a tendency for spouses to hide financial issues from each other.

src: hou maandelikse vergaderings om begrotings, jul finansiële doelwitte en dit wat julle albei vir die toekoms wil hê, te bespreek.
tgt: have monthly meetings to discuss budgets, your financial goals and what you both want for the future.

src: neem die tyd om n gedeelde visie te ontwikkel van hoe julle wil hê julle toekoms saam moet lyk.
tgt: take time to build a shared vision of what you want your future together to look like.

src: verminder jou vermaaklikheidsbe groting kry gratis aktiwiteite soos parke, biblioteke en dinge wat jy in jou buurt kan doen.
tgt: reduce your entertainment budget find free activities, such as parks, libraries and things to do in your neighbourhood.

src: daar is baie maniere om pret te hê sonder om geld te spandeer.
tgt: there are plenty of ways to have fun without spending money.

src: wenke om jou te help om by die plan te houom by jou finansiële plan te hou is nie altyd maklik nie, maar poog om die volgende te doen: gaan gereeld jou bankrekeninge na – evalueer jou besteding.
tgt: tips to help you stick to the plansticking to your financial plan is not always easy, but aim to: regularly check your bank accounts – evaluate your spending.

src: wees voorbereid op terugslae.
tgt: be prepared for setbacks.

src: vermy onbeplande skuld.
tgt: stay clear of unplanned debt.

src: koop slim.
tgt: make smart purchases.

src: kom ons werk saam om ons finansies reg te ruk vukuzenzele unnamed die begroting wat deur tito mboweni, mi nister van finansies, voorgelê is, bied 'n nugtere oorsig oor die stand van ons ekonomie.
tgt: let us work together to fix our finances vukuzenzele unnamed the budget presented by finance minister tito mboweni presents a sobering assessment of the state of our economy.

src: dit is duidelik uit die syfers dat, tensy ons nou optree om dinge om te keer, daar nog moeiliker tye voorlê.
tgt: the figures make it plain that unless we act now to turn things around, there will be even more difficult times ahead.

src: eenvoudig gestel, ons bestee baie meer as wat ons verdien.
tgt: put simply, we are spending far more than we are earning.

src: as gevolg hiervan, leen ons al hoe meer terwyl die koste om skuld te betaal styg.
tgt: as a result, we are borrowing more and more, and the cost of servicing that debt is rising.

src: trouens, skuldkoste is nou die vinnigste groeiende vlak van besteding.
tgt: in fact, debt service costs are now the fastestgrowing area of expenditure.

src: ons bestee meer aan skuldte rugbetalings as aan gesondheid; slegs onderwys en maatskapli ke ontwikkeling kry meer.
tgt: we spend more on debt repayments than we do on health; only education and social development get more.

src: hierdie posisie is onseker en onvolhoubaar.
tgt: this position is precarious and unsustainable.

src: ons moet aansienlike veran deringe aanbring en dit moet nou aangebring word.
tgt: we need to make significant changes and we need to make them now.

src: daar is verskeie redes vir die posisie waarin ons tans is.
tgt: there are several reasons for the position we’re now in.

src: ons ekonomie het die afgelope de kade nie veel gegroei nie, veral weens die wêreldwye finansiële krisis in 2008 en 'n afname in die vraag na die minerale wat ons uitvoer.
tgt: our economy has not grown much over the last decade, mainly due to the 2008 global financial crisis and a decline in demand for the minerals that we export.

src: as gevolg hiervan was die invordering van inkomste swak en moes ons meer leen om besteding aan ontwikke ling, infrastruktuur en lone te kon volhou.
tgt: as a result, revenue collection has been weak and we have had to borrow more to sustain spending on development, infrastructure and wages.

src: terselfdertyd het staatskaping en korrupsie 'n invloed gehad op bestuur, bedryfsdoeltreffendheid en finansiële volhoubaarheid by verskeie openbare instellings, insluitend ondernemings in staatsbesit (soe's).
tgt: at the same time, state capture and corruption has affected governance, operational effectiveness and financial sustainability at several public institutions, including stateowned enterprises (soes).

src: pogings wat die afgelope twee jaar aangewend is om die ekonomie te laat herleef en instellings te herbou, word nou ondermyn deur die elek trisiteitskrisis, wat groei verder beperk en 'n bykomende las op openbare finansies plaas.
tgt: efforts over the last two years to revive the economy and rebuild institutions have now been undermined by the electricity crisis, further constraining growth and placing an additional burden on public finances.

src: ons prioriteite in hierdie be groting is dus om die ekonomie weer op 'n groeipad te plaas, openbare besteding te beperk en ons skuld te stabiliseer.
tgt: our priorities in this budget therefore are to put the economy back on a path of growth, constrain public spending and stabilise our debt.

src: die begroting is 'n integrale deel van ons strewe na inklu siewe groei, werkskepping, belegging en 'n bekwame staat.
tgt: the budget is an integral part of our drive for inclusive growth, job creation, investment and a capable state.

src: ons het 'n doelbewuste besluit geneem om nie die pad van besnoeiingsmaatreëls te volg nie.
tgt: we have made a deliberate decision not to pursue a path of austerity.

src: op so 'n roete sou die uitga wes aan maatskaplike dienste waarop arm mense staatmaak, heelwat besnoei moes word.
tgt: such a route would have seen deep cuts in spending on the social services that poor people rely on.

src: dit kon daartoe gelei het dat staatsamptenare se salarisse dramaties sou verminder; die omvang van die staatsdiens, bo nusse en pensioene gekortwiek word; belasting verhoog word en die belangrikste staatsbates verkoop moes word.
tgt: it could have involved dramatically reducing the salaries of civil servants, the size of the public service, cutting bonuses and pensions, raising taxes and selling off key state assets.

src: 'n besnoeiingsbegroting sou ons groeivooruitsigte verder benadeel het en die staat se ver moë om ekonomiese aktiwiteite te stimuleer en in die behoeftes van mense te voorsien, verswak het.
tgt: an austerity budget would have damaged our growth prospects further and weakened the ability of the state to stimulate economic activity and meet people’s needs.

src: ons het in plaas daarvan 'n begroting voorgelê wat verskeie gebalanseerde en weldeurdagte maatreëls bevat om besteding in toom te hou, omset te verhoog en groei aan te moedig.
tgt: we have instead presented a budget that contains a range of balanced and wellconsidered measures to contain spending, increase revenue and encourage growth.

src: oor die volgende drie jaar ver wag ons om ongeveer r261 mil jard te bespaar deur verskillen de departemente se begrotings te besnoei en die koers waarteen die staatsdiens se loonrekening verhoog, te verlaag.
tgt: over the next three years, we expect to achieve savings of around r261 billion by cutting the budgets of several departments and reducing the rate at which the public service wage bill increases.

src: terself dertyd sal ons egter meer moet bestee om die herstruk turering van soe's soos eskom en die sal te ondersteun.
tgt: at the same time, however, we will need to spend more to support the restructuring of soes like eskom and saa.

src: as gevolg hiervan, verwag ons 'n netto vermindering van r156 miljard in nierenteuitgawes oor die mediumtermyn.
tgt: as a result, we expect a net reduction of r156 billion in noninterest spending over the medium term.

src: dit sal help om die tekort te verklein en ons leningsbehoef tes te verminder.
tgt: this will help to narrow the deficit and reduce our borrowing needs.

src: 'n groot deel van die bespa ring sal uit die vermindering van die koers waarteen ons loonrekening groei, spruit.
tgt: a large part of the savings will come from reducing the rate at which our wage bill grows.

src: dit sal verg dat gefokusde bespre kings tussen alle maatskaplike vennote, maar veral met vak bonde in die openbare sektor, gehou moet word.
tgt: this will require focused discussions among all social partners, but particularly with public sector unions.

src: hierdie be sprekings moet plaasvind met die wil om oplossings te vind.
tgt: these engagements need to be conducted in a spirit of seeking solutions.

src: ek is bemoedig deur die bereid willigheid van alle partye om oplossings deur daadwerklike onderhandelinge te vind.
tgt: i am heartened by the willingness of all parties to engage in serious negotiations aimed at finding a solution.

src: ons benadering is nie om die grootte van die staatsdiens dramaties te verminder nie, maar om te kyk na die tempo waarteen lone groei.
tgt: our approach is not to dramatically cut the size of the public service, but to examine the rate at which wages grow.

src: staats dienslone het oor baie jare ge middeld teen 'n baie hoër koers gestyg as inflasie, en ons moet dit regstel om die openbare finansies onder beheer te kry.
tgt: public service wages have on average increased at a much higher rate than inflation over many years, and we need to fix this if we are to get public finances under control.

src: dit geld ook vir die bestuur van mense se persoonlike finansies, waar enige uitgawes wat meer as inflasie styg of dit nou elektrisiteitstariewe, mobiele tariewe of kos is die begroting en finansies van elke individu altyd onder druk sal plaas.
tgt: this also applies to the management of people’s personal finances, where if any expenditure item that rises at a rate more than inflation – be it electricity tariffs, mobile tariffs or food – will always put any individual person’s budget and finances under strain and out of kilter.

src: die loonrekening is volgens ekonomiese klassifikasie die grootste bestedingskom ponent.
tgt: the wage bill remains the largest component of spending by economic classification.

src: die toename in die loonrekening het begin om die besteding aan kapitaalprojekte vir toekomstige groei en items wat van kritieke belang is vir dienslewering, te verdring.
tgt: growth in the wage bill has begun crowding out spending on capital projects for future growth and items that are critical for service delivery.

src: die staatsdiens se loonreke ning is geensins die enigste gebied waar ons koste besnoei nie.
tgt: the public service wage bill is by no means the only area where we are cutting costs.

src: ek het besluit dat die sala risse van senior openbare amps draers nie vanjaar verhoog sal word nie.
tgt: i have decided that there will be no increase in the salaries of senior public office bearers this year.

src: dit volg op 'n vermin dering in voordele wat spruit uit wysigings aan die ministe riële handboek.
tgt: this follows a reduction in benefits stemming from changes to the ministerial handbook.

src: ons sal vanjaar 'n nuwe wet publiseer waarin 'n vergoedingsraamwerk vir openbare entiteite en onder nemings in staatsbesit bekend gemaak sal word om buitenspo rige betaling aan raadslede en bestuurders te voorkom.
tgt: we will publish a new law this year introducing a remuneration framework for public entities and state owned companies to prevent excessive pay for board members and executives.

src: ons vakbondgenote is reg wanneer hulle sê dat ons op 'n bewysbare manier lekkasies van openbare fondse moet voorkom deur korrupsie uit te roei, en onreëlmatige, nuttelose en verkwistende uitgawes te beëindig.
tgt: our trade union compatriots are right in saying that we should in a demonstrable way prevent leakages of public funds by addressing corruption, ending irregular, fruitless and wasteful expenditure.

src: ons sal dit, en nog baie meer doen.
tgt: we will do this and much more.

src: net so belangrik as wat dit is om die openbare loonrekening in toom te hou om openbare finansies te stabiliseer, is dit noodsaaklik om die prestasie van die openbare sektor te verbeter om 'n meer bekwame, doeltreffende staat te bou.
tgt: as much as containing the public wage bill is critical to stabilising public finances, improving public sector performance is imperative if we want to build a more capable, efficient state.

src: ons het meer van die regte mense in die regte posisies nodig.
tgt: we need more of the right people in the right positions.

src: deur openbare besteding in toom te hou, streef ons daarna om groei te verbeter.
tgt: as we contain public spending, we are pursuing growth.

src: dit is om hierdie rede dat daar geen groot belastingverhogings is nie, ondanks die fiskale tekort.
tgt: it is for this reason that, despite the fiscal gap, there are no major tax increases.

src: in plaas daarvan is daar 'n mate van verligting vir individuele belastingbetalers en verskeie maatreëls om die korporatiewe belastingbasis te verbreed.
tgt: instead, there is some relief for individual tax payers and several measures to broaden the corporate tax base.

src: ons gaan ook voort met verreiken de hervormings in gebiede soos elektrisiteitsvoorsiening, hawens en spooren telekom munikasie om die koste van saketransaksies te verlaag.
tgt: we are also pushing ahead with farreaching reforms in areas like electricity provision, ports and rail and telecommunications to reduce the cost of doing business.

src: deur die infrastruktuurfonds wil ons finansiering vanuit 'n verskei denheid bronne mobiliseer om in 'n massiewe bouprogram te belê.
tgt: through the infrastructure fund we aim to mobilise financing from a range of sources to invest in a massive build programme.

src: deur ons industriële stra tegie en beleggingsaansporing, ontsluit ons belangrike groei gebiede.
tgt: through our industrial strategy and investment drive we are unlocking vital areas of growth.

src: ons herstel ons openbare finansies om inklusiewe groei en werkskepping moontlik te maak.
tgt: we are fixing our public finances to make inclusive growth and job creation possible.

src: in sulke omstandighede moet ons realisties wees, nie dogmaties nie.
tgt: such times call for us to be realistic, not dogmatic.

src: dit verg same werking, nie konflik nie.
tgt: they call for cooperation, not conflict.

src: steun aan pasiënte noodsaaklik in stryd teen tb dale hes die usaid tuber kulose suidafrika projek is ‘n perfek te voorbeeld van hoe die regering, gemeenskappe en nro's kan saamwerk om tuberkulose (tb) te bestry.
tgt: patient support crucial for fighting tb dale hes the usaid tuberculosis south africa project is proving to be a perfect example of how government, communities and ngos can partner together to combat tuberculosis (tb) by providing proper support to patients.

src: suidafrika het n leierskap sposisie in die globale stryd teen tb ingeneem en die ver enigde state se agentskap vir internasionale ontwikkeling (usaid) het ingetree om hulp aan te bied.
tgt: south africa has taken a position of leadership in the global fight against tb, and the united states agency for international development (usaid) has stepped in to provide assistance.

src: die projek wat oor vyf jaar strek en in 2016 begin het, word saam met die nasionale depar tement van gesondheid in agt van suidafrika se provinsies uitgevoer.
tgt: the fiveyear project, which started in 2016, is being carried out in partnership with the national department of health in eight of south africa’s provinces.

src: een van die belangrikste dele van die projek is om gemeenskapsgebaseerde nro's te on dersteun.
tgt: one of the most important parts of the project is to support communitybased ngos.

src: die projek voorsien befondsing aan 21 nro's, wat meer as 3 500 pasiënte, meest al vanuit landelike gebiede, ondersteun.
tgt: the project provides funding to 21 ngos who have supported more than 3 500 patients, the majority based in rural areas.

src: mosamaria in die vrystaatmosamaria in mangaung, is een van die nro's wat fondse van die projek ontvang het.
tgt: free state progressbased in mangaung, mosamoria is one of the ngos which has received funding from the project.

src: die organisasie het n span gemeenskapsgesondheidswer kers, n projekbestuurder en n datavaslegger wat saamwerk om te verseker dat pasiënte op behandeling bly sodat hulle oor n tydperk van ses maande genees kan word.
tgt: the organisation has a team of community health workers, a project manager and a data capturer who all work towards ensuring that patients stay on treatment so that they can be cured in a six month period.

src: "ons het 74 versorgers in diens vir dié projek.
tgt: "we employ 74 care givers for this project.

src: ons het aanvanklik met 200 pasiënte gewerk, toe 400 pasiënte en in ons huidige kontrak het ons 500 pasiënte waarmee ons op n daaglikse basis werk.
tgt: initially we worked with 200 patients, then 400 patients, and in our current contract we have 500 patients who we work with on a daily basis.

src: die pasiënte word vanaf nege kli nieke in die mangaung metro na ons verwys wanneer hulle met tb gediagnoseer word," sê mosamariakoördineerder, trudie harrison.
tgt: the patients are referred to us when they have been diagnosed as having tb from nine different clinics in the mangaung metro," says mosamaria coordinator trudie harrison.

src: mosamaria onderneem maan delikse deurtotdeur siftings veldtogte om nuwe tbpasiënte op te spoor en hulle dadelik te begin behandel.
tgt: mosamaria conducts monthly doortodoor screening campaigns to find new tb patients and get them on treatment immediately.

src: harrison sê dat mosamaria se werk die stigma van tb vermin der het en hegte verhoudings met die gemeenskap gesmee het.
tgt: harrison says that mosamoria’s work has reduced the stigma around tb, built close relationships with the community and also led to much better rates of successful treatment.

src: "514 van ons pasiënte is by voorbeeld in 2018 genees," sê harrison.
tgt: "for example, in 2018, 514 of our patients were cured," harrison says.

src: harrison deel die storie van een van mosamaria se pasiënte.
tgt: harrison shares the story of one of mosamaria’s patients.

src: hy is daagliks deur n mosama riaversorger ondersteun, wat seker gemaak het dat hy elke dag sy medikasie neem en hom ook van mieliemeel en nuwe klere voosien het.
tgt: he was given daily support by a mosamaria caregiver, who ensured that he swallowed his tablets every day and also assisted with maize meal and new clothes.

src: vulekamali bemagtig suidafrikaners more matshediso deur net op n knoppie te kliek, kan mense maklik die land se be grotings verstaan, danksy n aanlynstelsel, genaamd vu lekamali.
tgt: vulekamali empowers south africans more matshediso with a click of a button, people are able to easily get to grips with the country’s budgets, thanks to an online system called vulekamali.

src: die portaal is twee jaar gelede deur die nasionale tesourie, in samewerking met verskeie burgerlike samelewingsorgani sasies, geskep.
tgt: the portal was established two years ago by national treasury in collaboration with a number of civil society organisations.

src: dié innoverende projek het tydens die openbare sektor se 17de innovasietoekennings in 2019, n toekenning in die kate gorie innovasie wat 4iroplos sings aanwend, gewen.
