tgt: that is why the loss of even a single journalist is not just a loss to the industry but to the country.

src: ons het ons mediaveterane nodig omdat hulle wye erva ring en institusionele geheue, sowel as kritiese verslag gewing en ingeligte analise kan bied.
tgt: we need our media veterans, who bring with them vast experience and institutional memory, and are able to offer critical reportage and informed analysis.

src: ons het terself dertyd meer jong joernaliste in die beroep nodig wat tegnologieslim is, op hoogte is van nuwe tendense rakende storievertelling en in voeling is met n jeugdige bevolking se belange.
tgt: at the same time we need more young journalists in the profession who are techsavvy, abreast with new trends in storytelling and in touch with the concerns of a youthful population.

src: ons, as n samelewing, is ons volle ondersteuning aan die media verskuldig.
tgt: as a society we owe the media our full support.

src: ons kan almal ons deel doen om dié bedryf wat n krisis ervaar, te ondersteun, hetsy deur te kies om vir inhoud te betaal, skare befondsde joernalisme te ondersteun, ons sauklisen siefooie te betaal of eenvou dig n koerant te koop.
tgt: whether it is electing to pay for content, supporting crowdfunded journalism, paying our sabc license fees or simply buying a newspaper, we can all play our part to support this industry in crisis.

src: as die regering, sal ons ondanks die somber ekonomiese klimaat, steeds adverteringbesteding aan publikasies en uitsaaiers, veral gemeenskapsmedia, uitbrei.
tgt: as government, despite the gloomy economic climate we will continue to extend advertising spend to publications and broadcasters, especially community media.

src: die privaatsektor moet ook steeds die bedryf ondersteun deur advertensies en deur saam met mediahuise te werk rakende die produksie van innoverende inhoud, in ooreenstemming met globale mediatendense.
tgt: the private sector must also continue to support the industry through advertising and working with media houses in the production of innovative content in line with global media trends.

src: plaaslike filantropiese en skenkersorga nisasies behoort ook betrokke te raak en openbare belange joernalismeondernemings te ondersteun, soos wat die geval in baie demokrasieë is.
tgt: local philanthropic and donor organisations should also come on board and support public interest journalism ventures, as is the case in many democracies.

src: die verspreiding van vals nuus tydens die pandemie, hoofsaaklik op sosiale me diaplatforms, het bygedra tot die noodsaaklikheid vir meer nuus wat akkuraat, regverdig en onpartydig is.
tgt: the proliferation of fake news during the pandemic, primarily on social media platforms, has added to the urgency for more news that is accurate, fair and impartial.

src: ons mense het in dié tyd staatgemaak op ons gevestigde mediahuise vir inligting, wat weereens hul noodsaaklike rol as steun pilare vir ons demokrasie beklemtoon.
tgt: during this time our people have relied on our established media houses for information, once again underscoring their importance as pillars of our democracy.

src: namate ons die groot taak aanpak om ons ekonomie in die nadraai van die pandemie te herbou, sal die mediabedryf ons ondersteuning meer as ooit tevore nodig hê.
tgt: as we begin the great task of rebuilding our economy in the aftermath of the pandemic, the media industry will need our support more than ever.

src: die vrye pers is al beskryf as 'die waaksame beskermer van elke reg wat vrye mans en vroue op prys stel.'
tgt: the free press was once described as ‘the unsleeping guardian of every other right that free men and women prize’.

src: kgg bied toegang tot geregtigheid dale hes slagoffers van geslagsgeba seerde geweld (ggg) wat sukkel om die nodige hulp en ondersteuning te kry, word aangemoedig om die kommissie vir geslagsgelykheid (kgg) te kontak.
tgt: cge provides access to justice dale hes victims of gen derbased vio lence (gbv) who struggle to find the help and support they need are urged to contact the commission for gender equality (cge).

src: die kgg kan hulle help met kwessies rakende kin deronderhoud, seksuele teistering, geslagsdiskrimi nasie en ggg en bied gratis regsadvies en dienste aan slagoffers.
tgt: the commission can assist with child maintenance, sexual harassment, gender discrimination and gbv , and offers free legal advice and services to victims.

src: die kommissie se mofihli teleki sê dit is een van die kgg se take om slagoffers te help om hofsake aanhangig te maak.
tgt: the commission’s mofihli teleki says one of the cge’s roles is to help victims open court cases.

src: "die regsdeparte ment vergesel klaers na land droshowe om huishoudelike geweldsake aanhangig te maak en om hulp te verleen met die invul van vorms.
tgt: "the legal department accompanies complainants to magistrates courts to open domestic violence cases and assists with the completion of necessary forms.

src: die kgg speel ook n moni teringsrol in sake, insluitend verkragting en seksuele oor tredings, seksuele teistering en vrouemoord.
tgt: the commission also plays a monitoring role in cases, including rape and sexual offences, sexual harassment and femicide."

src: die kgg kan n slagoffer ook help om n beskermings bevel te verkry en werk dik wels saam met die nasionale vervolgingsgesag om te verseker dat die slagoffer n regverdige verhoor kry.
tgt: the commission can also help a victim to obtain a protection order and often works with the national prosecuting authority to ensure that the victim gets a fair trial.

src: in dié geval voer die kgg n waaksaamheidsopdrag uit en voer sy moniterings funksie oor gggsake uit.
tgt: "in this case, the commission conducts a watching brief and performs its monitoring function over gbv cases and examines key issues, such as insensitive conduct by presiding officers, secondary victimisation of survivors and in sensitive cross examination processes," teleki explains.

src: die kommissie ondersoek ook sleutelkwessies, soos onsensitiewe gedrag deur voorsittende beamptes, sekondêre viktimisasie van oorlewendes en onsensi tiewe kruisondervragings prosesse," verduidelik teleki.
tgt: when victims struggle to gain access to justice in domestic violence courts, the commission can act on their behalf, providing legal representation.

src: die kommis sie kan slagoffers ook vir sielkundige ondersteuning verwys.
tgt: it is also able to refer victims for psychological support.

src: n noodsaaklike diensdie kgg het regdeur die in perkingstyd as 'n noodsaak like diens gefunksioneer.
tgt: an essential servicethe commission has been functioning throughout lockdown as an essential service.

src: "hoewel sommige hofsake as gevolg van die inper king herskeduleer is, sal dringende aangeleenthede rakende gesinsgeweld en ggg steeds aandag deur die regstelsel geniet," sê teleki.
tgt: "even though some court cases have been rescheduled as a result of the lock down, urgent matters that pertain to domestic violence and gbv continue to receive attention through the justice system," says teleki.

src: die kgg verseker dat die publiek se regte beskerm word.
tgt: the commission ensures that the rights of the public are protected.

src: suidafrika is 'n oop demokrasie, verbind tot fundamentele menseregte, insluitend die reg op gelyk heid en die inherente waar digheid van elke persoon, volgens die bepalings van die grondwet."
tgt: south africa is an open democracy, committed to fundamental human rights, including the right to equality and the inherent dignity of the person, as per the provisions of the constitution.

src: transformasie van die landbousektor vukuzenzele unnamed die departement van landbou, grondhervorming en landelike ontwikkeling (dlglo) het onlangs aangekondig dat lede van die publiek aansoek sal kan doen om 700 000 hektaar onderbenutte of leë staatsgrond in sewe van die provinsies te huur.
tgt: transforming the agricultural sector vukuzenzele unnamed recently, the department of agriculture, land reform and rural development (dalrrd) announced that members of the public will be able to apply to lease 700 000 hectares of underutilised or vacant state land in seven of the provinces.

src: landbougrond is die hoof steun van ons natuurlike hulpbronbasis.
tgt: agricultural land is the mainstay of our natural resource base.

src: die beskikbaarheid en volhoubare gebruik van landbougrond waarop gewasse aangeplant kan word en vir veeteelt is van kardinale belang vir ons oorlewing.
tgt: the availability and sustainable use of farmland to grow crops and for animal husbandry is key to our very survival.

src: suidafrika het wyd uitgestrekte grondoppervlakke wat geskik is vir landbouproduksie, met net 37,9% van ons totale landoppervlakte wat tans vir kommersiële landbou gebruik word.
tgt: south africa has vast tracts of land suitable for agricultural production, with 37,9% of our total land area currently being used for commercial agriculture.

src: ons bewerkbare grond word, soos in baie ander lande, bedreig deur grondverswakking, waterskaarste en stedelike indringing.
tgt: like many other countries, our arable land is under threat from land degradation, water scarcity and urban encroachment.

src: ons verloor ook puik landbou grond deur veranderings in grondgebruik.
tgt: we are also losing prime agricultural land through landuse changes.

src: gegewe ons geskiedenis, is die verbreding van toegang tot landbougrond vir kommersiële produksie en bestaansboerdery, n nasionale prioriteit.
tgt: given our history, broadening access to agricultural land for commercial production and subsistence farming is a national priority.

src: hoewel die grondhervormingsproses na 1994 daartoe gelei het dat meer grond aan swart suidafrikaners teruggegee en herstel is, leef die skadelike uitwerking van die wet op naturelle grond van 1913 steeds voort in patrone van landbougrondeienaarskap.
tgt: although the post1994 land reform process has resulted in more land being restored and restituted to black south africans, the pernicious effects of the 1913 natives land act continue to be in patterns of farmland ownership.

src: die wet het baie verder gestrek as die onteiening van miljoene mense se voorvadersgrond.
tgt: the act went far beyond dispossessing millions of people of their ancestral land.

src: die uitwerking van ons verlede duur steeds voort deur grondeienaarskap wat steeds meestal in besit van die minderheid is, en landbou primêre produksie en waardekettings wat hoofsaaklik deur wit kommersiële boere besit word.
tgt: with land ownership still concentrated in the hands of the few, and agriculture primary production and value chains mainly owned by white commercial farmers, the effects of our past remain with us today.

src: die voortgesette monopolisasie van n belangrike produksiemetode soos grondverwerking, is nie net n hindernis tot die bevordering van n meer gelykmakende samelewing nie; dit is ook n resep vir maatskaplike onrus.
tgt: the continued monopolization of a key means of production like land is not just an obstacle to advancing a more egalitarian society; it is also a recipe for social unrest.

src: die hunkering na grond om te bewerk neem toe, veral onder arm landelike mense.
tgt: the hunger for land to farm is growing, especially amongst the rural poor.

src: en die tempo van grondhervorming in dié spesifieke sektor is, om verskeie redes, stadig en onbevredigend.
tgt: and for a number of reasons, the pace of land reform in this particular sector has been slow and unsatisfactory.

src: transformerende patrone van landbougrondeienaar skap is noodsaaklik om nie net die geskiedkundige ongeregtighede van die verlede die hoof te bied nie, maar ook om ons nasie se voedselsekerheid, te beveilig.
tgt: transforming patterns of agricultural land ownership is vital not just to address the historical injustices of the past, but to safeguard our nation’s food security.

src: volgens die 2019 verslag van die presidensiële raadgewende paneel oor grondhervor ming en landbou, "het 41% van mense in ons landelike gebiede en 59,4% in stedelike gebiede in ons land ernstige onvoldoende toegang tot voedsel, hoewel ons voedsel uitvoer".
tgt: as noted in the 2019 report of the presidential advisory panel on land reform and agriculture, "whilst we export food, back home 41% of people in rural areas and 59,4% in urban areas have severely inadequate access to food."

src: landbouhervorming was sedert demokrasie n prioriteit van opeenvolgende regerings.
tgt: agrarian reform has been a priority of successive administrations since democracy.

src: tussen 1994 en maart 2018, het die staat deur die grondhervormingsprogram 8,4 mil joen hektaar grond aan voor heen benadeelde individue gelewer.
tgt: between 1994 and march 2018 the state has delivered 8,4 million hectares of land to previously disadvantaged individuals under the land reform programme.

src: vordering beloop egter minder as 10% van alle kommersiële landbougrond.
tgt: but this progress amounts to less than 10% of all commercial farmland.

src: in my staatsrede vroeër vanjaar, het ek my daartoe verbind om landbougrond wat deur die staat besit word binnekort vir boerdery beskikbaar te stel.
tgt: in my state of the nation address earlier this year i committed that stateowned agricultural land would soon be released for farming.

src: dit is n belangrike mylpaal in die landbouhervormingsproses en gee uitvoering aan die vryheidsmanifes se belofte dat die grond onder diegene wat dit bewerk, verdeel sal word.
tgt: this is a major milestone in the agrarian reform process, and gives effect to the promise of the freedom charter that the land shall be shared among those who work it.

src: ons herverspreidingsvisie poog om die regte balans tussen maatskaplike ongeregtigheid en regstelling te vind en om landbouuitsette te bevorder deur meer swart boere tot die hoofstroomekonomie te laat toetree.
tgt: our redistributive vision aims to strike a balance between social justice and redress, and enhancing agricultural output by bringing more black farmers into the mainstream of the economy.

src: grond is n produktiewe bate wat wins genereer en vir kollateraal gebruik kan word om ander bates te verkry.
tgt: land is a productive asset that generates profit and can be used for collateral to secure other assets.

src: ons moet ook verseker dat grond wat vir boerderydoeleindes verkry word, produktief gebruik word.
tgt: we have to ensure that land acquired for farming purposes is productively used.

src: om die toegekende stuk grond vir boerderydoeleindes te beskerm, is die huurreg nie oordraagbaar nie.
tgt: to safeguard the allocated state land for farming purposes, the lease is not transferrable.

src: begunstigdes sal n huurkontrak met die staat teken en n huurfooi wat in ooreenstemming met die grondwaarde is, betaal.
tgt: beneficiaries will sign a lease agreement with the state and pay a rental fee consistent with the land value.

src: ons moet ook verseker dat boere op die pad na volhoubaarheid en winsgewend heid ondersteun word.
tgt: we must also ensure that farmers are supported along the road to sustainability and profitability.

src: as deel van die program, sal begunstigdes opleiding in finansiële bestuur en ondernemingsontwikkeling ontvang.
tgt: as part of this programme, beneficiaries will be trained in financial management and enterprise development.

src: ervaring het getoon dat opkomende en klein skaalse boere dikwels nie die finansiële vaardighede het om markgeleenthede te benut en met waardekettings te integreer nie.
tgt: experience has shown that emerging and smallscale farmers often lack the financial skills to exploit market opportunities and integrate with value chains.

src: ons prioritiseer vroue, die jeug en mense met gestremdhede as begunstigdes.
tgt: we are prioritizing women, youth and persons with disabilities as beneficiaries.

src: daar is bewysbare sukses met die bemagtiging van vroulike boere onder die bestaande proaktiewe grondverkrygingstrategie (pgvs).
tgt: there has been demonstrable success with empowering women farmers under the existing proactive land acquisition strategy.

src: vroue aan wie plase in verskeie provinsies deur die dlglo toegeken is, kon dit suksesvol bestuur en kon selfs na kommersiële produksie oorskakel.
tgt: in a number of provinces, women who have been allocated farms by the dalrrd have been able to run them successfully and even move into commercial production.

src: die departement belê ook, buiten grondverkryging self, in infrastruktuur, toerusting en masjinerie om dié entrepreneurs in staat te stel om suksesvolle besighede te bedryf.
tgt: in addition to the land acquisition itself, the department continues to invest in infrastructure, equipment and machinery to enable these entrepreneurs to run successful businesses.

src: verhoging van toegang tot grond en boerderygeleenthede sal werkskepping en ondernemingsontwikkeling ondersteun en die mark vir voedsel, landbougoedere en dienste, verbeter.
tgt: broadening access to land and opportunities for farming will support job creation and enterprise development, and improve the market for food, agricultural goods and services.

src: die uiteindelike doelwit van die beskikbaarstelling van dié grond, is om die landboulandskap te transformeer deur n nuwe generasie boere te ontwikkel.
tgt: the ultimate goal of releasing these land parcels is to transform the agricultural landscape by growing a new generation of farmers.

src: die verhuring van grond onder sulke gunstige toestande moet hulle aanspoor om groot planne te hê; om nie net hul eie ondernemings te ontwikkel nie, maar om gedeelde rykdom en voorspoed in die gemeenskappe waar hulle boer, te bevorder.
tgt: leasing land under such favourable conditions must spur them to think big; to not just grow their own businesses but to advance shared wealth and prosperity in the communities in which they farm.

src: so kan tieners onbeplandeswangerskap verhoed vukuzenzele unnamed daar is verskeie maniere om tienerswangerskap te verhoed, insluitend om te kies om nie seks te hê totdat jy getroud is of gereed is om kinders te hê nie.
tgt: how to prevent teenage pregnancy vukuzenzele unnamed there are various ways to prevent teenage pregnancy, including choosing not to have sex until you are married or ready to have children.

src: sommige mense dink dat onthouding (om te kies om nie seks te hê totdat jy getroud is nie) ouderwets is, terwyl ander dink dat dit moreel die beste ding is om te doen.
tgt: some people think that abstinence (choosing to not have sex until you are married) is oldfashioned, while others think it is morally the best thing to do.

src: tieners moet egter vir hulself besluit.
tgt: teenagers, however, need to decide for themselves.

src: baie mense wil nie wag totdat hulle getroud is voordat hulle seks het nie.
tgt: many people do not want to wait until they are married before having sex.

src: hulle wil ook nie enigiets oorhaastig doen en foute maak wat hulle duur te staan sal kom nie.
tgt: they also do not want to rush into anything and make costly mistakes.

src: hulle besluit dikwels dat dit die beste besluit is om seks uit te stel totdat hulle ouer is, meer verantwoordelik is, in n stabiele verhouding is met een maat en n werk het.
tgt: they often decide that delaying having sex until they are older, more responsible, in a stable relationship with one partner and have a job, is the best thing to do.

src: daar is ook ander dinge wat jy kan doen om jouself te beskerm as jy onthouding kies of kies om seks uit te stel: kies jou vriende versigtig.
tgt: if you choose abstinence or delaying sex, there are other things you can do to protect yourself: choose your friends care fully.

src: vriende behoort jou beste belange op die hart te dra en jou besluit om nie seks te hê nie, te respekteer.
tgt: friends should want what is best for you and should respect your decision not to have sex.

src: wees versigtig vir situasies wat onveilig kan wees, soos vriende wat drink of dwelms gebruik, wat tot onveilige seks kan lei.
tgt: beware of situations that could be unsafe, like friends drinking or taking drugs, that could lead to unsafe sex.

src: wees versigtig vir maats wat vir jou sê dat jy saam met hulle sal slaap as jy hulle lief het.
tgt: beware of partners who claim that you will sleep with them if you love them.

src: luister na en leer van mense wat self tienerswanger skap ervaar het.
tgt: listen to and learn from those who have gone through teenage pregnancy.

src: hulle weet wat die foute en nadele behels.
tgt: they know the mistakes and disadvantages.

src: luister na en leer van jou ouers oor hulle lewens ervarings.
tgt: listen to and learn from your parents about their life experiences.

src: as jy besluit dat onthouding en om seks uit te stel nie die beste keuses vir jou is nie en jy eerder nie wil wag nie, moet jy tyd maak om oor beskerming te leer, insluitend voorbehoeding, wat beteken jy gebruik n metode (meganies of chemies) om swangerskap te verhoed.
tgt: if you decide that abstinence and delaying sex are not the best decisions for you and you would rather not wait, take the time to learn about protection, including contraception, which is using a method (mechanical or chemical) to prevent pregnancy.

src: daar is verskeie voorbehoedmiddels wat op verskillende maniere werk om swangerskap te verhoed.
tgt: there are various contraceptives that work in different ways, but they are all designed to prevent pregnancy.

src: dit sluit in voorbehoedmiddels wat mondelings geneem word, bekend as 'die pil'; voorbehoedmiddels wat ingespuit word; en manlike en vroulike kondome.
tgt: they include oral contraception, known as ‘the pill’; injectable contraception; and male and female condoms.

src: wat kan ek doen as ek swanger raak?
tgt: what can i do if i’m pregnant?

src: as jy dink dat jy dalk swanger is, neem iemand wat jy vertrou saam met jou na jou naaste kliniek om n swangerskaptoets te laat doen.
tgt: if you think you might be pregnant, take someone you trust with you to your nearest clinic to have a pregnancy test.

src: voorgeboortelike sorg (om na jou ongebore baba om te sien) is belangrik en begin gewoonlik op agt weke.
tgt: antenatal care (taking care of the unborn baby) is important and usually starts at eight weeks.

src: jou plaaslike kliniek kan jou met voorgeboortelike sorg help en n gesondheidsorgwerker sal jou help om n plan te ontwikkel wat gepas is vir jou en jou baba.
tgt: your local clinic can help you with antenatal care and a healthcare worker will assist you to develop a plan that is suitable for you and your baby.

src: stimulering van n ekonomie wat werk vukuzenzele unnamed die bekendstelling van die presidensiële indiensne mingstimulus verlede week, dui op n fundamentele verskuiwing in ons benadering om werkloosheid aan te pak.
tgt: building a society that works vukuzenzele unnamed the launch of the presidential employment stimulus last week marks a fundamental shift in our ap proach to tackling unem ployment.

src: ons onderneem n verryken de en ambisieuse openbare belegging in menslike kapitaal, met die staat as beide die skepper en instaatsteller van werksgeleenthede.
tgt: we are undertaking a farreaching and ambitious public investment in human capital, with the state as both a creator and an enabler of jobs.

src: die presidensiële indiensnemingstimu lus is ongeëwenaar in skaal en omvang, en behels n openbare belegging van r100 miljard oor die volgende drie jaar.
tgt: the presidential employment stimulus is unprecedented in its scale and breadth, involving a public investment of r100 billion over the next three years.

src: ons sal werksgeleenthede wat direk befonds word en bestaansondersteuningsingrypings beskerm en skep, terwyl ons arbeidsmark ná die koronaviruspandemie herstel.
tgt: we will protect and create directlyfunded jobs and livelihood support interventions while the labour market recovers from the coronavirus pandemic.

src: elkeen hiervan is gereed om geïmplementeer te word en is bykomend tot bestaande verpligtinge.
tgt: each of these is ready for implementation, and is additional to existing commitments.

src: terwyl sommige van die ingrypings voortbou op die sterkpunte van bestaande programme, sluit die stimulus ook nuwe en innoverende benaderings in.
tgt: while some of the interventions build on the strengths of existing programmes, the stimulus also includes new and innovative approaches.

src: dit sluit n fokus in op wat ons 'maatskaplike indiensneming' noem.
tgt: this includes a focus on what we have termed ‘social employment’.

src: ons gaan van die veronderstelling uit dat daar geen tekort aan werk is wat gedoen moet word om die magdom maatskaplike probleme in ons samelewing op te los nie.
tgt: we are working from the premise that there is no shortage of work to be done to address the many social problems in our society.

src: die doelwit is om die aansienlike kreatiwiteit, inisiatief en institusionele vermoëns te ondersteun wat in die breër samelewing bestaan, om mense te betrek by werk wat die algemene belang dien.
tgt: the aim is to support the considerable creativity, initiative and institutional capabilities that exist in the wider society to engage people in work that serves the common good.

src: dié werk dek n wye verskeidenheid temas, insluitend voedselsekerheid, die beëindiging van geslagsgebaseerde geweld, opgradering van informele nedersettings en baie meer.
tgt: this work cuts across a range of themes, including food security, ending genderbased violence, informal settlement upgrading and much more.

src: dit sal die openbare sektor se pogings aanvul om groter omvang en maatskaplike impak te verseker, asook nuwe tipes vennootskappe met diverse maatskaplike rolspelers.
tgt: this will supplement the efforts of the public sector, allowing for greater scale and social impact as well as new forms of partnership with diverse social actors.

src: die stimulus sluit n nuwe nasionale program in om onderrigen skoolassistente in skole aan te stel.
tgt: the stimulus includes a new national programme to employ teaching and school assistants in schools.

src: skole doen nou reeds dié aanstellings en bied nuwe geleenthede in elke gemeenskap oor die lengte en breedte van die land.
tgt: schools are making these appointments right now, delivering new opportunities in every community across the length and breadth of the country.

src: openbare indiensneming het nie net op ongeskoolde werk betrekking nie.
tgt: public employment is not just for unskilled work.

src: daar is n geïntegreerde fokus op graduandi, met geleenthede vir verpleërs, wetenskapgraduandi, ambagsmanne en ander.
tgt: there is a crosscutting focus on graduates, with opportunities for nurses, science graduates, artisans and others.

src: die stimulus sal ook werksgeleenthede in kwesbare sektore, wat hard deur die pandemie getref is, beskerm.
tgt: the stimulus will also protect jobs in vulnerable sectors that have been hit hard by the pandemic.

src: ondersteuning sal aan vroeë kinderontwikkelingspraktisyns, hoofsaaklik vroue in eie diens, verskaf word.
tgt: support will be provided to early childhood development practitioners, mainly selfemployed women.

src: meer as 74 000 kleinboere sal ook produksieinsettoelae ontvang.
tgt: over 74,000 small farmers will also receive production input grants.

src: as n nasie benodig ons kuns en kultuur om ons gemoedere weer te lig — die stimulus verskaf nuwe befondsing om die sektor weer op sy voete te kry, insluitend ondersteuning aan digitale inhoudskepping en uitbreiding van ehandelplatforms.
tgt: as a nation, we need arts and culture to lift our spirits once more – the stimulus provides new funding to help the sector back onto its feet, including support to digital contentcreation and expansion of ecommerce platforms.

src: dit sal kunstenaars in staat stel om aan te pas by die nuwe marktoestande wat die pandemie op ons afgedwing het en om nuwe geleenthede vir groei aan te gryp.
tgt: this will enable artists to adapt to the new market conditions that the pandemic has imposed on us all and to seize new opportunities for growth.

src: n kritieke instaatsteller vir breër werkskepping, wat selfs belangriker gemaak is deur die pandemie, is konnektiwiteit.
tgt: a critical enabler for wider job creation, made more important by the pandemic, is connectivity.

src: die stimulus sal bekostigbare, hoëspoedbreëbandkonnektiwiteit aan laeinkomste huishoudings verskaf deur innoverende verbindingsubsidies en die uitbreiding van openbare wifi, ten einde die digitale kloof te oorbrug.
tgt: to overcome the digital divide, the stimulus will provide affordable, highspeed broadband to lowincome households through innovative connection subsidies and the expansion of free public wifi.

src: ons betwyfel geensins die omvang van die taak wat voorlê namate ons land herstel van die verwoesting van die koronaviruspandemie nie.
tgt: as our country recovers from the devastation of the coronavirus pandemic, we are in no doubt as to the size of the task before us.

src: ons moet n ekonomiese herstelpunt bereik wat vinnig en inklusief is.
tgt: we have to achieve an economic recovery that is swift and inclusive.

src: ons moet soveel moontlik van ons mense weer aan die werk kry.
tgt: we have to get as many of our people as possible working again.

src: ons moet ook verlore veld herwin betreffende die verskaffing van basiese dienste en kritieke infrastruktuur, wat maat skaplike uitdagings aanpak en townships en landelike gemeenskappe transformeer.
tgt: we also have to regain lost ground in the provision of basic services and critical infrastructure, addressing social challenges and transforming townships and rural communities too.

src: openbare betrokkenheid is n instrument wat dit alles kan doen: werkskepping op skaal op kort termyn terwyl markte herstel, met die skepping van maatskaplike waarde in die proses.
tgt: public employment is an instrument that can do all of the above: creating jobs at scale in the short term while markets recover, and creating social value in the process.

src: die voorbeeld word dikwels genoem van die massiewe openbarewerkeprogram wat deur die verenigde state onderneem is ná die groot depressie in die 1930's.
tgt: the example is often cited of the massive public works programme undertaken by the united states after the great depression in the 1930s.

src: dit was nie net n stimulus nie, maar het ook maatskaplike deelname en insluiting behels.
tgt: this was not just a stimulus, but also promoted social participation and inclusion.

src: daar is verskeie voorbeelde van innoverende openbare werkskeppingsprogramme in die ontwikkelende wêreld, insluitend indië, etiopië en hier in suidafrika.
tgt: there are several examples of innovative public employment programmes in the developing world, including in india, ethiopia and here in south africa.

src: dié programme maak n direkte beleg ging in plaaslike ekonomieë, wat eerstens armer gebiede bereik en plaaslike klein ondernemings ondersteun en van daar af deursyfer na die breër ekonomie.
tgt: these programmes make a direct investment in local economies, reaching poorer areas first, supporting local small enterprises and trickling up into the wider economy from there.

src: sulke programme bevorder ook maatskaplike deelname en insluiting, wat aan gemeenskappe die middele verskaf om hulle lewens te verander namate hulle nuwe tipes werk onderneem.
tgt: they also promote social participation and inclusion, providing communities with the means to change their lives as they undertake new forms of work.

src: sodoende dra hulle by tot die transformasie op beide plaaslike vlak en in die breër samelewing.
tgt: in doing so, they contribute to transformation both at a local level and within broader society.

src: direkte openbare belegging om indiensneming te ondersteun en ekonomiese geleenthede te skep wat maatskaplike waarde genereer, doen meer as om net die werkloosheidskrisis aan te pak.
tgt: direct public investment to support employment and create economic opportunities that generate social value does more than just tackle the unemployment crisis.

src: dit is responsief, want dit gebruik die staat se hulpbronne om op plaaslike gemeenskapsbehoeftes te reageer, hetsy vir groener ruimtes, voedselsekerheid, nog meer vroeë kinderontwikkelingsentrums, of beter en meer toeganklike paaie.
tgt: it is responsive, because it uses the state’s resources to respond to local community needs, be it for greener spaces, food security, more early childhood development centres, or for better and more accessible roads.

src: dit is progressief, want dit bied maatskaplike beskerming en inkomstesekerheid aan diegene wat armoede in die gesig staar omdat hulle nie werk kan kry nie.
tgt: it is progressive, because it offers social protection and income security to those who face destitution because they are unable to find work.

src: dit is n belegging in die toekoms, omdat dit die breër ekonomie se herstelagenda ondersteun deur dringend ons mense aan die werk te kry om ons nasionale en munisipale infrastruktuur te verbeter.
tgt: it is an investment in the future, in that it supports the broader economic recovery agenda by urgently getting our people to work on improving our national and municipal infrastructure.

src: deur middel van die ingrypings in die stimulus skep ons werk vir diegene wat dit nodig het, terwyl dit n blywende impak op gemeenskappe laat.
tgt: through the interventions in the stimulus, we are creating work for those who need it, while leaving a lasting impact on entire communities.

src: net soos openbare diensprogramme wêreldwyd, ondersteun en vul die indiensnemingstimulus die kritieke rol van die privaatsektor in werkskepping aan.
tgt: like public employment programmes across the world, this employment stimulus supports and complements the critical role of the private sector in creating jobs.

src: dit is teensiklies omdat, namate die herstelproses vorder, die skaal van openbare indiensneming sal afneem.
tgt: it is countercyclical, in that as the recovery advances, the scale of public employment will decline.

src: die werkservaring en vaardighede wat deur begunstig des van die presidensiële in diensnemingstimulus benodig word, sal hulle vooruitsigte om formele werk te verkry, verbeter.
tgt: the work experience and skills acquired by beneficiaries of the presidential employment stimulus will improve their prospects of securing formal employment.

src: die ervaring wat opgedoen word, bied ook n pad na entrepreneursaktiwiteit.
tgt: the experience gained is also a pathway to entrepreneurial activity.

src: deelne mers sal hulle vaardighede en vermoëns om hulle eie besighede te begin, verbeter en kan die vaste inkomste wat deur die openbare indiensneming verskaf word gebruik om na ander inkomstegenererende aktiwiteite uit te brei.
tgt: participants will improve their skills and capabilities to start their own businesses, and can use the steady income provided by public employment to branch out into other incomegenerating activities.

src: ek het deurentyd bevestig dat die covid19krisis ook n geleentheid bied om ons samelewing weer beter op te bou.
tgt: i have consistently affirmed that the covid19 crisis is also a window of opportunity to build back better.

src: ons sal, in hierdie tyd van groot omwenteling, onsself geen guns bewys deur onrealistiese beloftes te maak wat verwagtinge skep, net om tekort te skiet wanneer dit nie realiseer nie.
tgt: at this time of great upheaval, we would be doing ourselves no favours by making unrealistic promises that raise expectations, only to come short when they are not met.

src: dit is waarom elkeen van die betrekkings en bestaansondersteuning ten volle befonds word, tesame met n duidelike implementeringsplan.
tgt: this is why each of the jobs and livelihood support interventions is fully funded, with a clear implementation plan.

src: die indiensnemingstimulus gaan nie oor vae verpligtinge vir eendag in die toekoms nie, maar oor werk wat hier en nou geskep word.
tgt: the employment stimulus is not about vague commitments for some time in the future, but about jobs being created right here and now.

src: die stimulus is die resultaat van uitgebreide oorlegpleging met nasionale departemente, provinsies en metrorade om vinnig indiensnemingprogramme te skep wat binne ses maande bekendgestel en uitgebrei kan word.
tgt: the stimulus is the result of extensive consultation with national departments, provinces and metros to rapidly design employment pro grammes that can be rolled out or expanded within six months.

src: die implementeringsdepartemente en ander belanghebbendes is streng geassesseer op grond van hulle implementeringskapasiteit.
tgt: the implementing departments and other stakeholders were rigorously assessed on their capacity to implement.

src: in elkeen van die programme wat deel uitmaak van die stimulus, sal geleenthede wyd geadverteer word en werwing sal regverdig, oop en deursigtig wees.
tgt: in every one of the programmes that fall under the stimulus, opportunities will be widely advertised and recruitment will be fair, open and transparent.

src: die doelwitte wat ons vir onsself gestel het is realisties, meetbaar en bereikbaar en put uit vorige ervaring en internasionale beste praktyk.
tgt: the goals we have set ourselves are realistic, measura ble and achievable, and draw lessons from past experience and international best prac tice.

src: ons mense is gereed en gewillig om te werk.
tgt: our people are ready and willing to work.

src: hierdie geweldige potensiaal moet benut word en ons kollektiewe vaardighede en vermoëns moet aangewend word om ons land in die nasleep van die koronavirus te herbou.
tgt: this vast potential must be harnessed, and our collective skills and capabilities brought to bear in rebuilding our country in the wake of the coronavirus.

src: die presidensiële indiensnemingstimulus verskaf verligting aan gesinne wat n lang, moeilike winter verduur het, met inkomste wat baie verminder het en vir individue wat reeds baie jare sonder werk moes oorleef.
tgt: the presidential employment stimulus provides a respite for families who have endured a long hard winter with greatly reduced income, and for individuals who have spent many years without work.

src: regte, behoorlike werk is elke mens se reg.
tgt: real, decent work is the right of every human being.

src: voorkom dat jy n slagoffer van mensehandel word silusapho nyanda namate die aantal gerapporteerde mensehandelgevalle toeneem, is dit belangrik dat jy stappe doen om jou veiligheid te verseker.
tgt: avoid becoming a human trafficking victim silusapho nyanda as the number of human trafficking cases being reported increases, it is important that you take steps to ensure your safety.

src: om te voorkom dat jy n slagoffer van mensehandel word, moet jy nie alleen, saans, of in verlate strate rondbeweeg nie.
tgt: to avoid becoming a victim of trafficking, you should avoid travelling alone at night or on deserted streets.

src: dit is belangrik dat jy te alle tye bewus is van jou omgewing.
tgt: it is important that you are aware of your surroundings at all times.

src: deur paraat te wees, sal jy makliker iets kan raaksien wat onvanpas is.
tgt: being alert will help spot something that is out of place.

src: as jy agterkom dat n persoon of n voertuig jou volg, gaan dadelik na 'n plek met baie mense en kontak die polisie of iemand wat jy vertrou.
tgt: if you notice a person or a car following you, find a crowded place and contact the police or someone you trust immediately.

src: mensehandelaars gebruik dikwels die belofte van werk om hulle slagoffers te ontvoer en sal potensiële slagoffers nader om aan hulle n werk of een of ander tipe geleentheid te bied.
tgt: traffickers often use the promise of a job to kidnap their victims and will approach potential victims offering them a job or some kind of opportunity.

src: dié tipe mensehandel kan enige plek gebeur — selfs op sosiale media, by die skool, in die winkelsentrum en buite jou huis.
tgt: this form of trafficking can happen anywhere – even on social media, at school, in the mall and outside your house.

src: maak seker dat jy deeglike navorsing oor potensiële werkgewers doen voordat jy hulle van aangesig tot aangesig vir onderhoude ontmoet.
tgt: make sure you conduct thorough research on potential employers before going to meet them in person for interviews.

src: jy kan by die kommissie vir maatskappye en intellektuele eiendom navraag doen om te bevestig dat die maatskappy regtig bestaan.
tgt: this can be done by verifying that the company really exists by checking with the companies and intellectual property commission.

src: jy moet ook vir iemand wat jy vertrou sê wanneer jy na n onderhoud toe gaan en met hulle reël dat hulle jou ná n sekere tydperk skakel.
tgt: you should also tell some one you trust when you are going to an interview and arrange for them to call you after a certain amount of time.

src: laat iemand saam met jou gaan, indien moontlik.
tgt: if possible, have someone go with you.

src: wees versigtig wanneer jy sosiale media gebruik, veral wanneer n vreemdeling hulp, geld, blyplek of n werksgeleentheid aanbied in reaksie op iets wat jy geplaas het.
tgt: be careful when using social media, especially when a stranger offers to help, offers money, a place to stay or a job opportunity in response to something you posted.

src: as jy uitgaan om iemand nuut te ontmoet, doen dit op n openbare plek en sê vir iemand wat jy vertrou waar jy is.
tgt: if you are going out to meet someone new, do so at a public place and let someone you trust know where you are.

src: wanneer jy saam met kinders uitgaan, hou hulle naby jou en maak seker dat jy hulle te alle tye kan sien.
tgt: when going out with children, keep them close and make sure you can see them at all times.

src: jy behoort nooit n kind te stuur om n taak te verrig sonder dat n volwassene wat jy vertrou toesig hou nie.
tgt: you should never send a child on an errand without a trusted adult to watch over them.

src: herstel in die vooruitsig vir sa vukuzenzele unnamed jakarandabome is oral in die land se hoof stad in volle blom, wat aandui dat die somer aangebreek het.
tgt: recovery on the horizon for sa vukuzenzele unnamed the jacaranda trees are in full bloom across the nation’s capital, heralding the start of summer.

src: na 'n lang en moeilike winter behoort die begin van 'n nuwe sei soen ons met optimisme te vervul.
tgt: after a long and difficult winter, the beginning of a new season should fill us with optimism.

src: toe die nasionale ramptoe stand in maart afgekondig is, was ons onmiddellike prioriteit om die versprei ding van die virus te beperk en noodleniging aan burgers, gemeenskappe, werkers en sakeondernemings te bied.
tgt: when the national state of disaster was declared in march, our immediate priority was to contain the spread of the virus and provide emergency relief to citizens, communities, workers and businesses.

src: deur die loop van agt maan de en met die ondersteuning van ons maatskaplike ven note het ons 'n omvattende stel maatreëls ingestel om die sosiale en ekonomiese impak van die pandemie te beperk.
tgt: over the course of eight months and with the support of our social partners, we rolled out a comprehensive set of measures to limit the social and economic impact of the pandemic.

src: ons het maatskaplike steun op ’n ongekende skaal wat nog nooit voorheen in die land gesien is nie, uitgebrei.
tgt: we massively expanded social protection on a scale that has never been attempted before in this country.

src: ons is een van die min lande ter wêreld waar die reg op toegang tot maatskaplike se kerheid in die grondwet ver vat is, en ons kan trots wees dat ons gedurende hierdie ernstige krisis op baie ma niere praktiese uitdrukking aan hierdie reg gegee het.
tgt: we are one of the few countries in the world where the right of access to social security is enshrined in the constitution, and we can be proud that during this grave crisis we gave practical expression to this right in many ways.

src: benewens ons bestaande maatskaplike toelaes, wat elke maand meer as 17 mil joen mense bereik, het ons die ouderdoms, ongeskiktheidsen kinderonderhoudstoelae aangevul.
tgt: in addition to our existing social grants, which reach more than 17 million people every month, we toppedup the old age, disability and child support grants.

src: ons het ook 'n spesiale covid19 maats kaplike noodverligtingstoe lae ingestel, wat tot dusver ses miljoen mense bereik het.
tgt: we rolled out a special coronavirus disease (covid19) social relief of distress grant, which has reached some six million people to date.

src: dit is gedoen binne ’n paar weke nadat die ramptoestand verklaar is.
tgt: this was done within weeks of the national state of disaster being declared.

src: die omvang van so 'n on derneming kan nie onderskat word nie.
tgt: the scale of such an undertaking cannot be understated.

src: om hierdie stelsel aanlyn te bring, het omvat tende samewerking tussen die suidafrikaanse agents kap vir maatskaplike seker heid, die suidafrikaanse inkomstediens, binnelandse sake en talle ander instansies geverg.
tgt: to bring this system online there was extensive collaboration between the south african social security agency, south african revenue service, home affairs and many others.

src: ons het 'n ten volle outomatiese aansoekenuitbetalingsproses opgestel en veelvuldige databasisse geïntegreer, insluitend die nasionale bevolkingsregister en die databasis van die werk loosheidsversekeringsfonds (uif).
tgt: we set up a fully automated application and disbursement process, and integrated multiple databases, including the national population register and the unemployment insurance fund (uif) database.

src: ons het nuwe toepas singskanale soos whatsapp en ussd ingestel en met die handelsbanke stelsels geskep om die verifikasie van bank besonderhede moontlik te maak.
tgt: we set up new application channels like whatsapp and ussd, and created systems with the commercial banks to enable banking detail verification.

src: dit is 'n merkwaardige prestasie in 'n baie kort tyd.
tgt: this is a remarkable achievement in a very short space of time.

src: behalwe die maatreëls wat ons getref het om lewenson derhoud te beskerm en te onderhou, het ons ook suk kelende ondernemings on dersteun.
tgt: alongside the measures we took to protect and sustain livelihoods, we also supported ailing businesses.

src: ons het steun aan klein ondernemings verleen in die vorm van skuldver ligting, finansiering en die uitstel van belastingbetaling, sowel as ander hulpmiddels.
tgt: we provided relief to small businesses in the form of debt relief, finance, tax payment deferrals and other instruments.

src: ons het 'n covid19leningwaarborgskema geïmplementeer om onder nemings in staat te stel om hul bedryfsuitgawes tydens die inperking te dek, en ons is tans besig om te kyk hoe hier die skema meer behoeftige ondernemings kan bereik.
tgt: we implemented a covid19 loan guarantee scheme to enable businesses to meet their operational expenses during the lockdown, and are currently looking at how this scheme can reach more companies in need.

src: ons het inkomstebes kerming aan werkers en verligting aan sakeeienaars verskaf deur middel van die hulpskema vir tydelike werkgewers wat deur die uif bestuur word.
tgt: we provided income protection to workers and relief to business owners through the temporary employer relief scheme administered by the uif.

src: al hierdie maatreëls was ’n regstreekse reaksie op 'n noodgeval en was van nature tydelik.
tgt: these were all in direct response to an emergency and were by nature temporary.

src: sommige kom nou tot 'n einde, terwyl ander verleng is terwyl die arbeidsmark herstel.
tgt: some are now coming to an end, while others have been extended as the labour market recovers.

src: die maatreëls wat ons geïm plementeer het, het daartoe bygedra om ons samelewing te beskerm teen die felle aan slae van covid19.
tgt: the measures we implemented went a long way towards protecting our society from the harsh winds of covid19.

src: die by komende toelaes het gehelp om te voorkom dat miljoene mense tot onder die voedselarmoedegrens daal.
tgt: the additional grants helped to prevent millions of people from falling below the food poverty line.

src: as ons nie ingegryp het om lewensonderhoud te verseker en sakeondernemings te red nie, sou die lewensomstan dighede van ons mense en die omstandighede van duisende ondernemings aansienlik er ger gewees het.
tgt: had we not intervened to secure livelihoods and save businesses, the living conditions of our people and the circumstances of thousands of businesses would have been considerably worse.

src: nou is ons in 'n oorgang van verligting na herstel.
tgt: now we are in a transition from relief to recovery.

src: die noodmaatreëls wat ons ingestel het, het 'n stewige grondslag gelê waarop ons ekonomie herbou kan word.
tgt: the emergency measures we put in place have laid a firm foundation on which to rebuild our economy.

src: aangesien ons fokus nou na die implementering van die ekonomiese heropbouenherstelplan verskuif, is ons prioriteit om groei te stimu leer en werk te skep.
tgt: as our focus now shifts to the implementation of the economic reconstruction and recovery plan, our priority will be to stimulate growth and create jobs.

src: daar is reeds op verskeie gebiede vordering gemaak.
tgt: there has already been progress in a number of areas.

src: na afloop van ons infra struktuurprojektafelronde verlede week, het ons nuwe finansieringsverbintenisse vir infrastruktuurontwikkeling verkry.
tgt: we are seeing new funding commitments for infrastructure development following an infrastructure project roundtable last week.

src: verskeie werkpro gramme onder die president se indiensnemingstimulus het reeds begin.
tgt: a number of employment programmes under the presidential employment stimulus have started.

src: ons sit ook ekonomiese hervormings voort op gebiede soos energie en telekommunikasie.
tgt: we are pushing ahead with economic reforms in areas such as energy and telecommunications.

src: planne word omgeskakel na aksie en verbintenisse word weerspieël in werkskepping en geleenthede.
tgt: plans are being converted to action and commitments are being reflected in jobs and opportunities.

src: dit is soveel te meer krities in hierdie tyd, veral met die feestyd wat aanbreek, dat ons nie ons eie ondergang moet bewerkstellig nie.
tgt: it is all the more critical at this time, more so with the festive season approaching, that we do not become the architects of our own undoing.

src: ons moet almal die uiterste waaksaamheid aan die dag lê om die virus te stuit.
tgt: the greatest vigilance is required from us all to keep the virus at bay.

src: 'n oplewing op enige skaal sal nie net ons gesondheids voordele dramaties omkeer nie.
tgt: a resurgence at any scale will not just dramatically reverse our health gains.

src: dit sal die groen lote van ekonomiese herstel wat ont kiem het, doodwurg en ons van die lente na die winter terugneem.
tgt: it will choke the green shoots of economic recovery that have emerged, and take us back from spring to winter.

src: om 'n tweede vlaag van covid19infeksies te voor kom, moet ons die riglyne vir openbare gesondheid wat in plek is, getrou nakom.
tgt: to prevent a second wave of covid19 infections, we must observe the public health guidelines that remain in place.

src: as ons nie 'n masker dra tydens sosiale byeenkomste nie, of geleenthede bywoon waar mense saamdrom, stel ons nie net onsself en ander in gevaar nie.
tgt: when we fail to wear a mask at a social gathering, when we attend crowded events, we are not only putting ourselves and others at risk.

src: ons stel ook ons ekonomiese herstel in gevaar.
tgt: we are also putting our economic recovery in jeopardy.

src: laat ons almal steeds ons kant bring.
tgt: let us all continue to play our part.

src: die positiewe optrede om 'n masker te dra, om sosiale afstand te hou en gereeld ons hande te was, het ons gehelp om die ergste gevolge van die pandemie te oorkom.
tgt: the positive actions of wearing a mask, of maintaining social distancing and of regular hand washing helped us overcome the worst effects of the pandemic.

src: drink water om ontwatering te voorkom allison cooper erge hitte en ’n gebrek aan vloeistowwe in die liggaam kan tot ontwatering en hitteuitputting lei, wat dodelik kan wees.
tgt: healthdrink water to avoid dehydration allison cooper severe heat and not drinking enough fluids can lead to dehydration and heatstroke, which can be fatal.

src: volgens die weskaapse departement van gesondheid hou die somerhitte 'n groot gevaar van ontwatering in; dit beteken dat die verlies aan water skadelik vir die liggaam kan wees.
tgt: according to the western cape department of health, the summer heat brings with it a high risk of dehydration, which is a harmful loss of water in the body.

src: ontwatering word gewoonlik veroorsaak wanneer ’n mens nie genoeg vloeistowwe drink om die water wat deur sweet verlore gaan, aan te vul nie.
tgt: dehydration is usually caused by not drinking enough liquids to replenish the water lost by sweating.

src: dit kan ook veroorsaak word deur siektes wat met braking en/of diarree gepaard gaan; en deur sweet as gevolg van ’n hoë koors.
tgt: it can also be caused by an illness, that causes vomiting or diarrhoea; and by sweating from a fever.

src: die verlies aan liggaamsvloeistowwe word nie net deur strawwe fisiese aktiwiteite veroorsaak nie, maar kan ook ontstaan deur aktiwiteite soos stap, tuinmaak of ﬁ etsry, veral in warm of bedompige toestande.
tgt: the loss of body fluids does not only occur during hard physical activities, but can also result from walking, gardening or riding a bike, especially in hot or humid conditions.

src: as jy ontwater, kan jou liggaam nie soos gewoonlik funksioneer nie.
tgt: when you are dehydrated, your body cannot function as usual.

src: kinders jonger as vyf jaar, bejaardes en mense wat buite werk, is veral kwesbaar vir ontwatering en sonsteek ('n toestand wat veroorsaak word as 'n mens se liggaam oorverhit).
tgt: children younger than five, the elderly and people working outdoors are especially vulnerable to dehydration and heatstroke (a condition caused when your body overheats).

src: sonsteek is 'n mediese noodgeval.
tgt: heatstroke is a medical emergency.

src: kry onmiddellik mediese hulp vir enige van hierdie simptome: jy voel verward of jou spraak word stadig en onduidelik.
tgt: seek medical help immediately for any of these symptoms: feeling confused or your speech starts to become slow and unclear.

src: naarheid en braking.
tgt: nausea and vomiting.

src: vinnige hartklop.
tgt: a throbbing headache.

src: waarskuwingstekens van ontwatering sommige van die vroeë waarskuwingstekens van ontwatering sluit in: dors en lighoofdigheid.
tgt: dehydration warning signssome of the early warning signs of dehydration include: feeling thirsty and lightheaded.

src: ’n droë mond.
tgt: a dry mouth.

src: moegheid.
tgt: tiredness.

src: urine met ’n donker kleur en ’n skerp reuk.
tgt: having dark coloured, strongsmelling urine.

src: urineer minder dikwels as gewoonlikom ontwatering en sonsteek te voorkom, moet jy: meer water as gewoonlik drink op baie warm dae.
tgt: passing urine less often than usual.

src: altyd ’n bottel met water by jou hou en gereeld daarvan drink.
tgt: always carry a bottle of water with you and drink regularly.

src: gereeld ruskanse uit die son neem as jy buite werk.
tgt: take regular breaks from the sun if you work outside.

src: jouself met water uit ’n spuitbottel afkoel.
tgt: cool yourself down by using a spray bottle.

src: babas en kindersouers en versorgers moet veral aandag aan kinders en babas gee om seker te maak dat hulle nie ontwater nie.
tgt: babies and childrenparents and caregivers should pay extra attention to children and babies, to make sure they are hydrated.

src: moeders wat borsvoed, moet hul babas meer gereeld voed as dit baie warm is.
tgt: breastfeeding moms should feed their babies more frequently when it is very hot.

src: hou kinders binne of in die koelte, trek vir hulle ligte klere aan en vee hulle lyﬁ es met 'n klam lap af om hulle koel te hou.
tgt: keep children indoors or in the shade, dress them in light clothing and wipe them down with a damp cloth to help them stay cool.

src: onthou om ’n sonskermmiddel te gebruik as die kind buite speel.
tgt: remember to apply sunscreen when they go outdoors.

src: kry onmiddellik mediese hulp as kinders jonger as vyf waterige stoelgang het, aanhoudend braak en moeg is.
tgt: if children younger than five have watery stools, keep vomiting and are tired, seek medical help immediately.

src: kry ook onmiddellike mediese sorg as jou baba nie wil borsvoed nie, of versonke oë en 'n versonke sagte plek (fontanel) op sy kop het.
tgt: also seek immediate medical care if your baby is unable to breastfeed or has sunken eyes and a sunken soft spot (fontanelle) on its head.

src: by kinders is ander waarskuwingstekens van ontwatering die volgende: ’n droë of taai mond.
tgt: in children, other dehydration warning signs include: a dry or sticky mouth.

src: sa is besig om miv en vigs te oorwin vukuzenzele unamed kan nie te midde van ons pogings om die verwoestende koronaviruspandemie te beheer, ander openbare gesondheidsuitdagings wat ons land in die gesig staar, ignoreer nie.
tgt: sa overcoming hiv and aids vukuzenzele unnamed as we continue our efforts to manage the devastating coronavirus pandemic, we cannot ignore the other public health challenges that our country faces.

src: die land is al vir meer as drie dekades in n voortdurende stryd teen miv en vigs gewikkel, wat baie lewensverliese, swaarkry en lyding veroorsaak.
tgt: for more than three dec ades, our country has been engaged in an ongoing struggle against hiv and aids, which has cost many lives and caused great hardship and suffering.

src: baie miv, vigsen tuberkulosedienste is swaar getref deur die uitbreek van covid19, die landwye grendeltydperk en die druk op ons gesondheidsfasiliteite.
tgt: since the outbreak of cov id19 in the country, with the nationwide lockdown and the pressure on our health facilities, many hiv , aids and tuberculosis services have suffered.

src: dit hou n uitdaging in vir mense wat getoets is en met antiretrovirale behandeling begin het.
tgt: this has posed a challenge for people testing and starting antiretroviral treatment.

src: baie mense sukkel om hulle medisyne te gaan haal en minder mense het toegang tot ander dienste, soos vrywillige manlike mediese besnyding.
tgt: many people found it difficult to collect their medicines and fewer people accessed other services, such as voluntary male medical circumcision.

src: ons het terselfdertyd baie lesse uit ons openbare gesondheid se reaksie op die koronaviruspandemie geleer, wat ons stryd teen miv en tb kan versterk.
tgt: at the same time, there are many lessons that have been learnt from our public health response to the coronavirus pandemic that can strengthen our fight against hiv and tb.

src: suidafrika het steeds die grootste aantal mense ter wêreld wat met miv leef.
tgt: south africa continues to have the largest number of people living with hiv in the world.

src: dit is egter bemoedigend dat ons oor die afgelope dekade vordering gemaak deur die aantal nuwe mivinfeksies in die bevolking met byna 60% te verminder.
tgt: it is encouraging, however, that over the last decade we made progress in reducing the number of new hiv infections in the population by nearly 60%.

src: dit is ook bemoedigend dat mivinfeksies in tienermeisies en jong vroue oor die afgelope dekade aansienlik afgeneem het.
tgt: it is also encouraging that hiv infections in adolescent girls and young women have significantly declined in the last decade.

src: dit is n deurslaggewende groep, want hulle is baie meer geneig om in gevaar te wees om miv te kry.
tgt: this is a crucial group because they are much more likely to be at risk of getting hiv .

src: ons behandelingsprogram het tot n afname van 60% in die aantal sterftes as gevolg van vigs, bygedra.
tgt: our treatment programme has contributed to a reduction in the number of deaths due to aids by 60%.

src: daar is ook n groter afname in mivverwante sterftes onder jongmense.
tgt: there has been a greater reduction in hivrelated deaths among young people.

src: dit was moontlik om die aantal sterftes te verminder omdat ons, saam met ons vennote, n uitgebreide antiretrovirale program vanstapel gestuur het, wat miljoene mense wat met die siekte lewe, bereik het.
tgt: it was possible to reduce the number of deaths because we, together with our partners, have rolled out an extensive antiretroviral programme reaching millions of people living with the disease.

src: ons program om moedernakindoordrag (pmnko) van miv te voorkom het aan die begin van die dekade baie lae dekking gekry.
tgt: at the beginning of the decade, our programme to prevent mother to child transmission (pmtct) of hiv had very low coverage.

src: ons het nou een van die hoogste dekkingskoerse van pmnko in suiderafrika, wat die infeksiekoers onder kinders beduidend laat afneem het.
tgt: now we have one of the highest rates of coverage of pmtct in southern africa, which has substantially reduced rates of infection among children.

src: hoewel sterftes en nuwe infeksies afgeneem het, is ons steeds ver van die doelwit af waartoe ons onsself in 2016 verbind het, naamlik om teen 2020 n afname van 75% in mivinfeksies te bereik.
tgt: while we have reduced deaths and new infections, we still are far from reaching the goal we committed ourselves in 2016 of achieving a 75% reduction in hiv infections by 2020. if we succeed in doing so, we are likely to end aids as a public health threat by 2030. unfortunately, we are not there yet.

src: indien ons sukses behaal, sal ons vigs as n bedreiging vir openbare gesondheid waarskynlik teen 2030 kan beëindig.
tgt: we have to do far more to ensure that young people are empowered to prevent infections, including through changing behaviour, accessing condoms and testing regularly.

src: ons moet baie meer doen om te verseker dat jongmense bemagtig word om infeksie te voorkom, insluitend deur gedragsverandering, toegang tot kondome en gereelde toetsing.
tgt: we need to make sure that everyone who is infected has access to treatment and care.

src: ons moet ook seker maak dat almal wat die siekte het, toegang tot behandeling en sorg het.
tgt: we need to work harder on hiv prevention among key populations, including sex workers, men who have sex with men, and people who inject drugs.

src: ons moet die stigma en diskriminasie teen dié bevolkingsgroepe stopsit.
tgt: we must end the stigma and discrimination towards these populations.

src: ons kan nie poog om miv te beëindig as ons die behoeftes, belange en regte van enige deel van ons bevolking ignoreer nie.
tgt: we cannot hope to end hiv if we ignore the needs, concerns and rights of any part of our population.

src: suidafrika moet sy pogings om jong mans medies te besny uitbrei, om hul risiko om miv op te doen, te verminder.
tgt: south africa needs to increase efforts to medically circumcise young men to reduce their risk of acquiring hiv .

src: onveilige besnyding behoort nie vir jong mans lewenslange probleme te veroorsaak nie en niemand behoort as gevolg van besnyding te sterf nie.
tgt: unsafe circumcision should not leave young men with lifelong health problems, and no one should die from circumcision.

src: ons moet seker maak dat daar veilige besnyding vir jong mans is.
tgt: we must make sure that young men have safe circumcision.

src: ons is bemoedig deur die bevindings van n onlangse studie oor voorblootstellingsprofilakse (vbp).
tgt: we are encouraged by findings of a recent study on preexposure prophylaxis (prep).

src: vbp behels die gereelde gebruik van antiretrovirale middels deur mivnegatiewe mense om infeksie te verhoed, anders as antiretrovirale behandeling wat aan mivpositiewe mense gegee word.
tgt: unlike antiretroviral treatment that is given to people who are hiv positive, prep involves the regular use of antiretroviral drugs by hiv negative people to prevention infection.

src: die studie, wat deur wetenskaplikes van die netwerk vir mivvoorkomingsproewe uitgevoer is, het bevind dat langwerkende inspuitings, een keer elke agt weke, beter werk as die daaglikse pil wat vir mivvoorkoming gebruik word.
tgt: the study, conducted by scientists from the hiv prevention trials network, found that longacting injections once every eight weeks was better than the daily tablet used for hiv prevention.

src: dié bevindings het die potensiaal om ons reaksie op die epidemie aansienlik te versterk.
tgt: these findings have the potential to significantly strengthen our response to the epidemic.

src: as ons vigs binne die volgende dekade as n bedreiging van openbare gesondheid wil beëindig, moet ons dié mediese deurbrake met fundamentele gedragsveranderinge kombineer.
tgt: if we are to succeed in ending aids as a public health threat within the next decade, we need to combine these medical breakthroughs with fundamental changes in behaviour.

src: ons moet ook die ekonomiese en gemeenskaplike toestande wat tot hoë infeksiekoerse bydra, aanpak.
tgt: we also need to tackle the economic and social conditions that contrib ute to high rates of infection.

src: een van ons belangsrikste take is om tienermeisies en jong vroue opvoedkundig, ekonomies en maatskaplik te bemagtig.
tgt: one of our central tasks is to empower adolescent girls and young women, educationally, economically and socially.

src: hulle moet in staat gestel word om hul eie besluite oor elke aspek van hulle lewens te maak, insluitend hulle seksualiteit en seksuele gedrag.
tgt: they need to be able to make their own decisions about every aspect of their lives, including their sexuality and sexual behaviour.

src: ons sal uiteindelik die einde van vigs bereik deur die bemagtiging van jongmense, vroue en ander mense wat in gevaar is.
tgt: ultimately, we will achieve the end of aids through the empowerment of young people, women and other people at risk.

src: dit sluit bemagtiging deur toegang tot inligting, raad en ondersteuning in sowel as toegang tot onderrig en ekonomiese geleenthede, veral vir jong vroue.
tgt: this includes empowerment through access to information, advice and support.

src: nog n kans om matriek te slaag cathy grosvenor die boodskap van die departement van basiese onder wys (dbo) se second chan ceondersteuningsprogram is dat dit nooit te laat is om matriek te slaag of die uitslae te behaal wat jy wil hê nie.
tgt: another chance to get your matric cathy grosvenor it is never too late to get your matric or to achieve the results you want, is the message behind the department of basic edu cation’s (dbe) second chance matric support programme.

src: die programdirekteur, dr. sandy malapile, sê dat n matriekkwalifikasie n absolute noodsaaklikheid is aangesien baie deure na geleenthede daarsonder gesluit bly.
tgt: director of the programme, dr sandy malapile, says a matric qualification is an absolute necessity because without it, many doors of opportunity remain closed.

src: "sektorale onderwys en opleidingsowerhede (seta's) is die taak opgelê om die nasie se vaardigheidsvlakke te verbeter deur opleidingsprogramme en vakleerlingskappe en vereis ook dat kandidate matriek het," sê dr malapile.
tgt: "sector training and education authorities (setas), tasked with upskilling the nation through skills programmes and apprenticeships, also require that candidates have a matric," says dr malapile.

src: die second chance pro gram, wat in januarie 2016 geloods is, ondersteun enigiemand — van enige ouderdom — wat vakvirvak en deeltyds n matriekkwalifikasie wil behaal of hul uitslae wil verbeter.
tgt: launched in january 2016, the second chance programme supports anyone – of any age – who wants to achieve or improve a matric qualification, subjectbysubject and on a parttime basis.

src: daar is geen koste aan verbonde nie.
tgt: there are no costs involved.

src: wie kwalifiseer?
tgt: who qualifies?

src: mense wat hulle ma triekuitslae wil verbeter, hetsy hulle onlangs of selfs dekades gelede matriek geskryf het.
tgt: people who want to im prove their matric results, whether they wrote matric recently or even decades ago.

src: dr. ma lapile verduidelik dat n persoon wat byvoorbeeld n ingenieurskwalifikasie wil verwerf, moontlik hulle wiskundepunt moet verbeter om vir die kursus te kwalifiseer.
tgt: dr malapile explains that a person wanting to obtain an engineering qualification, for in stance, might need to im prove their mathematics mark to qualify for the course.

src: mense wat matriek gedruip het en n tweede kans wil hê om te slaag.
tgt: people who failed matric and want a second chance at passing.

src: mense wat die skool verlaat het nadat hulle graad 9 (destyds standerd 7) geslaag het, of mense wat 21 of ouer is en matriek wil verwerf.
tgt: people who left school after passing grade 9 (then standard 7), are 21 or older, and wish to obtain their matric.

src: hoe om te begin registreer by een van die 75 distriksonderrigkantore landwyd of aanlyn by: www.
tgt: how to get startedregister at one of the 75 dis trict education offices across the country or online at this website: www.

src: eservices.
tgt: eservices.

src: gov.
tgt: gov.

src: za.
tgt: za.

src: registrasie het op 1 oktober geopen en sal in februarie 2021 sluit.
tgt: registration opened on 1 october and will close in february 2021. learners either study on their own or at one of the 133 second chance centres where facetoface learning takes place afterhours and on weekends.

src: dr. malapile sê dat slegs die top presterende onderwysers in elke distrik by hierdie sentrums werk.
tgt: dr malapile says only the top performing teachers in each district are employed at these centres.

src: daar is nie ’n sentrum in elke stad of dorp nie, maar slegs in gebiede waar die meeste mense geregistreer het; dit beteken dat hul ligging elke jaar kan verander.
tgt: the centres are not available in every town and village, but are located in areas where the greatest number of people have registered, which means their location could change each year.

src: leerders wat van aangesigtotaangesig leer sowel as leerders wat by die huis studeer het toegang tot n volle reeks studieondersteuningsdienste, wat wissel van lesse wat op spesifieke tye op radio en televisie uitgesaai word, tot aanlynmateriaal wat afgelaai kan word.
tgt: both facetoface learners and learners who study at home have access to a full range of study support services, from lessons broadcast on radio and television at specific times; to downloadable online material; and, for those without access to computers, printers and the inter net−printed study material is sent to them by the dbe.

src: vir diegene wat nie toegang tot rekenaars, drukkers en die internet het nie, word gedrukte studiemateriaal deur die dbo aan hulle gestuur.
tgt: people with a computer but no internet or data, may request a cd with all the study material, which will be mailed to them.

src: "volwasse leerders mag dalk nie baie tyd hê om aan hulle studies te bestee nie.
tgt: "many adult learners may not have lots of time to devote to their studies.

src: hulle kan gelukkig besluit hoeveel vakke hulle per jaar wil neem, omdat hulle nie hul matriek binne n vasgestelde tyd hoef te voltooi nie.
tgt: luck ily, they may decide how many subjects they want to do a year because they do not have to complete their matric within a set time.

src: "die dbo sal elke ouer leerder help, sodra hulle geregistreer is, om die vakke te kies wat hulle wil neem en verduidelik watter verpligtend is.
tgt: "once registered, the dbe will help each older learner choose the subjects they want to do and explain which ones are compulsory.

src: wanneer mense wat die skool na 2008 verlaat het, slaag, sal hulle n nasionale senior sertifikaat ontvang en diegene wat die skool vroeër verlaat het, sal n gewysigde senior sertifikaat ontvang.
tgt: on qualifying, people who left school after 2008 receive a national senior certificate and those who left school earlier, receive an amended senior certificate.

src: dr. malapile sê egter dat albei kwalifikasies dieselfde gewig dra en, afhangende van die vakke wat geneem is en punte wat behaal is, gebruik kan word om by universiteite en kolleges aansoek te doen.
tgt: however, dr malapile says both qualifications carry the same weight and, depending on the subjects taken and marks achieved, can be used to apply to universities and colleges.

src: kry tweede kansedie dbo hou gemeen skapsveldtogte om mense aan te moedig om vir die second chance program in te skryf.
tgt: giving second chancesthe dbe holds community roadshows to encourage people to enrol for the second chance programme.

src: tersiêre onderriginstansies en seta's word genooi om soveel inligting moontlik aan belangstellendes te verskaf.
tgt: tertiary education institutions and setas are invited to provide as much information as possible to interested people.

src: by verskeie van hierdie veldtogte het die jeug minister angie motshekga ge vra om programme bekend te stel wat jongmense kan help om meer geskik vir indiensneming te wees, sê dr. malapile.
tgt: at many of these roadshows, minister angie mot shekga was asked by youth to introduce programmes that could assist young people to be more employable, says dr malapile.

src: die dbo het gereageer deur vanjaar n vaardigheidsontwikkelingsprogram te loods wat gerig sal wees op ongeveer 3,4 miljoen jongmense wat nie werk, onderrig of opleiding het nie.
tgt: in response, the dbe is launching a skills development programme this year that will target about 3.4 million young people who are not in employment, education or training.

src: kursusse sal wissel van lewensvaardighede — wat onderwerpe soos hoe om n cv te skryf en wat om by n werksonderhoud te doen, dek — tot basiese vaardigheidskursusse soos hoe om skoene te herstel, basiese inligtingstegnologie en kommunikasie en geletterdheid.
tgt: courses will range from life skills – covering topics such as how to write a cv and what to do at a job interview; to basic skills courses, such as shoe repair, basic itc and literacy.

src: beter 2021 vir alle suidafrikaners die eerste weke van die nuwe jaar was maar moeilik vir alle suidafrikaners.
tgt: a better 2021 for all south africans the first weeks of the year have been difficult for all south africans.

src: vukuzenzele unnamed die koronaviruspandemie het vererger, met nuwe infeksies wat baie vinniger gestyg en groter getalle bereik het as ooit vantevore.
tgt: vukuzenzele unnamed the coronavirus pandemic has gotten worse, with new infections increasing far faster and far higher than before.

src: hospitale is onder baie druk geplaas, met al hoe meer mense wat mediese aandag benodig het.
tgt: hospitals have been under great strain as more people have needed medical attention.

src: alhoewel die meeste van die land se ekonomiese sektore nou al vir n hele paar maande weer in staat was om handel te dryf en te produseer, gaan dit tyd neem vir die ekonomie om te herstel, en werkskepping en indiensname om weer op die been te kom.
tgt: while most economic sectors have been able to operate again for several months, it will take some time for the economy to recover and for lost jobs to be restored.

src: met die begin van die nuwe jaar is daar baie gesinne en families wie se lewens en lewensbestaan steeds deur die pandemie geraak word.
tgt: as the new year starts, many families are still feeling the effects of the pandemic on their lives and livelihoods.

src: die wêreld betree nou die tweede jaar van die koronaviruspandemie.
tgt: the world is now entering the second year of the coronavirus pandemic.

src: vir suidafrika, soos ook vir die meeste lande regoor die wêreld, gaan die jaar 2021 vol uitdagings wees.
tgt: for south africa, as for most countries around the world, the year 2021 will be extremely challenging.

src: die tweede vlaag kovid19infeksies kan heel moontlik deur nóg vlae gevolg word, wat bedreiging vir beide ons mense se gesondheid en die herstel van ons ekonomie inhou.
tgt: the second wave of covid19 infections may well be followed by further waves, which will threaten both the health of our people and the recovery of our economy.

src: ek is seker daarvan, so moeilik soos wat vanjaar gaan wees, dat ons die pandemie te bowe sal kom en saam ons land koersvas op die herstelpad sal plaas.
tgt: difficult as this year will be, i am certain that we will overcome the pandemic and set our country firmly on the path to recovery.

src: dié vertroue wat ek het, is te danke aan die mense van suidafrika.
tgt: my confidence comes from the south african people.

src: as ek kyk na hoe suidafrikaners van meet af op die krisis reageer het, vandat die eerste koronageval op eie bodem bevestig is, twyfel ek nie vir n oomblik dat ons die deursettingsvermoë, dissipline en vermoëns het om die virus te klop nie.
tgt: if i look at how south africans responded to this crisis from the moment the virus arrived on our shores, i have no doubt that we have the resilience, discipline and ability to defeat this disease.

src: die volstrekte meerderheid van suidafrikaners het begryp dat dit noodsaaklik was om hul daaglikse doen en late en aktiwiteite te beperk en die maatreëls wat in plek gestel is, te gehoorsaam — natuurlik was daar n paar uitsonderings.
tgt: certainly there were exceptions, but the vast majority of south africans understood the need for restrictions on their movement and activities, and complied with the regulations that we had to put in place.

src: inteendeel, dié maatreëls is getrou gevolg en die meeste suidafrikaners het voorts ook die verantwoordelikheid vir hulself en diegene om hulle op hulself geneem deur ag te slaan op voorkomingsmaatreëls soos sosiale distansiëring, die dra van maskers en gereelde handewas.
tgt: even more important than compliance, most south africans took responsibility for themselves and for others, following advice on issues like social distancing, wearing a mask and hand washing.

src: waar dié voorkomende maatreëls egter nie gevolg is nie, was die nagevolge ongelukkig ooglopend.
tgt: and where we fell short, we have, sadly, seen the consequences.

src: ons besef nou die risiko’s verbonde aan samedromming in geslote spasies en tussen n groot aantal mense, noue kontak met ander mense en wat gebeur as mense nie maskers dra nie en n gesonde afstand van ander mense handhaaf nie.
tgt: we now know about the risks of closed spaces and crowded gatherings, of not wearing masks and not keeping our distance from others.

src: dit is goeie tekens vir die jaar vorentoe — ons weet immers nou baie meer van die koronavirus en hoe om die verspreiding daarvan te bekamp en, ten spyte van sogenaamde "pandemiemoegheid", is ons, as suidafrikaners, meer vasberade as ooit om te doen wat van ons vereis word.
tgt: and despite what one could call ‘pandemic fatigue’, we are no less determined as south africans to do what needs to be done.

src: ons gaan ook, benewens dat ons die basiese voorkomingsmaatreëls selfs nog meer pligsgetrou gaan handhaaf, n reuse inentingsveldtog van stapel stuur.
tgt: as we adhere even more rigorously to the basic prevention measures, we will also be rolling out a mass vaccination campaign.
