tgt: they tend to occur in the organs of the body, look different under the microscope and respond more favourably to treatment, says seegers.

src: "die genesingskoers vir die meeste kinderkankers is baie hoër as dié van die meeste soorte kanker onder volwassenes.
tgt: "cure rates for most childhood cancers are much higher than those for most adult cancers.

src: vandag, in meeste ontwikkelende lande, kan die meerderheid van kinderkankers baie doeltreffend behandel word, en tussen 50% tot 60% kan genees word.
tgt: today, in developing countries, the majority of childhood cancers can be treated very effectively, and between 50% to 60% can be cured.

src: in hoëinkomste lande kan die oorlewingskoers tussen 85% en 90% wees.
tgt: in highincome countries, the survival rate can be between 85% to 90%.

src: brics n sleutelfaktor in sa se groei vukuzenzele unnamed n jaar voordat die eerste demokratiese verkiesing plaas gevind het, het president nelson mandela n artikel in die foreign policytyd skrif geskryf oor die nuwe suidafrika se toekomsti ge buitelandse beleid.
tgt: brics key to sa's growth vukuzenzele unnamed a year before the first democratic elections, president nelson mandela wrote an article in foreign policy magazine on the new south africa’s future foreign policy.

src: in sy nadenke oor die wêreldwye bondgenoot skappe wat gevorm is weens die beëindiging van die koue oorlog, het hy geskryf dat lande "weer hulle nette sal moet uitgooi" as hulle enigsins wou baatvind by internasionale sake.
tgt: reflecting on the shifts in global alliances brought about by the end of the cold war, he wrote that countries would have to "recast their nets" if they were to reap any benefit from international affairs.

src: sedert die tektoniese ver skuiwing van 1994 toe ons besluit het om nie net apart heid af te skaf nie, maar ook weg te breek van die inter nasionale opvatting van apartheid se argitekte, word suidafrika se buitelandse beleid gekenmerk deur dié "heruitgooi van die nette".
tgt: since the tectonic shift of 1994 when we made a decisive break with not just apartheid but the international relations outlook of its architects, south africa’s foreign policy continues to be characterised by this "recasting the net".

src: ons buitelandse beleidspri oriteite is streeksintegrasie op politieke en ekonomiese gebied, die ontwikkeling van afrika, multilaterale betrok kenheid en die bevordering van demokrasie, vrede en menseregte.
tgt: our foreign policy priorities are regional political and economic integration, pursing african development, multilateral engagement and the promotion of democracy, peace and human rights.

src: ons het met dié doel ons strategiese alliansies met sowel die lande van die globale suide as wedersyds voordelige samewerking met die lande van die noorde opgebou.
tgt: to this end, we have forged strategic alliances with both the countries of the global south and mutually beneficial cooperation with the countries of the north.

src: ons inskakeling by die bricslande in 2010 was n mylpaal in ons strewe om ons eie nasionale ontwikkelings prioriteite te bevorder deur sterker bande te smee met die belangrike ontluikende ekonomieë van brasilië, rus land, indië en china.
tgt: joining the brics group of countries in 2010 was a milestone in our quest to advance our own national development priorities by forging stronger ties with the important emerging economies of brazil, russia, india and china.

src: in konteks gesien, kom 41% van die wêreldbevolking in die bricslande voor en sorg dié lande vir 24% van die glo bale bbp en vir ongeveer 16% van wêreldwye handel.
tgt: put into context, brics countries comprise roughly 41% of the world’s population and account for around 24% of global gdp and some 16% of global trade.

src: in ons lidmaatskap van dié blok het ons die meeste gebaat op die gebied van ekonomiese samewerking.
tgt: we have reaped the benefits of membership of this important bloc, most notably in the area of economic cooperation.

src: bilaterale handel het gegroei, veral met china en indië, met kommoditeits uitvoere en die invoer van vervaardigde goedere hoog op die lys.
tgt: bilateral trade has grown, particularly with china and india, with commodity exports and manufactured goods imports featuring strongly.

src: die bricslande is steeds belangrike bronne van buitelandse direkte beleggings op sleutelgebiede soos mynbou, die motorbe dryf, vervoer, skoon energie, finansiële dienste en it.
tgt: the brics countries continue to be important sources of foreign direct investment in key such as mining, automotive, transportation, clean energy, financial services and it.

src: n hersiening van ons bricslidmaatskap in 2018 deur die professionele diens temaatskappy, deloitte, het uitgewys dat bricsvennote "drie keer meer kapitaal in die land belê het as in die sewe jaar voor 2011".
tgt: a 2018 review of our brics membership by professional services firm deloitte noted that brics partners "invested three times more capital in the country compared to the seven years prior to 2011".

src: dié beleggings en projekte het op hulle beurt tot beduidende werkskepping gelei.
tgt: these investments and projects have in turn led to significant job creation.

src: sedert die ontstaan van die nuwe ontwikkelings bank, wie se streekkantoor in johannesburg geleë is, is suidafrika n begunstigde van finansiering en tegniese ondersteuning vir projekte in vervoer, skoon energie, omgewingsbeskerming, waterinfrastruktuur en die vermindering van kweek huisgasse.
tgt: since the formation of the new development bank, whose regional office is located in johannesburg, south africa has been a beneficiary of financing and technical support for projects in transportation, clean energy, environmental protection, water infrastructure and greenhouse gas emissions reduction.

src: sedert die uitbreek van die kovid19pandemie, het suidafrika $2 miljard in befondsing van die nuwe ontwikkelingsbank onder die kovid19noodfinansie ringsprogram ontvang om die pandemie te bestry en om ekonomiese herstel te steun.
tgt: since the outbreak of the covid19 pandemic, south africa has received $2 billion in funding from the new development bank under the covid19 emergency loan programme to fight the pandemic and to support our economic recovery.

src: daar was ook beduidende samewerking met ons bricsvennote om persoonlike beskermende toerusting te bekom, asook ten opsigte van die toegang tot en versprei ding van entstof.
tgt: there has also been substantial cooperation with our brics partners in securing personal protective equipment and cooperation around vaccine access and distribution.

src: ons het onlangs deel geneem aan die 13de bricsspitsberaad waar bricslande ooreengekom het om nog nouer saam te werk om kovid19 te bestry en om die politieke en finansi ële hulpbronne te mobiliseer wat nodig is vir toekomstige pandemiegereedheid.
tgt: we recently participated in the 13th brics summit, where brics countries agreed to deepen cooperation to fight covid19 and mobilise the political support and financial resources needed to respond to future pandemic preparedness.

src: dit behels die ves tiging van n virtuele bricsentstofnavorsingen ontwikkelingsentrum asook n geïntegreerde vroeë waarskuwingstelsel om toekomstige uitbrekings van aansteeklike siektes in bricslande te voorspel.
tgt: this includes the establishment of a virtual brics vaccine research and development centre and a brics integrated early warning system to forecast future outbreaks of infectious diseases.

src: nog n belangrike gebied van ooreenkoms was die wedersydse erkenning van nasionale dokumente oor inenting en stelsels vir kovid19toetse — wat noodsaaklik sal wees vir oorgrensreise in die toekoms.
tgt: another important area of agreement was on mutual recognition of national documents of vaccination and systems of covid19 testing – something that will be vital to crossborder travel in the future.

src: die begrip van wedersyds voordelige same werking sal veral belangrik wees in die globale ekono miese herstelplanne waar ongelyke ontwikkeling beteken dat sommige lande vinnig sal herstel en ander agter sal raak.
tgt: the concept of mutually beneficial cooperation will be particularly important in the global economic recovery, where unequal development means that some countries will bounce back quickly, while others will lag behind.

src: ter ondersteuning van ekonomiese herstel, het die bricsvennote ooreengekom om hulle samewerking te ver stewig in katalitiese sektore soos energie, it, wetenskap, tegnologie en innovering, landbou en die groen eko nomie.
tgt: in support of economic recovery, brics partners agreed to strengthen collaboration in catalytic sectors such as energy, it, science, technology and innovation, agriculture and the green economy.

src: dit is almal belangrike sektore wat geïdentifiseer is in ons ekonomiese heropbouen herstelplan wat verlede jaar aangekondig is.
tgt: these are all important sectors identified in our economic reconstruction and recovery plan announced last year.

src: samewerking met ander bricslande, veral op die terrein van innovasienavors ing, sal help om ons land se industrialisasie te versnel en om ons doelwitte vir die vierde nywerheidsom wenteling te bereik.
tgt: cooperation with other brics countries, particularly in the field of innovation research, will help to accelerate our country’s industrialisation and help us meet our fourth industrial revolution aspirations.

src: in dié verband is samesprekings oor die vorming van formele bricsplatforms gehou om beste praktyk, kennis en kun digheid te deel, insluitend die gebruik van oopbrontegnolo gieplatforms.
tgt: in this regard, discussions were held around the creation of formal brics platforms to share best practice, knowledge and expertise, including the use of open source technology platforms.

src: die bricsvennote het saamgestem dat ontwikke lende lande hulp nodig het om die vn se volhoubare ontwikkelingsdoelwitte te bereik, en dat skenkerlande hulle verantwoordelikhede in dié verband moet nakom.
tgt: the brics partners agreed that developing countries need assistance to achieve the un sustainable development goals, and that donor countries should honour their commitments in this regard.

src: dit is veral belangrik in die konteks van klimaatsaksie.
tgt: this is particularly important within the context of climate action.

src: soos die meeste lande, wil suidafrika n laekoolstof ontwikkelingspad volg, wat inklusief en volhoubaar is en wat ons status as n ontwik kelende land in ag neem.
tgt: like most countries, south africa seeks to move towards a lowcarbon development path that is inclusive, sustainable and that takes into account our status as a developing country.

src: die brics se samewerkingsplat form vir energienavorsing sal baie nuttig wees soos ons poog om ons energiehulp bronne te diversifiseer.
tgt: the brics energy research cooperation platform will be valuable as we move to diversify our energy sources.

src: in die elf jaar sedert ons by brics aangesluit het, het ons lidmaatskap ons nasionale belang aansienlik bevorder.
tgt: in the 11 years since we joined brics, our membership has substantially advanced our national interest.

src: deur n lid van brics te wees het ons posisie as n belangrike opkomende ekonomie bevor der.
tgt: being a member of brics has enhanced our position as an important emerging economy.

src: dit het ons toegang gegee tot beleidsen tegniese kun digheid van groter en meer gevestigde ekonomieë, asook toegang tot die ondersteu ning van die nasionale ontwikkelingsbank.
tgt: it has given us access to policy and technical expertise of larger and established economies, as well as access to the support of the national development bank.

src: kovid19entstowwe: ons beantwoord jou vrae allison cooper met suidafrika se koronavi russiektein entingsprogram in volle swang, het vuk’uzenzele navraag gedoen by die departement van nasio nale gesondheid om van die algemene vrae van die publiek oor inenting te beantwoord.
tgt: covid19 vaccines: your questions answered allison cooper with south af rica’s corona virus disease (covid19) vaccination programme now in full swing, vuk’uzen zele has put together information from the department of health to help answer some common questions about the vaccine.

src: v: kan die entstof kovid19 veroorsaak of my laat positief toets?
tgt: q: can the vaccine cause covid19 or make me test positive?

src: nie een van die ent stowwe wat in suidafrika gebruik word, bevat die lewendige virus wat kovid19 veroorsaak nie.
tgt: a: none of the vaccines used in south africa contain the live virus that causes covid19.

src: dit kan dus nie die virus veroorsaak nie en jy sal nie positief toets nadat jy die entstof ontvang het nie.
tgt: it does not cause the virus and you will not test positive after receiving the vaccine.

src: v: is dit waar dat daar n mikroskyfie in die entstof is wat mense se bewegings kan monitor?
tgt: q: is it true that there’s a microchip in the vaccines, that tracks people’s movements?

src: daar is geen mi kroskyfie of opsporingstoe stel in die entstof nie.
tgt: a: there is no microchip or tracking device in the vaccines.

src: ent stofvervaardigers moet die bestanddele van die entstof aan die suidafrikaanse reguleringsowerheid vir gesondheidsprodukte (sah pra) verklaar voordat die entstof vir gebruik goedge keur word.
tgt: vaccine manufacturers are required to declare the ingredients to the south african health products regulatory authority (sahpra) before the vaccine is approved for use.

src: v: ek het gehoor dat die entstof die merk van die dier het — 666. is dit waar?
tgt: q: i have heard that vaccines have the mark of the beast – 666. is this true?

src: entstowwe het geen verbintenis met enige godsdienstige organisasie nie en kan nie saam met geeste, demone of ander abstrakte bestanddele toegedien word nie.
tgt: a: vaccines have no connection with any religious organisations and cannot be infused with spirits, demons or other abstract ingredients.

src: v: moet ek ingeënt word as ek swanger is?
tgt: q: should i get vaccinated if i am pregnant?

src: a: n swanger vrou is meer geneig om siek te raak van kovid19.
tgt: a: a pregnant woman is more likely to get ill from covid19.

src: deur haar te laat inent, kan dit voorkom dat n swanger vrou ernstig siek word.
tgt: getting vaccinated can prevent a pregnant woman from being severely ill. q: should i stop breast feeding to get vaccinated?

src: v: moet ek ophou om te borsvoed sodat ek ingeënt kan word?
tgt: a: the world health organisation and the department of health do not recommend stopping breastfeeding in order to get vaccinated.

src: entstowwe word aanbeveel vir gebruik deur borsvoe dende moeders.
tgt: vaccines are safe for use in breastfeeding mothers.

src: v: kan ek n entstof kry kort nadat ek kovid19 gehad het?
tgt: q: can i get a vaccine soon after being infected with covid19?

src: enigiemand wat kovid19 gehad het moet ten minste 30 dae wag nadat hulle simptome verby is.
tgt: a: anyone who has been infected with covid19 must wait at least 30 days from when their symptoms stop.

src: v: ek het kovid19simp tome.
tgt: q: i have covid19 symptoms, is it safe to get vaccinated?

src: laat jou eerder toets.
tgt: you should rather be tested.

src: v: kan ek die tweede dosis van die pfizerentstof vroeër kry as die 42 dae na my eerste inenting?
tgt: q: can i get my second dose of the pfizer vaccine earlier than 42 days after my first shot.

src: v: moet ek ingeënt word as ek herstel het van kovid19?
tgt: q: do i need to be vaccinated if i have recovered from covid19?

src: kan my liggaam nie die siekte op sy eie beveg son der die neweeffekte van die entstof nie?
tgt: can my body not fight the disease on its own, without suffering the side effects of the vaccine?

src: a: daar is bewyse wat toon dat die liggaam se reaksie wanneer jy siek is weens kovid19, baie swakker en korter is as die reaksie op die entstof.
tgt: a: evidence shows that your body’s response, when you are sick from covid19, is much weaker and shorter than the response to the vaccine.

src: deur die entstof te kry, gee dit jou n baie sterker en langdurige immuunreak sie.
tgt: getting the vaccine will give you a much stronger and longerlasting immune response.

src: die neweeffekte van die entstof is matig en hou nie langer as n dag of twee aan nie, terwyl jy kan hospitaal toe gaan of sterf as jy kovid19 opdoen.
tgt: the side effects of the vaccine are mild and do not last more than a day or two, while getting sick from covid19 can cause hospitalisation or death.

src: v: kan mense met chro niese siektes, soos hoë bloeddruk, die entstof kry?
tgt: q: can people with chronic diseases, such as high blood pressure, get the vaccine?

src: a: mense met chroniese siektes loop n groter risiko om ernstige kovid19 te kry.
tgt: a: people with chronic diseases are at higher risk of getting severe covid19.

src: hulle sal dus die meeste daarby baat om die entstof te kry.
tgt: they will therefore benefit the most from getting the vaccine.

src: v: as ek voorheen n aller giese reaksie teenoor medi kasie of n entstof getoon het, moet ek die entstof kry?
tgt: q: if i previously had an allergic reaction to medication or a vaccine should i get the covid19 vaccine?

src: a: enigeen met n geskie denis van allergiese reaksies teenoor ander entstowwe of medikasie, behoort eers met hulle gesondheidspraktisyn te praat.
tgt: a: anyone with a history of allergic reactions to other vaccines or medicines should first speak to their health practitioner.

src: v: hoe gevaarlik is n allergiese reaksie teen die entstof?
tgt: q: how dangerous is an allergic reaction to the vaccine?

src: a: ernstige allergiese reaksies kom selde voor.
tgt: a: severe allergic reactions are rare.

src: n allergiese reaksie kom gewoonlik binne sekondes of minute voor nadat die entstof toegedien is.
tgt: an allergic reaction usually happens within seconds or minutes after getting the vaccine.

src: dit is hoekom almal 15 minute in die waarnemingsarea moet wag nadat hulle die entstof gekry het.
tgt: this is why all people must wait in the observation area for 15 minutes after their vaccine.

src: v: is dit veilig om die ent stof te kry as ek allergies vir eiers is?
tgt: q: is it safe to get the vaccine if you are allergic to eggs?

src: a: ja.
tgt: a: yes.

src: nie een van die kovid19entstowwe bevat enige eierproteïene nie.
tgt: none of the covid19 vaccines have any egg proteins.

src: v: ek het gehoor van oumense wat kort nadat hulle die entstof ontvang het, gesterf het.
tgt: q: i have heard of elderly people dying shortly after getting the vaccine.

src: is die ent stof veilig vir bejaardes?
tgt: is the vaccine safe for the elderly?

src: a: die entstof is veilig en hoogs doeltreffend in die voorkoming van ernstige kovid19siekte en sterfte.
tgt: a: the vaccine is safe and highly effective to prevent severe covid19 disease and death.

src: deur die gebruik van die ent stof sien ons n groot afname in kovid19sterftes by bejaardes in verskeie lande.
tgt: through the use of the vaccine, there has been a huge drop in covid19 deaths in the elderly in several countries.

src: v: waarom kry sommige mense nog steeds kovid19 binne twee weke nadat hulle die entstof gekry het?
tgt: q: why do some people still get covid19 within two weeks of getting the vaccine?

src: a: jy is eers 30 dae nadat jy die johnson & johnsonentstof gekry het, ten volle ingeënt, of twee weke na die tweede dosis van die pfizerentstof.
tgt: a: you are only fully vaccinated 30 days after get ting the johnson & johnson vaccine or two weeks after the second dose of the pfizer vaccine.

src: as jy aan die virus blootgestel word voordat jy ten volle ingeënt is, kan jy die siekte kry.
tgt: if you are exposed to the virus before you are fully vaccinated, you may get the disease.

src: v: voorkom die entstof heeltemal dat jy kovid19 kry?
tgt: q: does the vaccine completely prevent covid19 infection?

src: korrupsie in die staatsdiens moet stop vukuzenzele unnamed die onlangse onthul ling in die parle ment dat duisen de staatsamptenare elke maand onwettig maatskap like toelae ontvang, bewys dat ons nog n lang pad het om te stap om n kul tuur van werksetiek in die staatsdiens te vestig.
tgt: ending corruption in the public service vukuzenzele unnamed the revelation in parliament that thousands of public servants have been illegally receiving social grants every month shows we still have a long way to go towards instilling a culture of ethics in the public service.

src: vroeër vanjaar is daar ook bevind dat meer as 16 000 werknemers in diens van die staat onreëlmatige uit betalings van die spesiale kovid19 maatskaplike noodverligtingstoelaag ont vang het.
tgt: earlier this year, it was also found that around 16,000 employees on the government payroll were irregularly paid the covid19 social relief of distress grant.

src: dit is algemeen bekend dat mense wat om hierdie toelaag aansoek doen terwyl hulle wel n ander bron van inkomste het, nie vir die toelaag kwalifiseer nie.
tgt: it is common knowledge that applicants with other sources of income do not qualify for this grant.

src: dit is ook vanselfsprekend dat mense wat n inkomste vanaf die staat ontvang, nie in aan merking kom om vir hierdie toelaag aansoek te doen nie.
tgt: it is also selfevident that those who receive an income from the state are not eligible to apply.

src: en tog het hulle.
tgt: and yet they did.

src: sowat 17 000 mense werksaam by die staat, op beide nasionale en provinsiale vlak, het aansoeke ingedien met die doel om hul salarisse aan te vul met geld wat vir die behoeftiges bestem is.
tgt: some 17,000 people employed at national and provincial government submitted applications in a bid to top up their salaries with money meant for the poor.

src: gegewe die omvang van armoede in ons land, iets waarvan ons staatsamptenare maar ál te bewus is, is hierdie doelbewuste diefstal uit die staatskoffers onvergeeflik.
tgt: given the extent of need in the country, one that our public servants know too well, this wilful intent to steal from the public purse is unforgivable.

src: die staat is nou besig om streng stappe te neem om hier die soort misbruik teen te kant en sal korte mette maak van enige staatsamptenare wat hul skuldig maak aan sulke misdade.
tgt: government is now stepping up its efforts to prevent this kind of abuse and act against anyone in the public service involved in wrongdoing.

src: die staat het onlangs n nuwe eenheid vir etiek, integriteit en dissiplinêre tegniese bystand in die openbare administrasie gestig.
tgt: recently, government launched a new public administration ethics, integrity and disciplinary technical assistance unit.

src: die eenheid sal kapasi teit ontwikkel onder openbare instansies om dissiplinêre aksies van stapel te stuur in gevalle van wangedrag en sal met ander staatsinsellings saamwerk om diegene wat hulle aan ongerymdhede skul dig maak, tot verantwoording te bring.
tgt: the unit will build capacity within public bodies to institute disciplinary proceedings in cases of misconduct and cooperate with other organs of state in holding those responsible to account.

src: die eenheid sal kor rupsiesake na die staat se teenkorrupsietaakmag verwys en opvolg met depar temente om seker te maak dat kriminele sake waarby staatsamptenare betrokke is, tot dissiplinêre aksie lei.
tgt: the unit will refer corruption cases to government’s anticorruption task team and follow up with departments to ensure criminal cases involving public servants translate into disciplinary cases.

src: die eenheid sal saam met die multiagentskap fusion centre werk om werknemers betrokke in prioriteitsake wat deur die wetstoepassingso werhede ondersoek word, te identifiseer.
tgt: working with the multiagency fusion centre, the unit will help identify employees in priority cases investigated by law enforcement authorities.

src: die eenheid sal die leefstyl oudits op staatsamptenare monitor.
tgt: the unit will monitor the conduct of lifestyle audits of public service employees.

src: waar departemente korrupsie en onverklaarbare welgesteldheid identifiseer, sal die sake na die suidafri kaanse polisiediens verwys word.
tgt: where departments identify corruption and unexplained wealth, the cases will be referred to the south african police service.

src: die nuwe eenheid het reeds in alle erns skouer aan die wiel begin sit en help om staatsamptenare te identifiseer wat betrokke is in sake wat met kovid19verkrygingsbedrog, asook bedrog rakende die spesiale kovid19toelaag en die werkloosheidsversekerings fonds, verband hou.
tgt: the new unit has already begun its work in earnest, helping to identify public servants involved in cases related to covid19 procurement, the special covid19 grant and unemployment insurance fund fraud.

src: sake waar staatsamptenare deur die spesiale onder soekeenheid vir dissiplinêre aksie verwys is, sal deur die eenheid gemonitor word om hierdie sake se vordering te volg.
tgt: the cases of government officials referred by the special investigating unit for disciplinary action will be monitored by the unit to assess their progress.

src: nog n belangrike deel van die eenheid se werksaam hede sal wees om etiek en integriteit in die range van die staatsdiens te vestig.
tgt: another important aspect of the unit’s work will be institutionalising ethics and integrity in the ranks of the public service.

src: n paar staatsamptenare het oor die jare heen die standpunt ingeneem dat dit toelaatbaar is om uitermate voordeel te trek uit die staat of om besigheid met die staat te doen, hetsy deur hulself of hul vriende en familie, mits daar niks onwet tig plaasgevind het nie.
tgt: a few public servants have over the years taken the view that doing business with or unduly benefiting from the state is permissible for them, their friends and their families, provided there has been no illegality.

src: ons moet alles binne ons vermoë doen om hierdie houding tot niet te bring.
tgt: we must do everything we can to change this attitude.

src: waar ons daaraan werk om korrupsie hok te slaan, moet ons eweneens fokus op die vestiging van etiese gedrag, want dinge wat nie nood wendig onwettig is nie, kan oneties of onbetaamlik van n staatsamptenaar nie.
tgt: as we work to end corruption, there must be equal focus on inculcating ethical behaviour, because what may not necessarily be illegal can be unethical and unbecoming of a public servant.

src: die nuwe eenheid sal norme en standaarde met betrekking tot etiek, integriteit en gedrag instel.
tgt: the new unit will set norms and standards on ethics, integrity and conduct.

src: dit sal ook die kapasiteit van departemente ontwik kel om amptenare wat aan wangedrag skuldig bevind word, te dissiplineer.
tgt: it will also build the capacity of departments to discipline officials found guilty of misconduct.

src: laasjaar is meer as 200 werknemers opgelei as inligtingsbeamptes en inleiers.
tgt: last year more than 200 employees were trained as presiding officers and initiators.

src: die bou van n etiese, bekwame staatsdiens bly steeds n fokuspunt van dié administrasie.
tgt: building an ethical, capable state continues to be a focus of this administration.

src: soos ons kan sien uit n hele paar skandale die afgelope paar jaar waar staatsampte nare onwettig voordeel getrek het uit die regering, sal hier die proses moeilik wees en n hele ruk neem.
tgt: as a number of scandals involving public servants illegally benefiting from the state have shown, the process will be difficult and will take some time.

src: n bekwame staat dien as die fondasie om ons nasionale prioriteitsdoelwitte te bereik.
tgt: a capable state is the foundation for the attainment of all our national priorities.

src: sonder om verantwoordbaar heid te verskerp en etiese gedrag te bevorder, sal hierdie doelwitte buite bereik bly.
tgt: without improving accountability and promoting ethical conduct, none can be achieved.

src: die oorgrote meerderheid staatsamptenare is pligsge trou, verbind tot etiese gedrag en wetsgehoorsaam.
tgt: the vast majority of our public servants are committed, lawabiding and ethical.

src: die taak wat ons voorlê is om saam te werk om daardie staatsamptenare wat nie hier die waardes volg nie, uit die staatsdiens te verwyder en die wanbegrip dat almal wat in diens van die staat korrup of selfsugtig is, reg te stel.
tgt: the task before us is to work together to root out those who are not, and correct the misconception that all those employed in government are either selfserving or corrupt.

src: ek doen n beroep op die mans en vroue wat ons land elke dag dien om opnuut hulself te verbind tot die waar des van onbaatsugtigheid en diens, en om te onthou dat hul gedrag ten alle tye beide wettig en eties moet wees.
tgt: ai call on all the men and women who serve our country every day to recommit themselves to the values of selflessness and service, and to recall that their conduct must at all times be both legal and ethical.

src: maak seker dat jy n testament het!
tgt: make sure you have a will!

src: vukuzenzele unnamed indien jy nie n geldige testament het nie, het jy geen seggenskap oor wie jou bates erf met jou afsterwe nie.
tgt: vukuzenzele unnamed if you don’t have a valid will, you will have no control over who inherits your assets when you die.

src: dit be teken dat mense jou bates of geld kan erf, al wil jy nie noodwendig hê hulle moet nie.
tgt: this might lead to people inheriting your money or assets, even if you didn’t want them to.

src: indien n persoon sterf sonder om n testament op te stel, sal die bates in hul besit volgens die bepalings van die wet op intestate erfop volging verdeel word onder die mense wat dit regmatig moet erf.
tgt: if a person dies without making a will, the assets that they owned will be distributed in terms of the intestate succession act, to the people who must rightfully inherit them.

src: die wet sit reëls uiteen waarvolgens die boedel verdeel moet word.
tgt: the act sets out rules of how the estate must be distributed.

src: as jy nie n gade het nie en slegs kinders agterlaat, erf hulle die boedel in gelyke dele.
tgt: if you don’t have a spouse and are only survived by your children, they will inherit the estate in equal shares.

src: as jy n gade en kinders agterlaat, erf die gade óf n kinderdeel óf r250 000 — watter bedrag ook al die meeste is — en die res word onder die kinders verdeel.
tgt: if you are survived by a spouse and children, the spouse will receive a child’s share or r250 000, whichever is greater, and the children share the balance.

src: byvoorbeeld, as die boedel r2 miljoen werd is en die oorledene n gade en drie kinders agterlaat, beslaan n kin derdeel r500 000. dié kinderdeel word bereken deur die waarde van die boedel deur vier te deel.
tgt: for example, if the estate is worth r2 million and the deceased is survived by a spouse and three children, a child’s share amounts is r500 000. the child’s share is calculated by dividing the value by four.

src: indien jy nie n gade of kinders het nie, maar beide jou ouers leef nog, erf hulle die boedel in ge lyke dele.
tgt: if one parent is dead, but left siblings, the surviving parent will inherit half of the estate and the deceased parent’s descendants will receive the other half.

src: indien een ouer reeds afgestorwe is, maar sibbe het wat nog leef, erf hulle die gestorwe ouer se helfte; en die ouer wat nog leef, erf die ander helfte van die boedel.
tgt: if both of the deceased’s parents have died, but they left descendants, the estate is split into equal parts.

src: indien die oorledene nie n gade, nasate, ouers of ouers se nasate agterlaat nie, erf die naaste bloed verwant die hele boedel.
tgt: if the deceased does not leave a spouse, descendants, parents or parents’ descendants, the nearest blood relation will inherit the entire estate.

src: laastens, indien die oor ledene nie enige bloed verwante agterlaat nie, ontvang die staat die op brengste van die boedel.
tgt: finally, if the deceased is not survived by any relative, the state will inherit the proceeds of the estate.

src: bykomend tot bogenoemde kan n kind wat buite die eg gebore is van beide bloed verwante erf; en n aangenome kind word beskou as n nasaat van sy of haar aangenome ouer of ouers.
tgt: in addition to the above, a child born out of wedlock can inherit from both blood relations; and an adopted child is deemed as a descendant of his adoptive parent or parents.

src: wanneer is n testa ment geldig?
tgt: when is a will valid?

src: n testament is slegs geldig indien dit opgestel is deur n persoon van 16 jaar of ouer en moet voorts ook aan die volgende vereistes voldoen: dit moet geskrewe wees, en jou handtekening moet op elke bladsy asook aan die einde van die doku ment verskyn.
tgt: a will is only valid when made by a person 16 years or older, and must meet the following requirements: it must be in writing, and your signature must appear on every page and at the end.

src: dit moet geteken word deur twee of meer bevoeg de persone.
tgt: it must be signed in the presence of two or more competent witnesses.

src: enige persoon van 14 jaar of ouer kan as getuie dien.
tgt: any person 14 years and above can be a witness.

src: n erfgenaam kan egter nie as getuie dien nie.
tgt: an heir can’t be a witness.

src: jy moet volledige inlig ting oor jou bates verskaf en aandui watter persone watter bates moet ont vang, met die volledige name en inligting van die begunstigdes.
tgt: you must include full details of your assets and who you want to leave them to, including their names and details.

src: jy moet n persoon nomi neer om jou boedel te be redder (die boedelbered deraar).
tgt: you must nominate a person to manage your estate (the executer).

src: presidensiële werkskeppingstimulus gee stukrag aan werkskepping vukuzenzele unnamed die onlangse bekend stelling van die tweede fase van die presidensiële werkskeppingstimulus spreek van groot vordering in ons poging om werk te skep vir werklose suidafrikaners.
tgt: presidential employment stimulus drives job creation vukuzenzele unnamed the recent launch of the second phase of the presidential employment stimulus represents great progress in our quest to create job opportunities for unemployed south africans.

src: ons het die werkskeppingstimulus verlede jaar op die been gebring om soveel moontlik geleenthede in die kortste moontlike tyd te skep.
tgt: we established the employment stimulus last year to create as many opportunities as possible in the shortest possible time.

src: dit het nuwe en innoverende maniere van doen geverg om programme teen n ongekende pas en skaal te implementeer.
tgt: this required new and innovative ways of working to implement programmes at an unprecedented speed and scale.

src: die werwingsproses van die talle werklose mense maak gebruik van digitale platforms om soveel moontlik geskikte deelnemers te bereik.
tgt: the recruitment process of the many people who were unemployed made use of digital platforms to reach as many eligible participants as possible.

src: byvoor beeld, kleinskaalboere kon deur middel van ussd (funk siekodes) vir ondersteuning aansoek doen en insetbewyse op hulle selfone ontvang.
tgt: for example, smallscale farmers were able to apply for support via ussd and receive input vouchers to their cellphones.

src: sedert die departement van basiese onderwys onlangs aansoeke oopgestel het vir die volgende inname van skoolassistente, het meer as 940 000 jongmense via die nultariefindiensnemingsplat form naamlik sayouth.
tgt: since the department of basic education opened applications for the next cohort of school assistants recently, over 940 000 young people have applied via the zerorated recruitment platform called sayouth.

src: mobi aansoek gedoen, wat deel uitmaak van die nasionale roetebestuursnetwerk.
tgt: mobi, which forms part of the national pathway management network.

src: die gebruik van nuwe tegnologieë in die aanbieding van werksgeleenthede, het werwing baie makliker, vinniger en meer deursigtig gemaak.
tgt: the use of new technologies in offering employment opportunities has made recruitment much easier, quicker and more transparent.

src: die presidensiële indiensnemingstimulus het samewerking in die openbare sektor moontlik gemaak en vergemaklik.
tgt: the presidential employment stimulus has enabled and facilitated cooperation in the public sector.

src: programme in fase een is deur 11 nasionale departemente geïmplemen teer.
tgt: programmes in phase one were implemented by 11 national departments.

src: hulle aktiwiteite is in ooreenstemming in gebring om duplisering en vermorsing te voorkom en leer uit ander se ervaring te bevorder.
tgt: their activities were aligned to avoid duplication and wastage and enhance learning from the experience of others.

src: die indiensnemingstimulus het ook die belangrikheid van maatskaplike vennootskappe getoon.
tgt: the employment stimulus has also shown the importance of social partnership.

src: die regering, sake wêreld, arbeid en burgerlike samelewing het saamgekom om diegene wat werkloos is, in die ekonomie in te bring.
tgt: government, business, labour and civil society have come together to bring those who are unemployed into the economy.

src: meer as n halfmiljoen suidafrikaners het reeds baatgevind by die eerste fase, met talle programme wat nog geloods gaan word.
tgt: more than half a million south africans have already benefitted from the first phase, with several programmes still underway.

src: deelnemers is die kans gegun om n bestaan te maak, nuwe vaardighede aan te leer en bestaande vaardighede te ver beter en om hulle ervaring te gebruik as n wegspringplek vir n ander werk of om vir hulself te werk.
tgt: participants were given the opportunity to earn a livelihood, to learn new skills and upgrade existing ones, and to use their experience as a springboard to get another job or to selfemployment.

src: byvoorbeeld, n aantal deelnemers wat deur die departement van openbare werke en infrastruktuur in sy programme in fase een aan gewys is, kon teen die einde maart 2021 werk in die privaatsektor bekom.
tgt: for example, a number of participants appointed by the department of public works and infrastructure in its phase one programmes were able to secure private sector employment by the end of march 2021. many of those in the first cohort of school assistants, similarly, have found their way into employment, armed with experience, training and references.

src: die programme wat deur middel van die presi densiële werkskeppingsti mulus geïmplementeer is, het ook die gemeenskappe in die algemeen bevoordeel.
tgt: the programmes implemented through the presidential employment stimulus have also benefited communities more broadly.

src: die fokus is op werkskep ping in sektore wat n direkte maatskaplike impak het, waaronder opvoedkunde, voedselsekerheid, onderhoud van staatsinfrastruktuur en omgewingsbeskerming.
tgt: the focus has been on job creation in sectors with direct social impact such as education, food security, public infrastructure maintenance and environmental protection.

src: deur middel van hierdie presidensiële werkskepping stimulus is jongmense in diens geneem om onderwysers in ons skole te ondersteun en by te staan.
tgt: through this presidential employment stimulus young people were employed to support and assist teachers in our schools.

src: baie vroeë kinderontwik kelingsentrums is gehelp om te oorleef en te heropen.
tgt: many early childhood development centres were helped to survive and reopen.

src: bestaansboere het ondersteu ning ontvang om produksie uit te brei, en omgewingsba tes soos riviere en vleilande is herstel en word in stand gehou.
tgt: subsistence farmers were supported to expand production, and environmental assets such as rivers and wetlands were restored and maintained.

src: as deel van fase twee bring ons n maatskaplike indiensnemingsfonds op die been wat werksgeleenthede sal steun wat die samelewing bevoordeel, onder leiding van gemeenskapsorganisasies, op diverse gebiede soos stedelike landbou, openbare kuns, die opgradering van informele nedersettings en gemeenskapsveiligheid.
tgt: as part of phase two, we are establishing a social employment fund that will support work for the common good led by community organisations in areas as diverse as urban agriculture, public art, informal settlement upgrading and community safety.

src: te midde van die erge ekonomiese terugslag weens die koronaviruspandemie, het staatsen maatskaplike indiensneming n belangrike stimulus vir werkskepping voorsien.
tgt: in the midst of the severe economic setback caused by the coronavirus disease pandemic, public and social employment has provided an important stimulus to job creation.

src: dit is die implemen tering van ons verbintenis dat die staat indiensneming aktief moet ondersteun terwyl die arbeidsmark herstel.
tgt: this is the implementation of our commitment that the state should actively support employment while the labour market recovers.

src: deur middel van die presidensiële indiensneming stimulus het ons jongmense in die arbeidsmark ingebring in baie groter getalle in n onge kende kort tydperk.
tgt: through the presidential employment stimulus we have brought young people into the labour force in far greater numbers in an unprecedented manner in a short space of time.

src: ongeveer 84% van die deelnemers aan fase een was jongmense onder die ouderdom van 35, en tweederdes was vroue.
tgt: some 84% of the participants in phase one were young people under the age of 35, and twothirds were women.

src: in fase twee verwag ons dat hierdie getal selfs hoër sal wees, aangesien die sti mulus byna r1 miljard sal voorsien aan befondsing vir die presidensiële jeugindiensnemingsingryping.
tgt: in phase two we expect this number to be even higher, as the stimulus will provide almost r1 billion in funding for the presidential youth employment intervention.

src: verskeie jongmense sal as deel van die ingryping gewerf word in n nasionale jeugdiens waarin nuwe lewe geblaas is.
tgt: as part of the intervention, several young people will be recruited into a revitalised national youth service.

src: jongmense sal opleiding in digitale vaardighede ont vang en ondernemings wat deur jongmense besit word, sal hulp kry om uit te brei en personeel aan te stel.
tgt: young people will receive training in digital skills and youthowned enterprises will receive support to expand and hire.

src: wees op jou hoede vir seksoortreders sphelele ngubane raadpleeg die nasionale register vir seksoortreders voordat jy personeel aanstel wat na kinders of mense met verstandelike gestremdhede, omsien.
tgt: beware of sex offenders sphelele ngubane consult the national register for sex offenders before hiring staff to care for children and those with intellectual disabilities.

src: as jy n werkgewer is wat n vroeë kinderontwikkelingsen trum bedryf, word jy deur die wet verplig om te kontroleer of jou werknemers op die nasionale register vir seksoortreders (nrs) voorkom.
tgt: if you are an employer who runs an early childhood development centre, you are among the people required by law to check if your current and potential employees are on the national register for sex offenders (nrso).

src: die nrs val onder die departement van justisie en grondwetlike ontwikkeling en werkgewers moet hom raad pleeg om te kontroleer of voornemende werknemers daarop gelys word.
tgt: the nrso falls under the department of justice and constitutional development and employers must approach it to check if prospective employees are listed.

src: n werkgewer sluit ook in n ouer wat n huiswerker wil aanstel, n skoolbeheerliggaam of n hospitaal.
tgt: an employer also includes a parent looking to employ a house helper, a school governing body or a hospital.

src: die nrs is in 2007 deur n wet van die parlement tot stand gebring.
tgt: the nrso was established by an act of parliament in 2007. it is a record of names of those found guilty of sexual offences against children and people with intellectual disabilities.

src: ntombizodwa matjila, die registrateur van die nrs, sê die register bevat name van sowel manlike as vroulike oortreders.
tgt: ntombizodwa matjila, the nrso registrar, says the register contains names of both male and female offenders.

src: daar is mense wat oortre dings teen kinders en mense met intellektuele gestremd hede gepleeg het, soos: statutêre verkragting; om kinders te dwing of te veroorsaak dat hulle sek suele oortredings aanskou; seksuele dade; seksuele uitbuiting; seksuele gereedmaking; blootstelling of vertoning van kinderpornografie aan kinders of mense met intel lektuele gestremdhede en om kinders en mense met intellektuele gestremdhede vir pornografiese doelein des te gebruik.
tgt: these are people who have committed offences against children and those with intellectual disabilities, such as: statutory rape; compelling or causing children to witness sexual offences; sexual acts; sexual exploitation; sexual grooming; exposure or display of child pornography to children or people with intellectual disabilities and using children or people with intellectual disabilities for pornographic purposes.

src: "indien n werkgewer uitvind dat die naam van n werknemer op die register voorkom, moet die werkgewer die werkne mer na n ander posisie skuif waar hy nie meer in kontak sal kan kom met n kind of n vol wassene met n intellektuele gestremdheid nie," sê matjila.
tgt: "if an employer finds out that the name of an employee appears on the register, the employer must move that employee to another post that will not bring him or her in contact with a child or an adult with an intellectual disability," says matjila.

src: indien die werkgewer nie die werknemer na n ander posisie kan skuif nie, moet die diens kontrak beëindig word.
tgt: if the employer is unable to move the employee to another position, they are required to terminate the employment contract.

src: inligting wat op die nrs voorkom, sluit in: oortreders se volledige naam, van en hul beroep of ambag; oortreders se bekende straatadres en enige kontak besonderhede, waaronder n posadres; oortreders se identiteitsof paspoortnommer; die tipe seksuele oortreding.
tgt: information contained in the nrso includes: offenders’ full names and surname, nickname and their profession or trade; offenders’ known physical address, and any contact details, including a postal address; offenders’ identity number or passport number; the type of sexual offence.

src: rapporteer korrupsie via die teenkorrupsieblitslyn silusapho nyanda om korrupsie in die staatsdiens te bekamp, bly n prioriteit vir die regering en die teenkorrupsieblitslyn maak dit maklik vir lede van die publiek om gevalle waar korrupsie vermoed word, te rapporteer.
tgt: report corruption via the anticorruption hotline silusapho nyanda if you suspect corruption, fraud, theft or other wrong doing in the public service, you are urged to report it.

src: die blitslyn is in 2004 deur die staatsdienskommis sie (sdk) geloods en het sedertdien meer as 100 000 oproepe met aantygings van korrupsie en wanadministra sie ontvang.
tgt: curbing corrup tion in the public service remains a government priority and the national anticorruption hotline makes it easy for members of the public to report suspected acts of corruption.

src: dié oproepe deur onthullers het gelei tot die ondersoek van 24 035 sake van kor rupsie, bedrog en ander misdaad, sê die kommissaris van die sdk, michael selo ane, wat toesig hou oor al die werk wat deur die kommissie uitgevoer word.
tgt: the hotline was launched by the public service commission (psc) in 2004 and since then, more than 100 000 calls reporting allegations of corruption and maladministration have been received.

src: tussen 2020 en 2021 is 337 sake via die blitslyn gerap porteer.
tgt: between 2020 and 2021, 337 cases were reported via the hotline.

src: vyfendertig van dié het ongerymdhede rakende aanstellings en verkrygings behels wat tans deur die sdk ondersoek word.
tgt: thirtyfive of these involve appointment and procurement irregularities that are being investigated by the psc.

src: die oorblywende sake is na ander staatsdepartemente of wetstoepassingsagentskappe vir ondersoek verwys.
tgt: the remaining cases were referred to other government departments or law enforcement agencies for investigation.

src: ongerymdhede betref fende behuising, tenders en maatskaplike toelae onder die heropbouen ontwikkelings program (hop) is onder die algemeenste aantygings wat gemaak word.
tgt: the reconstruction and development programme (rdp) housing, tender and social grant irregularities are among the most common allegations made.

src: "ons het tydens die inper kingstydperk baie wenke per epos ontvang.
tgt: "during the lockdown we received a lot of tipoffs through email.

src: ons het ook n geoutomatiseerde bood skapopnamestelsel vir die gene wat ons blitslyn naure wil skakel," sê seloane.
tgt: we also have an automatic message recording system for those who wish to call our hotline after hours," seloane says.

src: hy voeg by dat daar n bestendige toename in die rapportering van bedrog met betrekking tot maatskaplike toelae was sedert die inper kingsvlakke begin lig is, veral rakende die maatskaplike noodverligtingstoelae.
tgt: he adds that since the lowering of lockdown levels, there has been a steady increase in the reporting of social grantrelated fraud, especially social relief of distress grants.

src: ter versterking van dié pogings om korrupsie te bekamp, het die staat wets toeppassingsagentskappe voorsien van vaardige personeel en n koalisiesentrum gevestig.
tgt: to strengthen efforts to curb corruption, the state has capacitated law enforcement agencies with skilled personnel, and established the fusion centre.

src: dié sentrum bring wetstoepassingsagent skappe byeen, waar hulle inligting en hulpbronne deel in die stryd teen bedrog en korrupsie in die verkryging van kovid19verwante goedere en dienste.
tgt: the centre is a grouping of law enforcement agencies that share information and resources in the fight against fraud and corruption in the procurement of covidrelated goods and services.

src: wat gebeur nadat n wenk ontvang word?
tgt: what happens after a tipoff is made?

src: seloane sê dat wanneer n saak via die blitslyn gerapporteer word, vroeë beslegtingsbeamptes seker maak dat alle betrokke inligting verskaf is.
tgt: seloane says when a case is reported via the hotline, early resolution officers check that all the relevant information is provided.

src: soda nige inligting behels die besonderhede van wie wat gedoen het, wanneer dit na bewering plaasgevind het en die rede daarvoor.
tgt: this includes the details of who did what, when the alleged act took place, and why.

src: hy sê dat indien enige oortreding bevind word — hetsy ongerymdhede met verkryging of aanstellings, omkopery, korrupsie ver want aan hopbehuising, bedrog met betrekking tot maatskaplike toelae, onwet tige migrasie, aanranding, diefstal of bedrog — die sdk óf remediërende aksie aan die betrokke departement sal voorstel óf die saak na die valke, die sanp of die teenkorrup sietaakmag sal verwys vir verdere ondersoek.
tgt: he says if wrongdoing is found – be it procurement and appointment irregularities, bribery, rdp housing related corruption, social grant fraud, illegal migration, assault, theft or fraud – the psc either recommends remedial action to the relevant department or refers the case to the hawks, saps or anticorruption task team for further investigation.

src: sake wat die sdk na departemente verwys vir ondersoek sluit die vol gende in: staatsamptenare wat ekstra werk doen vir geld sonder toestemming van die departemente; onverklaarde belangebot sings; onetiese gedrag.
tgt: cases the psc refers to departments for investigation, include: public servants doing extra work for money without consent of the departments undeclared conflicts of interests, and unethical behaviour.

src: seloane sê dat die sdk die staatsdepartemente 60 dae gee om ondersoek in te stel en n saak af te handel.
tgt: seloane says the psc gives government departments 60 days to investigate and close a case.

src: hy sê dat die departement dan die sdk oor die bevin dinge inlig.
tgt: he says the department then informs the psc of its findings.

src: "as ons tevrede is met die stappe wat die departement geneem het, sal ons die saak sluit; maar as ons nie tevrede is nie, word die saak na hulle teruggestuur.
tgt: "if we are happy with the steps taken by the department, we will close the case, but if we are not satisfied, we revert back to them.

src: "naamloosheid gewaar borgwanneer n onthuller nie sy/haar identiteit wil openbaar nie, neem die sdkblitslyn slegs hul kontakbesonder hede.
tgt: "anonymity guaranteedwhen a whistleblower does not want his/her identity revealed, the psc hotline officer takes down only their contact details.

src: dit is belangrik sodat die sdk met hulle in kontak kan tree, sou daar meer inligting benodig word.
tgt: this is important because if extra information is needed, the psc must be able to contact them.

src: onthullers wat sake via die sdkblitslyn rapporteer, word daarvan verseker dat hulle beskerm sal word as hulle verkies om naamloos te bly, sê seloane.
tgt: whistleblowers who report cases to the psc hotline are assured protection if they want to remain anonymous, says seloane.

src: indiening van klagtes by die gepf vergemaklik vukuzenzele unnamed lede, pensioenaris se en begunstigdes van die pensioen fonds vir staatsampte nare (gepf) het nou af toegang tot hulp indien hul ongelukkig is oor die diens wat hul ontvang.
tgt: lodging gepf complaints made easy vukuzenzele unnamed members, pen sioners and beneficiaries of the government employees pension fund (gepf) now have recourse when unhappy with the service they receive.

src: om te verseker dat die gepf hul lede en dié se families regverdig behan del, het die raad onlangs n beregtiger aangestel om klagtes te hanteer.
tgt: to ensure the gepf members and their families are treated fairly, the board recently established an office to handle disputes.

src: die beregter vir pensioenfondse is n interne dog onafhank like kantoor van die gepf.
tgt: the government employees pension ombud (gepo) is an internal but independent office of the gepf.

src: die gepf is een van die grootste pensioenfondse ter wêreld, met meer as 1,2 mil joen aktiewe lede en meer as 450 000 pensioenarisse en begunstigdes.
tgt: the gepf is among the largest pension funds in the world, with over 1.2 million active members and more than 450 000 pensioners and beneficiaries.

src: die fonds is ingevolge die wet op pensioene vir staatsamp tenare gestig en word daar volgens gereguleer.
tgt: the fund was founded and is regulated in terms of the government employees pension law.

src: advokaat makhado rama bulana is as die beregtiger aangestel.
tgt: advocate makhado ramabulana has been appointed as the ombud.

src: hy sê dat die kantoor ten doel het om hulp en steun te verleen aan mense wat ongelukkig is met die dienste van die gepf.
tgt: he says the office was established to assist people who are unhappy with the services of the gepf.

src: mense wat nie regsaksie kan bekostig nie, sal veral voordeel trek uit die bereg tigerskantoor.
tgt: it will be especially beneficial to people who cannot afford legal recourse.

src: voor mense hul klagtes na die kantoor van die openbare beskerm er of na die howe neem, kan hulle bemiddeling deur die beregter versoek.
tgt: before people take their disputes to the office of the public protector or to the courts, they can seek mediation from the ombud.

src: die beregtiger sal intree in sake wat lei tot onre delike vertragings in die verwerking van betalings verskuldig aan eisers.
tgt: the ombud will intervene in matters that lead to unreasonable delays in the processing of payments due to claimants.

src: dit mag slegs as bemiddelaar optree in klagtes wat in die afgelope drie jaar ontstaan het.
tgt: it may only mediate in complaints that have arisen within the past three years.

src: ander sake wat binne die bestek van die gepo val, sluit die volgende in: amptenare wat versuim om hul pligte ingevolge die fonds se wet en reëls uit te voer; die verbreking van n verbintenis sonder n gegronde rede; en verkeerde of misleidende inligting wat deur gepfwerknemers verskaf is.
tgt: other issues within the gepo’s scope include: the failure of officials to perform their duties in terms of the fund’s law and rules; breaking a commitment without a justifiable reason; and incorrect or misleading information provided by the gepf employees.

src: voordat n persoon ’n klagte by die beregti gerskantoor indien, moet die persoon n skriftelike klag by die gepf, die staatspensioenadministra sieagentskap (gpaa) of hul werkgewer indien en aan hul die geleentheid bied om die saak te besink.
tgt: before lodging a complaint with the gepo, a person must send a written complaint to either the gepf, the government pensions administration agency (gpaa) or their employer, and give them a chance to settle the matter.

src: "jy moet aan hulle 30 dae gun om aandag te skenk aan die kwessies wat jy geopper het.
tgt: "you must allow them 30 days to correct the issues that you identified.

src: indien die klagte na 30 dae steeds onopgelos is, kan jy n klagte by die beregtigerskantoor inhandig," verduidelik ramabulana.
tgt: if, after 30 days, your issues remain unresolved, you can submit a complaint to the ombud," explains ramabulana.

src: bou n bankvaste basis vir belegging vukuzenzele unnamed gewoonlik is nou dié tyd van die jaar wanneer ons beleggers van regoor die land en die wêreld byeen bring by die jaarlikse suidafrikaanse beleggingskon ferensie.
tgt: building a foundation for investment vukuzenzele unnamed normally, this is the time of year when we bring together investors from across the country and around the world for the annual south africa investment conference.

src: die eerste beleggingskon ferensie is in 2018 gehou as deel van ons ambisieuse veldtog om r1,2 triljoen in nuwe beleggings oor n tyd perk van vyf jaar in te samel.
tgt: we held the first investment conference in 2018 as part of our ambitious drive to raise r1.2 trillion in new investment over five years.

src: die konferensie is in 2018 en 2019 deur meer as n duisend afgevaardigdes bygewoon, terwyl die konferensie in 2020 plaasgevind het in n hibriede formaat weens die kovid19pandemie.
tgt: the conference was attended by over a thousand delegates in 2018 and 2019, and in 2020 was held in a hybrid format due to the covid19 pandemic.

src: dié konferensies het tot dusver altesaam net meer as r770 miljard in beleggings verbintenisse regoor n wye verskeidenheid ekonomiese sektore ingesamel.
tgt: together, these conferences raised just over r770 billion in investment commitments across a wide range of economic sectors.

src: die vierde suidafrikaanse beleggingskonferensie sou in november 2021 plaasge vind het, maar ons het die besluit geneem om dit na maart 2022 te verskuif weens verskeie ander byeenkomste wat op dié stadium plaasvind, waaronder die plaaslike regeringsverkiesings, die cop26klimaatskonferensie en die intraafrika handels beurs.
tgt: the fourth south africa investment conference would have been held in november 2021, but we decided to move it to march 2022 due to several other events taking place at this time.

src: nog n belangrike rede om dit volgende jaar te hou is dat die kovid19inentingsy fers teen daardie tyd by verre baie hoër sal wees as op die oomblik, wat beide reis en byeenkoms sal vergemaklik.
tgt: another important reason for holding it next year is that there will be far greater covid19 vaccination coverage by then, making both travelling and gathering easier.

src: alhoewel die vierde suidafrika beleggingskonferensie met n paar maande uitgestel is, duur ons ambisieuse veld tog voort.
tgt: although the fourth investment conference has been held over by a few months, our ambitious investment drive continues.

src: selfs te midde die uitdagings in die ekonomiese omgewing weens kovid19, wat vererger is deur die geweld en verwoesting wat in julie in dele van kwazulunatal en gauteng plaasgevind het, het maatskappye hul woord gehou en hulle verbintenisse nagekom, en ook verdere beleggingsgeleenthede in suidafrika ondersoek.
tgt: even in the midst of the challenging economic environment caused by the covid19 pandemic, which was exacerbated by the violence and destruction that occurred in parts of kwazulunatal and gauteng in july, companies continue to make good on their commitments and to look for other investment opportunities in south africa.

src: in slegs die afgelope jaar is beleggingsverbintenisse van naastenby r120 mil jard in projeksamestelling en uitbreiding ingestoot.
tgt: in the last year alone, nearly r120 billion of investment commitments flowed into project construction or expansion.

src: dit beteken dat nagenoeg 38% van die totale beleggingsver bintenisse — oftewel r290 miljard — tot op hede in die ekonomie ingestoot is.
tgt: this means that around 38% of the total investment commitments – or r290 billion – have to date flowed into the economy.

src: som mige beleggings is weens kovid19 uitgestel, veral in sektore wat swaar getref is soos eiendomsontwikkeling en toerisme.
tgt: some investments have been delayed due to covid19, particularly in hardhit sectors like property development and tourism.

src: die farmaseutiese bedryf is n opwindende nuwe gebied van groei.
tgt: pharmaceuticals is an exciting new area of growth.

src: aspen pharmacare het onlangs hul r3,4 miljard uit breiding van stapel gestuur, soos aangekondig by die 2018 beleggingskonferen sie.
tgt: aspen pharmacare recently launched its r3.4 billion expansion, which it announced at the 2018 investment conference.

src: dié belegging het aspen se vervaardigingsfasiliteit in gqeberha omskep in een van die grootste vervaardig ingspilpunte van algehele ver dowingsmedikasie ter wêreld en het ook kapasiteit ver skaf vir die vervaardiging van meer as 100 miljoen dosisse van die johnson & johnson kovid19entstof.
tgt: this investment has turned aspen’s gqeberha manufacturing facility into one of largest global manufacturing hubs for general anaesthetics and has also provided capacity over 100 million doses of the johnson & johnson covid vaccine have been produced under contract.

src: verder het die wêreld gesondheidsorganisasie suidafrika gekies as gasheer vir n mrnainent ingsvervaardigingspilpunt met die biovacinstituut as deel van n private publieke vennootskap met die staat.
tgt: the world health organization also chose south africa to host an mrna vaccine manufacturing hub with the biovac institute, which is a publicprivate partnership with government.

src: suidafrikaansgebore dr. patrick soonshiong, wat in suidafrika gebore is, en sy maatskappy nantworks het onlangs n ambisieuse inisiatief aangekondig om kapasiteit vir gevorderde gesondheidsorg in afrika tot stand te bring.
tgt: south africanborn dr patrick soonshiong and his company nantworks recently announced an ambitious initiative to build capacity for advanced health care in africa.

src: benewens die beleggings wat hulle gaan inbring, sal dié ontwikkelings ook bydra tot ons oorkoepe lende ambisie vir die kontinent om teen 2040 self 60% van afrika se inentingsbehoeftes te vervaardig.
tgt: in addition to the investments they will bring, these developments will also contribute to our collective ambition for the continent to manufacture 60% of its vaccine needs by 2040. energy is another area of growth.

src: daar word verwag dat die 25 verkose bieërs in die vyfde rondte van ons program vir die verkryging van hernu bare energie van onafhanklike kragprodusente altesaam nagenoeg r50 miljard in die ekonomie sal belê.
tgt: the 25 preferred bidders in the fifth round of our renewable energy independent power producer procurement programme are together expected to invest around r50 billion into the economy.

src: die ver hoogde lisensiëringsdrempel vir vasgelegde kragopwek king na 100 megawatts sal waarskynlik lei tot wesenlike privaat belegging in kragop wekkingsprojekte.
tgt: the increase of the licensing threshold for embedded generation to 100 megawatts is likely to result in substantial private investment in electricity generation projects.

src: suidafrika het onlangs n aanvanklike verbintenis van ongeveer r131 miljard gesluit om n regverdige oorgang na n lae koolstofekonomie te befonds deur beleggings in hernubare energie, groen waterstof en elektriese voer tuie.
tgt: south africa has recently secured an initial commitment of around r131 billion to fund a just transition to a low carbon economy by investing in renewable energy, green hydrogen and electric vehicles.

src: dié verbintenis deur die verenigde state van amerika, die verenigde koninkryk, frankryk, duitsland en die europese unie, is belyn met die parysooreenkoms, wat ryker lande onder die ver pligting stel om ontkoling in ontwikkelende lande te onder steun.
tgt: this commitment by the united states, united kingdom, france, germany and the european union is in line with the paris agreement, which obliges wealthier countries to support decarbonisation in the developing world.

src: dié beleggings in energie sal ons in staat stel om die aftakelende beurtkrag wat die land tans ervaar, te bekamp sodra die nuwe kragopwek kingskapasiteit daargestel is.
tgt: these energy investments will help us overcome the debilitating load shedding that the country is currently experiencing, as new electricity generation capacity comes online.

src: verskeie nuwe beleggings in datasentrums en ondersese kabels sal nie net nuwe beleg gings lok nie, maar ook die nodige infrastruktuur vir groei in die tegnologie en telekom munikasiesektore verskaf.
tgt: several new investments in datacentres and undersea cables will not only bring in new investment, but will provide the infrastructure needed for the growth of technology and telecommunications industries.

src: n belangrike deel van ons beleggingsveldtog is die verreikende strukturele hervormingsinisiatiewe wat ons tans onderneem op gebiede soos energie, tele kommunikasie, water, en hawens en spoorweë.
tgt: an important part of our investment drive are the farreaching structural reforms we are undertaking in areas such as energy, telecommunications, water and ports and rail.

src: dié hervormingsinisiatiewe sal doeltreffendheid en mede dingendheid bevorder, wat die koste van sake in suidafrika doen sal verminder en groter privaat belegging in ons ekonomiese infrastruktuur sal aanmoedig.
tgt: these reforms will improve efficiency and competitiveness, bringing down the cost of doing business in south africa, and encouraging greater private investment in our economic infrastructure.

src: ons het nou 13 spesiale eko nomiese sones regoor die land wat aan beleggers geteikende beleggingsaansporings, voorkeurbelastingkoerse en uitvoersteun bied.
tgt: we now have 13 special economic zones across the country, providing investors with targeted investment incentives, preferential tax rates and export support.

src: dié bied n aanloklike vervaardigings basis vir maatskappye wat beide plaaslike en oorsese markte wil dien.
tgt: these provide an attractive manufacturing base for companies seeking to supply both local and international markets.

src: asidi bespoedig skoolinfrastruktuur more matshediso nkululeko ralo primêre skool is n goeie voorbeeld van die positiewe uitkomste wat bereik kan word wanneer die gemeenskap en regering saamwerk.
tgt: asidi fast tracks school infrastructure more matshediso nkululeko ralo primary school is a good example of how positive results can be achieved when communities and government work together.

src: die skool, wat in mthatha in die ooskaap geleë is, is aanvanklik vanuit n motorhuis van n gemeenskapslid, nkululeko ralo, bedryf – na wie dit ook vernoem is.
tgt: the school, based in mthatha in the eastern cape, first started operating in a garage at the home of community member nkululeko ralo, who it is named after.

src: soos die skool oor die jare heen gegroei het, het dit n paar keer van adres verwissel.
tgt: over the years, the school moved a number of times as it expanded.

src: leerders en onderwysers het egter nooit toegang tot voldoende fasiliteite geniet nie ... tot onlangs, toe hul nuwe, moderne skool sy deure geopen het.
tgt: however, learners and teachers never had the benefit of proper facilities until recently, when they walked through the doors of their new, stateoftheart school.

src: die skool is voltooi as deel van die versnelde skoleinfra struktuurleweringsinisiatief (asidi) wat deur die departement van basiese onderwys in 2011 bekendgestel is.
tgt: the school was completed as part of the accelerated schools infrastructure delivery initiative (asidi), which was launched by the department of basic education in 2011. the initiative aims to replace schools that compromise the safety of learners and staff, due to a lack of proper infrastructure, water, sanitation and electricity.

src: tot dusver het asidi 266 skole gebou en sanitasie voor sien aan 886 skole, water aan 1 030 skole en elektrisiteit aan 372 skole.
tgt: to date, asidi has built 266 schools, provided 886 schools with sanitation, 1 030 with water and 372 with electricity.

src: die leerders van nkululeko ralo primêre skool het nou voldoende klaskamers en toe gang tot n hulpbronsentrum, wetenskaplaboratorium, en ook n veeldoelige sentrum en n voedingsentrum.
tgt: the learners of nkululeko ralo primary school now have proper classrooms and access to a resource centre, science laboratory, multipur pose and a nutrition centre.

src: 'n gedeelde visie die skoolhoof, koleka gilman, is passievol oor die verbetering van opvoeding in mthatha.
tgt: a shared vision principal koleka gilman is passionate about improving education in mthatha.

src: haar droom om n skool vir die gemeenskap op die been te bring het in 1988 ontstaan en die daaropvolgende jaar het sy begin om haar visie met die gemeenskap te deel.
tgt: her dream to start a school for her community began in 1988, and the following year, she began sharing her vision with the community.

src: "ons gemeenskap was prop vol kinders van skoolgaande ouderdom wat nêrens gehad om te gaan vir skoolopleiding nie.
tgt: "our community was highly populated with a lot of children of schoolgoing age who had nowhere to go for education.

src: my visie is verwelkom deur n gemeenskapslid, nkululeko ralo, wat sy motor huis vir ons aangebied het om as skool te gebruik," sê gilman.
tgt: my vision was welcomed by community member nkululeko ralo, who offered his home garage to be used as a school," says gilman.

src: sy voeg by dat ralo n vraghouer van telkom gereël het om as ekstra klaskamer te dien.
tgt: she adds that ralo went on to organise a container from telkom and it was used as an additional classroom.

src: ralo het ook met twee lede van die gemeenskap gereël om hul motorhuise as ekstra klaskamers aan te bied.
tgt: ralo also arranged with two members in his community to offer their garages as additional classrooms.

src: ralo is ongelukkig oorlede in 2004. in 1994 het die skool na die eli spilkin hall getrek wat deur die plaaslike sakeman, eli spilkin, gebou is.
tgt: ralo sadly passed away in 2004. in 1994, the school moved to the eli spilkin hall, which was built by local businessman eli spilkin.

src: "ons het in dieselfde jaar mobiele toilette vanaf die provinsiale departement van onderwys ontvang.
tgt: "in the same year, we received mobile toilets from the provincial department of education.

src: "ek het toe rondgesoek en aansoek gedoen vir n perseel waar ons uiteindelik n skool sou kon bou.
tgt: i then looked [for] and applied for a site where we would eventually build our school.

src: in 1998 het ons vyf hektaar grond ontvang," sê gilman.
tgt: we received five hectares of land in 1998," says gilman.

src: kats en spaks, n niewinsgewende organisasie, het drie tydelike klaskamers aan die skool geskenk en die gemeenskap het vyf klaskamers van klei gebou.
tgt: three temporary classrooms were donated to the school by a nonprofit organisation called kats and spaks, and the community built five mud classrooms.

src: gilman was deur die jare n groot kampvegter vir die opknapping en verbe tering van die skool en uitein delik het hulle vyf klaskamers vanaf die kantoor van die ooskaapse premier ontvang.
tgt: throughout the years, gilman continued to advocate for the school to be improved and eventually, five classrooms were received from the eastern cape premier’s office.

src: in 2014 het dinge n positiewe wending geneem toe die departement van basiese onderwys deur middel van asidi n tender uitgereik het om die nkululeko ralo primêre skool te bou.
tgt: in 2014, things took a positive turn when the department of basic education, through asidi, issued a tender to build nkululeko ralo primary school.

src: "bouwerk het in 2018 begin en die skool is in 2021 voltooi, danksy asidi," sê gilman.
tgt: "construction started in 2018 and the school was completed in 2021, thanks to asidi," says gilman.

src: onderrig en leer wat inspireer die adjunkminister van basiese onderwys, reginah mhaule, sê die departement wil seker maak dat die fisiese infrastruktuur van elke skool leerders inspireer om skool by te woon en te leer, en opvoeders inspireer om te onderrig.
tgt: inspiring teaching and learning basic education deputy minister reginah mhaule says the department wants to ensure that the physical infrastructure of every school inspires learners to attend school and learn, and educators to teach.

src: "die bou van hierdie skool is die regering se manier om die waardigheid van landelike en minderbevoorregte skoolgaande kinders en hul onderwysers terug te besorg," het sy bygevoeg.
tgt: "the building of this school is government’s way of restoring dignity to rural and underprivileged schoolgoing children and their teachers," she adds.

src: n lid van die skool se beheerliggaam, nomuntu dlengane, sê die nuwe skool sal onderwysers en leerders motiveer om hul volle poten siaal te bereik.
tgt: a member of the school governing body, nomuntu dlengane, says the new school will motivate tea chers and learners to reach their full potential.

src: "ons leerders se gesindheid en selfvertroue het reeds verbeter danksy die nuwe infrastruktuur.
tgt: "our learners’ attitudes and selfconfidence have already improved due to the new infrastructure.

src: sperdatum vir nsfas befondsing kruip nader sphelele ngubane studente en jongmense vanuit voorheen benadeelde en werkersklasgemeenskappe word aangemoedig om aansoek te doen vir befondsing vanaf die nasionale finansiële hulpskema vir studente (nsfas).
tgt: nsfas funding deadline looms sphelele ngubane students and youth from disadvantaged and workingclass backgrounds are encouraged to apply for funding from the national student financial aid scheme (nsfas).

src: volgens die departement van hoër onderwys en opleiding is nsfasbefondsing beskikbaar aan jongmense wat reeds hul skoolopleiding voltooi het of reeds naskools studeer.
tgt: according to the department of higher education and training, nsfas funding is available to youth who have already completed their schooling or are already studying at any level in a higher education institution.

src: hulle kan aansoek doen vir befondsing deur nsfas om aan n openbare universiteit of kollege vir tegniese en beroepsgerigte onderwys en opleiding (tvet) te studeer, maar moet aansoek doen voor die sluitingsdatum op 7 januarie 2022. mense wat aansoek doen, moet: suidafrikaanse burgers wees of permanente verblyfreg hê, en wil registreer om aan n openbare univer siteit of tvetkollege te studeer, of reeds studeer.
tgt: they can apply for funding from nsfas to study at a public university or a technical and vocational education and training (tvet) college, but must do so before the closing date on 7 january 2022. applicants must be: south african citizens or permanent residents who want to register or are already studying at a public university or tvet college; south african social security agency grant recipients; from households with a combined household income not exceeding r350 000 per year.

src: blinker toekoms nhlakanipho mkhize (26) is n gekwalifiseerde elektrisiën danksy nsfasbefondsing wat vir sy studies aan umfolozi tvetkollege in kwazulunatal betaal het.
tgt: a brighter future nhlakanipho mkhize (26) is a qualified electrician, thanks to nsfas funding, which paid for his studies at umfolozi tvet college in kwazulunatal.

src: mkhize, van richardsbaai, het n nasionale sertifikaat (beroepsgerig) in elektriese infrastruktuurkon struksie in 2017 verkry.
tgt: mkhize, from richards bay, obtained a national certificate (vocational) electrical infrastructure construction in 2017. in addition to campusbased learning, he also had to complete workplace training and pass a trade test.

src: buiten vir kampusgebaseerde onderrig moes hy ook opleiding in die werksplek voltooi en n ambagstoets slaag.
tgt: early on in his studies, mkhize had the opportunity to put what he learnt into practice, ensuring that he gained confidence in the basic skills he was developing.

src: "as eerstejaarstudent het ek reeds na die elektrisiteitsprobleme in my gemeenskap omgesien.
tgt: "as a firstyear student, i was already attending to electricity problems in my community.

src: umfolozi tvetkollege het die teorie sowel as die praktiese toepassing vir ons aangebied.
tgt: umfolozi tvet college provided us with both theory and practice.

src: "die voordeel van tvetstudente is nie net die blootstelling nie, maar ook die verpligte werkplekgebaseerde leerkomponent wat sertifiseer dat studente bevoeg is voor dat hulle hul kwalifikasie ontvang," sê hy.
tgt: "the advantage tvet students have is not just exposure, but also a compulsory workplacebased learning component to certify that they are competent before receiving their qualification," he says.

src: soos baie suidafrikaanse jongmense wat uit n minderbevoorregte agtergrond kom, het mkhize geweet hy wil n loopbaan in ingenieurswese volg, maar niemand in sy familie kon die kollegegelde bekostig nie.
tgt: like many south african youth who come from underprivileged backgrounds, mkhize knew he wanted to pursue a career in engineering, but no one in his family could afford college fees.

src: "toe ek van die nsfasbe fondsing te hore kom, het ek geweet dat dit sou lei na waar ek wil wees – om n ingenieur te word," sê hy.
tgt: "when i became aware of the nsfas funding, i knew it would lead to where i wanted to go – being an engineer," he says.

src: geen verskoning vir ggg vukuzenzele unnamed as n nasie se karakter gemeet word aan die manier waarop dit vroue en kinders hanteer, dan faal ons klaaglik.
tgt: no excuse for gbv vukuzenzele unnamed if a nation’s character can be judged by how it treats women and children, then we are falling desperately short.

src: die jongste misdaadstatistiek wat deur die suidafrikaanse polisiediens (sapd) vrygestel is, toon n toename in verkragting, huishoudelike geweld en – waarskynlik die kommerwekkendste – kindermoord.
tgt: the latest crime statistics released by the south african police service (saps) show an increase in rapes, domestic violence, and, perhaps most worryingly, in child murders.

src: tussen julie en september 2021 is 9 556 mense verkrag, die meerderheid daarvan vroue.
