tgt: between july and september 2021, 9 556 people, most of whom were women, were raped.

src: dit is 7% meer as in die vorige verslagperiode.
tgt: this is 7% more than in the previous reporting period.

src: van die byna 73 000 gevalle van aanranding wat in hierdie tydperk aangemeld is, is meer as 13 000 verwant aan huishoudelike geweld.
tgt: of the nearly 73 000 assault cases reported during this period, more than 13 000 were domestic violencerelated.

src: die aantal kindermoorde het met byna een derde toegeneem teenoor die vorige verslagperiode.
tgt: the rate of child murders has climbed by nearly a third compared to the previous reporting period.

src: ons het voorheen gesê dat die geweld wat mans teen vroue pleeg die tweede pandemie is wat ons land moet konfronteer, en nes die kovid19pandemie kan dit oorwin word as ons almal saamwerk.
tgt: we have said before that the violence perpetrated by men against women is the second pandemic that our country must confront, and like the covid19 pandemic it can be overcome if we all work together.

src: as regering het ons n plig en n verantwoordelikheid om die nodige hulpbronne te voorsien om misdaad weens geslagsgebaseerde geweld hok te slaan.
tgt: as government, we have a duty and responsibility to devote the necessary resources to combat crimes of genderbased violence (gbv).

src: sedert die bekendstelling van die nasionale strategiese plan om geslagsgeweld en vrouemoord te bekamp (nsp) in 2020, was daar verskeie ingrypings om op ggg te reageer.
tgt: since the launch of the national strategic plan to combat genderbased violence and femicide (nsp) in 2020, there have been a several interventions to respond to gbv.

src: dit behels verreikende wetgewende hervorming, ondersteuning aan oorlewendes deur die beskikbaarstelling van verkragtingtoetsstelle (rape kits) asook sielkundige en maatskaplike dienste by polisiestasies, die stigting van n gggvfonds en die ondersteuningsnetwerk van thuthuzelaen khuseleka sorgsentrums.
tgt: this includes farreaching legislative reform, support to survivors through the provision of evidence kits at police stations and psychosocial services, the establishment of a genderbased violence and femicide fund and supporting the network of thuthuzela and khuseleka care centres.

src: die sapd het aangedui dat ons vordering maak in die aansienlike agterstand van dnsanalise, wat noodsaaklik is vir geregtigheid om te geskied vir die oorlewendes van seksmisdade.
tgt: the saps has indicated we are making progress in reducing the significant backlogs in dna analysis, which is crucial to securing justice for survivors of sex crimes.

src: die sapd beman ook 134 gggtoonbanke by polisiestasies regoor die land en is in die proses om nog in te rig.
tgt: the saps also operates 134 gbv desks at police stations around the coun try and is in the process of establishing more.

src: geslagsgebaseerde geweld is n probleem van manlike geweld.
tgt: gbv is a problem of male violence.

src: dit is hoofsaaklik mans wat verkragters is.
tgt: it is predominantly men who are rapists.

src: dit is oorwegend mans wat huis houdelike geweld pleeg.
tgt: it is mainly men who are perpetrators of domestic violence.

src: aangesien dit hoofsaaklik mans is wat die oortreders is, behoort dit mans te wees wat die leiding neem teen geslagsgebaseerde geweld en hul stemme dik maak, dit aanmeld, bewusmaking daar oor skep, portuuropvoeding doen en voorkomende aksies neem.
tgt: because it is men who are the main perpetrators, it should be men taking the lead in speaking out and reporting gbv, in raising awareness, in peer edu cation and in prevention efforts.

src: dit behoort mans in gesagsposisies in ons onderriginstansies te wees – hetsy skoolhoofde, opvoeders of dosente – wat skole en plekke van hoër onderrig omskep in veilige ruimtes vir vroulike leerders en studente, en wat nooit, ooit hul gesagsposisies gebruik om seksuele gunste af te dwing nie.
tgt: it should be men in positions of authority in our educational system, whether as school principals, educators or lecturers, who should be making schools and places of higher learning safe spaces for female learners and students, and never, ever abusing their position of authority to demand sexual favours.

src: mans behoort ook n baie meer formatiewe en teenwoordige rol in hul gesinne te speel, veral om hul seuns groot te maak om n gesonde, positiewe manlikheid uit te leef wat respek teenoor vroue en kinders betoon.
tgt: men should also be playing a more formative and present role in their families, particularly in raising their sons to exhibit healthy, positive masculinity that is respectful of women and child ren.

src: gemeenskappe en gemeen skapsorganisasies moet saam met die regering werk om ingrypings te implementeer wat manlikheid herdefinieer, sodat ons mans kan grootmaak om empatie, verdraagsaamheid en respek te hê.
tgt: communities and community organisations must work with government to implement interventions that redefine masculinity so that we raise men with empathy, tolerance and respect.

src: net soos wat die beëindiging van geslagsgebaseerde geweld nie alleen die staat se verantwoordelikheid kan wees nie, kan die onus ook nie net op vroue en kinders rus om die skokkende vlakke van geweld en mishandeling teen hulle te beëindig nie.
tgt: just as ending gbv cannot be the state’s responsibility alone, the onus cannot be on women and children to end the shocking levels of violence and abuse being visited upon them.

src: suidafrikaanse mans moet n groter rol speel in die voorkoming van ggg.
tgt: south african men need to play a greater role in preventing gbv.

src: hulle moet verstaan wat geslagsge baseerde geweld behels, veral seksuele geweld.
tgt: they need to understand what constitutes gbv, especially sexual violence.

src: die jongste misdaadstatis tiek toon dat byna 4 000 mense in hul eie of in die oortreder se huis verkrag is, en in 400 aan gemelde verkragtingsake was die oortreder en die slagoffer in n verhouding.
tgt: the latest crime statistics show nearly 4 000 people were raped in their homes or that of the perpetrator, and in 400 reported rape cases the victim and perpetrator had a relationship.

src: dit impliseer dat sommige mans nie verstaan dat seksuele aktiwiteit sonder uitdruklike toestemming n misdaad is nie.
tgt: this suggests that some men do not understand that sexual activity without explicit consent is a crime.

src: mans moet hul vrouens en meisies respekteer en begryp dat om in n intieme verhouding te wees, nooit huishoudelike geweld regverdig nie.
tgt: men must respect their wives and girlfriends and understand that being in an intimate partner relationship is never a justification for domestic violence.

src: as elke man twee ander mans kry en aldrie onderneem om nooit n vrou te verkrag en nooit n hand teen n vrou te lig nie, en mekaar verantwoordbaar hou aan hierdie verbintenis, kan ons begin om geslagsgebaseerde geweld in ons land in alle erns aan te pak.
tgt: if each man gathers two men and the three pledge to never rape a woman, never lay a hand on a woman and hold each other accountable to this pledge, we can start to seriously tackle gbv in our country.

src: dit is nie genoeg om eers in te gryp wanneer oortreders deur die strafregstelsel opgetel word nie.
tgt: it is not enough to intervene only once perpetrators have entered the criminal justice system.

src: ons moet geslagsgebaseerde geweld stop voor dit begin.
tgt: we have to prevent gbv before it happens.

src: ek doen n beroep op alles suidafrikaanse mans, jonk en oud, stedelinge en dié op die platteland, moderne sowel as tradisionele mans, getroud en ongetroud, om deel te wees van die voorkomingsaksies wat broodnodig is in ons huise en gemeenskappe.
tgt: i call on all south african men, young and old, city dwellers and rural dwellers, modernists and traditionalists, married and unmarried, to be part of the prevention efforts that are sorely needed in homes and in our communities.

src: deur te weier om geweld teen vroue en kinders ooglui kend toe te laat, deur nie self deel daarvan te wees nie en deur sulke dade te rapporteer, stel jy n voorbeeld aan ander mans, veral jong mans en seuns.
tgt: by refusing to condone violence against women and children, by not being party to it yourself and by reporting such acts, you are setting an example to your fellow men, especially to young men and boys.

src: werk saam om die demokrasie te versterk vukuzenzele unnamed soos suidafrika die nuwe jaar tegemoet gegaan het, is ons gekonfronteer met twee diepgaande gebeurtenisse wat ons op verskillende maniere herinner aan wat ons as n nasie saamsnoer.
tgt: work together to strengthen democracy vukuzenzele unnamed as south africa entered the new year, we were confronted by two pro found events that remind ed us, in different ways, of what brings us together as a people.

src: op die eerste dag van 2022 het die nasie in die gees bymekaargekom om afskeid te neem van aartsbiskop desmond tutu by die st. george’s katedraal in kaapstad.
tgt: on the first day of 2022, the nation gathered in spirit to bid farewell to arch bishop desmond tutu at st george’s cathedral in cape town.

src: dit was n baie hartseer oom blik soos wat ons teruggedink het aan die lewe en bydrae van n geliefde landgenoot wat op verskeie maniere die morele gewete van ons nasie was.
tgt: it was a moment of great sadness as we recalled the life and contribution of a beloved compatriot who was, in many ways, the moral conscience of our nation.

src: sy begrafnis was terselfdertyd n viering van die waardes wat hy voorgestaan het.
tgt: at the same time, his funeral was a celebration of the values he stood for.

src: dit was n viering van die groot eenheid en diversiteit van ons mense, en n herinnering aan die opofferings wat deur so baie mense gemaak is om ons demokrasie te vestig.
tgt: it was a celebration of the great unity and diversity of our people, and a reminder of the sacrifices made by so many to achieve our democracy.

src: op die tweede dag van 2022 het die land in afgryse toegekyk hoe n groot vuur ons parlement verswelg, net honderd meter weg van waar ons die vorige dag bymekaarge kom het om ons laaste eer aan aartsbiskop tutu te betoon.
tgt: on the second day of 2022, the country watched on in horror as a huge fire engulfed our parliament, just a hundred metres from where we had gathered the day before to pay our last respects to archbishop tutu.

src: ons is verlig dat daar geen lewensverlies was nie en dat niemand in die brand beseer is nie.
tgt: we are relieved that there was no loss of life and that noone was injured in the fire.

src: ons is uiters dankbaar teenoor die brandbestryders wat die brand bestry en uiteindelik geblus het.
tgt: we are extremely gra teful to the firefighters who battled the blaze and finally extinguished it.

src: die ondersoek na die oorsaak van die brand is tans aan die gang.
tgt: the investigations into the cause of the fire are now underway.

src: ons moet seker maak dat dié ondersoek deeglik en sonder vertraging afgehandel word.
tgt: we need to ensure that these investigations are thorough and concluded without delay.

src: die land moet weet wat gebeur het.
tgt: the country needs to know what happened.

src: daar word reëlings getref om te verseker dat die werk van die parlement kan voortgaan, selfs al kan die gebou nie gebruik word nie.
tgt: arrangements are being made to ensure that the work of parliament can continue even if the buildings cannot be used.

src: dit is noodsaaklik dat die parlement voortgaan om wette te oorweeg en deur te voer wat die samelewing sal transformeer en wat voortgaan om oorsig te verskaf, en verantwoordbaarheid verseker namate die regering werk om die mandaat wat hy van sy mense ontvang het, te implementeerbehalwe dat die st. george’s katedraal en die parlement naby aan mekaar geleë is, word die twee geboue ook verbind deur die herinnering aan dit wat ons as suidafrikaners bymekaar bring: ons demokrasie.
tgt: it is vital that parliament continues to consider and pass laws that will transform society and continues to provide oversight and ensure accountability as government works to implement the mandate it received from the people.

src: ons treur oor desmond tutu, want hy was die geestelike vader van ons demokrasie.
tgt: apart from the close proximity of st george’s cathedral and parliament, what connects these two events is that each reminds us of what brings us together as south africans: our democracy.

src: ons wil wanho pig raak oor die vernietiging van ons parlementsgebou, want dit is die setel van ons demokrasie.
tgt: we mourn desmond tutu because he was the spiritual father of our democracy.

src: dit is die plek waar die nuwe demokratiese grondwet net meer as 25 jaar gelede aanvaar is, en waar honderde transformerende wette goedgekeur is.
tgt: they are the place where our new democratic constitution was adopted just over 25 years ago, and where hundreds of trans formative laws have been passed.

src: ons besef dit nie altyd nie, maar die brand by die parlement het gedemonstreer hoe sterk suidafrikaners oor hulle demokrasie voel.
tgt: we may not always recognise it, but the fire at parliament demonstrated how strongly south africans feel about their democracy.

src: dit is ook n herinnering aan hoe belangrik dit is dat ons hard daaraan werk om die demokrasie te versterk en te verdedig.
tgt: it is a reminder also of how important it is that we work to strengthen and defend that democracy.

src: alhoewel die parlementsgebou so erg beskadig is dat ons nie daar kan werk nie, gaan die parlement as instelling in diens van die mense voort.
tgt: while the parliamentary buildings have been damaged beyond use, the institution of parliament continues its work in the service of the people.

src: dit is n belangrike herinnering dat ons demokratiese instellings nie gedefinieer word deur die geboue wat hulle huisves nie, maar deur die werk wat hulle doen en deur die vertroue wat die mense in hulle het.
tgt: this is an important reminder that our democratic institutions are not defined by the buildings that house them, but by the work they do and by the confidence that the people have in them.

src: dit geld vir al die instellings van ons demokrasie.
tgt: this is true of all the institutions of our democracy.

src: terwyl die brand in die par lement uiteindelik geblus is, het waarnemende hoofregter, raymond zondo, die eerste deel van die verslag van die kommissie van ondersoek na staatskaping ingehandig.
tgt: just as the fire in parliament was finally being extinguished, acting chief justice raymond zondo submitted the first part of the report of the commission of inquiry into state capture.

src: dié gedeelte van die verslag sit uiteen hoe verskeie staatsinstellings geïnfiltreer, geplunder en ernstig benadeel is.
tgt: this part of the report details how several public institutions were infiltrated, looted and severely damaged.

src: dit sluit instellings in staatsbesit in soos die suidafrikaanse lugdiens, die regering se kommunikasie diens en die suidafrikaanse inkomstediens.
tgt: these include stateowned enterprises like south african airways, the government communication and information system and the south african revenue service.

src: hierdie gedeelte van die ver slag skets n baie ontstellende prentjie oor hoe sleutelinstel lings van ons demokrasie onder verdenking geplaas en ondermyn is deur kriminele aktiwiteit.
tgt: this part of the report paints a deeply disturbing picture of how key instituti ons of our democracy were compromised and undermined with criminal intent.

src: nie net is beduidende bedrae geld gesteel nie, maar hierdie instellings was nie in staat om die funksies waarvoor hulle opgerig is na behore te verrig nie.
tgt: not only were significant amounts of money stolen, but these institutions were not able to properly fulfil the functions for which they were established.

src: die bevindinge en aanbevelings van die zondokommissie sal die land help om dié instellings te herbou en die verantwoordelike per sone verantwoordbaar te hou.
tgt: the findings and recommendations of the zondo commission will help the country to rebuild these institutions and to hold those responsible to account.

src: ons moet seker maak dat ons dié bevindings gebruik om dié instellings in die toekoms te beskerm sodat hulle nooit weer gekaap word nie.
tgt: we must ensure that we use them to safeguard these institutions into the future so that they may never be captured again.

src: ons moet ons demokrasie waarvoor ons so hard gewerk het, beveilig teen enige pogings om dit leed aan te doen – of dié pogings nou die vorm van korrupsie in staatsondernemings, die ondermyning van ons wets toepassingsagentskappe, die sabotasie van ons ekonomiese infrastruktuur, of aanvalle op die onafhanklikheid en integriteit van ons regbank, aanneem.
tgt: we must safeguard against any and all efforts to diminish our hardwon democracy – whether these efforts take the form of corruption in stateowned enterprises, the subversion of our law enforcement agencies, the sabotage of our economic infrastructure, or attacks on the independence and integrity of our judiciary.

src: ons moet ons grondwet, ons demokratiese staat en die verkiesingsproses be skerm teen enigeen wat ons demokrasie wil verswak en die suidafrikaanse mense van hulle swaarverdiende vryheid wil ontsê.
tgt: we need to protect our constitution, our democratic state and the electoral process from anyone who wants to weaken our democracy and deny the south african people of their hardwon freedom.

src: gratis opleiding en dienste vir besighede vukuzenzele unnamed drie regeringsentiteite is daarop ingestel om dit maklik te maak om sake in suidafrika te doen om die ekonomie uit te brei.
tgt: free training and services for businesses vukuzenzele unnamed three government entities are firmly focused on enabling the ease of doing business in south africa to grow the economy.

src: daar is onlangs n vuk talkwebinaar gehou om bewusmaking te skep van die mandaat, beleide en dienste wat deur die kommissie vir maatskappye en intellektuele eiendom (cipc), die maat skappytribunaal (ct) en die breedgebaseerde swart eko nomiese bemagtigingskommissie (bgsebkommissie) aangebied word.
tgt: a recent vuktalks webinar, hosted by govern ment communication and information system, was held to raise awareness of the mandate, policies and services provided by the companies and intellectual property commission (cipc), companies tribunal (ct) and the broadbased black economic empowerment (bbbee) commission.

src: dit is almal entiteite van die departement van handel, nywerheid en mededinging.
tgt: these are all entities of the department of trade, indus try and competition.

src: volgens ofentse shakung, die cipc se bestuurder van innovasie en samewerking en direkteur van eleer, het die cipc verskeie funksies, waaronder die registrasie van maatskappye, koöperasies en intellektuele eiendomsregte (handelsmerke, patente, ontwerpe en kopiereg).
tgt: according to ofentse shakung, the cipc’s manager of innovation and collaboration and director of elearning, the cipc has various functions, including the registration of companies, cooperatives and intellectual property rights (trademarks, patents, designs and copyright).

src: die cipc het sy bizportalplatform ontwikkel om aanlyn maatskappyregistrasie en verwante dienste te bied om die proses te vereenvoudig om n besigheid te registreer en aan die nodige vereistes te laat voldoen.
tgt: the cipc developed its bizportal platform to offer online company registration and related services to simplify the process of register ing a business and adhering to requirements.

src: bizportal bied n eenstopplatform aan diegene wat n besigheid wil begin om n maatskappy te registreer, vir belasting te registreer, n domeinnaam te registreer, aansoek te doen vir n bgsebsertifikaat, om by die vergoedingsfonds en die werkloosheidsversekerings fonds te registreer, en om n besigheidsbankrekening oop te maak.
tgt: bizportal offers those wanting to start a business a onestop platform to register a company, register for tax, register a domain name, apply for a bbbee certificate, register for the compensation fund and unemployment insurance fund, and open a business bank account.

src: "dit is n papierlose proses en die maatskappy sal binne 24uur nadat die aansoek ingedien is, geregistreer wees.
tgt: "it’s a paperless process and the company will be registered within 24 hours of submission.

src: ons het ook google se besigheidsdienste bygevoeg, wat maatskappye in staat stel om n gratis besigheidsprofiel en statiese maatskappywebblad te hê," sê shakung.
tgt: we have also added google business services, which enables companies to host a business profile and static company website on google for free," said shakung.

src: besoek www.
tgt: to make use of these services, visit www.

src: bizportal.
tgt: bizportal.

src: gov.
tgt: gov.

src: za en klik op "register" boaan die bladsy om van dié dienste gebruik te maak.
tgt: za and click on ‘register’ at the top of the page.

src: dit is maklik om die portaal te navigeer en dit bied inligting stapvirstap aan oor hoe om n besigheid te registreer.
tgt: the portal is easy to navigate and offers stepbystep information on how to register a business.

src: gratis opleiding die cipc het ook onlangs n gratis aanlyn opleidingsplatform, learnibiz, bekendgestel om klein, medium en mikroondernemings se di rekteure en entrepreneurs te help om hulle kapasiteit uit te brei om suksesvolle besig hede te bestuur terwyl daar verseker word dat hulle aan die nodige wetlike vereistes voldoen.
tgt: free training the cipc also recently launched free online training platform learnibiz to help small, medium and micro enterprise directors and entrepreneurs build their capacity to run successful businesses, while ensuring they comply with the legal requirements.

src: "die platform is n digitale studiegids en sluit vi deohandleidings en n selfek samineringstoets in vir elkeen van die sewe modules," sê shakung.
tgt: "the platform is a digital study guide and includes video tutorials and a selfexamination for each of the seven modules," said shakung.

src: die modules sluit opleiding in oor wat n maatskappy en n direkteur is, oor wie die sleu telpersone in n maatskappy is, die verantwoordelikhede van n direkteur, persoonlike finansiële belange en n konflik van belange, vergoeding van direkteure en versprei dings, en die raad van direk teure.
tgt: the modules include training on what a company and a director is, key persons in a company, responsibilities of a director, personal financial interests and conflict of interest, re muneration of directors and distributions and the board of directors.

src: besoek www.
tgt: to register for the training, visit www.

src: elearning@cipc.co.za om vir die opleiding te registreer.
tgt: elearning@cipc.co.za.

src: maatskappytribu naal dr. mohammed chicktay, die voorsitter van die ct, het ver duidelik dat die entiteit help om n spoedige oplossing vir maatskappygeskille te verkry wat verband hou met aansoeke en klagtes wat ingevolge die maatskappywet, wetnr.
tgt: companies tribunal dr mohammed chicktay, the chairperson of the ct, explained that the entity helps provide a speedy resolution in company disputes, relating to applications and complaints made in terms of the companies act no.

src: dit sluit geskille in wat verband hou met maatskappyname, direkteurskap en vrystelling van die vestiging van n maatskaplike en n etie se komitee.
tgt: 71 of 2008. these include disputes relating to company names, directorship and exemption from establishing social and ethics committees.

src: dit hersien ook voldoeningskennisgewings wat deur die cipc uitgereik word wat verband hou met verlengde tyd om jaarlikse finansiële state voor te berei en om algemene jaarvergade rings te belê.
tgt: it also reviews compliance notices issued by the cipc, relating to time extensions to prepare annual financial statements and convene annual general meetings.

src: "die ct hanteer verskeie aansoeke.
tgt: "the ct deals with various applications.

src: ons het, byvoorbeeld, tydens kovid19 baie aansoeke ontvang vir die aanskuif van die datum om n algemene jaarvergadering te belê," sê chicktay.
tgt: during covid19, for example, we received many applications for an extension of the date to convene an annual general meeting," said chicktay.

src: nog n gratis diens wat deur die ct gelewer word, is ge skilbeslegting.
tgt: another free service offered by the ct is dispute resolution.

src: n persoon kan n saak vir beslegting verwys d. m. v. bemiddeling, versoe ning of arbitrasie, as n alternatief om hof toe te gaan.
tgt: a person may refer a matter for resolution by mediation, conciliation or arbitration, as an alternative to going to court.

src: die ct dien as fasiliteerder tus sen die partye.
tgt: the ct serves as a facilitator between the parties.

src: "die ct moedig bemiddeling aan sodat mense hulle werk kan behou, veral tydens kovid19, en mense moet meer daarvan gebruik maak," sê chicktay.
tgt: "the ct encourages mediation to save jobs, especially during covid19, and people should start using it more," said chicktay.

src: kovid19 korrupsieplegers ry aan die pen vukuzenzele unnamed individue en maatskappye wat betrokke was in die pleeg van korrupsie te make met die regering se verkryging van koronavirus toerusting en dienste, gaan verantwoordbaar gehou word vir hul optrede.
tgt: covid19 corruption perpetrators brought to book vukuzenzele unnamed individuals and companies who were involved in corruption relating to the gov ernment’s procurement of coronavirus disease (covid19) goods and services are being held accountable for their actions.

src: die spesiale ondersoekeenheid (soe) se finale verslag oor hul ondersoek na aantygings verwant aan die misbruik van kovid19fondse, regoor alle regeringsfere en die privaat sektor, se vrystelling aan die publiek is onlangs deur president cyril ramaphosa goedgekeur.
tgt: the special investigation unit’s (siu) final report on its probe into allegations relating to any misuse of covid19 funds, across all spheres of government and the private sector was recently authorised for release to the public by president cyril ramaphosa.

src: die verslag is n belangrike stap in die stryd teen korrup sie en wanadministrasie in die staaten privaatsektors, het hy gesê.
tgt: the report is an important step in the fight against corruption and maladministration in the public and private sectors, he said.

src: president ramaphosa het die ondersoek deur die soe in julie 2020 gemagtig.
tgt: in july 2020, president ramaphosa authorised the investigation by the siu.

src: destyds het hy hom daartoe verbind dat indien die soe bewyse sou vind dat kriminele oortreding plaasgevind het, die bewyse aan die nasionale vervolgingsgesag (nvg) oorhandig sou word.
tgt: at the time, he gave his commitment that if the siu found evidence that a criminal offence had been committed, it would be obliged to refer the evidence to the national prosecuting authority (npa).

src: die soe is ook gemagtig om siviele regsaksies in te stel om enige skade of verliese wat deur die staat gely is, te herwin.
tgt: the siu was also aut horised to institute civil proceedings for the recovery of any damages or losses incurred by the state.

src: bevindinge van die verslag die soe het 5 467 kontrakte ter waarde van r14.3 miljard wat aan 3 066 diensverskaffers toegestaan is, ondersoek.
tgt: report findings the siu investigated 5 467 contracts awarded to 3 066 service providers, worth a total of r14.3 billion.

src: die ondersoek na 4 549 kontrakte is gefinaliseer en2 803 hiervan is as onreëlma tig bevind.
tgt: the investigation into 4 549 contracts have been finalised, and 2 803 of these were found to be irregular.

src: dit behels 62% van die afgehandelde ondersoeke.
tgt: this amounts to 62% of the finalised investigations.

src: "dié ondersoek is gemik op individue en instellings wat geglo het dat hulle n oomblik van nasionale weerloosheid kon uitbuit om hulself te verryk asook diegene met wie hulle saamgesnoer het om die staatskas te misbruik," het die president gesê.
tgt: "this investigation targeted individuals and institutions who believed they could exploit a moment of national vulnerability to enrich themselves and those with whom they colluded to abuse public resources," the president said.

src: hy het bygevoeg dat dit onaanvaarbaar is dat soveel kontrakte wat gemik was op die red van lewens en die beskerming van mense se lewensbestaan onreëlmatig, onwettig en bedrieglik was.
tgt: he added it was unacceptable that so many contracts associated with saving lives and protecting livelihoods were irregular, unlawful or fraudulent.

src: "dié ondersoek demonstreer ons vasberadenheid om korrupsie met wortel en tak uit te roei en met oortreders klaar te speel," het president ramaphosa gesê.
tgt: "this investigation demonstrates our determination to root out corruption and to deal with perpetrators," said president ramaphosa.

src: die finale verslag bevat besonderhede oor sake wat die soe na die nvg, departemente en entiteite in die staatsektor asook ander partye verwys het.
tgt: the final report details matters that the siu has referred to the npa, departments and entities in the public sector and other parties.

src: die nvg sal die proses om oortreders tot verantwoording te roep en swakpunte wat deur die soe geïdentifiseer is, te finaliseer, het die president verduidelik.
tgt: the npa will finalise the process of bringing wrongdoers to book and addressing weaknesses identified by the siu investigation, the president explained.

src: stappe wat gedoen is sedert die begin van die ondersoek het die soe, in samewerking met ander agentskappe, die volgende vordering gemaak: 45 sake, met n gesamentlike waarde van r2.1 miljard, is aangegee by die spesiale beslissingsraad oor korrupsie, bedrog en ongeoorloofde geldvloei.
tgt: action taken since the start of the investigation, the siu, working with other agencies, has made the following progress: 45 matters, with a combined value of r2.1 billion, have been enrolled with the special tribunal on corruption, fraud and illicit money flows.

src: die spesiale beslissingsraad het n wetlike mandaat om staatsfondse wat deur middel van korrupsie, bedrog en ongeoor loofde geldvloei gesteel is, te herwin en siviele aksie teen die oortreders te neem; 224 sake is verwys vir dissiplinêre aksie teen amptenare in staatsdepartemente of entiteite; 386 sake is na die nvg verwys en drie is verwys vir aksie op uitvoerende vlak; 330 sake is vir administratiewe aksie verwys, insluitend plasing op die swartlys (nie toegelaat om vir die staat te werk nie).
tgt: the special tribunal has a statutory mandate to recover public funds stolen through corruption, fraud and illicit money flows, and take civil action against perpetrators; 224 cases have been referred for disciplinary action against officials in government departments or entities; 386 cases have been referred to the npa, and three have been referred for executive action; 330 cases have been referred for administrative action, which includes blacklisting (not being able to do work for gov ernment).

src: volgens die verslag moet n somtotaal van r551.5 miljoen (waarde van kontant en bates) nog herwin word, met r34.2 miljoen wat tot op hede herwin is.
tgt: according to the report, a total of r551.5 million (value of cash and assets) is to be recovered, while r34.2 million has been recovered to date.

src: die ondersoek het n verlies van r114.2 miljoen verhoed en kontrakte ter waarde van r170.4 miljoene tersyde gestel.
tgt: the investigation prevented a r114.2 million loss, and set contracts aside valued at r170.4 million.

src: die soe verwag dat dié sake tussen maart en april 2022 afgehandel sal wees, voor die inhandiging van n aanvullende verslag aan die president aan die einde van junie.
tgt: the siu expects these matters to be completed between march and april 2022, before the submission of a supplementary report to the president at the end of june.

src: die verslag sluit nie besonderhede van die voortgesette ondersoek na aantygings wat na die sluitingsdatum vir die verslag deur die soe ontvang is, in nie.
tgt: the report does not include details of ongoing investigations into allega tions received by the siu after the deadline set for the final report.

src: cach snel studente te hulp met studiegeleenthede silusapho nyanda jongmense wat nog nie toelating by hoëronderwysinstellings gekry het nie, kan die sentrale aansoekklaringshuis (cach) om hulp nader.
tgt: cach connects students with learning opportunities silusapho nyanda young people who have not yet secured spots at higher education institutions can turn to the central application clearing house (cach) system for help.

src: cach is n aanlynregeringsdiens wat deur die department van hoër onderwys en opleiding (doo) bestuur word en diegene te hulp staan wat toegang tot universiteite, tegniese en beroepsgerigte opleidingskolleges (tvetkolleges) en vaardigheidsontwikkelingsentrums benodig.
tgt: cach is an online government service managed by the department of higher education and training (dhet).

src: "cach se dienste is vanaf 24 januarie 2022 tot 31 maart 2022 beskikbaar om diegene te hulp te staan wat by n tersiêre instelling wil inskryf, maar sukkel om plek te kry," sê die minister van hoër onderwys en opleiding, dr. blade nzimande.
tgt: the service helps those who need access to university, technical and vocational education and training (tvet) colleges and skills development opportunities.

src: cach kan diegene help wat in 2021 betyds aansoek gedoen het om toelating tot n universiteit of kollege, maar nie plek in hul verkose program gekry het nie.
tgt: "cach services have been available from 24 january 2022, and will close on 31 march, to assist those who need to enter tertiary education but face challenges with getting space," says minister of higher education and training dr blade nzimande.

src: die doo verduidelik dat dít gewoonlik gebeur wanneer die aansoeker nie aan die nodige vereistes voldoen nie of die instelling die maksimum aantal studente wat ingeskryf kan word, bereik.
tgt: cach can help those who applied for admission to a university or a college on time in 2021, but were not offered a place in a programme of their choice.

src: cach sal sulke individue na loopbaanontwikkelingsdienste verwys en, waar moontlik, die geleentheid verskaf vir hulle om in aanmerking te kom vir plek wat steeds beskikbaar is by universiteite en tvetkol leges of leerlingskappe by sektoronderwysen oplei dingsowerhede (seta’s), sonder dat die student self na enige instelling hoef te gaan.
tgt: the dhet explained that this usually happens when the applicant does not meet the necessary requirements or the institution has reached its limit on the number of students it can enrol.

src: alle openbare universiteite, tvetkolleges en seta’s het toegang tot die cachdatabasis om na individue te soek wat aan die kriteria voldoen vir die plekke wat steeds beskikbaar is.
tgt: cach can also help those who applied to a higher learning institution and were accepted, but now want to change their courses.

src: "instellings kies individue vanuit die cachdatabasis en kontak dié verkose kandidate direk," sê doowoordvoerder, ishmael mnisi.
tgt: cach will refer individuals to career development services and where possible, provide an opportunity for them to be considered for spaces still available at universities, tvet colleges or sector education and training authority (seta) learnerships, without having to travel to any institution.

src: aansoekers wat by die cach aansluit moet hul besonderhede, insluitend hul verkose studierigting, verskaf.
tgt: all public universities, tvet colleges and setas can access the cach database to search for individuals who meet the criteria for available spaces.

src: aansoekers het dan die keuse om die studiegeleenthede op die cachstelsel te aanvaar, al dan nie.
tgt: "institutions select individuals from the cach database and make direct contact with those they have selected," says dhet spokesperson ishmael mnisi.

src: nuwe wette steun die stryd teen ggg silusapho nyanda laat verlede jaar het ek n brief van n groep besorgde burgers ontvang met n beroep op die regering om die vroue en kinders van die land teen geweld te beskerm.
tgt: new laws strengthen the fight against gbv vukuzenzele unnamed late last year, i received a letter from a group of concerned citizens calling on the government to protect the women and children of this country from violence.

src: met verwysing na die toename in verkragting en seksuele aanranding, het hulle verduidelik hoe hulle as vroue voortdurend in vrees leef en dat hulle hul vertroue in die gereg verloor het.
tgt: pointing to an increase in rape and sexual assault, they wrote that as women they continue to live in fear; they are losing their faith in the law.

src: ek was diep geraak deur hul mededeling van die vrees waaronder die vroue in ons land op n daaglikse basis leef.
tgt: i was deeply moved and touched by their account of the fear that the women of our country are subjected to on a daily basis.

src: na aanleiding van die lyding waaraan vroue en kinders onderworpe is, het ons wette ingestel met die doel om hulle te beskerm.
tgt: in response to the suffering that women and children are subjected to, we have passed laws designed to protect them.

src: maar ten spyte van die strawwe om oortreders uit die samelewing te verwyder, ly en sterf vroue en kinders steeds.
tgt: but despite penalties to remove perpetrators from society, women and children continue to suffer and die.

src: ek het onlangs drie wetsontwerpe bekragtig wat ons belofte nakom om die strafregstelsel te versterk, verantwoordbaar heid regoor die regering te bevorder en ondersteuning vir slagoffers en oorlewendes as die fokuspunt van al ons planne te stel.
tgt: i recently signed into law three pieces of legislation that honour our promises to strengthen the criminal justice system, promote accountability across the state and put support for survivors at the centre of all our efforts.

src: die nuwe wet op kri minele en verwante sake beskerm die weerloses teen sekondêre viktimisering deur die howe toe te laat om n tussenpersoon aan te stel deur wie n minderjarige, n persoon met gestremdhede of n bejaarde persoon ondervra kan word tydens hofverrigtinge.
tgt: the new criminal and related matters amendment act protects the vulnerable from secondary victimisation by allowing courts to appoint intermediaries through which a minor, a disabled person or an elderly person can be examined in proceedings.

src: dit laat ook die verdere gebruik van bewyse deur middel van n oudiovisuele skakel toe.
tgt: it also allows for the extended use of evidence by means of an audiovisual link.

src: dit help om n getuie te beskerm teen enige kwaad wat aangedoen kan word, verhoed onnodige vertragings en spaar kostes tydens hofverrigtinge.
tgt: this helps to shield a witness against harm, prevent unreasonable delays and save costs in proceedings.

src: die nuwe wet verskerp ook ons borgstelsel aansien lik.
tgt: the new law also significantly tightens up our bail regime.

src: n aanklaer wat nie borg teenstaan nie in sekere aan gewese sake moet hul redes op rekord plaas.
tgt: a prosecutor who does not oppose bail in designated cases must have their reasons placed on record.

src: die hof moet enige dreigemente wat teen die klaer gemaak is asook die klaer se sienspunt van hul eie veiligheid in berekening neem.
tgt: the court must consider any threats of violence made against the complainant and the complainant’s view of their own safety.

src: tensy die hof tevrede is dat uitsonderlike omstandighede bestaan wat die toestaan van borg regverdig, moet borgtog geweier word.
tgt: unless the court is satisfied that exceptional circumstances exist that warrant release on bail, bail must be denied.

src: die nuwe wysigingswet op die strafreg (seksuele misdrywe en verwante aangeleenthede) maak seksuele uitbuiting en die voorbereiding (sogenaamde "grooming") van mense met verstandsgestremdhede en maak voorsiening omdat seksuele oortredings teen mense met verstandgestremdhede in die nasionale register van seksuele oortreders (nrso) opgeneem moet word.
tgt: the new criminal law (sexual offences and related matters) amendment act outlaws sexual exploitation and grooming of persons with mental disabilities, and provides that sexual offences against persons who are mentally disabled must be recorded in the national register of sex offenders (nrso).

src: ons het werk gemaak van versoeke dat die bestuur van die nrso opgeskerp word.
tgt: we have responded to calls to tighten up the management of the nrso.

src: persone wat skuldig bevind is aan seksuele misdade teen kinders of mense met verstandgestremdhede, wat voorheen aan sulke misdade skuldig bevind is, en wat vonnisse van langer as 18 maande opgelê is, kan slegs na 20 jaar aansoek doen dat hul name van die register verwyder word.
tgt: those who have been convicted of sex crimes against children or mentally disabled persons, have previous convictions in this respect, and have been sentenced to terms longer than 18, months can only apply to have their names removed from the register after 20 years.

src: die wet reguleer ook die aanmeldingsplig van mense wat vermoed dat seksuele oortredings teen weerlose persone gepleeg is.
tgt: the act further regulates the reporting duty of people who are aware that sexual offences have been committed against vulnerable persons.

src: die nuwe wysigings wet op gesinsgeweld maak voorsiening vir die ingewikkeldhede in gesinsgeweldverhoudings.
tgt: the new domestic violence amendment act takes account of some of the complexities in violent domestic relationships.

src: ons het die proses om n beskermingsbevel te kry, verskerp en die omstandighede waaronder daar vir só n bevel aansoek gedoen kan word, uitgebrei.
tgt: we have tightened up the process of obtaining protection orders, and broadened the circumstances under which they can be applied for.

src: ons het die kwessie aangespreek van vroue en kinders wat geviktimiseer word ten spyte van die feit dat daar n beskermingsbevel bestaan of een in die proses is om uitgereik te word.
tgt: we have addressed the issue of women and children being victimised despite having, or being in process of applying for, a protection order.

src: as n hof glo dat n klaer in dringende gevaar is, kan dit dadelik n beskermingsbevel uitreik sonder die vereiste kennisgewing aan die respondent.
tgt: if a court believes a complainant is in imminent danger it can issue a protection order immediately without needing to give a respondent notice of the proceedings.

src: van groot belang is dat, indien die hof iemand wat van gesinsgeweld aangekla is maar nie n beskermingsbevel teen hulle het nie op borgtog vrylaat, die hof n beskermingsbevel moet uitreik nadat navrae gemaak is.
tgt: significantly, if the court releases someone charged with domestic violence on bail who does not have a protection order granted against them, the court must issue one after holding an enquiry.

src: wanneer die hof n beskermingsbevel uitreik, moet dit terselfdertyd die die uitreiking van n opgeskorte lasbrief van inhegtenisname magtig wat aan die suidafrikaanse polisiediens (sapd) verskaf moet word.
tgt: when the court issues a protection order it must at the same time authorise the issuing of an arrest warrant, suspended, that must be provided to the south african police service (saps).

src: indien n lid van die sapd vermoed dat n klaer in gevaar is weens oortreding van die beskermingsbevel, moet hulle onmiddellik die respondent arresteer.
tgt: if a saps member suspects a complainant is in danger due to breach of the order, they must arrest the respondent immediately.

src: die wet beskerm nou uitdruklik bejaardes teen alle vorme van gesinsgeweld en laat ook klaers toe om aanlyn aansoek te doen vir n beskermingsbevel, wat tyd en reiskoste spaar.
tgt: the act now expressly protects the elderly from all forms of domestic violence, and also permits complainants to apply for protection orders online, saving them time and travel costs.

src: om klaers teen verdere mishandeling te beskerm, mag die hof n veiligheidsmoniteringskennisgewing uitreik wat vereis dat n lid van die sapd in voortdurende kontak bly met die klaer, sonder die wete van die misbruiker.
tgt: to protect complainants against further abuse, the court may an issue a safety monitoring notice that will require a member of saps to be in constant contact with the complainant without the knowledge of the abuser.

src: oorlewendes van ggg kla dikwels oor swak behandeling of miskenning van hul kommer wanneer hulle klagtes by polisiestasies aflê.
tgt: survivors of gbv often complain of illtreatment or disregard for their concerns when they lay complaints at police stations.

src: sapdlede wat nie hul verpligtinge onder die nuwe wetgewing nakom nie, sal skuldig wees aan wangedrag.
tgt: saps members who fail to comply with their obligations under the new law will be guilty of misconduct.

src: alle volwasse persone wat kennis dra of vermoedens het dat gesinsgeweld gepleeg word teen n kind, n persoon met verstandgetremdhede of n bejaarde persoon, word verplig om dit by n maatskaplike werker of die polisie aan te meld.
tgt: all adult persons who have knowledge or suspicion that domestic violence is being perpetrated against a child, a person with a mental disability or an elderly person are obliged to report such acts to a social worker or to the police.

src: versuim om dit te doen is n kriminele oortreding.
tgt: failure to do so is a criminal offence.

src: staatsrede 2022: verbeter lewens en lewensbestaan vukuzenzele unnamed die regering is daartoe verbind om die mense van ons land voorop te stel en het aan hulself 100 dae gegee om n plan te finaliseer wat alle sektore van die samelewing betrek in die ontwik keling van suidafrika se ekonomie, werkskepping en die bekamping van hongerte.
tgt: sona 2022: bettering lives and livelihoods vukuzenzele unnamed government is committed to putting people first, and has given itself 100 days to finalise a plan to involve all sectors of society in growing south africa’s economy, creating jobs and combating hunger.

src: dit is deur president cyril ramaphosa in sy 2022 staatsrede beklemtoon.
tgt: this was emphasised by president cyril ramaphosa in his 2022 state of the nation address.

src: "dié werk sal voortbou op die grondslag van die ekonomiese heropbouen herstelplan wat ons gemeenskaplike plan bly om die ekonomie te herbou," sê hy.
tgt: "this work will build on the foundation of the economic reconstruction and recovery plan, which remains our common programme to rebuild the economy," he said.

src: die president het gesê dat die regering se prioriteite behels om die koronavirus siektepandemie (kovid19) te oorkom, infrastruktuur te bou, plaaslike produksie te verhoog, werke te skep en die energiekrisis aan te spreek.
tgt: the president said government’s priorities are overcoming the coronavirus disease (covid19) pandemic, building infrastructure, increasing local production, creating jobs and addressing the energy crisis.

src: "as daar een ding is waarop ons almal kan ooreenkom, is dit dat die huidige situasie – van uiterse armoede, werkloosheid en ongelykheid – onaanvaarbaar en onvolhoubaar is."
tgt: "if there is one thing we all agree on, it is that the present situation – of deep poverty, unemployment and inequality – is unacceptable and unsustainable."

src: werkskepping na aanleiding van die finansiële verwoesting wat deur kovid19 gesaai is, het die werkloosheidskoers in verlede jaar se derde kwar taal sy hoogste aangetekende vlak van 34.9% bereik.
tgt: creating jobs last year, the unemployment rate reached its highest recorded level of 34.9% in the third quarter, following the financial devastation caused by covid19.

src: "ons almal weet dat die regering nie werke skep nie.
tgt: "we all know that government does not create jobs.

src: die regering se sleutelrol behels om toestande te skep wat die privaatsektor – beide groot en klein ondernemings – in staat stel om te ontwikkel, te groei, toegang tot nuwe markte te verkry, nuwe produkte te skep en meer werknemers in diens te neem," sê hy.
tgt: the key task of government is to create the conditions that will enable the private sector – both big and small – to emerge, to grow, to access new markets, to create new products, and to hire more employees," he said.

src: ongeveer 80% van werkende mense word deur die privaatsektor in diens geneem.
tgt: around 80% of employed people work in the private sector.

src: die president sê dat die regering n nuwe leningswaarborgskema bekend sal stel om klein ondernemings te help om te herstel.
tgt: the president said government will introduce a new loan guarantee scheme to help small businesses recover.

src: die presidensiële werkskep pingstimulusplan, wat reeds meer as 850 000 indiensnemingsgeleenthede ondersteun het, sal opgeskerp word.
tgt: the presidential employment stimulus programme, which has already supported over 850 000 employment opportunities, will be stepped up.

src: die meeste begunstigdes was jongmense; meer as 60% was vroue.
tgt: most of the beneficiaries were young people; over 60% were women.

src: die werkskeppingstimulus sal die departement van binnelandse sake in staat stel om 10 000 werklose jeugdiges te werf vir die digitalisering van papierargiewe en die maat skaplike indiensnemingsfonds sal n verdere 50 000 werksgeleenthede skep.
tgt: the employment stimulus will enable the department of home affairs to recruit 10 000 unemployed youth for the digitisation of paper records, and the social employment fund will create another 50 000 work opportunities.

src: vanaf april 2022 sal die departement van hoër onderwys en opleiding 10 000 werklose tegniese en beroepsonderrigen oplei dingsgegradueerdes in werksplekke plaas.
tgt: the department of higher education and training will place 10 000 unemployed technical and vocational education and training graduates in workplaces from april 2022. the sayouth.

src: mobiplatform, wat jong werksoekers help om toegang tot geleenthede en ondersteuning te verkry, het nou meer as 2.3 miljoen geregistreerde jeugdiges.
tgt: mobi platform, which helps young work seekers to access opportunities and support, now has over 2.3 million youth registered.

src: meer as 600 000 van hierdie mense is in indiensnemingsgeleenthede geplaas.
tgt: of these, over 600 000 have been placed into employment opportunities.

src: "n hernude nasionale jeugdiens sal in volgende jaar [2023] sy eerste kohort van 50 000 jongmense werf en geleenthede vir jongmense skep om by te dra tot hul gemeenskappe en hul vaardighede, en hul aanstelbaarheid te ontwikkel."
tgt: "a revitalised national youth service will recruit its first cohort of 50 000 young people during the next year [2023], creating opportunities for young people to contribute to their communities, develop their skills and grow their employability."

src: mvntoelaag duur voort die kovid19 fonds vir maatskaplike verligting van nood (mvn), wat meer as 10 miljoen werklose mense gehelp het, is vir n verdere jaar verleng, tot einde maart 2023. die regering en sy vennote sal ook na maniere kyk om steeds mense in finansiële nood te ondersteun op n manier wat oor die langtermyn bekostigbaar vir die land is.
tgt: srd grant continuesthe covid19 social relief of distress (srd) grant, which has helped over 10 million unemployed people, has been extended for another year – to the end of march 2023. in addition, government and its partners will look at ways to continue to support people in financial distress in a manner that is affordable to the country over the long term.

src: toegang tot grond die regering gaan voort met grondhervorming en verwag vanjaar die goedkeuring van die wets ontwerp op onteiening.
tgt: access to land government is moving ahead with land reform and anticipates the approval of the expropriation bill this year.

src: "die departement van openbare werke en infrastruktuur sal die oordrag van 14 000 hektaar staatsgrond aan die behuisingsontwikkelingsagentskap finaliseer," sê die president.
tgt: "the department of public works and infrastructure will finalise the transfer of 14 000 hectares of state land to the housing development agency," the president said.

src: hy voeg by dat daar genoeg bewerkbare grond is om miljoene florerende kleinskaalse pluimvee, vee, vrugteen groente boere te ondersteun.
tgt: he added that there is enough arable land to support millions of thriving smallscale farmers in poultry, livestock, fruit and vegetables.

src: meer as 100 000 boere het reeds insetbewysstukke ontvang om hul produksie uit te brei en die program sal uitgebrei word om meer boere te bereik.
tgt: already, over 100 000 farmers have received input vouchers to expand their production and the programme will be expanded to reach more farmers.

src: korrupsie en misdaad president ramaphosa beweeg hemel en aarde – van die instelling van die ondersoekkommissie oor staatskaping tot die ondersoek van kovid19verwante verkrygingskontrakte – om korrupsie stop te sit.
tgt: corruption and crime from instituting the commission of inquiry into state capture, to investigating covid19related procurement contracts, president ramaphosa is leaving no stone unturned when it comes to ending corruption.

src: "geeneen van ons pogings om ons ekonomie te hernuwe sal slaag as ons nie die plaag van korrupsie vir eens en altyd aanpak nie," sê die president.
tgt: "none of our efforts to revive our economy will succeed if we do not tackle the scourge of corruption once and for all," the president said.

src: hy sal ten laaste teen 30 junie n aksieplan na aanleiding van die kommissie se aanbevelings voorlê.
tgt: by no later than 30 june 2022, he will present a plan of action in response to the commission’s recommendations.

src: hy verduidelik dat ver skeie regeringsagentskappe saamgewerk het om oortreders te identifiseer, hulle te straf en die gesteelde staatsgeld terug te kry.
tgt: he explained that various government agencies were working together to identify wrongdoers, punish them, and to get looted state money refunded.

src: veiligheid en sekuriteit sal versterk word deur die werwing van 12 000 polisiepersoneel en die hervestiging van gemeenskapspolisiëringsforums.
tgt: safety and security will be strengthened through the recruitment of 12 000 police personnel and the reestablishment of community policing forums.

src: bestry ggg die regering sal vanjaar ook steeds die stryd teen geslagsgebaseerde geweld en vrouemoord (gggv) versterk deur die implementering van die nasionale strategiese plan vir ggg.
tgt: fighting gbvf government will also continue to intensify the fight against genderbased violence and femicide (gbvf) this year, through the implementation of the national strategic plan on gbvf.

src: drie nuwe wette is reeds in werking om die strafregstelsel te versterk en oorlewendes te ondersteun.
tgt: three new laws are already working to strengthen the criminal justice system and support survivors.

src: "die implementasie van dié wetgewing sal van groot hulp wees om te verseker dat sake suksesvol geregtelik vervolg word, dat oorlewendes beskerm word en dat daar doeltref fender afskrikmiddels in plek is."
tgt: "the implementation of this legislation will go a long way to ensuring that cases are successfully prosecuted, that survivors are protected and that there are more effective deterrents in place."

src: een van die nuwe wette waarna president ramaphosa verwys, is die wysigingswet op die strafreg en verwante aan geleenthede wat kwesbare mense teen sekondêre viktimisering beskerm.
tgt: one of the new laws that president ramaphosa was referring to is the criminal and related matters amendment act which protects the vulnerable from secondary victimisation.

src: dié wet laat die howe toe om tussengangers aan te stel wat minderjariges, persone met gestremdhede en bejaardes in verrigtinge kan ondersoek.
tgt: this act allows the courts to appoint intermediaries through which a minor, a disabled person or an elderly person can be examined in proceedings.

src: die president verwys ook na die nuwe wysigings wet op die strafreg (seksu ele misdrywe en verwante aangeleenthede) wat seksuele uitbuiting en seksuele voorbereiding van mense met geestelike gestremdhede verbied.
tgt: the president was also referring to the new criminal law (sexual offences and related matters) amendment act which outlaws sexual exploitation and grooming of persons with mental disabilities.

src: dié wet stel ook dat seksuele oortredings teen mense wat geestelik gestremd is op die nasionale register vir seksoortreders (nrso) aangeteken moet word.
tgt: this act also states that sexual offences against persons who are mentally disabled must be recorded in the national register of sex offenders.

src: einde van ramptoestand in sig vir sa vukuzenzele unnamed president cyril ramaphosa het onlangs in sy 2022 staatsrede (sr) aangekondig dat die regering beplan om die nasionale ramptoestand te skrap namate die land n nuwe fase in die hantering van die koronavirussiektepan demie (kovid19) betree.
tgt: end of state of disaster in sight for sa vukuzenzele unnamed president cyril ramaphosa recently announced in his 2022 state of the nation address (sona) that government plans to scrap the national state of disaster as the coun try enters a new phase in the management of the coronavirus disease (covid19) pandemic.

src: "ons is van plan om die nasionale ramptoestand te beëindig sodra ons ander maatreëls om die pandemie te bekamp, ingevolge die nasionale gesondheidswet en ander wetgewing, gefinaliseer het," sê die president.
tgt: "it is our intention to end the national state of disaster as soon as we have finalised other measures under the national health act and other legislation to contain the pandemic," said the president.

src: president ramaphosa het op 15 februarie 2020 die nasionale ramptoestand ingevolge die wet op ramp bestuur verklaar en n reeks maatreëls aangekondig om die kovid19uitbraak te bekamp.
tgt: on 15 march 2020, president ramaphosa declared the national state of disaster in terms of the disaster management act and announced a range of measures to contain the covid19 outbreak.

src: president ramaphosa sê dat byna alle beperkings op ekonomiese en sosiale aktiwiteit, grootliks te danke aan die entstofverspreidingsplan, reeds gelig is.
tgt: president ramaphosa said nearly all restrictions on economic and social activity have already been lifted, which is largely thanks to the vaccination rollout programme.

src: hy het burgers daaraan herinner dat entstowwe die beste verdediging teen siekte, dood en kovid19 is, wat plaaslik nagenoeg 100 000 lewens geëis het.
tgt: he reminded citizens that vaccines are the best defence against illness, death and covid19, which has claimed close to 100 000 lives locally.

src: "ek het nog altyd volgehou, vanuit n persoonlike standpunt, dat as ek nie ingeënt was toe ek kovid19 in desember opgedoen het nie, ek waarskynlik nie hier sou gestaan het nie," stel hy.
tgt: "i've always said from a personal point of view, had i have not been vaccinated, in december when i contracted covid19, i probably will not be standing here," he reflected.

src: die president het die tyd geneem om suidafrikaners aan te moedig om die lewensreddende inspuiting te kry, steeds basiese gesondheidsmaatreëls te volg en waaksaam te bly.
tgt: the president took the time to urge south africans to take the lifesaving jab and continue to observe basic health measures and remain vigilant.

src: "ons sal kan aangaan met ons lewens, selfs met die virus in ons midde," sê hy en voeg by dat die pandemie die skeiding tussen diegene wat werk het en werkloses vererger het.
tgt: "we will be able to get on with our lives, even with the virus in our midst," he said, adding that the pandemic has exacerbated the divide between those who are employed and those who are jobless.

src: solidariteitsfonds president ramaphosa het aangekondig dat die solidariteitsfonds r3.4 miljard vanaf meer as 300 000 suidafrikaners en maatskappye ingesamel het, terwyl meer as 400 individue en 100 maatskappye hul tyd en dienste vrywillig aangebied het.
tgt: solidarity fund president ramaphosa announced that the solidarity fund has raised r3.4 billion from more than 300 000 south africans and companies, while more than 400 individuals and 100 companies volunteered their time and services.

src: "die fonds het n sentrale rol gespeel in die ondersteuning van die nasionale gesondheidsreaksie en die verligting van die humanitêre krisis wat ons land en ons mense in die gesig gestaar het.
tgt: "the fund has played a pivotal role in supporting the national health response and alleviating the humanitarian crisis that confronted our country and our people.

src: "hy het almal bedank wat tot die fonds bygedra het, waaronder sommige parlementslede en ander inisiatiewe ter ondersteuning van diegene wat deur die pandemie geraak is.
tgt: "he thanked everyone who contributed to the fund, including some members of parliament, and other initiatives to support those affected by the pandemic.

src: die president het ook hulde gebring aan die baie gesondheidsorgen frontli niewerkers wat n sleutelrol in die stryd teen kovid19 gespeel het.
tgt: the president also paid tribute to the many healthcare and frontline workers who play a key role in the fight against covid19.

src: "die nasie is baie dankbaar teenoor die toegewyde gesondheidswerkers en ander frontliniepersoneel wat in dié tydperk hul eie gesondheid en lewens in gevaar gestel het om na siek en kwesbare mense om te sien," sê hy.
tgt: "the nation owes a great debt of gratitude to the dedicated health workers and to other frontline staff who put their own health and lives at risk to care for the ill and the vulnerable during this period," he said.

src: – sanews.
tgt: – sanews.

src: gov.
tgt: gov.

src: privaatsektor én staatsektor belangrik vir ekonomiese groei vukuzenzele unnamed namate ons ons ekonomie groei en indiensneming skep, heers daar n groot debat oor die onderskeie rolle van die staat en sakelui om dié doelwitte te bereik.
tgt: public and private sector key to economic growth vukuzenzele unnamed as we work to grow our economy and create employment, there is much debate about the relative roles of the state and business in pursuing these goals.

src: sommige mense het voorgestel dat ons n keuse moet maak tussen n ontwikkelingstaat wat n kernbelangrike rol in ekonomiese en maatskaplike transformasie speel aan die een kant, en n lewendige, uitbreidende privaatsektor wat groei een indiensneming aandryf, aan die ander kant.
tgt: some people have suggested that we must make a choice between, on the one hand, a developmental state that plays a vital role in economic and social transformation, and, on the other, a vibrant, expanding private sector that drives growth and employment.

src: die werklikheid is dat ons beide benodig.
tgt: the reality is that we need both.

src: ons benodig n bekwame ontwikkeling staat en n dinamiese en behendige privaatsektor.
tgt: we need a capable developmental state and a dynamic and agile private sector.

src: ons benodig dat hulle saam werk en mekaar komplimenteer.
tgt: we need them to work together and complement each other.

src: dit is nie n nuwe idee nie.
tgt: this idea is not new.

src: die african national congress het 30 jaar gelede, in 1992, n dokument ge titeld "gereed om te regeer" goedgekeur.
tgt: thirty years ago, in 1992, the african national congress adopted a document titled "ready to govern".

src: die dokument het beleidsriglyne vir n demokratiese suidafrika uiteengesit en het, oor byna drie dekades, die beleidsrigting van opeenvolgende demokratiese administrasies beïnvloed.
tgt: the document set out policy guidelines for a democratic south africa and has, over nearly three decades, influenced the policy direction of successive democratic administrations.

src: die "gereed om te regeer"dokument het n demokratiese staat beoog met die uiteindelike verantwoordelikheid vir "die koördinasie, beplanning en leiding van die ekonomie se ontwikkeling na n volhoubare groeipatroon", in samewerking met vakbondbewegings, sakelui en ander instansies in die samelewing.
tgt: the "ready to govern" document envisaged a democratic state with ultimate responsibility for coordinating, planning and guiding the development of the economy towards a sustainable growth pattern’ in cooperation with the trade union movement, business and other organs of society.

src: dit het verwys na die behoefte vir ekonomiese beleid wat die ekonomie demokratiseer en produktiewe indiensne mingsgeleenthede teen n bestaansloon vir alle suidafrikaners skep.
tgt: it spoke of the need for economic policy that democratises the economy and creates productive employment opportunities at a living wage for all south africans.

src: die dokument beoog verder "n dinamiese privaatsektor wat die vaardighede en vernuf van alle suidafrikaners gebruik ... en besigheidsaktiwiteite wat beduidend tot werkskepping bydra wat aktief aangemoedig word".
tgt: the document further envisages a dynamic private sector, employing the skills and acumen of all south africans … and of business activities which contribute significantly to job creation, being actively encouraged.

src: ek het in die onlangse staatsrede uiteengesit hoe die regering, sakelui en arbeid saam behoort te werk – deur elkeen gebruik te maak van sy unieke vermoëns – om werke te skep.
tgt: in the recent state of the nation address, i outlined how government, business and labour should work together, each using their unique capabilities, to create jobs.

src: een van die belangrikste drywers van groei en indiensneming is ondernemings in staatsbesit (sbo’s).
tgt: one of the most important drivers of growth and employment are stateowned enterprises (soes).

src: hulle genereer elektrisiteit, bestuur hawens, bou die paaie en verskaf die water wat die ekonomie benodig om te funksioneer.
tgt: they generate electricity, manage the ports, build the roads and supply the water that the economy needs to function.

src: dié sbo’s het sedert die begin van demokrasie toegang tot basiese dienste vir behoeftiges beduidend uitgebrei.
tgt: since the advent of democracy, these soes have significantly expanded access to basic services for the poor.

src: dit is waarom n kritiese deel van ons program dit behels om ondernemings in staatsbesit te versterk, tot finansiële welstand te herstel, bedryfsprestasie te verbeter en hier die ondernemings in staat te stel om n meer prominente en voordelige rol in die ekonomie te speel.
tgt: that is why a critical part of our programme is to strengthen stateowned enterprises, restoring them to financial health, improving their operational performance and enabling them to play a more prominent and beneficial role in the economy.

src: die staat, eg aan die rol wat in die "gereed om te regeer"dokument voorsien word, lei beide groei en transformasie deur hefbome soos mededingingsbeleid, breedgebaseerde swart ekonomiese bemagtigingsbepalings en indiensnemingsgelykheidswette asook deur die toestaan van verskeie lisensies aan universele diensen bemagtigingsverpligtinge te skakel.
tgt: true to the role envisaged in "ready to govern", the state directs both growth and transformation through levers like competition policy, broadbased black economic empowerment provisions and employment equity laws, and by linking the award of various licences to universal service and empowerment obligations.

src: die regering is ook direk betrokke by die skep van indiensname benewens die bestaande staatsamptenare wat in die staatsdiens werk.
tgt: government is also directly involved in employment creation beyond those people employed in the public service.

src: die uitgebreide openbare werkeprogram, wat sedert 2003 bestaan, het werksgeleenthede aan miljoene mense verskaf.
tgt: the expanded public works programme, which has been in existence since 2003, has provided work opportunities to millions of people.

src: dié regering het meer onlangs en in reaksie op die verwoestende ekonomiese impak van die kovid19pandemie, toesig oor die mees beduidende verbreding van staatsindiensname in ons land se geskiedenis gehou.
tgt: more recently, in response to the devastating economic impact of the covid19 pandemic, this government has overseen the most significant expansion of public employment in our country’s history.

src: die presidensiële werkskeppingstimulus het in slegs 16 maande meer as 850 000 geleenthede ondersteun.
tgt: the presidential employment stimulus has supported more than 850 000 opportunities in just 16 months.

src: ons verskaf, bykomend tot die uitbreiding van staatsindiensneming, ook ondersteuning aan werklose jeug om hulle vir indiensneming voor te berei, hulle meer aanstelbaar te maak en hulle met geleenthede te skakel.
tgt: in addition to expanding public employment, we are providing support to unemployed young people to prepare them for work, make them more employable and connect them to opportunities.

src: daar is baie ander maniere waarop die regering direk bydra tot werkskepping, waaronder grootskaalse beleggings in infrastruktuur, die skep van spesiale ekonomiese sones en die ondersteuning van arbeidsintensiewe groeinywerhede.
tgt: there are many other ways in which government is contributing directly to job creation, including through largescale investments in infrastructure, the establishment of special economic zones and through support to labourintensive growth industries.

src: daar word dié jaar spesiaal gefokus op klein, mediumen mikroondernemings, koöperasies en die informele sektor.
tgt: a special focus this year is on small, medium and micro businesses, on cooperatives and the informal sector.

src: ons maak "terugwipfinansiering" meer toeganklik vir klein besighede deur die herontwerp van die lening waarborgskema wat ons in die vroeë maande van die kovid19pandemie bekend gestel het.
tgt: through the redesign of the loan guarantee scheme that we introduced in the early months of the covid19 pandemic, we are making ‘bounce back’ finance more accessible for small businesses.

src: ons brei die indiensnamebelastingaansporing uit en kyk na verskeie ander regulatoriese veranderinge om dit makliker te maak vir klein ondernemings om meer mense aan te stel.
tgt: we are expanding the employment tax incentive and looking at various other regulatory changes to make it easier for small businesses to employ more people.

src: soos wat ek in die staatsrede aangedui het, is hierdie sommige van die maatreëls wat ons as die regering tans neem "om die toestande te skep wat die privaatsektor – beide groot en klein ondernemings – in staat sal stel om te ontwikkel, te groei, toegang tot nuwe markte te verkry, nuwe produkte te skep en meer werknemers aan te stel".
tgt: as i indicated in the state of the nation address, these are among the measures we are taking as government to create the conditions that will enable the private sector – both big and small – to emerge, to grow, to access new markets, to create new products, and to hire more employees.

src: die privaatsektor is verantwoordelik vir die indiensname van sowat driekwart van suidafrika se werkers en is verantwoordelik vir meer as tweederdes van beleggings asook navorsingen ontwikkelingsbesteding.
tgt: the private sector employs some three quarters of south africa’s workers and accounts for over twothirds of investment and research and development expenditure.

src: tesame met n bekwame en ontwikkelingstaat, benodig ons land dus ook n florerende privaatsektor wat in produktiewe kapasiteit belê.
tgt: alongside a capable and developmental state, our country therefore needs a thriving private sector that is investing in productive capacity.

src: meer lewensbestane word ondersteun en volhou namate privaatsektorindiensname uitbrei.
tgt: as private sector employment expands, more livelihoods are supported and sustained.

src: spesiale tribunaal toon dat misdaad nie lonend is nie allison cooper verskeie burgers het tydens die onlangse presidensiële imbizo in mahikeng hul kommer oor die tempo van die stryd teen korrupsie uitgespreek.
tgt: special tribunal is showing that crime does not pay vukuzenzele unnamed during the recent presidential imbizo in mahikeng, several citizens raised concerns about the pace of the fight against corruption.

src: hulle het vir my gesê wat ek in baie ander gemeenskappe regoor die land gehoor het – dat die identiteit van oortreders van sodanige misdade bekend is, veral omdat hulle met die opbrengs van hul misdade spog.
tgt: they told me what i have heard in many other communities across the country: that the perpetrators of such acts are known, not least because they flaunt the proceeds of their crimes.

src: maar die arm van die gereg is lank.
tgt: but the arm of the law is long.

src: diegene wat by die staat gesteel het, glo dalk dat hulle daarmee weggekom het, maar hulle dade sal hulle uiteindelik inhaal; ongeag wie hulle is en watter poste hulle beklee.
tgt: those who have stolen from the state may believe they have gotten away with it.

src: hulle sal leer dat misdaad nie lonend is nie.
tgt: they will learn that crime does not pay.

src: een van ons doeltreffend ste wapens in die stryd teen korrupsie en staatskaping in dié opsig is die spesiale tribunaal van die spesiale ondersoekeenheid (soe) wat in 2019 van stapel gestuur is.
tgt: in this regard, one of our most effective weapons in the fight against corruption and state capture is the special tribunal of the special investigating unit (siu), which i established in 2019. it adjudicates on matters that the siu institutes for civil litigation after it has concluded its investigations.

src: die spesiale tribunaal is opgestel om regsgedinge te bespoedig.
tgt: the special tribunal was set up to speed up litigation.

src: dié benadering het dit moontlik gemaak om staatsfondse en bates wat tydens korrupsie verlore gegaan het, gouer terug te kry en vermy vertragings in hooggeregs howe waar die soe saam met ander gedingvoerders hul beurt moet afwag.
tgt: this approach has made it possible for public funds and state assets lost to corrupt acts to be recovered faster, avoiding delays in the high courts, where the siu has to wait its turn together with other litigants.

src: die soe kan reddingsbevele en die vries van bates versoek om verdere verliese vir die staat te voorkom.
tgt: the siu can request preservation orders and the freezing of assets to prevent further losses to the state.

src: dit is van belang, aangesien oortreders wat onder verdenking staan dikwels groot moeite doen om hul korrupsiegewin rond te skuif, weg te steek of daarvan ontslae te raak.
tgt: this is important when considering that per petrators who are under suspicion often go to great lengths to move around, hide or dispose of proceeds of corruption.

src: die spesiale tribunaal het onbetwyfeld die spel verander.
tgt: there can be no doubt the special tribunal has been a game changer.

src: die tribunaal het sedert hul stigting ongeveer r8.6 miljard vanuit onwettige kontrakte teruggekry.
tgt: since its establishment, the tribunal has recovered around r8.6 billion from unlawful contracts.

src: die vervolging van oortreders is nie genoegsaam vir die stryd teen korrupsie om as doeltref fend beskou te word nie.
tgt: for any fight against corruption to be deemed effective, it is not sufficient that perpetrators are pro secuted.

src: die opbrengste van hul misdade moet teruggekry word.
tgt: the proceeds of their crimes must be recovered.

src: dié geld behoort aan burgers en behoort gebruik te word om aan hul behoeftes te voorsien.
tgt: this money belongs to citizens and should be used to meet their needs.

src: die spesiale tribunaal het onlangs twee konstruksiemaatskappye beveel om die winste wat hulle verdien het vanuit r40 miljoen in kontrakte om die beitbruggrensheining te bou, terug te gee.
tgt: the special tribunal recently ordered two construction companies to return the profits they earned from r40 million in contracts to erect the beit bridge border fence.

src: dit was na aanleiding van n soeondersoek wat n aantal ongerymdhede ontbloot het, waaronder n voorafbetaling aan die maatskappye deur die departement van openbare werke en infrastruktuur.
tgt: this followed an investigation by the siu that uncovered a number of irregularities, including a prepayment to the companies by the department of public works and infrastructure.

src: die tribunaal het in net die afgelope paar weke onreëlmatige en onwettige kontrakte na aanleiding van kovidverwante verkryging ter waarde van meer as r100 miljoen hersien en tersyde gestel.
tgt: over the past few weeks alone, the tribunal has reviewed and set aside more than r100 million worth of irregular and unlawful contracts arising from covidrelated pro curement.

src: die spesiale tribunaal het ook sukses behaal en geld teruggekry by senior uitvoerende beamptes in ondernemings in staatsbesit wat by onreëlmatige sakeaktiwiteite betrokke was.
tgt: the special tribunal has also been successful in getting back money from senior executives in stateowned enterprises who conducted irregular business activities.

src: byvoorbeeld, n voormalige uitvoerende beampte van transnet is beveel om r26 miljoen te betaal wat hy ontvang het as aandeelhouer van n konsultantingenieursfirma wat aan transnet gekontrakteer was terwyl hy n voltydse werknemer was.
tgt: for example, last year a former transnet executive was ordered to pay r26 million he received as a shareholder of a firm of consulting engineers contracted to transnet while he was a fulltime employee.

src: die soe het die tribunaal in etlike sake genader om die betaling van pensioenvoordele aan staatsamptenare wat by finansiële ongerymdhede of nuttelose en verkwistende besteding verwikkel is, te vertraag hangende die uitslag van hul ondersoeke.
tgt: the siu has in a number of cases approached the tribunal to delay the payment of pension benefits, pending the outcome of its investigations, to public servants implicated in financial irregularities or fruitless and wasteful expenditure.

src: die sake voor die spesiale tribunaal dui aan dat baie werk steeds gedoen moet word om leiding en bestuur regoor alle takke van die staat te versterk.
tgt: the cases before the special tribunal show that much work still needs to be done to strengthen governance and management across all arms of the state.

src: dit dui op ernstige foute deur die rekenpligtige beamptes en n versuim om aan die wette en regulasies wat verkryging omskryf, te voldoen.
tgt: they point to serious lapses on the part of accounting officers and failures to adhere to laws and regulations governing procurement i have said before that winning the war on cor ruption will be difficult, and that it will take time to unravel the vast webs of patronage that had become entrenched.

src: ek het voorheen gesê dat dit moeilik sal wees om die oorlog teen korrupsie te wen en dat dit tyd sal neem om die ontsaglike, verskanste webbe van beskermheerskap los te torring.
tgt: i have also maintained that we must fight private sector corruption with equal vigour, because for every public sector employee willing to be bribed, there is a business person willing to pay a bribe.
