src: alles wat jy oor epilepsie moet weet vukuzenzele unnamed die meeste mense wat epilepsie het, kan n normale lewe lei as hulle hul medisyne neem en die siekte goed bestuur.
tgt: all you need to know about epilepsy vukuzenzele unnamed most people with epilepsy can live a normal life if they take their medication and the condition is well controlled.

src: epilepsie is, volgens dr. nhlakanipho gumede, die kliniese bestuurder van mediese dienste by harry gwalastreekshospitaal in pietermaritzburg, nie n sielkundige steuring, siekte of kwaal nie en is ook nie aansteeklik nie.
tgt: according to dr nhlakanipho gumede, the clinical manager of medical services at harry gwala regional hospital in pietermaritzburg, epilepsy is not a psychological disorder, disease or illness, and it is not contagious.

src: hy verduidelik dat epilepsie n neurologiese siekte is wat gekenmerk word deur skielike en herhaalde sensoriese versteurings, verlies van bewussyn of stuiptrekkings wat verband hou met abnormale elektriese aktiwiteit in die brein.
tgt: he explains that epilepsy is a neurological disorder marked by sudden recurrent episodes of sensory disturbance, loss of consciousness or convulsions, associated with abnormal electrical activity in the brain.

src: "die brein bestaan uit miljarde senuselle (neurone) wat deur elektriese en chemiese seine kommunikeer.
tgt: "the brain comprises of billions of nerve cells (neurons) communicating through electrical and chemical signals.

src: n skielike, oormatige elektriese ontlading wat die normale aktiwiteit van die senuselle versteur, kan tot n aanval lei.
tgt: when there is a sudden excessive electrical discharge that disrupts the normal activity of the nerve cells, a seizure may result.

src: "n enkele aanval beteken nie noodwendig dat jy epilepsie het nie.
tgt: "a single seizure does not necessarily mean you have epilepsy.

src: n diagnose deur n mediese praktisyn moet dit bevestig," sê hy.
tgt: a diagnosis by a medical practitioner needs to confirm this," he says.

src: tagtig persent van mense met epilepsie sal, volgens epilepsie suidafrika, hul aanvalle met medisyne kan beheer.
tgt: according to epilepsy south africa, 80% of people with epilepsy will be able to control their seizures with medication.

src: oorsake en aanvalle in ses uit tien mense is die oorsaak van epilepsie onbekend.
tgt: causes and seizures the cause of epilepsy in six out of 10 people is not known.

src: in die ander 40% kan dit deur n kopbesering, besering tydens die geboorteproses, alkoholen dwelmmisbruik, veroudering of n metaboliese of biochemiese versteuring of wanbalans veroorsaak word.
tgt: in the other 40%, it can be caused by a head injury, injury during the birthing process, alcohol and drug abuse, aging or a metabolic or biochemical disturbance or imbalance.

src: dr. gumede sê dat die tekens en simptome van epilepsie wissel en op verskeie maniere te voorskyn kom, waaronder algemene ligte epilepsie oftewel afwesigheidsaanvalle (petit mal), wanneer iemand uitdrukkingloos staar; algemene toniesekloniese aanvalle (grand mal), wat meestal begin met die liggaam wat styftrek voordat die persoon bewusteloos raak en rukbewegings het; en komplekse gedeeltelike aanvalle, wat n uitwerking het op n sekere deel van die brein.
tgt: dr gumede says the signs and symptoms of epilepsy vary, and can present in various ways, including generalised absence seizures (petit mal), when a person looks blank and stares; generalised tonicclonic seizures (grand mal), which commonly start with body stiffening, before the person falls down and has jerking movements; and complex partial seizures, which affect a part of the brain.

src: n petit malaanval duur slegs vir n paar sekondes en die persoon kan onbewus wees daarvan dat hulle ’n aanval gehad het.
tgt: a petit mal seizure only lasts a few seconds, and the person may be unaware that they had one.

src: tydens n grand malaanval kan die persoon se lippe n blou skynsel hê wat verdof wanneer hul weer normaal asemhaal.
tgt: during a grand mal seizure, the person may have a blue colour around their mouth, which fades when normal breathing resumes.

src: grand malaanvalle duur gewoonlik n paar minute.
tgt: grand mal seizures usually last a few minutes.

src: "beskerm die persoon teen besering deur die voorwerpe rondom hulle te verwyder en hul kop te steun.
tgt: "protect the person from injury by moving objects away and cushioning their head.

src: moenie hul bewegings beperk of enigiets in hul mond plaas nie.
tgt: don’t restrict their movement or put any thing in their mouth.

src: ondersteun asemhaling deur die persoon op hul sy te draai wanneer die aanval tot n einde kom.
tgt: help breathing by laying the person on their side when the seizure ends.

src: bly by die persoon totdat hulle ten volle herstel het."
tgt: stay with the person until they have fully recovered."

src: die persoon kan tydens n komplekse gedeeltelike aanval deurmekaar, ver ward of dronk voorkom.
tgt: during a complex partial seizure, the person may appear confused, distracted or drunk.

src: hul kan ook herhalende bewegings hê, soos om aan hul klere te trek.
tgt: they may also have repetitive movements, such as plucking at their clothes.

src: voedingsprogram maak seker dat kinders nie honger ly nie vukuzenzele unnamed meer as nege miljoen kinders ontvang n voedsame maaltyd by die skool danksy die regering se nasio nale skoolvoedingsprogram (nsvp) wat in 1994 ingestel is.
tgt: food at school ensures children don’t go hungry vukuzenzele unnamed over nine million children receive a nutritious meal at school thanks to government’s national school nutrition programme (nsnp), which was introduced in 1994. the programme aims to improve children’s ability to learn, by reducing malnutrition and hunger and improving school attendance, especially at disadvantaged schools.

src: die program is daarop gemik om kinders se leervermoë te verbeter deur wanvoeding en hongerte te verminder en skoolbywoning te verbeter, veral by voor heenbenadeelde skole.
tgt: "the programme is critical for furthering learners’ constitutional rights to basic nutrition and basic education," explains deputy minister of basic education dr reginah mhaule.

src: "die program speel n kritiese rol in die bevordering van leerders se grondwetlike reg tot basiese voeding en basiese onderwys," verdui delik die adjunkminister van basiese onderwys, dr. regi nah mhaule.
tgt: as a result of the nsnp, more children are attending school on time and more regularly, and their concentration in class has improved.

src: weens die nsvp daag meer kinders betyds en ook meer gereeld vir skool op en hulle konsentrasie in die klas het verbeter.
tgt: according to the department of basic education (dbe), learners are taught good eating and lifestyle habits.

src: skole word ook aangemoe dig om hulle eie groentetuine aan te plant om die nsvpspyskaart aan te vul.
tgt: schools are also encouraged to set up their own food gardens to supplement the nsnp menu.

src: leerders, opvoeders en ouers word geleer hoe om hulle eie kos te kweek.
tgt: learners, teachers and parents are taught grow their own food.

src: nsvptoekennings thabang primary school in bethlehem in die vrystaat is een van die skole wat baatvind by die nsvp.
tgt: nsnp awards thabang primary school in bethlehem, free state, is one of the schools that benefits from the nsnp.

src: die skool het onlangs die toekenning as beste skool in die nsvp ontvang.
tgt: the school recently won the nsnp best school award.

src: die toekennings vier skole se voedingsprogramme deur na hulle higiëneen veiligheidspraktyke, voedsame maaltye, groentetuine en voedingsopvoeding te kyk.
tgt: the awards celebrate schools’ nutrition programmes by looking at their hygiene and safety practices, nutritious meals, food gardens and nutrition education.

src: "ek is verskriklik dankbaar dat die skool die toekenning gewen het," sê seyanokeng sejake, thabang primary school se hoof van die afgelope 24 jaar.
tgt: "i am extremely grateful that the school won the award," says seyanokeng sejake, the thabang pri mary principal for the past 24 years.

src: thabang primary school se voedingsprogram kom al van 1994 af aan.
tgt: thabang primary school has been running its nutrition programme since 1994. today, it ensures that its 1 065 learners receive a healthy breakfast daily from a local business.

src: die kos word deur werklose persone in die gemeenskap gekook wat deur die skool se beheerliggaam (sbl) aangewys word.
tgt: the food is cooked by unemployed members of the community, who are appointed by the school governing body (sgb).

src: "ons ses vrywillige voedselhanteerders (vvh) wat in ons diens is, berei die kos voor wat deur die departement van onderwys verskaf word deur die toekenning van fondse aan die skool," sê sejake.
tgt: "our six employed voluntary food handlers (vfh) make the food provided by the department of basic education through the allocation of funds to the school," says sejake.

src: die vvh’s ontvang elkeen n toelaag vir die voorberei ding van die voedsel.
tgt: they vfhs each receive a stipend for preparing the food.

src: thabang primary school het met die louere weggestap by die toekennings weens harde werk en toewyding van sy sbl, bestuurspan en funksionele nsvpkomitee, sê.
tgt: thabang primary school took top honours at the awards due to the hard work and commitment of its sgb, management team and functional nsnp com mittee, says sejake.

src: sejake"stiptelikheid is die wagwoord.
tgt: "punctuality is the order of the day.

src: ons laat nie afwesigheid sonder n geldige rede toe nie en het geen persone wat uitval nie.
tgt: we don’t allow absenteeism, without a valid reason, and we have no dropouts.

src: ons leerders se konsentrasie en algemene prestasie het ook verbeter," voeg sy by.
tgt: our learners’ concentration and general performance have also improved," she adds.

src: die skool se voedingsprogram gaan nou net verder verbeter aangesien die wenprys n ultramoderne kombuis is wat deur die tiger brandsstigting gebou gaan word.
tgt: as the prize for winning the award is a stateoftheart kitchen built by the tiger brands foundation, the school’s nutrition programme is set to become even better.

src: die skool maak seker dat daar genoeg kosvoorraad is wat behoorlik bestuur word, om seker te maak dat daar altyd voedsel vir die program is.
tgt: the school also ensures that there are enough food supplies which are managed properly, to ensure there is always food for the programme.

src: "ons het byvoorbeeld n groentetuin wat groente voorsien om die nsvptoelaag aan te vul," verduidelik sejake.
tgt: "for example, we have a food garden that supplies vegetables to supplement the nsnp allocation," explains sejake.

src: toekenningwenners grootdrink intermediate in die mgcawudistrik in die noordkaap het tweede gekom in die kategorie vir beste skole en aaron gqedu primary school in nelson mandelabaai in die ooskaap derde.
tgt: award winners in the best schools category, grootdrink intermediate, in the mgcawu district in the northern cape, took second place and aaron gqedu primary school, in nelson mandela bay in the eastern cape, came third.

src: hulle sal kombuistoerusting van die departement van basiese onderwys ontvang.
tgt: they will receive kitchen equipment from the depart ment of basic education.

src: die toekenning vir die beste distrik is deur umzinyathi (kwazulunatal) gewen.
tgt: the best district award was won by umzinyathi (kwazulunatal).

src: die zf mgcawudistrik (noordkaap) het tweede gekom en metro noord (weskaap) derde.
tgt: the zf mgcawu district (northern cape) came second and metro north (western cape) came third.

src: elke distrik het kantooren rekenaartoerusting gewen.
tgt: each district won office and computer equipment.

src: hou kinders veilig aanlyn vukuzenzele unnamed met die wêreld wat toenemend aanlyn raak, is dit belangrik dat kinders dié geleenthede aangryp terwyl hulle terselfdertyd veilig bly.
tgt: keep children safe online vukuzenzele unnamed with the world increasingly moving online, it’s important for children to take advantage these opportunities while also staying safe.

src: die regeringskommunikasie en inligtingstelsel (gcis) en digify africa het onlangs n webinaar tesame met media monitoring africa (mma) en die filmen publikasieraad (fpr) aangebied om kinders, opvoeders, ouers en die publiek te leer hoe om verantwoordelik te wees wanneer hulle aanlyn is.
tgt: the government communication and information system (gcis) and digify africa recently hosted a webinar with media monitoring africa (mma) and the film and publication board (fpb) to teach children, educators, parents and the public about how to be responsible online.

src: phakamile khumalo, die programbestuurder van die ontwikkeling van openbare en mediavaardighede by mma, sê dat sewe uit 10 kinders wat as deel van die sa kids online study vrae beantwoord het, gesê het dat hulle die internet sonder hulle ouers se toestemming gebruik.
tgt: phakamile khumalo, the programme manager of public and media skills development at mma, said seven out of 10 children who answered questions as part of the sa kids online study said they used the internet without their parents’ permission.

src: slegs vier uit 10 kinders het gesê dat hulle een of ander vorm van inligting oor aanlynveiligheid het.
tgt: only four out of 10 children said they have some sort of information about online safety.

src: dit toon dat kinders vaardighede en hulpbronne benodig om hulle te help om die internet op n veilige manier te gebruik.
tgt: this shows that children need skills and resources to help them use the internet safely.

src: mmaletjema poto, die fpr se kinderbeskermingsbeampte, sê dat ouers bewus moet wees van die gevare wat hulle kinders aanlyn kan teenkom, insluitend die kyk van pornografie of seksuele misbruik van kinders en gereedmaking deur seksuele predatore.
tgt: mmaletjema poto, the fpb’s child protection officer, said parents need to be aware of the dangers their children face online, in cluding viewing child pornography or child sexual abuse, and being groomed by sexual predators.

src: kinders kan die teiken van aanlyn seksuele predatore word deur net n onskuldige internetsoektog te doen en op die verkeerde skakel te klik.
tgt: children can become the target of online sexual predators by just conducting an innocent internet search and clicking on the wrong link.

src: oortreders begin dan hulle vertroue wen en begin hulle voorberei.
tgt: offenders then gain their trust and start grooming them.

src: "die kind is dikwels verleë en praat dus nie daaroor nie, wat dit moeilik maak om uit die gereedma kingsiklus uit te breek," sê poto.
tgt: "the child is often embarrassed and therefore doesn’t speak about it, which makes it hard for them to get out of the grooming cycle," said poto.

src: sy het ook daarteen gewaarsku dat mense video’s of foto’s van kinderpornografie aanlyn deel.
tgt: she also warned against sharing videos or images of child pornography online.

src: "dit het die norm geraak om inhoud op sosiale media te deel, maar om dié soort inhoud te deel, is n bewys van kindermishandeling.
tgt: "it has become a norm to share content on social media.

src: dit is n kriminele oortreding om in die besit van sodanige inhoud te wees of dit te deel," het poto bygevoeg.
tgt: being in possession of such content or sharing it is a criminal offence," added poto.

src: hulp is beskikbaar daar is verskeie hulpbronne beskikbaar om kinders te help om die internet op n veilige manier te gebruik.
tgt: help at hand there are various resources available to help children use the internet safely.

src: die mma bedryf web rangers, n digitale geletterdheidsprogram om leerders, onderwysers en ouers se vaardighede op te skerp en uit te brei.
tgt: the mma runs web rangers, a digital literacy programme to upskill learners, teachers and parents.

src: opvoedkundige video’s oor kuberboeliegedrag, sexting en aanlyn gereed making is beskikbaar by www.
tgt: educational videos about cyberbullying, sexting and online grooming, are available at www.

src: webrangers.co.zadie mma help ook kinders deur sy hashplaywebblad (https://hashplay.co.za) wat n sosi ale mediaplatform insluit wat kinders toelaat om met n aanlyn konsultant te praat oor dit wat hulle op sosiale media teëkom.
tgt: webrangers.co.za the mma also helps children through its hashplay (https://hashplay.co.za) website, which includes a social media platform that allows children to talk to an online consultant about what they are experiencing on social media.

src: digify africa het n gratis kitso whatsappbot wat kinders help om digitale geletterdheidsvaardig hede te ontwikkel.
tgt: digify africa has a free kitso whatsapp bot that helps children develop digital literacy skills.

src: besoek https://digifyafrica.
tgt: visit https://digifyafrica.

src: com/learnersresponsiblecitizens.
tgt: com/learnersresponsiblecitizens.

src: jy kan aanlyn seksuele misbruik van kinders of geweld teenoor kinders by die fpr aanmeld deur n epos te stuur aan hotline@fpb.
tgt: you can report online child sexual abuse or child violence to the fpb by emailing hotline@fpb.

src: org.
tgt: org.

src: verbeterde belastinginvordering ondersteun herstel en groei vukuzenzele unnamed die suidafrikaanse inkomstediens (said) het onlangs in sy voorlopige belastinginvorderingsverslag aangekondig dat dit oor die r1,5 biljoen tussen april 2021 en maart 2022 ingevorder het.
tgt: improved tax revenue supports recovery and growth vukuzenzele unnamed recently, the south african revenue service (sars) announced in its preliminary tax revenue collection outcome that it had collected over r1.5 trillion between april 2021 and march 2022. this a 25% improvement over the previous year and a 15% increase over the last year prior to the covid19 pandemic.

src: dit is n 25% verbetering teenoor die vorige jaar en n 15% toename teenoor die laaste jaar voor die kovid19pandemie.
tgt: over the same period, sars also paid out its highest amount in tax refunds since it was established 25 years ago.

src: n bekwame belastinginvorderingsagentskap is die grondslag van n bekwame staat.
tgt: a competent tax revenue collection agency is at the heart of building a capable state.

src: inkomstebelasting versnel ons nasie se ontwikkeling.
tgt: tax revenue propels our nation’s development.

src: die geld wat deur said ingevorder word, finansier dienslewering en infrastruktuur.
tgt: the money collected by sars finances service delivery and infrastructure.

src: ons was, deur middel van die r17,8 biljoen wat said ingevorder het sedert sy totstandkoming in 1997, in staat om meer maatskaplike infrastruktuur te bou soos klinieke, skole en hospitale; paaie op te gradeer en nuwe paaie te bou, en om die samelewing se mees kwesbare mense te ondersteun deur middel van toelae en ander maatreëls.
tgt: through the r17.8 trillion that sars has collected since its establishment in 1997, we have been able to build more social infrastructure like clinics, schools and hospitals, upgrade and build new roads, and support society’s most vulnerable through social grants and other measures.

src: wanneer invorderingstel sels van inkomstebelasting en die ondersteunende wetgewing effektief, ongekompliseerd en billik is, dien dit as aansporing vir groter voldoening.
tgt: when tax revenue collection systems and their supporting legislation are efficient, uncomplicated and equitable, it incentivises greater compliance.

src: die herstel van stabiliteit en geloofwaardigheid in said was een van my eerste prioriteite toe ek in 2018 as president verkies is.
tgt: restoring stability and credibility in sars was among my foremost priorities when i was elected president in 2018. like a number of other key institutions, sars had suffered from the illeffects of state capture, with political meddling, mismanagement and other factors seriously affecting its efficiency.

src: said het, soos n aantal van die ander sleutelinstellings, ook deurgeloop onder die slegte gevolge van staatskaping, waar politieke inmengery, wanbestuur en ander faktore sy doeltref fendheid ernstig benadeel het.
tgt: this had the direct consequence of not only undermining taxpayer morality, but also loss of business confidence in the organisation.

src: ek het in 2018 n kommissie van ondersoek na belastingadministrasie en regering by said aangestel onder voorsitterskap van die afgetrede regter robert nugent.
tgt: in 2018, i appointed a commission of inquiry into tax administration and governance at sars chaired by retired justice robert nugent.

src: die kommissie het sy finale verslag teen die einde van dieselfde jaar ingedien.
tgt: the commission delivered its final report by the end of the same year.

src: said het vier jaar later byna al 16 aanbevelings en 27 subaanbevelings van die kommissie geïmplementeer om stabiliteit in die organisasie te herstel.
tgt: four years later, sars has implemented nearly all of the 16 recommendations and 27 subrecommendations to restore stability to the organisation.

src: said het n gefokusde omkeerstrategie aangedryf om homself aan die voorpunt van doeltreffendheid en diensuitnemendheid te posisioneer.
tgt: sars has driven a focused turnaround strategy to position itself at the forefront of efficiency and service excellence.

src: hy het n gekombineerde program om belastingmoraliteit en voldoening te bevorder.
tgt: it has a concerted programme to promote tax morality and compliance.

src: die huidige hoë kommoditeitspryse wat verhoogde inkomste uit korporatiewe inkomstebelasting tot gevolg het, het bygedra tot die jongste inkomstebelastingmeevaller.
tgt: current high commodity prices, resulting in increased corporate income tax revenues, have contributed to the latest revenue collection windfall.

src: die stappe wat said gedoen het om sy informasietegnologie en ander infrastruktuur te verbeter, doeane te moderniseer, vaardige personeel te werf en belastingontduiking en kriminele aktiwiteit te bekamp, het ook n rol gespeel.
tgt: what has also played a role are the steps sars has taken to improve its information technology and other infrastructure, modernise customs, recruit skilled staff, and combat tax avoidance and criminal activity.

src: een van die nugentkommissie se aanbevelings was dat said sy kapasiteit om onwettige handel te monitor en te ondersoek, herinstel.
tgt: one of the recommendations of the nugent commission was that sars reestablish capacity to monitor and investigate illicit trades.

src: die eenheid wat onwettige ekonomie ondersoek wat in 2018 heringestel is, het n paar suksesse behaal in die bekamping van onwettige ekonomiese handel, insluitend deur te fokus op nievoldoening aan doeanevereistes.
tgt: the illicit economy unit that was reconstituted in 2018 has notched up a number of successes in combating illicit economy trades, including through a focus on customs noncompliance.

src: belastinginvordering van maatskappye wat op die jeb gelys is, multinasionale maatskappye en hoënettowaardeindividue, word nou meer doeltreffend bestuur deur die eenheid vir groot besighede wat in 2020 hervestig is.
tgt: tax collection from jse listed companies, multinationals and high net worth individuals is now more effectively managed through its large business unit, which was relaunched in 2020. as a result of sars’ turnaround there has been improved compliance in personal income tax, corporate income tax and pay as you earn.

src: n gevolg van said se omkeer is die verbeterde voldoening in persoonlike inkomstebelasting, korporatiewe inkomstebelasting en pay as you earn.
tgt: sars is taking the wind out of the sails of tax dodgers, beneficiaries of the proceeds of crime, and those involved in corrupt activities.

src: said is besig om die wind uit die seile van belastingontduikers, begunstigdes van inkomste uit misdaad en diegene wat by korrupte aktiwiteite betrokke is, te neem.
tgt: it is wellestablished that ‘the taxman’ is one of the most efficient tools to combat corruption.

src: said het, in gevalle waar individue se lewenstyle nie ooreenstem met wat hulle verklaar nie, leefstyloudits uitgevoer.
tgt: in cases where an individual’s lifestyle does not match what they declare, sars has been conducting lifestyle audits.

src: said het, in die laaste jaar, leefstyloudits voltooi wat die invordering van n verdere r474 miljoen tot gevolg gehad het.
tgt: in the last year, sars has completed lifestyle audits that resulted in the collection of a further r474 million.

src: soos ons met die pogings voortbeur om die kapasiteit van die staat te versterk en instellings te herbou wat sistematies deur staatskaping verswak is, het ons baie om te leer uit dit wat said in n relatief kort tydjie bereik het.
tgt: as we forge ahead with efforts to strengthen the capacity of the state and rebuild institutions that were systematically weakened by state capture, we have much to learn from what sars has achieved in a relatively short space of time.

src: as staatsinstellings goed bestuur word en doeltref fend funksioneer, as hulle geloofwaardigheid en billikheid in hulle sake demonstreer, dra dit by tot verhoogde vlakke van vertroue in die regering.
tgt: when state institutions are wellrun and efficient, when they demonstrate credibility and fairness in their operations, this contributes to increasing levels of trust in government.

src: sakeen beleggersvertroue verbeter ook, wat groter beleggings en ekonomiese groei aanmoedig.
tgt: business and investor confidence also improve, encouraging greater investment and economic growth.

src: vloedverligting vir kzn en ooskaap allison cooper die regering sal inwoners van kwazulunatal en die ooskaap help om hul lewens en wonings te herbou nadat onlangse vloede in die twee provinsies erge lewensverlies en verwoesting veroorsaak het.
tgt: flood relief for kzn and e cape allison cooper government will help residents of kwazulunatal and the eastern cape rebuild their lives and homes after floods recently left a trail of death and destruction in the two provinces.

src: president cyril ramaphosa het aangekondig dat die nasionale tesourie fondse vir verligtingspogings beskik baar sal stel om hulp te verleen aan diegene wat deur die vloede geraak is.
tgt: president cyril ramaphosa said national treasury will make money available for relief efforts to help those affected by the floods.

src: "die minister van finansies het aangedui dat r1 miljard onmiddellik beskikbaar is," het die president gesê.
tgt: "the minister of finance has said that r1 billion is immediately available," he said.

src: president ramaphosa sal ook die parlement nader vir bykomende hulpbronne.
tgt: president ramaphosa will also approach parliament for additional resources.

src: die regering werk saam met die solidariteitsfonds, die privaatsektor en nieregeringsen gemeenskapsgebaseerde organisasies om slagoffers by te staan.
tgt: government is working with the solidarity fund, private sector and nongovernmental and communitybased organisations to support victims.

src: die solidariteitsfonds sal n aparte bankrekening vir die vloedramp oopmaak sodat suidafrikaanse en internasionale skenkers tot die verligtingspogings kan bydra.
tgt: the solidarity fund will set up a separate bank account for the flood disaster for south african and foreign donors to contribute to relief efforts.

src: die regering sal ook geskenkbewyse verskaf om huishoudings te help om gedeeltelikbeskadigde huise te herbou, het die president gesê.
tgt: government will also provide vouchers to help households rebuild partially damaged houses, the president said.

src: "n omvattende assessering van die ekonomiese koste van dié vloede moet nog gedoen word, maar dit is duidelik dat die herbou van infrastruktuur en verlies aan produksie biljoene rande sal beloop."
tgt: "a comprehensive assessment of the economic cost of these floods still has to be made, but it is clear that it will run into billions of rands for the rebuilding of infrastructure and loss of production."

src: hy het bygevoeg dat die geld wat opsy gesit word vir die vloedslagoffers diegene moet bereik wat dit die meeste benodig.
tgt: he added that the money set aside for the flood victims must reach those who need it the most.

src: "dit sal krities wees, wanneer ons dié taak onderneem, dat alle hulpbronne wat ons mobiliseer wel aangewend word vir die doel waarvoor dit bestem is en mense vir wie dit bestem is, bereik.
tgt: "it will be critical, as we undertake this work, that all the re sources we mobilise are used for their intended purposes and reach the intended recipients.

src: daar kan geen ruimte wees vir korrupsie, wanbestuur of bedrog van enige aard nie," het die president benadruk.
tgt: there can be no room for corruption, mismanagement or fraud of any sort," the president stressed.

src: driefase reaksie president ramaphosa het gesê dat die regering se reaksie op die ramp in drie fases sal plaasvind.
tgt: threephased response president ramaphosa said government will respond to the disaster in three phases.

src: daar sal eerstens n fokus wees op onmiddelike humanitêre verligting om te verseker dat almal wat deur die vloede geraak is, veilig is en dat daar aan hul basiese behoeftes voldoen word.
tgt: it will first focus on immediate humanitarian relief, ensuring that everyone affected is safe and their basic needs are met.

src: "tweedens sal ons fokus op stabilisering en herstel deur behuising te verskaf aan mense wat hul wonings verloor het en die herstel van dienslewering.
tgt: "second, we will focus on stabilisation and recovery, rehousing people who have lost homes and restoring the provision of services.

src: derdens sal ons fokus op herkonstruksie en herbou," het hy gesê.
tgt: "third, we will focus on reconstruction and rebuilding," he said.

src: die herkonstruksieen herboufase sal die oprigting van huise in geskikte gebiede insluit.
tgt: the reconstruction and building phase will include the construction of houses in suitable areas.

src: die departement van menslike nedersettings het reeds met n assessering van die skade aan behuising regoor die provinsies, begin.
tgt: the department of human settlements has already begun an assessment of damages to houses across the province.

src: "n onmiddelike taak is om behuising te verskaf aan die mense wat deur die vloede dakloos gelaat is en voorbereiding is onderweg om tydelike behuisingseenhede te verskaf," het president ramaphosa gesê.
tgt: "an immediate task is to house those people who have been displaced by the floods and preparations are underway to provide temporary residential units," said president ramaphosa.

src: die departement van openbare werke en infrastruktuur is besig om geskikte staatsgrond te identifiseer wat vir hervestiging gebruik kan word.
tgt: the department of public works and infrastructure is identifying suitable state land that can be used for resettlement.

src: grootskaalse skade die reën het grootskaalse skade aan huise, besighede, paaie en brûe, asook water, elektrisiteit, spooren telekommunikasieinfrastruktuur veroorsaak.
tgt: extensive damage the rains caused extensive damage to houses; businesses; roads and bridges; water, electricity, rail and telecommunications infrastructure.

src: skole, gesondheidsorgfasiliteite, polisiestasies en land droshowe is ook geraak, asook brandstofen voedselvoorraad.
tgt: schools, health facilities, police stations and magistrates’ courts were also affected, along with fuel and food supplies.

src: "na beraming is meer as 270 000 leerders geraak en meer as 600 skole beskadig; daar is geen toegang tot 16 van hierdie skole nie weens skade aan paaie en brûe.
tgt: "it is estimated that over 270 000 learners were affected and over 600 schools were damaged, 16 of which cannot be accessed due to damage to connecting roads and bridges.

src: "sesensestig openbare gesondheidsorgfasiliteite is geraak, alhoewel daar minimale onderbrekings in gesondheidsorgdienste in die meeste van die geraakte distrikte is," het die president gesê.
tgt: "sixtysix public healthcare facilities were affected, although there has been minimal disruption to health services in most affected districts," the president said.

src: breedvoerige werk is onderweg om basiese dienste in verskeie dele van kzn te herstel.
tgt: extensive work is under way to restore basic services to various areas in kzn.

src: meer as 400 mense in kzn het hul lewens verloor en baie mense word vermis.
tgt: more than 400 people have lost their lives in kzn and many people are missing.

src: een sterfte is ook in die ooskaap aangeteken.
tgt: one death has also been reported in the eastern cape.

src: meer as 4 000 huise is vernietig en 8 300 is gedeeltelik beskadig, met 40 000 mense wat dakloos gelaat is.
tgt: over 4 000 homes have been destroyed and 8 300 have been partially damaged, leaving 40 000 people homeless.

src: die president het gesê dat die suidafrikaanse polisiediens (sapd) en die suidafrikaanse nasionale weermag (sanw) reddingsoektogte gelei het.
tgt: the president said that the south african police service (saps) and the south african national defence force (sandf) have been leading search and rescue efforts.

src: dit sluit in die ontplooiing van sapdpersoneel, duikspanne, hondeeenhede en verskeie vaartuie, helikopters en vastevlerkvliegtuie na meeste van die geraakte gebiede.
tgt: this includes the deployment of saps personnel, diving teams, canine units and various vessels, helicopters and fixedwing planes to the most affected areas.

src: "lugvaartuie van die sanw is gebruik vir beide redding en die aflewering van noodvoor raad — soos voedsel, water, tente en komberse — aan mense in ontoeganklike areas.
tgt: "aircraft from the sandf have been used both for rescue and for the delivery of relief supplies – such as food, water, tents and blankets – to people in inaccessible areas.

src: "ek het die sanw gemagtig om meer personeel, waterstoringen watersuiweringsvoorraad en ingenieurspanne in te bring om te help met die herstel van elektrisiteit en watertoevoer," het hy gesê.
tgt: "i have authorised the sandf to bring in more personnel, water storage and purification supplies and engineering teams to assist with electricity and water restoration," he said government departments at national and provincial levels; municipalities; nongovernmental organisations and businesses have been distributing basic relief materials such as food, blankets, mattresses, clothing, chronic medication, toiletries and cooking utensils.

src: die kabinet het onlangs n nasionale ramptoestand na aanleiding van die vloede verklaar.
tgt: cabinet recently declared a national state of disaster in response to floods.

src: die president het die vloede as n humanitêre ramp beskryf, wat n "reuse en dringende verligtingspoging" noodsaak.
tgt: the president described the floods as a humanitarian disaster that called for a "massive and urgent relief effort.

src: "die lewens, gesondheid en welstand van duisende mense is steeds in gedrang.
tgt: ""the lives, h ealth and wellbeing of thousands of people are still at risk.

src: die vloede het grootskaalse ekonomiese en maatskaplike skade verrig," het hy gesê.
tgt: the floods have caused great economic and social damage," he said.

src: durbanhawe, wat van sleutelbelang tot suidafrika se ekonomie is en een van die grootste en besigste verskepingsterminale op die kontinent is, is grootliks geraak.
tgt: the port of durban, which is vital to south africa’s economy and is one of the largest and busiest shipping terminals on the continent, has been severely affected.

src: veg teen misdaad, nie teen migrante vukuzenzele unnamed ons nuwe demokratiese grondwet het 25 jaar gelede tot stand gekom.
tgt: fight crime, not migrants vukuzenzele unnamed twentyfive years ago, our new democratic constitution came into effect.

src: met die instelling van dié grondwet het ons ons toewyding bevestig tot n samelewing geskoei op demokratiese waardes, maatskaplike geregtigheid en menseregte.
tgt: in adopting this constitution, we affirmed our commitment to a society based on democratic values, social justice and human rights.

src: ons het ons ook met die verlede verbreek.
tgt: we were also making a complete break with our past.

src: daardie verlede het rassegebaseerde maatskaplike ordening behels wat aan die dag gelê is deur toevloeibeheer, werkstoekenning, groepsgebiede en die gevreesde dompas.
tgt: this was a past of racebased social engineering that manifested itself through influx control, job reservation, group areas and the dreaded dompas.

src: toe ons voorvaders die vry heidshandves, waarvan die beginsels in ons grondwet opgeneem is, in 1955 opgestel het en verklaar het dat suidafrika aan almal wat in die land woon behoort, was hulle doel n samelewing sonder etniese chauvinisme, stamorganisasie, rassisme en seksisme.
tgt: when our forebears drafted the freedom charter in 1955, whose principles have been incorporated in our constitution, and declared that south africa belongs to all who live in it, they were seeking a society free from ethnic chauvinism, tribalism, racism and sexism.

src: dit is dus verontrustend hoe die onlangse gevalle van sentiment teen buitelanders in dele van die land n weerklank is van daardie verlede van apartheid.
tgt: it is therefore deeply disturbing how the recent incidents of antiforeigner sentiment in parts of the country echo our apartheid past.

src: ons het gesien hoe mense deur private landsburgers op straat gestop word en geforseer word om hul immigrasiestatus te verifieer.
tgt: we have seen people being stopped on the street by private citizens and being forced to produce identification to verify their immigration status.

src: ons het gesien hoe sekere politieke leiers onwetenskaplike stellings maak oor immigrante om mense se besware vir politieke gewin uit te buit.
tgt: we have seen some political leaders making unscientific statements about immigrants to exploit people’s grievances for political gain.

src: ons het gesien hoe mense opgesweep word om mense se huise en besighede binne te val vir bewyse van kriminele aktiwiteit.
tgt: we have seen marches being led on people’s homes and their dwellings raided for evidence of criminal activity.

src: ons het gesien hoe mense aangeval word, aangerand word en selfs doodgemaak word na aanleiding van hoe hulle lyk of omdat hulle n spesifieke aksent het.
tgt: we have seen people being attacked, hurt and even killed because of how they looked or because they have a particular accent.

src: dit is wat apartheid se onderdrukkers gedoen het.
tgt: this was how the apartheid oppressors operated.

src: hulle het gesê mense mag net in sekere gebiede woon, sekere besighede bedryf en sekere werke doen.
tgt: they said some people could only live in certain areas, operate certain businesses or take certain jobs.

src: swart mense was onder apartheid vanselfsprekend onder verdenking en is deur die polisie gestop as hulle in sogenaamde wit gebiede gevind is.
tgt: under apartheid, black people were deemed suspects by default and stopped by police when found in socalled white areas.

src: swartmense is geforseer om n dompas te toon en as hulle nie een gehad het nie, is hulle in die tronk gegooi.
tgt: black people were forced to produce a dompas and if they could not do so, they were jailed.

src: ons kan nie toelaat dat sulke ongeregtighede weer plaasvind nie.
tgt: we cannot allow such injustices to happen again.

src: die onlangse gebeure in die gautengse township diepsloot was n tragedie.
tgt: the events in the gauteng township of diepsloot recently were a tragedy.

src: sewe mense is in die bestek van n enkele naweek doodgemaak, wat tot protesaksie gelei het.
tgt: in the course of a single weekend, seven people were killed, sparking protests.

src: dié lewensverlies is betreurenswaardig, net soos die moord op n medeafrikaan van zimbabwe, na bewering in n vigilanteaanval.
tgt: this loss of life is deplorable, as is the killing of a fellow african from zimbabwe allegedly at the hands of vigilantes.

src: misdaad is n ernstige probleem in dié land.
tgt: crime is a serious problem in this country.

src: dit raak alle gemeenskappe en mense is na regte moeg daarvoor om in vrees vir misdadigers te leef.
tgt: it affects all communities and people are justifiably tired of living in fear of criminals.

src: in teenstelling wat deur sommige antiimmigrasiegroepe en individue beweer word, word misdaad deur beide swart en wit, mans en vrouens, landsburgers en buitelanders gepleeg.
tgt: contrary to what is claimed by some antiimmigration groupings and individuals, the perpetrators of crime are both black and white, male and female, foreigner and citizen.

src: misdaad, nie migrante nie, is die gemeenskaplike vyand waarteen ons moet saamstaan en veg.
tgt: crime, not migrants, is the common enemy we must work together to defeat.

src: ons kan nie misdaad bestry met opsweping, geweld, intimidasie en vigilantisme teen buitelandse inwoners, spesifiek inwoners van ander afrikalande, nie.
tgt: we cannot defeat crime through incitement, violence, intimidation and vigilantism aimed at foreign nationals, and specifically nationals from other african countries.

src: ons besef dat baie gemeenskappe gefrustreerd is deur die skynbare onvermoë van die polisie om met misdadigers af te reken.
tgt: we acknowledge many communities are frustrated by the apparent inability of the police to deal with criminals.

src: een van die mates wat ons onderneem het om die polisiemag se kapasiteit te vergroot is die werwing van n bykomende 12 000 polisiebeamptes.
tgt: among the measures we are taking to capacitate the police is the recruitment of an additional 12 000 additional police officers.

src: ons is ook besig om weer gemeenskapspolisiëringsforums regoor die land in te stel.
tgt: we are also reestablishing community policing forums across the country.

src: dié forums bring gemeenskappe en polisieverteenwoordigers byeen om plaaslike veiligheid te bevorder en die polisie aanspreeklik te hou.
tgt: these forums bring communities and police representatives together to improve local safety and hold police accountable.

src: met dié dat ons ons stryd teen misdaad verskerp, is daar geen regverdiging vir mense om die reg in eie hande te neem nie.
tgt: even as we intensify our fight against crime, there is no justification for people taking the law into their own hands.

src: ons besef dat onwettige migrasie n risiko vir suidafrika se sekuriteit, stabiliteit en ekonomiese vooruitgang behels.
tgt: at the same time, we recognise that illegal migration poses a risk to south africa’s security, stability and economic progress.

src: onwettige migrasie beïnvloed dienslewering en plaas bykomende druk op noodsaaklike dienste soos gesondheidsorg en onder wys.
tgt: illegal migration affects service delivery and places additional burdens on essential services such as health care and education.

src: soos enige onafhanklike nasie het ons die reg om beleide en maatreëls te implementeer om die integriteit van ons grense te waarborg, die regte van suidafrikaners te beskerm en aan te dring dat alle persone wat in die land woon wetlik die reg het om hier te wees.
tgt: like any sovereign nation, we have the right to implement policies and measures that guarantee the integrity of our borders, protect the rights of south africans and provide that all who reside in our borders have a legal right to be here.

src: die beheer van migrasie is die verantwoordelikheid van die regering.
tgt: controlling migration is the responsibility of government.

src: geen private landsburger mag die rol van die immigrasieof regstoepas singsowerhede inneem deur daarop aan te dring dat buitelandse burgers identifikasie verskaf nie.
tgt: no private citizen may assume the role of immigration or law enforcement authorities by demanding that foreign nationals produce identification.

src: kragtens artikel 41 van die wet op immigrasie kan slegs n polisielid of immigrasiebeampte iemand versoek om hulself as n lands burger, permanente inwo ner of buitelandse burger te identifiseer.
tgt: under section 41 of the immigration act, only a police member or immigration officer can ask someone to identify themselves as a citizen, permanent resident or foreign national.

src: indien dié beamptes vermoed, gebaseer op redelike gronde, dat die persoon onwettig in die land is, mag hulle aangehou word terwyl n ondersoek na hul status ingestel word.
tgt: if these officers believe, on reasonable grounds, that the person is in the country unlawfully, they may be detained while an investigation into their status is conducted.

src: die toepassing van migrasiewetgewing is vir die regering n prioriteit.
tgt: enforcement of migration legislation is a priority for government.

src: ons werk daaraan om te verseker dat daar met sindikate wat in samewerking met korrupte beamptes immigrasiebedrog pleeg, afgereken word.
tgt: we are working to ensure that syndicates perpetrating immigration fraud in collusion with corrupt officials are brought to book.

src: soos alle ander besighede, moet besighede wat deur buitelanders bedryf word die toepaslike wette nakom, waaronder gesondheidsen veiligheidsmaatreëls, alle vereiste permitte en lisensies hê asook die nodige belasting betaal.
tgt: like all other businesses, foreignowned businesses must obey the relevant laws, including health and safety regulations, have all the required permits and licences, and pay the necessary taxes.

src: ons is n demokrasie geskoei op die oppergesag van die gereg.
tgt: we are a democracy founded on the rule of law.

src: wetteloosheid gemik op buitelanders, met of sonder die nodige dokumente, sal nie geduld word nie.
tgt: acts of lawlessness directed at foreign nationals, whether they are documented or undocumented, cannot be tolerated.

src: operasie vulindlela baan die weg na groei vukuzenzele unnamed die suidafrikaanse ekonomie, soos enige ander ekonomie, kan nie sonder doeltreffende en mede dingende netwerknywerhede funksioneer nie, wat nog te sê van groei.
tgt: operation vulindlela is opening the path to growth vukuzenzele unnamed the south african economy, like any other economy, cannot function, let alone grow, without efficient and competitive network industries.

src: dié nywerhede – wat water, vervoer en telekommunikasie insluit – is die are waardeur die suurstof van die ekonomie vloei.
tgt: these industries – which include electricity, water, transport and telecommunications – are the arteries through which the oxygen of the economy runs.

src: strukturele probleme op dié gebiede is lank reeds as van die belangrikste beperkinge op suidafrika se ekonomiese groei uitgewys.
tgt: structural problems in these areas have long been cited as some of the main constraints on south africa’s economic growth.

src: ondoeltreffendheid en die hoë koste van netwerkdienste is n hindernis om sake in die land te doen.
tgt: inefficiency and the high cost of network services are an impediment to doing business in the country.

src: ons het operasie vulindlela in oktober 2020 op die been gebring om dié uitdagings aan te pak en die hoof te bied as n inisiatief van die presidensie en die nasionale tesourie om strukturele hervorming in dié netwerknywerhede te versnel.
tgt: to address and overcome these challenges, we set up operation vulindlela in october 2020 as an initiative of the presidency and national treasury to accelerate structural reforms in these network industries.

src: alhoewel die verantwoordelike departemente en entiteite dié hervormings aandryf, monitor en identifiseer operasie vulindlela uitdagings en blokkasies.
tgt: while the responsible government departments and entities drive these reforms, operation vulindlela monitors and identifies challenges and blockages.

src: dit fasiliteer, waar nodig, tegniese ondersteuning aan departemente.
tgt: where needed, it facilitates technical support to departments.

src: die onlangse kwartaallikse verslag gee n oorsig van operasie vulindlela en die departemente wat vir dié hervorming verantwoorde lik is, se vordering.
tgt: the recent quarterly report outlines the progress made by operation vulindlela and the departments responsible for these reforms.

src: ons fokus regoor die rege ring is op hervorming wat fundamenteel en transformerend is; wat die manier hoe ons ekonomie werk, hervorm.
tgt: across government, our focus is on reforms that are fundamental and transformative; that reshape the way our economy works.

src: dit behels die opveil van hoëaanvraagspektrum vir mobiele telekommunikasie, wat vir meer as 10 jaar vertraag, en uiteindelik in maart voltooi is.
tgt: this includes the auction of highdemand spectrum for mobile telecommunications, which was delayed for more than 10 years and finally completed in march.

src: die bekendstelling van nuwe spektrum sal konnektiwiteit verbeter en die koste van breëband afbring.
tgt: the release of new spectrum will improve connectivity and bring down broadband costs.

src: die totstandkoming, verlede jaar, van die nasionale haweowerheid as n aparte filiaalmaatskappy van trans net, is vir meer as 15 jaar vertraag.
tgt: the establishment of the national ports authority as a separate subsidiary of transnet last year had been delayed for more than 15 years.

src: dit was die nodige eerste stap tot die instaatstelling van die deelname van die privaat sektor en toenemende doeltreffendheid in ons haweterminale.
tgt: this was the necessary first step towards enabling private sector participation and increasing the efficiency of our port terminals.

src: ons het ook die blou druppel, groen druppelen geen druppelstelsel vir die eerste keer sedert 2014 heringestel om beter kontrole van water en die gehalte van afvalwaterbehandeling te verseker.
tgt: we have also reinstated the blue drop, green drop and no drop system for the first time since 2014 to ensure better monitoring of water and wastewater treatment quality.

src: ons het ook vir die eerste keer sedert 2014, n lys van kritiese vaardighede bygewerk en gepubliseer.
tgt: we have published an updated critical skills list, also for the first time since 2014. these are just some examples where, by focusing effort and attention on a limited number of priority reforms, this administration has been able to drive progress.

src: ons was ook deur middel van operasie vulindlela in staat om n meer gefokusde en holistiese benadering tot hervorming te volg, wat beter koördinering waar veelvoudige departemente en entiteite betrokke is, tot gevolg het.
tgt: through operation vulindlela, we have also been able to take a more focused and holistic approach to reforms, ensuring better coordination where multiple departments and entities are involved.

src: die beste voorbeeld hiervan is in die energiesektor waar n aantal belangrike hervormings wat onderling verbind is besig is om die manier te verander waarop ons elektrisiteit opwek en verbruik.
tgt: the best example of this is in the energy sector, where a number of important, interconnected reforms are underway to change the way that we generate and consume electricity.

src: mylpale behels die verhoging van die lisensiëringsdrempel vir nuwe opwekkingsprojekte tot 100mw, wat dié projekte in staat stel om aan die kragnetwerk te verbind en krag aan kliënte te verkoop.
tgt: milestones include the raising of the licensing threshold for new generation projects to 100mw, allowing these projects to connect to the grid and sell power to customers.

src: ons het die program vir die verkryging van hernubare krag van onafhanklike kragprodusente (reippp) laat herleef deur die opening van nuwe bodvensters.
tgt: we have revived the renewable energy independent power producer procurement programme through the opening of new bid windows.

src: veranderinge aan die regulasies oor nuwe opwekkingskapasiteit het munisipaliteite in staat gestel om krag vir die eerste keer onafhanklik te bekom en wetgewende hervorming sal uiteindelik oorsprong gee aan n nuwe kompeterende elektrisiteitsmark wat ondersteun word deur die publisering van die wysigingswetsontwerp op elektrisiteitsregulering en die werk wat gedoen word om die beleid op die prysvasstelling van elektrisiteit te wysig.
tgt: changes to the regulations on new generation capacity have allowed municipalities to procure power independently for the first time.

src: die proses van die ontbondeling van eskom is op koers waar die instansie sy sperdatum van desember 2021 vir die oprigting van n nasionale geleidingsmaatskappy sal haal.
tgt: the process of unbundling eskom is on track, with the entity meeting its december 2021 deadline for the establishment of a national transmission company.

src: ons hoop om die ontbondeling van eskom se opwekkingsen verspreidingsafdelings teen desember vanjaar te voltooi.
tgt: by december this year we hope to complete the unbundling of eskom’s generation and distribution divisions.

src: die kwartaallikse verslag lig n aantal ander belangrike prestasies uit, asook gebiede waar intensiewe werk tans aan die gang is.
tgt: the quarterly report highlights a number of other important achievements, as well as areas where intensive work is underway.

src: operasie vulindlela het in die watersektor tegniese ondersteuning aan die departement van water en sanitasie verleen om n ommekeerplan vir die toestaan van watergebruiks lisensies te implementeer, met die teiken om 80% van alle aansoeke binne 90 dae te verwerk.
tgt: in the water sector, operation vulindlela has been providing technical support to the department of water and sanitation to implement a turnaround plan for the granting of water use licences, with a target to process 80% of all applications within 90 days.

src: daar word ook tans werk gedoen om n nasionale waterhulpbroninfrastruk tuuragentskap op die been te bring wat beter bestuur van ons nasionale waterhulpbronne sal verseker.
tgt: work is also underway to establish a national water resources infrastructure agency that will ensure better management of our national water resources.

src: in die vervoersektor het ondoeltreffendheid in haween spoorvervoer ons vermoë om goedere uit te voer, ernstig geknou.
tgt: in the transport sector, inefficiencies in port and rail have severely affected our ability to export goods.

src: daar word tans werk gedoen om vennootskappe met privaat sektoroperateurs op te rig om in haweinfrastruktuur te belê en die bestuur van vraghouerterminale by die hawe van durban en ngqura, te verbeter.
tgt: work is underway to establish partnerships with private sector operators to invest in port infrastructure and improve the management of container terminals at the ports of durban and ngqura.

src: die witskrif oor die nasionale spoorbeleid wat in maart deur die kabinet goedgekeur is, gee n oorsig oor planne om spoorinfrastruktuur te laat herleef en maak derdepartytoegang tot die vragspoornetwerk moontlik.
tgt: the white paper on national rail policy, which was approved by cabinet in march, outlines plans to revitalise rail infrastructure and enables third party access to the freight rail network.

src: transnet freight rail is reeds besig om gleuwe vir private spooroperateurs op die netwerk beskikbaar te stel.
tgt: transnet freight rail is already in the process of making slots available for private rail operators on the network.

src: n ten volle werkende evisastelsel is in 14 lande bekendgestel, waaronder sommige van ons grootste toeristemarkte.
tgt: a fully operational evisa system has been launched in 14 countries, including some of our largest tourist markets.

src: beskerm jouself dié winter teen kovid19 allison cooper met suidafrika se kovid19gevalle aan die toeneem voor n vyfde vlaag wat voorspel is en die koue wintermaande om die draai, versoek die regering steeds die publiek om teen die virus ingeënt te word en op datum te bly met die ver sterkerdosisse.
tgt: protect yourself from covid19 before winter allison cooper with south africa’s covid19 cases increasing ahead of the predicted fifth wave and cold winter months around the corner, government continues to urge the public to get vaccinated against the virus and stay up to date with their booster shots.

src: volgens die minister van gesondheid, dr. joe phaahla, het suidafrika op 25 april n toename van 137% in nuwe kovid19gevalle, vergeleke met die vorige sewe dae, aangeteken wat hoofsaaklik deur n hoër infeksiekoers in gauteng, kwazulunatal en die weskaap aangedryf is.
tgt: according to health minister dr joe phaahla, on 25 april south africa recorded a 137% increase in new covid19 cases, compared with the previous seven days, driven mainly by higher rates of infection in gauteng, kwazulunatal and the western cape.

src: "kovid19 bly n bedreig ing en ons kan nie bekostig om alle voorkomingsmaatreëls te laat vaar nie," sê minister phaahla.
tgt: "covid19 remains a threat and we cannot afford to drop all prevention measures," said minister phaahla.

src: "ons versoek weereens almal wat nog nie ingeënt is nie, om na vore te kom en ingeënt te word.
tgt: "we again urge all those who are still not vaccinated to come forward and take the jab.

src: ons lê nog steeds onder 50% van volwassenes wat ten minste een inenting gehad het, en dit is nie goed nie.
tgt: we are still under 50% of adults with at least one jab and that’s not good.

src: ons versoek jong volwassenes om na vore te kom.
tgt: we urge young adults to come forward.

src: natuurlike immuniteit neem na n ruk af, en anders as n inenting, kan dit nie bespreek word nie.
tgt: natural immunity wanes after time and unlike vaccination, it cannot be booked.

src: ons pleit dat almal wat vir versterkerdosisse kwalifiseer, die geleentheid sal benut voordat dit hoogwin ter is," voeg hy by.
tgt: we urge all those who qualify for boosters to take the opportunity before deep winter," he added.

src: die weskaapse gesond heidsdepartement sê dat plaaslike en internasionale data bewys dat inenting teen kovid19 steeds die beste verdediging teen die virus is, soveel te meer vir mense wat n verswakte immuunstelsel het.
tgt: the western cape department of health says local and international data prove that vaccination against covid19 remains the best defence against the virus.

src: kovid19 gaan nie gou verdwyn nie.
tgt: covid19 will not go away anytime soon.

src: om dit te oorwin, moet ons dit uitroei deur te verseker dat so veel as moontlik mense ingeënt word en voortgaan om versterkerdosisse te kry, sê die departement.
tgt: to defeat it, we must eradicate it by ensuring that as many people as possible are vaccinated and continue to have their booster shots, the department said.

src: die vyfde vlaag al is kovid19gevalle aan die toeneem en verwag die land binnekort n vyfde vlaag, is dit nog nie bekend hoe erg dit gaan wees nie.
tgt: the fifth wave even though covid19 cases are increasing and the country is expecting to soon be in the fifth wave, it is not yet known how severe it will be.

src: "wat nog onseker is, is dat ons wetenskaplikes vir ons sê dat n nuwe vlaag gaan kom deur n nuwe variant met die naam pi, wat meer aansteeklik en weerstandig is sal moet wees, maar op hierdie stadium is dit nog net bevestig dat dit wat dominant is, subvariante van omikron, genaamd b.4 en b.5, is" sê phaahla.
tgt: "what is still uncertain is that our scientists tell us that a new wave will come through a new variant nicknamed pi, which will need to be more transmissible and escape immunity.

src: voorkom oordrag van virus jy kan help om die oordrag van kovid19 by te voorkom deur te verseker: dat jou kovid19inenting (waaronder ver sterkerdosisse) op datum is.
tgt: but, at this stage, what is confirmed to be dominant are subvariants of omicron called b.4 and b.5," said phaahla.

src: suidafrika se eerste veeartsenykundige verpleegsters kry graad allison cooper om een van die land se eerste veeartsenykundige verpleegsters te wees, is n droom wat waar geword het vir die randburgse inwoner, phumelela mthimkhulu (21), wat al sedert haar kinderdae passievol oor diere is.
tgt: south africa’s first veterinary nurses graduate allison cooper being one of the country’s first veterinary nurse graduates is a dream come true for randburg resident phumelela mthimkhulu (21), who has been passionate about animals since she was a child.

src: mthimkhulu het onlangs aan die universiteit van pre toria (up) gegradueer, wat die enigste opleidingsinstansie in sa met n baccalaureusgraad in veeartsenykundige verpleging is.
tgt: mthimkhulu recently graduated from the university of pretoria (up), the only veterinary training facility in sa, with a bachelor of veterinary nursing degree.

src: om te weet dat ek deel was van die eerste klas om die baccalaureusgraad te voltooi, wat jare geneem het om saamgestel te word, is n eer.
tgt: to know that i was part of the first class to do the bachelor’s degree, which has been years in the making, is an honour.

src: "ek is dankbaar vir die geleenthede en deure wat vir ons as verpleegsters gaan oopgaan om verder te studeer en in ons beroep te spesialiseer, wat voor heen baie moeilik was om te doen," sê sy.
tgt: "i’m grateful for the opportunities and doors that will open for us nurses to further our studies and specialise within our profession, which was hard to do in the past," she says.

src: tamarin fisher, die pre sident van die vereniging van veeartsenykundige ver pleegsters van suidafrika, sê dit is die grootste mylpaal in die beroep se geskiedenis van 42 jaar.
tgt: tamarin fisher, the pre sident of the veterinary nurses association of south africa, says this is the biggest milestone in the profession’s 42year history.

src: "die nuwe drie jaargraad sal aan gekwalifiseerde ver pleegsters die geleentheid bied om vir nagraadse kursusse in te skryf, wat hopelik sal kulmineer in die verkryging van n honneurs, meestersof phdgrade."
tgt: "the new threeyear degree will give qualified nurses the opportunity to enrol in postgraduate studies, which will hopefully culminate in the awarding of masters and phd degrees."

src: veeartse behandel diere se beserings en siektes op dieselfde wyse as wat n dokter gesondheidsorg aan mense verskaf.
tgt: veterinarians treat animals’ injuries and illnesses, similar to how a doctor provides health treatment for people.

src: veeartsenykundige verpleegsters is noodsaaklike rolspelers in n veearts se professionele span, sê mthimkhulu.
tgt: veterinary nurses are essential in vets’ professional teams, says mthimkhulu.

src: "sommige van die belangrikste gebiede waarop n verpleegster moet funksioneer, is pasiëntsorg, kommunikasie met kliënte, hulpverlening aan veeartse met prosedures en allerhande ander dinge wat daartoe bydra dat n veeartsenykundige hospitaal op sy beste funksioneer.
tgt: "some of the vital skills a nurse has to display are patient care, client communication, assisting veterinarians with procedures, and anything that will help the veterinary hospital to function at its best.

src: as jy n veeartsenykundige ver pleegster wil word, moet jy nie toelaat dat vrees of n gebrek aan kennis jou daar van weerhou om dit na te volg en te geniet nie, want dit sal jou lewe ten goede verander," sê mthimkhulu.
tgt: if you want to be a veterinary nurse, don’t allow fear or a lack of knowledge to deter you from trying it out and enjoying it because it will change your life for the better," says mthimkhulu.

src: beurse om die tekort aan vaardighede te verligomdat daar so n tekort aan vaardighede in dié sektor is, het mthimkhulu nie gesukkel om werk te kry nie.
tgt: bursaries to address skills shortagedue to a severe skills shortage in the sector, mthimkhulu didn’t battle to find a job.

src: "ek was gelukkig genoeg om in my finale jaar n werk by fourways dierehospitaal te kry.
tgt: "i was lucky enough to secure a job at fourways veterinary hospital during my final year.

src: ek het omtrent n maand na my finale eksamen daar begin werk en ek geniet elke oomblik daarvan," sê sy.
tgt: i started working there about a month after my final exams and i’ve been enjoying every moment of it," she says.

src: die onderwysen opleidingsgesagsliggaam vir die gesondheidsen welsynsektor (hwseta) is daartoe verbind om die ekstreme vaardigheidstekort in die veeartsenykundige sektor te verlig en transformasie te verseker.
tgt: the health and welfare sector education and training authority (hwseta) is committed to addressing the extreme skills shortage in the veterinary sector and ensuring transformation.

src: dié gesagsliggaam het onlangs n beroepsleidingsveldtog in die veeartsenykunde bekendgestel, in vennootskap met die departement van hoër onderwys en opleiding, en sal landelike skole besoek om leerders aan te moedig om veeartsenykundige dienste as n loopbaan te oorweeg.
tgt: it recently launched a veterinary science career guidance campaign, in partnership with the department of higher education and training, and will be visiting rural schools to encourage learners to consider veterinary services as a career path.

src: hy het ook 60 beurse bekendgestel om die kritieke tekort aan veeartse en paraveeartse in suidafrika se landelike gebiede te takel.
tgt: it also announced 60 bursaries to address the critical shortage of veterinarians and paraveterinarians in south africa’s rural areas.

src: "die beurse is spesifiek gemik op leerders in landelike gebiede, sodat hulle hulle kennis kan terugneem na hulle plekke van herkoms toe," sê dr. nom fundo mnisi, voorsitter van die hwseta.
tgt: "the bursaries are specifically aimed at learners in rural areas as they can take their knowledge back to their homesteads," says dr nomfundo mnisi, the chairperson of the hwseta.

src: die adjunkminister van hoër onderwys, weten skap en innovering, buti manamela, het die beurse verwelkom.
tgt: the deputy minister of higher education, science and innovation, buti manamela, welcomed the bursaries.

src: die up se fakulteit veearts enykunde sal die hwseta bystaan met sy bemarking, beursbefondsing en werwingsveldtogte.
tgt: the up’s faculty of vete rinary science will assist the hwseta in its marketing, bursary funding and recruitment campaigns.

src: "ons sal ook die hwseta bystaan met die administrasie van die beurse wat aan die eerstejaarstudente in veeartsenykundige uit die aangewese groepe toegeken is," sê chris van blerk, die hoof van kommunikasie en media aan die up se fakul teit veeartsenykunde.
tgt: "we will also assist the hwseta in administering the bursaries, which were allocated for firstyear veterinary science stu dents from the designated groups," says chris van blerk, the head of communications and media at up’s faculty of veterinary science.

src: hy sê dat jongmense wat in mthimkhulu se voetspore wil volg en vir n eerste baccalaureusgraad aan die up wil registreer, oor n nasionale senior sertifikaat (nss) of ekwivalente kwalifikasie moet beskik en aan die minimumvereistes moet voldoen.
tgt: he says youth hoping to follow in mthimkhulu’s footsteps and register for a first bachelor’s degree at up need to have completed their national senior certificate (nsc), or equivalent qualification, and meet minimum requirements.

src: "n minimum toelatingspunttelling van 28 en n nss met engels huistaal of engels eerste addi sionele taal, wiskunde, en natuurwetenskap of lewenswetenskap word benodig vir die baccalaureus in veeartsenykundige verpleging," het hy gesê.
tgt: "for the bachelor of veterinary nursing degree, they need a minimum admission point score of 28 and an nsc with english home language or english first additional language, mathematics, and physical sciences or life sciences," he adds.

src: die jeug kan, vir meer inligting oor die sektor, private veeartspraktyke kontak of met verpligte gemeenskapsdiensveeartse (ccsveeartse) praat wat landwyd deel uitmaak van die departement van landbou, grondhervorming en landelike ontwikkeling (dalrrd).
tgt: for more information about the sector, youth can contact private vete rinary practices or speak to compulsory community service (ccs) veterinarians which are part of the department of agriculture, land reform and rural development (dalrrd) around the country.

src: "die ccsprogram mik om toeganklike en bekostigbare veeartsenykundige dienste aan onderbediende en arm gebiede binne suidafrika te verskaf.
tgt: "the ccs programme aims to provide accessible and affordable veterinary services to underserved and poor resourced areas within south africa.

src: gaan haal jou bestuurderslisensiekaart vukuzenzele unnamed motoriste wat tussen oktober en desember verlede jaar aansoek gedoen het vir n nuwe bestuurderslisensiekaart of dit hernu het, of wat aansoek gedoen het vir n professio nele bestuurspermit (prdp), word dringend versoek om dit te gaan afhaal.
tgt: collect your driver's licence card vukuzenzele unnamed motorists who applied for a new or renewal driver’s licence card or professional driving permit (prdp) between october and december last year are being urged to collect them.

src: volgens die padverkeers bestuurkorporasie (rtmc) is slegs 42% van die 32 748 bestuurderslisensiekaarte wat in dié tyd vervaardig is, reeds afgehaal.
tgt: according to the road traffic management corporation (rtmc), only 42% of the 32 748 driver’s licence cards produced during this time have been collected.

src: die minister van vervoer, fikile mbalula, het verlede jaar die rtmclisensiëringsentrums in midrand en eco park geopen, na aan leiding van die agterstand in bestuurderslisensies, wat weens kovid19 verval het.
tgt: minister of transport fikile mbalula opened the rtmc licensing centres in midrand and eco park last year, in response to the backlog of expired driver’s licences due to covid19.

src: die driver’s licence card account wat die lisensies druk, werk onverpoos om die vervaardiging van kaarte te versnel en is op koers om die agterstand teen einde junie uit te wis. die rtmc sê dat mense die vordering van hulle aan soeke kan nagaan voordat hulle na die toetssentrums gaan om dit af te haal.
tgt: the driver’s licence card account, which prints the licences, is working around the clock to fasttrack production and remains on course to clear the backlog by the end of june.

src: dit kan per sms of aanlyn gedoen word.
tgt: this can be done by sms or online.

src: smsnavrae oor bestuurderslisensies om navraag te doen oor bestuurderslisensies, kan aansoekers hulle idnommer na 33214 sms.
tgt: driver’s licence sms query for a driver’s licence query, applicants can sms their id number to 33214. they will then receive one of the smses below: application received: the application was received, but has not yet been processed.

src: hulle sal dan een van onderstaande sms’e in engels ontvang: application received: the application was received, but has not yet been pro cessed.
tgt: production queue: the card is still being processed and manufactured.

src: production queue: the card is still being proces sed and manufactured.
tgt: produced and ready for collection: the card will be ready for collection in 21 days.

src: produced and ready for collection: the card will be ready for collection in 21 days.
tgt: however, due to the high number of cards being processed, the rtmc advises you to wait 35 days before going to collect.

src: problem card: there is a pro blem with the production of your card.
tgt: problem card: there is a problem with the production of your card.

src: please return to the testing centre.
tgt: please return to the testing centre.

src: vir n navraag oor jou prdpaansoek, sms jou idnommer na 44220. aanlyn navraag oor jou bestuurderslisensie jy kan ook die vordering van jou aansoek gratis aanlyn vasstel.
tgt: for a prdp application query, sms your id number to 44220. driver’s licence online query you can also determine the status of your application for free online.

src: besoek online.
tgt: visit online.

src: natis.
tgt: natis.

src: gov.
tgt: gov.

src: za.
tgt: za.

src: skep n profiel en teken aan.
tgt: create a profile and log in.

src: kliek op die status van jou aansoek op die paneelbord.
tgt: click the status of your application on the dashboard.

src: diegene wie se lisensie tussen maart 2020 en 31 augustus 2021 verstryk het en wat die hernuwingsperdatum van 5 mei misgeloop het, word aangeraai om n tydelike bestuurslisensie te kry wanneer jy aansoek doen om hernuwing om sodoende binne die wet te bly.
tgt: those whose licences expired between march 2020 and 31 august 2021, who missed the renewal deadline of 5 may, are advised to obtain a tempo rary driver’s licence when applying for their renewal to remain legally compliant.

src: die heropbou van lewens en lewensbestaan na die vloede vukuzenzele unnamed dit is byna twee maande sedert die swaar vloede chaos in dele van kwazulunatal, die ooskaap en noordkaap en grootskaalse lewensverlies en skade aan eiendom en infrastruktuur veroorsaak het.
tgt: rebuilding lives and livelihoods after the floods vukuzenzele unnamed it has been almost two months since heavy flooding wreaked havoc across parts of kwazulunatal, the eastern cape and north west, causing extensive loss of life and damage to property and infrastructure.

src: ek het onlangs besoek afgelê by ethekwini in kwazulunatal om sakelui in die stad te ontmoet om ondersteuning te bied aan hulle pogings om weer op die been te kom.
tgt: i recently visited ethekwini in kwazulunatal to meet with business people in the city to lend our support to their efforts to restore their operations.

src: toe dié natuurramp hulle getref het, was daar besorgdheid dat die owerhede nie die kapasiteit of die wil het om doeltreffend en gepas te reageer op die verskriklike situasie waarin die mense wat alles verloor het, hulle bevind nie.
tgt: when this natural disaster struck, there was some concern that authorities had neither the capacity nor the will to respond efficiently and effectively to the dire situation of those who had lost everything.

src: na my tweede besoek aan die stad sedert die oorstro mings plaasgevind het, is ek oortuig dat die besorgdheid misplaas was.
tgt: having paid my second visit to the city since the floods, i am clear that this concern was misplaced.

src: in kwazulunatal, so ook in die ooskaap en noordwes, is alle belanghebbendes hard aan die werk om van dié tragiese gebeure te herstel.
tgt: in kwazulunatal, as in the eastern cape and north west, all stakeholders have been hard at work to recover from these tragic events.

src: die nasionale rampbestuursentrum het sedertdien alle aspekte van die rege ring gekoördineer in hulle poging om humanitêre hulp te verleen aan die talle huishoudings wat geraak is.
tgt: the national disaster management centre has been coordinating all spheres of government in their efforts to provide humanitarian relief to the many households that have been affected.

src: dit was n plesier om te sien hoe die nieregerings organisasiegemeenskap, sakegemeenskap en noodlenigingsorganisasies by die regering aansluit om die broodnodige bystand te verleen.
tgt: it has been pleasing to see the nongovernmental organisation community, business and relief organisations joining in working with government to provide muchneeded relief assistance.

src: al dié belanghebbendes het voedsel, klere, kom berse, waardigheidspakkies en skooluniforms aan kwesbare gesinne verskaf om in hulle basiese behoeftes te voorsien.
tgt: all these stakeholders have provided food, clothes, blankets, dig nity packs and school uniforms to vulnerable families to meet their basic needs.

src: skuiling word tans voorsien aan meer as 7 000 mense in die vier distrikte in kwazulunatal wat die meeste geraak word.
tgt: sheltering services are currently being provided to over 7,000 people in the four most affected districts in kwazulunatal.

src: bouwerk aan tydelike wonings vir die geaffekteerde gesinne het begin en staatsgrond en grond is in kwazulunatal geïdentifiseer vir moontlike hervestiging.
tgt: work has started to build temporary residences for affected families on stateowned land parcels have been identified in kwazulunatal for possible resettlement.

src: die departement van binnelandse sake, asook die departement van gesondheid en die departement van maatskaplike ontwikkeling het die geaffekteerde gemeenskappe gehelp om toegang tot belangrike dienste te kry.
tgt: the departments of home affairs, health and social development have been assisting affected communities to access important services.

src: byvoorbeeld, mobiele eenhede help diegene wat kritiese dokumentasie in die oorstromings verloor het, om nuwe slim id’s te kry en om geboortesertifikate weer uit te reik.
tgt: for example, mobile units are helping those who lost critical documents in the floods to get new smart ids and to reissue birth certificates.

src: mobiele gesondheidsdienste, insluitend kovid19inentings, word voorsien aan mense in gebiede waar die fisiese aktiwiteite nog nie ten volle operasioneel is nie.
tgt: mobile health services, including covid19 vaccinations, are being provided to people in areas where the physical facilities are not yet fully operational.

src: meganismes is in plek gestel om die maatskaplike toelae aan die betrokke individue uit te betaal.
tgt: mechanisms are in place to pay out the social grants of affected indivi duals.

src: mobiele klaskamers word verkry sodat onderrig en leer nie langer as wat nodig is in die vloedgeteisterde skole onderbreek word nie.
tgt: mobile classrooms are being procured so that learning and teaching should not be interrupted for longer than necessary in floodaffected schools.

src: herstelwerk vind tans aan rioolwaterwerke, pompstasies en retikulering plaas.
tgt: work is underway to repair damaged waste water treatment works, pumpstations and reticulation.

src: paaie wat beskadig is, word herstel.
tgt: damaged roads are being repaired.

src: daar word agtien nuwe brûe beplan as deel van die welisizwe landelike brugprogram.
tgt: eighteen new bridges are planned as part of the welisizwe rural bridges programme.

src: daar is ook aansienlike vordering gemaak in die herstel van sleutelinfrastruktuur wat aan die durbanse hawe ondersteuning bied.
tgt: there has also been considerable progress in fixing key infrastructure supporting the port of durban.

src: gegewe die belangrikheid van die hawe vir die nasionale en kontinentale ekonomie, is haweverkeer herstel, terminaalaktiwiteit weer op vol kapasiteit en herstelwerk aan die beskadigde spoorinfrastruktuur is aan die gang.
tgt: given the importance of the port to the national and continental economy, port traffic has been restored, terminal operations are back at full capacity and work to repair damaged rail infrastructure is underway.

src: bykomende maatreëls word ook in plek gestel om finansiële ondersteuning te bied aan sowel groot as klein sakeondernemings wat in die nood is.
tgt: additional measures are being put in place to provide financial support to both big and small businesses in distress.

src: dit is dringend nodig sodat besighede in bedryf kan bly en poste behou word.
tgt: this is needed as a matter of urgency to ensure that businesses can stay afloat and that jobs can be sustained.

src: ons is al op verskillende stadiums in die geskiedenis van ons demokrasie gekonfronteer met gebeure en omstandighede wat die deursettingsvermoë van ons mense en die doeltreffendheid van ons instellings tot die uiterste beproef het.
tgt: at different times in our democracy’s history, we have been confronted with events and circumstances that have severely tested the resolve of our people and the effectiveness of our institutions.

src: ons het buitengewone meelewendheid en ondersteuning aan die geaffekteerde gemeenskappe in kwazulunatal, die ooskaap en noordwes gesien.
