tgt: we have seen extraor dinary solidarity and support to affected communities in kwazulunatal, eastern cape and north west.

src: munisipale en provinsiale regerings werk nou saam met nasionale departemente en agentskappe om mense in staat te stel om hulle lewens weer op te bou en die plaaslike ekonomie weer aan die gang te kry.
tgt: municipal and provincial governments have been working closely with national departments and agencies to enable people to rebuild their lives and to get local economic activity back on track.

src: swart ekonomiese bemagtiging n vereiste vir ontwikkeling vukuzenzele unnamed n mylpaaltransaksie vir swart ekonomiese bemagtiging is in april vanjaar in die ooskaap beklink.
tgt: black economic empowerment a must for growth vukuzenzele unnamed in april this year, a landmark broadbased black economic empowerment transaction was concluded in the eastern cape that significantly improves the participation of black womenowned businesses in the energy sector.

src: die transaksie sal die deelname van ondernemings wat deur swart vrouens besit word in die energiesektor beduidend verbeter.
tgt: a liquid bulk fuel terminal operated by bp southern africa in east london has been sold to wasaa, an independent petrochemicals company.

src: n grootmaatterminaal vir vloeistofbrandstof wat in ooslonden deur bp southern africa bedryf is, is aan die onafhanklike petrochemikalieëmaatskappy wasaa verkoop.
tgt: wasaa has acquired all the terminal’s moveable assets and a 20 percent share in berthtoterminal pipelines.

src: wasaa het die terminaal se roerende bates en n 20% aandeel in ankerpleknaterminaalpyplyne gekoop.
tgt: with the 2020 report by the broadbased black economic empowerment commission showing that most economic sectors are falling short of their black women ownership targets, this acquisition by a black and femaleowned company of a liquid fuel terminal is a historic development.

src: dié aanskaffing van n vloeistofbrandstofterminaal deur n maatskappy wat deur n swart vrou besit word, is n geskiedkundige ontwikkeling, met die kommissie oor breedgebaseerde swart ekonomiese bemagtiging (bgseb) se 2020verslag wat toon dat die meeste ekonomiese sektore tekortskiet in terme van hul teikens vir eienaarskap deur swart vrouens.
tgt: it contributes to our national effort to redress inequality and ensure there is meaningful participation by the country’s majority in our economy.

src: ek het onlangs die aanstelling van die nuwe adviesraad vir bgseb – bestaande uit die regering, sakelui, die arbeidsmag en ander belanghebbendes – aangekondig.
tgt: recently, i announced the appointment of the new broadbased black economic empowerment advisory council, which comprises government, business, labour and other stakeholders.

src: die adviesraad is gestig om die saak van ekonomiese transformasie voor te staan.
tgt: it was established to champion the cause of economic transformation.

src: die raad spruit uit n 2001verslag wat deur die bgsebkommissie saamge stel is.
tgt: the council has its origins in a 2001 report produced by the bee commission.

src: dié verslag is na aanleiding van n omvangryke studie oor die struktuur van die suidafrikaanse ekonomie en wat nodig is om die ekonomie te transformeer, swart entrepreneurskap te ontwikkel, meer swart bestuur en eienaarskap van ondernemings te verseker, en swart vrouens terug te bring na die hoofstroomekonomie toe.
tgt: this report emanated from an extensive study into the structure of the south african economy, and what was needed to transform the economy, grow black entrepreneurship, ensure greater black management and ownership of busines ses, and bring black women into the mainstream of the economy.

src: dit sal volgende jaar twee dekades wees sedert die wet op breedgebaseerde swart ekonomiese bemag tiging, wat die raad gevestig het, goedgekeur is.
tgt: next year, it will be two decades since the broadbased black economic empowerment (bbbee) act – which established the council – was passed.

src: ons is koersvas in ons toewyding om ekonomiese bemagtiging te verskans en te verdiep.
tgt: our commitment to entrench and deepen economic empowerment is unwavering.

src: dit is waarom swart ekonomiese bemagtiging n integrale deel van ons ekonomiese heropbou en herstel in die nasleep van die kovid19pandemie is.
tgt: that is why black economic empowerment is an integral part of our economic reconstruction and recovery in the wake of the covid19 pandemic.

src: dit is een van die gerusstellings wat vroeër dié maand duidelik teenoor die swart sakeraad uitgespreek is toe ons die stand van bgseb in die land, die vordering wat gemaak is en wat ons as sakegemeen skap moet doen om op ons vordering voort te bou, bespreek het.
tgt: this is one of the reassurances i articulated to the black business council earlier last month, where we discussed the state of bbbee in the country, the progress that has been made and what we need to do as a collective to build on our gains.

src: oor die afgelope twee dekades is daar beduidende vordering gemaak, alhoewel daar agteruitgang in sommige gebiede was.
tgt: while there has been significant progress over the last two decades, there are some areas where there has been regression.

src: ons het agteruitgegaan betreffende die vermeerdering van swart bestuursbeheer, die opskaling van vaardigheidsontwikkeling, die verskansing van ondernemingsontwikkeling en die verbreding van voorraadverkryging om aan swart vrouens en die jeug meer geleenthede te bied.
tgt: we have gone backwards when it comes to increasing black management control, upscaling skills development, entrenching enterprise deve lopment and broadening procurement to give opportunities to black women and the youth.

src: die apartheidsregering het opsetlik n verwronge ekonomie gebou wat ontwerp is om blankes te bevoordeel.
tgt: the apartheid government deliberately built a distorted economy designed to benefit white people.

src: die meerderheid suid afrikaners is gemarginaliseer in die hoofstroomekonomie, met swart entrepreneurs wat beperk is tot kleinhandelsakeondernemings in die townships.
tgt: the majority of south africans were marginalised from the mainstream economy, with black entrepreneurs confined to small retail industries in the townships.

src: swart eienaarskap van jsegelyste maatskappye was aan die einde van apartheid minder as 1%.
tgt: at the end of apartheid, black ownership of jselisted companies was less than 1 percent.

src: dié syfer het nie veel in die laaste 28 jaar verbeter nie.
tgt: this figure has not improved much in the past 28 years.

src: daar was ook, terselfdertyd, belangrike privaatsektorinisiatiewe en doelbewuste maatreëls deur die staat om groter en sinvoller deelname van swartmense in die ekonomie te fasiliteer.
tgt: at the same time, there have been important private sector initiatives and deliberate measures by the state to facilitate greater and more meaningful participation of black people in the economy.

src: nagenoeg 500 bemag tigingstransaksies is tussen 2017 en 2020 by die bgsebkommissie ingehandig vir registrasie.
tgt: between 2017 and 2020, nearly 500 empowerment transactions were submitted for registration to the bbbee commission.

src: swart eienaarskap het teikens oorskry in sleutelsektore soos die boubedryf, eiendom, inligtingen kommunikasietegnologie, toerisme en vervoer.
tgt: in key sectors such as construction, property, information and communications technology, tourism and transport, black ownership has exceeded targets.

src: ekonomiese transformasie en ekonomiese groei is vervleg.
tgt: economic transformation and economic growth are intertwined.

src: daar kan nie een sonder die ander wees nie.
tgt: there cannot be one without the other.

src: ons bevorder n meer inklusiewe ontwikkelingsmodel, deur transformasie in die industrialisasieproses te integreer, wat welvaart deel eerder as om dit op te hoop.
tgt: by integrating transformation into the process of industrialisation, we are advancing a more inclusive growth model that shares, rather than concentrates, wealth.

src: die departement van handel, nywerheid en mededinging (dhnm) streef dié doelwit na deur verskeie programme.
tgt: the department of trade, industry and competition (dtic) is pursuing this goal through various programmes.

src: dit behels n ondersteuningsprogram vir townshipondernemings, uitvoerverwante opleiding deur die nywerheids ontwikkelingskorporasie (nok) aan ondernemings wat deur swartmense, vrouens en die jeug besit word en verhoogde infrastruktuurbegroting aan kmmo’s in tshwane se spesiale ekonomiese sone.
tgt: they include a support programme for township businesses, exportrelated training by the industrial development corporation (idc) to black, women and youthowned businesses, and increased infrastructure budget to smmes in the tshwane special economic zone.

src: ons stuur lokalisering deur sektorale meesterplanne wat ondernemings wat deur swartmense besit word, bevoordeel.
tgt: through sectoral masterplans we are driving localisation that benefits black owned businesses.

src: byvoorbeeld is 10 swart kontrakteurtelers gevestig, met n belegging van r336 miljoen as deel van die pluimveemeesterplan.
tgt: for example, 10 black contract growers have been established with an investment of r336 million as part of the poultry masterplan.

src: die regering het ook n swart uitvoerdersnetwerk geloods wat ondernemings wat deur swartmense besit word in die sektore van voedsel, ingenieursweseprodukte, voertuigkomponente, skoonheidsprodukte en ander sektore van die ekonomie met mekaar verbind.
tgt: government has also launched a black exporters network that will connect blackowned companies in food, engineering products, auto components, beauty products and other sectors of the economy.

src: die regering het verlede jaar r2.5 miljard in nuwe ondersteuning aan ongeveer 180 swart nyweraars, in die vorm van lenings deur die nok en die nasionale bemagtigingsfonds (nbf), asook toelaes deur die dhnm se aansporingskema goedgekeur, as deel van ons veldtog om n nuwe generasie swart nyweraars te skep.
tgt: as part of our drive to create a new generation of black industrialists, last year government approved r2.5 billion in new support to about 180 black industrialists in the form of loans from the idc and national empowerment fund (nef) and grants from the dtic incentive scheme.

src: n verdere r12 miljard is oor die volgende drie jaar deur die nok, nbf en ander instansies belowe om swart nyweraars te ondersteun.
tgt: over the next three years a further r21 billion has been committed by the idc, nef and other institutions to support black industrialists.

src: n bykomende r25 miljard is belowe om maatskappye wat deur swartmense, vrouens, jeugdiges en werkers besit word, te ondersteun.
tgt: an additional r25 billion has been committed to support black, women, youth and workerowned companies.

src: dit is duidelik dat baie meer werk nog gedoen moet word om die vele uitdagings wat swart ondernemings in die gesig staar, aan te spreek.
tgt: it is clear that much more work needs to be done to address the many challenges that black businesses face.

src: dit behels die struikelblok van toegang tot aanvangsen uitbreidingskapitaal en die vermoë van kmmo’s om markte vir hulle produkte te kry.
tgt: this includes the difficulty of accessing startup and expansion capital and the ability of smmes to find markets for their products.

src: besighede wat deur swart vrouens besit word, sukkel in besonder wanneer grootskaalse bemagtigings transaksies onderneem word.
tgt: black womenowned businesses, in particular, encounter difficulties in taking on largescale empowerment transactions.

src: om die siklus van onderontwikkeling deur swart ekonomiese bemagtiging te verbreek, is nie net n morele opdrag nie; dit maak ook sakesin.
tgt: breaking the cycle of underdevelopment through black economic empowerment is not just a moral imperative; it also makes business sense.

src: die voortgesette uitsluiting van die swart meerderheid uit die hoofstroomekonomie beperk ekonomiese groei, wat uiteindelik alle sakelui beïnvloed.
tgt: the continued exclusion of the black majority from the economy’s mainstream constrains economic growth, which ultimately impacts all business.

src: die uitbreiding van die land se entrepreneursbasis is fundamenteel vir ontwikkeling.
tgt: expanding the country’s entrepreneurial base is fundamental to growth.

src: ons het n gedeelde verantwoordelikheid om die poging om bgseb te verskans aan te moedig omdat dit oor die uitwissing van ongelykheid gaan.
tgt: we have a shared responsibility to drive the effort to entrench bbbee because it is about eradicating inequality.

src: ongelyke ekonomieë kweek ongelyke samelewings en ongelyke samelewings ontwikkel en floreer nie.
tgt: unequal economies breed unequal societies, and unequal societies don’t grow and flourish.

src: dit is nie net verkeerd nie, maar ook onvolhoubaar vir ondernemings om hul bestuursen eienaarskapstrukture meestal blank of manlik te hou.
tgt: it is not only wrong, but also unsustainable, for businesses to keep their management and ownership structures mostly white or male.

src: dit is, per slot van rekening, die suidafrikaanse publiek wat die primêre verbruikers van hul goedere en dienste is.
tgt: it is, after all, the south african public that are the primary consumers of their goods and services.

src: dit behoort in die diversiteit van aanstellingsen bestuurspraktyke, in eienaarskap en in verkryging, weerspieël te word.
tgt: this should be reflected in diversity of hiring and management practices, in ownership and in procurement.

src: bgseb sal slegs bereik word deur vennootskap en n gedeelde toewyding aan transformasie.
tgt: broadbased black economic empowerment will only be achieved through partnership and a shared commitment to transformation.

src: veilige en wettige aborsies is gratis allison cooper daar is geen regverdiging vir vrouens om n onwettige en onveilige aborsiekliniek te besoek as hulle hul swanger skappe wil beëindig nie.
tgt: safe and legal abortion is free allison cooper there is no justification for women to use an illegal and unsafe abortion clinic if they want to end their pregnancy.

src: dit is volgens die adjunkminister van gesondheid, dr. sibongiseni dhlomo, wat verduidelik dat alle vrouens ingevolge die wet die reg het om hul swangerskappe tydens die eerste 12 weke gratis by n staatshospitaal of kliniek te beëindig.
tgt: this is according to deputy minister of health dr sibongiseni dhlomo, who explains that, by law, all women have the right to terminate their pregnancy, for free, at a government hospital or clinic during the first 12 weeks.

src: "dit kwel ons, as regeringsleiers, om te sien hoe ons mense veilige en gratis gesondheidsdienste verlaat, om welke rede ook al, om die laaste geld wat hulle nie het nie te betaal aan iemand wat hul lewens in gevaar stel.
tgt: "it pains us as government leaders to see our people leaving safe and free health services, for whatever reason, to go and spend the last money they don’t have to pay someone to put their life at risk.

src: daar is geen regver diging vir vrouens om n onwettige en onveilige aborsiekliniek te gebruik as hulle hul swanger skappe wil beëindig nie.
tgt: there is no justification for women to correct an unplanned pregnancy with illegal and unsafe aborting because we all make mistakes.

src: onwettige aborsie is nie die antwoord nie," sê dr. dhlomo.
tgt: illegal abortion is not an answer," says dr dhlomo.

src: die departement van gesondheid het 346 staatsgesondheidsfasiliteite wat dienste vir die veilige beëindiging van swangerskappe verskaf, voeg hy by.
tgt: the department of health has 346 public health facilities that provide safe termination of pregnancy services, he adds.

src: dié fasiliteite is in die ooskaap (46), vrystaat (16), gauteng (25), kwazulunatal (56), limpopo (54), mpumalanga (27), noordkaap (ses), noordwes (26) en weskaap (90) geleë.
tgt: these are located in the eastern cape (46), free state (16), gauteng (25), kwazulunatal (56), limpopo (54), mpumalanga (27), northern cape (six), north west (26) and western cape (90).

src: komplikasies van onwettige aborsies die waarnemende direkteur van moederen kindergesondheid by kwazulunatal se departement van gesondheid, phalanndwa muthuphei, sê dat vrouens heelwat komplikasies kan ervaar wanneer hulle n aborsie by n onwettige aborsie kliniek kry.
tgt: illegal abortion complications the acting director for maternal child and women’s health at the kwazulunatal department of health, phalanndwa muthuphei, says women can face many complications when having an abortion at an illegal abortion clinic.

src: "die onmiddellike komplikasies behels ernstige bloeding, die serviks wat skeur, ernstige skade aan die geslagsdele en buik, inwendige infeksie van die buik en bloedvergif tiging.
tgt: "the immediate complications include severe bleeding, tearing of the cervix, severe damage to the genitals and abdomen, internal infection of the abdomen and blood poisoning.

src: "vrouens kan oor die langtermyn n effens verhoogde vlak van onvrugbaarheid, n ektopiese swangerskap, n miskraam of voortydige geboorte of selfs die dood in die gesig staar," sê muthuphei.
tgt: "in the longterm, women could face a slightly increased risk of infertility, an ectopic pregnancy, a miscarriage or premature delivery or even death," says muthuphei.

src: "vrouens kan ook, as gevolg van n onveilige, onwettige aborsie emosioneel daaronder lei, waaronder posttrauma tiese stresversteuring, depressie en probleme met interpersoonlike verhoudings.
tgt: "women could also suffer emotional effects from an unsafe, illegal abortion, which include posttraumatic stress disorder, depression and problems with interpersonal relationships.

src: "onveilige aborsies kan ook n negatiewe sosioekonomiese impak vir vrouens, kinders, gesinne en gemeenskappe inhou," voeg sy by.
tgt: "unsafe abortions can also lead to negative socioeconomic impacts on women, children, families and communities," she adds.

src: wettige aborsiekeuses muthuphei sê dat vrouens wat hul swangerskappe wil beëindig, veilige en gratis keuses het om dit by staatshospitale en klinieke te doen.
tgt: legal abortion options muthuphei says women who want to end their pregnancy have safe and free options to do so at public clinics and hospitals.

src: "daar behoort n reeks metodes beskikbaar te wees wat deur n opgeleide en ervare doktor of professionele verpleër uitgevoer word," voeg sy by.
tgt: "a choice of methods should be available, all of which must be performed by a trained and experienced doctor or professional nurse," she adds.

src: die keuses, hetsy mediese of sjirurgiese aborsie, hang af van hoe gevorderd die vrou se swangerskap is.
tgt: the options, either medical or surgical abortion, depend on how far along the woman’s pregnancy is.

src: mediese aborsie, wanneer twee stelle pille toegedien word om die swangerskap te beëindig, kan tot en met nege weke gedoen word.
tgt: medical abortion, which involves taking two sets of pills to end the pregnancy, can be done up until nine weeks of pregnancy.

src: "die pasiënt sou dan die fetus tuis aborteer en nie by n kliniek of hospitaal nie," sê muthuphei.
tgt: "the patient would then abort the foetus at home and not at a clinic or hospital," says muthuphei.

src: sjirurgiese aborsies word deur n geregistreerde verpleër (tot en met 12 weke) of n mediese dokter (vanaf 12 tot 20 weke) uitgevoer.
tgt: surgical abortions are performed by a registered nurse (up to 12 weeks) or a doctor (from 12 to 20 weeks).

src: n aborsie kan ook, inge volge die wet op keuse oor die beëindiging van swangerskap, wetnr.
tgt: according to the choice on termination of pregnancy act no 92 of 1996 (the act), an abortion can also be performed from 13 to 20 weeks if a doctor, after consultation with a pregnant woman, believes that: the continued pregnancy poses an injury risk to the woman’s physical or mental health.

src: 92 van 1996 (die wet), vanaf 13 tot 20 weke uitgevoer word as n dokter, in oorleg met n swanger vrou, glo dat: die voortgesette swangerskap n beseringsrisiko vir die vrou se fisiese of geestelike gesondheid inhou.
tgt: there’s a substantial risk that the foetus would suffer from a severe physical or mental abnormality.

src: die swangerskap voortspruit uit verkragting of bloedskande.
tgt: the pregnancy resulted from rape or incest.

src: die voortgesette swangerskap die vrou se maatskaplike of ekonomiese omstandighede beduidend sal beïnvloed.
tgt: the continued pregnancy would significantly affect the woman’s social or economic circumstances.

src: n aborsie kan ook na die 20ste week plaasvind as n dokter, in oorleg met n geregistreerde vroedvrou, glo dat die voortgesette swangerskap die vrou se lewe in gevaar sou stel, tot wanvorming van die fetus sou lei of die risiko van besering aan die fetus sou inhou.
tgt: an abortion can also take place after the 20th week if a doctor, after consultation with a registered midwife, believes that the continued pregnancy would endanger the woman’s life, result in a severe malformation of the foetus or pose a risk of injury to the foetus.

src: alle vrouens, selfs al is hulle onder die ouderdom van 18 en dus minderjarig, het ingevolge die wet die reg om n swangerskap te beëindig.
tgt: according to the act, all women, even if they are a minor under the age of 18, have the right to terminate a pregnancy.

src: hulle benodig nie hul ouers of voog se toestemming nie.
tgt: they do not need permission from their parents or guardian.

src: stygende lewenskoste vereis n verenigde reaksie suidafrikaners is oor die laaste paar maande hard geslaan deur skerp prysstygings wat hul lewenskwaliteit dramaties beïnvloed het.
tgt: rising cost of living calls for a united response over the past few months, south african consumers have been hit by steep price increases that have dramatically affected their quality of life.

src: dit word toenemend duurder om kos en ander noodsaaklikhede te koop, vir basiese dienste te betaal en van openbare en private vervoer gebruik te maak.
tgt: it has become increasingly more expensive to buy food and other essentials, to pay for basic services and to use public or private transportation.

src: alhoewel dié stygende koste almal affekteer, raak dit laeinkomstehuishoudings die meeste.
tgt: while these rising costs affect everyone, lowincome households are feeling them the most.

src: die jongste verbruikersprysindeks vir april 2022 wat deur statistiek suid afrika gepubliseer is, toon dat daar min verligting vir vuisvoos suidafrikaners is.
tgt: the latest consumer price index for april 2022 published by stats sa shows there has been little respite for hardpressed south africans.

src: voedselinflasie staan op 6,2%.
tgt: food inflation was recorded at 6.2 per cent.

src: die mees basiese voedselsoorte kos meer as n jaar gelede, met stapelvoedsel soos kookolie wat die meeste gestyg het.
tgt: the most basic foodstuffs cost more than a year ago, with staples like cooking oil recording the highest increases.

src: die prys van brandstof, wat omtrent alle ander produkte beïnvloed, het in die twaalf maande tot maart 2022 met n derde gestyg.
tgt: the price of fuel, which affects the price of almost everything else, has risen by a third in the twelve months to march 2022. south africa is not alone in this regard.

src: n onlangse opname vir die wêreldekonomiese forum wat gepubliseer is, toon dat ongeveer ’n kwart van alle mense wêreldwyd, waaronder diegene in ontwikkelde ekonomieë, finansieel sukkel weens stygende pryse.
tgt: a recently published poll for the world economic forum shows that nearly a quarter of people globally, including those in developed economies, are struggling financially due to rising prices.

src: dié styging in pryse, veral die prys van brandstof, is die gevolg van gebeure waaroor ons baie min beheer het.
tgt: these increases, particularly the price of fuel, are the consequence of events over which we have little control.

src: die voortgaande konflik tussen rusland en die oekraïne het n beduidende impak op die prys van brandstof en voedsel gehad.
tgt: the ongoing conflict between russia and ukraine has had a significant impact on the price of fuel and food.

src: beide lande is groot uitvoerders na internasionale markte van kunsmis, graan en oliesade wat nodig is n vir hele reeks produkte, waaronder kookolie.
tgt: both countries are major exporters to international markets of fertilisers, grains and oilseeds that are needed for a range of items such as cooking oil.

src: nog n faktor is laer landbouuitsette weens ekstreme weerstoestande wat veroorsaak is deur klimaatsverandering, waaronder oorstromings en droogte.
tgt: another factor is lower agricultural output due to extreme weather events caused by climate change, such as flooding and droughts.

src: terwyl baie van dié gebeure buite ons beheer is, doen die regering alles wat hy kan om suidafrikaners teen huidige en toekomstige prysstygings te beskerm.
tgt: while many of these events are beyond our control, government is doing what it can to shield the south african from current and future price increases.

src: een van die voordele vir ons as n land, is n sterk, onafhanklike reserwebank wat daarin kon slaag om inflasie binne n nou teikenreeks te hou – heelwat laer as wat baie ander lande kon regkry.
tgt: one of our greatest advantages as a country is a strong, independent reserve bank that has managed to keep inflation within a narrow target range, well below what many other countries are experiencing.

src: ons het onlangs aangekondig dat die brandstofheffing vir nog twee maande tot augustus opgehef sal word, wat n mate van verligting vir huishoudings sal bring.
tgt: we recently announced that the fuel levy will be suspended for another two months to august, which will bring some relief to households.

src: die opheffing van die brandstofheffing het noodsaaklike verligting aan suidafrikaners gebring sedert dit in april ingestel is.
tgt: the suspension of the levy has provided essential relief to south africans since it began in april.

src: aangesien die opheffing van die brandstofheffing n beduiende koste vir die staatskas inhou, wat weer ander regeringsprogramme beïnvloed, sal dit moeilik wees om onbepaald daarmee voort te gaan.
tgt: since the suspension of the levy comes at a significant cost to public finances, which affects other programmes of government, it will be difficult to continue this indefinitely.

src: daar is egter ander goed wat ons kan doen.
tgt: there are, however, other things we can do.

src: die verbetering van ons land se voedselsekerheid is noodsaaklik om die huidige en toekomstige skokke die hoof te bied.
tgt: improving our nation’s food security is vital to withstanding this and future shocks.

src: ons het n sterk landbousektor wat voortdurend groei en werk skep.
tgt: we have a strong agricultural sector that continues to grow and create jobs.

src: om landbouproduksie nog meer te laat toeneem en ons voedselonafhanklikheid te versterk, is ons besig om op grootskaal te belê in die verbetering van ons plaaslike kapasiteit, om kommersiële en kleinboere te ondersteun en om meer mense te help om hulle eie voedsel te kweek.
tgt: to further increase agricultural production and strengthen our food sovereignty, we are investing heavily in improving local capacity, supporting commercial and smallscale farmers alike and helping more people to grow their own food.

src: insetbewyse is deur die presidensiële indiensnemingstimulus aan meer as 65 000 kleinboere gegee, en werk word tans gedoen om 250 000 sodanige boere te bereik.
tgt: through the presidential employment stimulus, input vouchers have been given to over 65,000 smallholder farmers, and work is underway to reach 250,000 such farmers.

src: die regering voorsien ook kunsmis en toerusting aan bestaansboere om voedsel te produseer, en help groepe en individue om hulle eie groentetuine te begin.
tgt: government is also providing subsistence farmers with fertilisers and equipment to produce food, and helping groups or individuals to start their own food gardens.

src: in provinsies soos noordwes word kleinboere ondersteun deur "landboubeginnerspakkette" bestaande uit saailinge en pluimvee, in vennootskap met plaaslike landboukolleges.
tgt: in provinces like north west, smallscale farmers are supported with agricultural ‘starterpacks’ of seedlings and poultry, in partnership with local agricultural colleges.

src: deur middel van die proaktiewe grondverkrygingstrategie en die vrystelling van grond in staatsbesit vir landbou, ondersteun ons meer kleinboere om hulle besighede uit te brei en kommersieel suksesvol te maak.
tgt: through the proactive land acquisition strategy and the release of stateowned land for agriculture, we are supporting more smallscale farmers to expand their businesses and make them commercially successful.

src: ons fokus ook daarop om meer staatprivaat vennootskappe te vestig om die uitbreiding van swart kommersiële boerderye te ondersteun deur inisiatiewe soos die partners in agri land solutions en die landbouontwikkelingsagentskap.
tgt: we are also focusing on establishing more publicprivate partnerships to support the expansion of black commercial farming through initiatives like the partners in agri land solutions and the agricultural development agency.

src: ons is besig om ons maatreëls vir die vervoer van diere op te skerp en ons vermoë om entstowwe te vervaardiging, uit te brei, om biosekuriteit te bevorder en dieregesondheid teen siektes soos bekenklouseer, te beskerm.
tgt: to enhance biosecurity and safeguard animal health against diseases like footandmouth, we are strengthening our animal movement control measures and vaccine production capabilities.

src: behalwe om die plaaslike vervaardiging van voedselproduksie n hupstoot te gee, help ons ook die armes teen prysstygings beskerm deur ons omvattende maatskaplike toelaagstelsel en die nulgradering van basiese goedere.
tgt: in addition to boosting local food production, our extensive social grants system and zerorating of basic goods helps to protect the poor from rising costs.

src: ons kan, deur middel van gratis basiese dienste soos water en elektrisiteit vir behoeftige huishoudings, seker maak dat geen gesin sonder basiese dienste is nie.
tgt: through free basic services like water and electricity for indigent households, we can ensure that no family goes without basic services.

src: om deur dié moeilike tydperk te kom, moet die hele samelewing betrokke raak.
tgt: to get through this difficult period, all of society should get involved.

src: wat die regering betref, sal ons voortgaan om die situasie fyn dop te hou en alles binne ons vermoë doen om suidafrikaners teen die onvolhoubare styging in lewenskoste te beskerm.
tgt: for our part, government will continue to monitor the situation closely and will do everything within its power to protect south africans from unsustainable increases in the cost of living.

src: korporatiewe suidafrika behoort seker te maak dat verbruikers nie meer as wat nodig is vir voedsel betaal nie.
tgt: corporate south africa should ensure that consumers do not pay more for food than they have to.

src: ons verwelkom die aanduiding van voedselvervaardigers en kleinhandelaars dat hulle besig is om maatreëls in plek te stel om verbruikers te help om meer waarde vir hulle geld te kry.
tgt: we welcome the indications from food manufacturers and retailers that they are putting measures in place to help consumers get more for their money.

src: mededingingskommissie het in maart vanjaar, die opdrag vir publieke kommentaar vir n markondersoek na die varsproduktemark bekendgestel.
tgt: in march this year the competition commission released for public comment the terms of reference for a market enquiry into the fresh produce market.

src: hulle het waargeneem dat die koste van vars produkte bly toeneem het teen vlakke bo inflasie, en dat dit n disproporsionele uitwerking op die armes gehad het.
tgt: it noted that the cost of fresh produce has been increasing at aboveinflation levels, and that this has had a disproportionate effect on the poor.

src: die ondersoek sal vasstel of daar enige afwykings in die waardeketting is wat voedsel duurder maak.
tgt: the inquiry will examine if there are any distortions in the value chain that make food more expensive.

src: ons sal ons mededingingsbeleid aanwend om verbruikers teen onregverdige prysverhogings en onmededingende praktyke deur besighede te beskerm, soos wat ons tydens die kovid19 pandemie gedoen het.
tgt: we will use our competition policy to protect consumers against unjustifiable price increases and anticompetitive practices by businesses, as we did during the covid19 pandemic.

src: die misbruik van kindertoelae is onwettig more matshediso as jy weet dat die kindertoelaag wat deur n versorger ontvang word, misbruik word, het jy die verantwoordelikheid om die saak by die suidafrikaanse agentskap vir maatskaplike sekerheid (sassa) aan te meld.
tgt: child support grant misuse is illegal more matshediso if you are aware that the child support grant received by a caregiver is being misused, you have the responsibility to report the matter to the south african social security agency (sassa).

src: volgens die woordvoerder van sassa, paseka letsatsi, word die kindertoelae aan die sorggewer betaal, maar is bedoel vir die versorging van die kind.
tgt: according to sassa spokesperson paseka letsatsi, the child support grant is paid to the caregiver, but is intended for the care of the child.

src: die toelaag is tans r480 per maand per kind.
tgt: the grant is currently r480 per month per child.

src: die kindertoelaag is deur die regering ingestel om finansiële ondersteuning te bied aan kinders wat in arm huishoudings grootword.
tgt: the child support grant was introduced by government to provide financial support to children who live in poor households.

src: "sodra misbruik aangemeld word, word daar n ondersoek geloods.
tgt: "as soon as misuse is reported, an investigation is undertaken.

src: indien die ondersoek bevind dat die geld nie tot voordeel van die kind dien nie, kan sassa iemand anders aanwys om die toelae namens die kind te ontvang en te administreer," sê letsatsi.
tgt: if the investigation finds that the money received does not benefit the child, sassa may appoint someone else to receive and administer the grant on behalf of the child," says letsatsi.

src: hy voeg by dat dit van kritieke belang is dat die primêre versorger wat werklik op n dagtotdagbasis na die kind omsien, die geregistreerde beguns tigde is.
tgt: he adds that it is critical that the primary caregiver, who actually cares for the child on a daytoday basis, is the registered beneficiary.

src: "in die geval waar n kind van een versorger na n ander oorgeplaas word, is die toelaag veronderstel om die kind te volg.
tgt: "in an instance where a child moves from one caregiver to another, the grant is supposed to follow the child.

src: daar word van die oorspronklike versorger verwag om aan sassa te rapporteer dat die kind nie meer in sy/ haar sorg is nie, en die nuwe primêre versorger moet dan inkom om vir die toelaag aansoek te doen," sê letsatsi.
tgt: the original caregiver is expected to report to sassa that the child is no longer in his/her care, and the new primary caregiver must then come in to apply for the grant," adds letsatsi.

src: letsatsi sê dat daar van mense wat voortgaan om die kindertoelae te ontvang nadat die kinders nie meer in hulle sorg is nie, verwag sal word om die bedrag wat hulle sodoende wederregtelik ontvang het, terug te betaal.
tgt: letsatsi says people who continue to receive child support grants after the children are no longer in their care, will be required to repay the amount received unlawfully.

src: hulle kan ook krimineel vervolg word as daar bewys kan word dat hulle die staat opsetlik bedrieg het.
tgt: they may also be subject to criminal prosecution if the intention to defraud the state can be confirmed.

src: dieselfde gevolge is van toepassing op mense wat die afhanklikheidstoelae misbruik — wat toegeken word deur sassa om finansiële ondersteuning te bied aan kinders met ernstige gestremdhede wat voltydse sorg vereis, ongeskiktheidstoelae of ouderdomstoelae.
tgt: the same consequences apply to people who misuse care dependency grants – which are given by sassa to provide financial support to children with severe disabilities who require fulltime care, disability grants or older persons grants.

src: "indien die geld gebruik word vir alkohol, dwelms of dobbelary, en nie vir die onderhoud van die persoon wat vir die toelaag kwalifiseer nie, behoort dieselfde proses gevolg te word," sê letsatsi.
tgt: "if the money is used for alcohol, drugs or gambling, and not for the support of the person who qualifies for the grant, the same process of reporting should be followed," says letsatsi.

src: wie kan vir die kindertoelaag aansoek doen?
tgt: who can apply for child support grant?

src: volgens letsatsi, kan enige suidafrikaanse burger, iemand met permanente verblyfreg, of gedokumenteerde vlugteling wat vir n kind sorg — of dit sy of haar biologiese kind is of nie — aansoek doen vir n kindertoelaag op voorwaarde dat hy of sy aan onderstaande kriteria voldoen: die kind en versorger moet permanent in suidafrika woon.
tgt: according to letsatsi, any south african citizen, permanent resident or documented refugee who cares for a child, whether or not that child is his or her biological child, may apply for a child support grant, provided he/she meets the criteria listed below: the child and caregiver must live permanently in south africa.

src: die versorger moet 16 jaar oud wees (in die geval van kinderhoof huishoudings) of ouer.
tgt: the caregiver must be 16 years of age (in the case of childheaded households) or older.

src: die kind moet jonger as 18 wees.
tgt: the child must be younger than 18. the grant recipient must be the child’s primary caregiver and the child must live with him/her.

src: ons nasie rou oor die verlies van jong lewens in die enyobeni tavernetragedie vukuzenzele unnamed die gesinne in n township in scenery park buite ooslonden het n paar weke gelede die nuus ontvang waarteen elke ouer bid.
tgt: our nation mourns the young lives lost in enyobeni tavern tragedy vukuzenzele unnamed a few weeks ago the families of a township in scenery park outside east london, received news that every parent prays they never get to hear.

src: hulle is ingelig dat 21 van hul kinders dood gevind is in n taverne.
tgt: they were told that 21 of their children had been found dead, in a tavern.

src: die jongste was slegs 13 jaar oud.
tgt: the youngest child was only 13 years old.

src: die polisieondersoek na die tragedie is onderweg.
tgt: the police investigation into the tragedy is proceeding apace.

src: as deel van die ondersoek bepaal die buffalo city metro tans of die taverne enige munisipale regulasies oortree het.
tgt: flowing from the investigations, the buffalo city metro is looking into whether the tavern violated any municipal regulations.

src: ons gedagtes en gebede is met die gesinne wat sukkel om sin te maak van die onbeskryflike skok.
tgt: our thoughts and prayers are with the families who are struggling to come to terms with this unspeakable horror.

src: ons loof die ooskaapse provinsiale regering vir die ondersteuning wat hulle aan die gesinne verleen asook avbob wat hulself daartoe verbind het om die gesinne met die begrafnisse by te staan.
tgt: we commend the eastern cape provincial government for assisting the affected families, as well as avbob that has pledged to assist the families with the burials.

src: daar is, selfs terwyl die betrokke owerhede agter die kap van die byl kom oor wat gebeur het sodat geregtigheid vir die slagoffers kan geskied, n gesprek wat ons as land dringend moet voer.
tgt: even as the relevant authorities deconstruct what happened to ensure there is justice for the victims, there is a conversation we do need to have as a country.

src: dit is die probleem van minderjarige alkoholverbruik.
tgt: it is the problem of underage drinking.

src: die videoopnames en beelde wat aanlyn versprei is van die sogenaamde "pens down"partytjie wat daardie aand by die taverne gehou is, toon luidrugtige jongmense wat met bottels alkohol rondkuier.
tgt: the footage and images posted online of the socalled ‘pens down’ party at the venue that night show revelling youngsters clutching bottles of alcohol.

src: baie van diegene in die foto’s lyk skaars ouer as tieners.
tgt: many of those in the images look barely out of their teens.

src: n aantal jongmense van scenery park het aan die media vertel dat hulle n plasing op sosiale media gesien het wat gratis rondtes alkohol aan almal bied wat die partytjie die aand sou bywoon.
tgt: a number of young people from scenery park have told the media of having seen a post circulated on social media, offering free rounds of alcohol to all who attended the event that night.

src: die verhoogde maatskaplike aanvaarbaarheid van jongmense wat alkohol gebruik het ontaard in n ernstige probleem in n land waar die meerderheid van die bevolking wat alkohol verbruik reeds deur die wêreldgesondheidorganisasie as fuifdrinkers ( "binge drinkers") geklassifiseer word.
tgt: the increased social acceptability of young people drinking alcohol has become a serious problem in a country where the majority of the drinking population are already classified by the world health organization as binge drinkers.

src: alkoholverbruik onder adolessente gaan gepaard met verswakte funksionering, afwesigheid in skole, alkoholverwante beserings, selfmoordgedagtes en pogings asook waaghalsige gedrag.
tgt: alcohol use amongst adolescents is associated with impaired function, absenteeism from learning, alcoholrelated injuries, suicidal thoughts and attempts, and risky behaviour.

src: ons moet saamstaan teen dié misdryf wat ons jongmense van die beste jare van hul lewens beroof en hulle ontvanklik maak vir alkoholverslawing.
tgt: we must come together to combat this vice that is robbing our young people of the best years of their lives, and making them susceptible to alcohol addiction.

src: as gesinne beteken dit dat daar oop en eerlike gesprekke oor die gebruik van alkohol en die stel van perke gevoer moet word.
tgt: as families it means having open and frank conversations about alcohol and setting boundaries.

src: kinders onder die ouderdom van 18 wat alkohol gebruik is teen die wet.
tgt: children under the age of 18 consuming alcohol is against the law.

src: ons moet, as volwassenes, onsself weerhou van die gebruik om minderjariges te stuur om alkohol vir ons te gaan koop en weier om namens dié jongmense alkohol te koop.
tgt: as adults we should refrain from practices such as sending minors to buy alcohol for us or capitulating to requests to buy these young people alcohol.

src: dit is nie die eerste keer wat ons te staan kom voor tragiese gebeure soos wat laasweek in scenery park plaasgevind het.
tgt: it is not the first time we have been confronted with tragic events such as what happened in scenery park last week.

src: die enyobenitaverne, die throbnagklubramp in durban in 2000 en die osi’stavernetragedie in khayelitsha in 2015 het een ding in gemeen — dié kuierplekke het drank aan minderjariges verkoop.
tgt: a common denominator between enyobeni tavern, the throb nightclub disaster in durban in 2000, and the osi’s tavern tragedy in khayelitsha in 2015, is that these establishments were selling liquor to minors.

src: die vervuiling van kuierplekke en drankwinkels wat die wet openlik tart toon duidelik hoe die owerhede daarin faal om regulasies af te dwing.
tgt: the proliferation of establishments openly flouting the law points to failings on the part of authorities to enforce regulations.

src: eienaars van ondernemings met dranklisensies mag, ingevolge die nasionale drankwet, geensins alkohol aan enige persoon onder die ouderdom van 18 verkoop nie.
tgt: under the national liquor act, owners of establishments with liquor licenses may not sell alcohol to anyone under the age of 18. they must also take reasonable steps to ensure anyone they are selling alcohol to is of age.

src: hulle moet ook redelike stappe neem om te verseker dat enige persoon waaraan hulle alkohol verkoop, mondig is.
tgt: we call on communities to work with authorities to ensure that taverns, shebeens, entertainment venues and outlets breaking the law face the consequences.

src: ons doen n beroep op gemeenskappe om saam met die owerhede te werk om te verseker dat tavernes, sjebiens, vermaaklikheidsplekke en verkooppunte wat dié wette oortree, die gevolge daarvan dra.
tgt: we call upon our police to step up the enforcement of laws that prohibit the sale of alcohol close to schools and enhance monitoring of outlets to ensure alcohol is not being sold to minors.

src: ons doen n beroep op ons polisie om strenger op te tree in die toepassing van wetgewing wat die verkoop van alkohol naby skole verban asook om sulke verkoopspunte fyn te monitor om te verseker dat alkohol nie aan minderjariges verkoop word nie.
tgt: another reality is that alcohol is a form of escapism for young people in communities were opportunities for safe and ageappropriate recreation are few.

src: die scenery parkgemeenskap het die gebrek aan sport, leer en ander ontwikkelingsfasiliteite vir jongmense uitgewys, wat lei tot gedrag van kroegkruip ("tavern hopping").
tgt: the scenery park community has pointed to the lack of sports, learning and other developmental facilities for young people, leading them to resort to ‘tavern hopping’.

src: die gemeenskap het, na die tragedie, die gebrek aan bruikbare sportsgronde, gemeenskapbiblioteke of jeugsentrums in scenery park uitgewys.
tgt: in the wake of the tragedy, the community has pointed out that there are no viable sports grounds, community libraries or youth centres in scenery park.

src: ons moet, as regering op nasionale, provinsiale en plaaslike vlak op die pleidooi van dié gemeenskap en dié van ander gemeenskappe reageer deur meer ruimtes vir ontspanning, fasiliteite, programme en projekte vir ons jongmense in minderbevoorregte gebiede in die provinsie te ontwikkel.
tgt: as government at national, provincial and local level we need to respond to the pleas of this community and those of other communities by developing more recreational spaces, facilities, programmes, and projects for our young people in disadvantaged areas in the province.

src: ander maatskaplike vennote soos sakelui behoort ook bystand te verleen in die vorm van borgskappe.
tgt: other social partners such as the business community should also assist with sponsorship.

src: as gemeenskappe moet ons in samewerking met ons gemeenskapspolisiëringsforums, ons burgerlike organisasies en skoolbeheerliggame tree en n meer aktiewe rol in die lewens van ons kinders en om hul veiligheid en welstand te verseker, speel.
tgt: as communities we must work with our community policing forums, with our civics organisations and with our school governing bodies and play a more active role in the lives of our children and in ensuring their safety and wellbeing.

src: aappokke in suidafrika vukuzenzele unnamed die minister van gesondheid, dr. joe phaahla, het tydens n onlangse perskonferensie in pretoria, gauteng, bevestig dat aappokke in suidafrika bespeur is.
tgt: monkeypox in south africa vukuzenzele unnamed health health minister dr joe phaahla has confirmed that monkeypox has been detected in south africa during a recent media briefing in pretoria, gauteng.

src: hy het gesê dat hy n verslag ontvang het van die nasionale gesondheidslaboratoriumdienste (ngld) waarin die voorkoms van aappokke in suidafrika deur middel van laboratoriumtoetse bevestig is.
tgt: he said he received a report from the national health laboratory services (nhls) that they have confirmed monkeypox in south africa through laboratory tests.

src: die virus is in gauteng en in die weskaap bespeur.
tgt: the virus has been detected in gauteng and the western cape.

src: aappokke is gewoonlik n mildelike siekte wat blase of sere op die vel veroorsaak.
tgt: monkeypox is usually a mild disease manifesting as blisters or sores on the skin.

src: dit is gewoonlik nie baie ernstig nie en is dodelik in ongeveer 1% van alle gevalle.
tgt: it is usually mild and with a fatality rate of 1 percent.

src: die siekte is voorheen in die vroeë2000’s in afrikalande soos nigerië, die demokratiese republiek van die kongo, die sentraalafrikaanse republiek en ghana gerapporteer.
tgt: the disease has previously been reported in african countries such as nigeria, democratic republic of the congo, central african republic and ghana in the early 2000s.

src: die huidige uitbraak word oorheers deur hoë syfers in europa, met die verenigde koninkryk wat lei met meer as 700 gevalle, spanje met net meer as 500, gevolg deur duitsland, portugal en frankryk.
tgt: the current outbreak is dominated by high numbers in europe with the uk leading with over 700 cases, spain with just over 500, followed by germany, portugal and france.

src: die minister het gesê dat die nasionale instituut vir oordraagbare siektes (nios) aanlynindiensopleiding aan gesondheidswerkers bied om die siekte te herken sodat die nodige laborato riumtoetse uitgevoer kan word.
tgt: the minister said the national institute for communicable diseases (nicd) is conducting online inservice training for health workers to be able to detect the disease so that necessary laboratory tests can be done.

src: "die siekte word slegs deur direkte kontak versprei, so n mens kan dit nie opdoen deur net in die selfde vertrek as n persoon met die siekte te wees nie," het die minister gesê.
tgt: "the disease only spreads through close contact, so you cannot get it by being in the same room with an infected person," the minister said.

src: minister phaahla het suidafrikaners gerus gestel dat aappokke nie n nuwe virus is wat nog nooit vantevore gesien is nie en dat wetenskaplikes kennis daarvan dra.
tgt: minister phaahla assu red south africans that monkeypox is not a virus which has never been seen before and scientists have information about it.

src: die voorsitter van die ministeriële advieskomitee vir kovid19 en uitvoerende lid van die ngld, professor koleka mlisana, het gesê dat aappokke endemies is aan die sentrale en noordelike dele van afrika en bekend staan as n mildelike siekte.
tgt: chairperson of the minis terial advisory committee (mac) on covid19 and executive member of nhls, professor koleka mlisana, said monkeypox is a disease that is endemic in central and northern africa which has been known to be mild.

src: n endemiese siekte is n siekte wat gereeld voorkom onder sekere mense of in n sekere streek.
tgt: an endemic disease is a condition regularly found among particular people or in a certain area.

src: sy het gesê dat daar ooreenkomste tussen aap pokke en pokke ("variola" of "smallpox") is.
tgt: she said there are simila rities between monkeypox and smallpox.

src: "daar is inentings en behandeling beskikbaar teen aappokke.
tgt: "there are vaccines and treatment available for monkeypox.

src: die siekte se simptome is soortge lyk aan dié van griep en legionnaires se siekte.
tgt: the disease presents itself with flu like symptoms and legionnaires.

src: die belangrikste ding is dat mense wat kliniese simptome toon, maklik is om te diagnoseer en net so belangrik is dat dit moeilik oordraagbaar is, anders as n respiratoriese virus, omdat dit deur slegs deur fisiese kontak aansteeklik is.
tgt: the important thing is that somebody who comes up with a clinical picture is easy to diagnose and most importantly it is difficult to transmit, unlike a respiratory virus, because it is by contact.

src: jy kan dit slegs kry as jy in direkte fisiese kontak met n siek persoon kom," het sy gesê.
tgt: you would only get it when you have come in direct contact with somebody who is infected," she said.

src: legionnaires se siekte is n erge vorm van longontsteking.
tgt: legionnaires' disease is a severe form of pneumonia.

src: professor mlisana het gesê dat kontaksporing belangrik is in dié geval en dat die departement van gesondheid daarrmee sal voortgaan.
tgt: professor mlisana said contact tracing is important in this case and the health department will continue to do that.

src: sy het suidafrikaners daarvan verseker dat die laboratoriuminfrastruktuur oor al die nodige hulpbronne beskik om enige nuwe infeksies wat mag voorkom, te monitor.
tgt: she assured south africans that the laboratory infrastructure has all the adequate resources to be able monitor any new infections that may arise.

src: bemagtig vroue deur landbou owen mngadi dr ethel zulu is ’n merkwaardige kleinboer wie se ster al blinker skyn.
tgt: empowering women through agriculture owen mngadi dr ethel zulu is a remarkable small farmer on the rise.

src: sy gebruik haar diep gaande begrip van voeding en jare se ervaring om organiese hoenders te teël en organiese groente te kweek op haar plaas, met die doel om ander vroue te bemagtig om kommersiële boere te word.
tgt: she uses her indepth understanding of nutrition and years of experience to produce organic chickens and vegetables on her farm with the aim of empowering other women to become commercial farmers.

src: dr. zulu (48), wat n dok torsgraad in voeding het, besit n 23hektaarplaas in cullinan buite pretoria, waar sy organiese groente kweek en hoenders teël en dan agroverwerk om aan verskeie supermarkte te verskaf.
tgt: dr zulu (48), who holds a doctorate in nutrition, owns a 23hectare farm in cullinan outside pretoria, where she produces and agroprocesses organic veggies and chickens that she supplies to several supermarkets.

src: haar plaas is ook opleidingsgasheer vir 20 studente wat landboustudies nastreef.
tgt: her farm also hosts 20 students who are pursuing agricultural studies for training.

src: dr. zulu het uit haar pos by die noordwesprovinsie se departement van landbou bedank om haar opleidingsagentskap, hope nutrition business consultants, te stig.
tgt: dr zulu left her job at the north west department of agriculture to start her training agency, hope nutrition business consultants.

src: dit nadat sy na gauteng verhuis het maar nie werk as ’n voedingkundige kon kry nie.
tgt: this was after she relocated to gauteng but could not find a job as a nutritionist.

src: sy is geesdriftig oor landbou en haar droom is om soveel moontlik vrouens by boerdery te betrek, n sektor wat volgens haar die potensiaal het om te bemagtig en werk te skep.
tgt: she is passionate about agriculture and her vision is to get as many women as possible into farming, a field she believes has the potential to empower and create jobs.

src: "ek het vir agt jaar gedien, saam met landbouuitbreidingsbeamptes gewerk en ons het baie boere met voedselsekerheid, higiëne en voeding gehelp.
tgt: "i served for eight years, working with agricultural extension officers, and we helped many farmers with food safety, hygiene and nutrition.

src: landbou is my passie vandat ek jonk is en ek het nooit gedink dat ek iets anders sou doen nie."dr.
tgt: agriculture has been my passion since i was young and i never imagined myself doing anything else.

src: zulu verduidelik dat sy deur haar opleidingsagent skap al regoor ses provinsies bedrywig is en vrouens en jongmense help om hul boerderywerksaamhede te bestuur.
tgt: "through her training agency, dr zulu explained that she worked across six provinces, helping women and young people to run their farming operations.

src: zulu het in 2017 besef dat haar opleiding nutteloos is sonder resultate, en koop toe n plaas om haar kennis te neem van woord tot daad.
tgt: commercial poultry farmingin 2017, dr zulu realised that her training was meaningless without results, so she bought a farm to put her knowledge into action.

src: sy is vandag n kommer siële pluimveeboer met meer as 7 500 braaihoenders.
tgt: today, she has become a commercial poultry farmer with more than 7 500 broilers.

src: haar aanvanklike plan was om slegs organiese groente te kweek.
tgt: her initial plan was to produce only organic vegetables.

src: "ek het hoenders vir bemesting benodig.
tgt: "i needed chickens for manure.

src: ek het na mense se huise toe gegaan om dit te gaan haal om my groente organies te hou.
tgt: i would go to people’s houses to collect it to keep my veggies organic.

src: dit is hoe die idee van braaihoenders ontstaan het.
tgt: that is how the idea of the broilers came about.

src: ons het binne twee jaar 5 000 braaihoenders geteël en aan plaaslike supermarkte begin ver skaf.
tgt: within two years, we produced 5 000 broilers and started to supply local supermarkets.

src: "sy voeg by dat haar hoenders organiese plaashoenders is, met geen hormoontoevoegings nie.
tgt: "she added that her chicken are freerange and organic, with zero hormones.

src: sy gebruik hoendermis om groente soos spinasie, broccoli, kool en rissies te kweek.
tgt: she uses chicken manure to grow vegetables such as spinach, broccoli, cabbage and peppers.

src: dr. zulu verskaf ook haar vars produkte aan straatverkopers, bykomend tot supermarkte.
tgt: in addition to supermarkets, dr zulu supplies her produce to hawkers.

src: haar werksaamhede is so suksesvol dat sy tans 12 vrouens permanent in diens neem.
tgt: her operation is so successful that she employs 12 women permanently.

src: pluimvee is, volgens dr. zulu, die belangrikste sektor in die land, aangesien die meeste gesinne meer hoender as enige ander soort vleis eet.
tgt: according to dr zulu, poultry is the most critical sector in the country, as most families consume chicken more than any other kind of meat.

src: dr. zulu hoop om elke jaar meer as 1 000 vrouens regoor die land in boerdery op te lei.
tgt: dr zulu has hopes of training more than 1 000 women in farming across the country each year.

src: sy wil ook een van suidafrika se staatmakerprodusente van plaashoenders en organiese groente wees.
tgt: she is also set on being one of south africa’s trusted producers of freerange chickens and organic vegetables.

src: sy raai vroulike aspirantboere aan om klein te begin en om nie vir regeringsteun te wag nie.
tgt: she advises aspiring female farmers to start small and not wait for government support.

src: "regeringsondersteuning sal n hupstoot wees wanneer jy dit bekom.
tgt: "when government support finds you, it will be a boost.

src: niks keer jou om met 20 braaihoenders te begin as jy 3 000 wil teël nie.
tgt: if you need to produce 3 000 broilers, nothing stops you from starting with 20. approach local supermarkets to get their specifications on the quality they want and work in groups so that you can meet their quality and quantity demands," she adds.

src: nader plaaslike supermarkte om inligting oor die gehalte wat hulle wil hê, te kry, en werk in groepe sodat jy aan hul vereistes van gehalte en hoeveelheidaanvraag kan voldoen," voeg sy by.
tgt: empowering women through agriculturedr zulu believes agri culture can play a role in empowering women economically and creating more jobs for women.

src: kleinsake versoek om aansoek te doen om steun nosihle shelembe die minister van kleinsakeontwikkeling, stella ndabeniabrahams, het kleinsakeondernemings in townships en landelike gebiede aangemoedig om deur die townshipen landelike entrepreneurskapprogram (oftewel trep) aansoek te doen om steun.
tgt: small business urged to apply for support nosihle shelembe the minister of small business development, stella ndabeniabra hams, has encouraged small businesses in townships and rural areas to apply for support through the township and rural entrepreneurship programme (trep).

src: "ons spreek werkloosheid en armoede doelgerig aan, maar ons het ook n verantwoordelikheid om die ekonomie te ontwikkel," sê minister ndabeni abrahams.
tgt: "we are deliberate in addressing unemployment and poverty, but we also have a responsibility to grow the economy," minister ndabeni abrahams said.

src: die minister het tydens die onlangse shetradeszajeugseminaar in pretoria gesê dat die maksimumwaarde van trep r1 miljoen beloop, met n toelaag as een komponent en n lening as die ander komponent.
tgt: addressing the shetradesza youth seminar held recently in pretoria, the minister said the maximum value of trep stands at r1 million, with one com ponent being a grant and the other a loan.

src: entrepreneurs in townships of landelike gebiede kan om steun aansoek doen, insluitend befondsing, deur middel van die algemene aansoekvorm beskikbaar vanaf die kleinsakeontwikkelingsagentskap (seda), die kleinsakefinansieringsagentskap (sefa), die nasionale bemag tigingsfonds (nef) en die nasionale jeugontwik kelingsagentskap.
tgt: township or ruralbased entrepreneurs can apply for support, including funding, through the common application template from the small enterprise development agency (seda), the small enterprise finance agency (sefa), the national empowerment fund (nef) and the national youth development agency (nyda).

src: sakeeienaars moet suidafrikaanse burgers wees om te kwalifiseer.
tgt: the owners of the business must be south african nationals.

src: die volgende skemas is beskikbaar vir kwalifiserende entrepreneurs: ondersteuningsprogram vir kleinskaalse bakkerye en lekkergoedmakers ondersteuningsprogram vir motorvoertuigherstelwerk en werktuig kundiges (asook klein en onafhanklike motorvoertuigonderdeelwinkels en informele motorvoertuig entrepreneurs) slaghuisonder steuningsprogram ondersteuningsprogram vir klere, leer en tekstiel ondersteuningsprogram vir persoonlike sorg ondersteuningsprogram vir spazawinkels ondersteuningsprogram vir tshisanyama en gekookte kosom te registreer, besoek smmesa.
tgt: the following schemes are available for qualifying entrepreneurs: smallscale bakeries and confectioneries support programme autobody repairs and mechanics support programme (as well as small and independent autospares shops and informal automotive entrepreneurs) butcheries support programme clothing, leather and textiles support programme personal care support programme spazashop support programme tshisanyama and cooked food support programme registration can be done on smmesa.

src: gov.
tgt: gov.

src: za en vul die nodige inligting in.
tgt: and complete the information required.

src: die regering werk daaraan om die entiteite vir kleinsake saam te smelt na een agentskap en sodoende die befondsingsprosesse vir kleinsakeondernemings seepglad en gebruikersvriendelik te maak.
tgt: in an effort to ensure the funding processes for small business is seamless and userfriendly, government is working toward merging entities for small businesses to form one agency.

src: "ons is tans besig om sefa, seda en die koöperatiewe banke ontwikkelingsagentskap saam te smelt.
tgt: "we are currently in the process of merging sefa and seda as well as the cooperative banks development agency.

src: "shetrades programme ndabeniabrahams sê dat die regering deur verskeie inisiatiewe die kleinsakesektor gehelp het om te groei en broodnodige indiensname te skep.
tgt: "shetrades programme ndabeniabrahams said through various initiatives, government has assisted the small business sector to grow and create muchneeded employment.

src: "die departement van kleinsakeontwikkeling en seda het n vennootskap met die internasionale handelsentrum gesmee om die shetradesprogram na suidafrika te bring en n shetradeszaspilpunt te skep.
tgt: "the department of small business development and seda formed a partnership with the international trade centre (itc), to bring the shetrades programme to south africa, and create a shetradesza hub.

src: ons kán en sál meer doen om beurtkrag stop te sit vukuzenzele unnamed erge beurtkrag het oor die afgelope paar weke ons ekonomie ontwrig en uitermatige swaarkry vir alle suidafrikaners veroorsaak.
tgt: we can and will do more to end load shedding vukuzenzele unnamed over the past few weeks, severe load shedding has disrupted our economy and caused extreme hardship for all south africans.

src: vlak 6beurtkrag is ver oorsaak deur die ver lies van meer as 18 000 megawatt (mw) se opwekkingskapasiteit as gevolg van onklaarheid van eenhede en n onbeskermde staking deur eskomwerkers.
tgt: stage 6 load shedding was triggered by the loss of more than 18 000 megawatts (mw) of generation capacity due to unit breakdowns and an unprotected strike by eskom workers.

src: na meer as n dekade van elektrisiteitstekorte voel suidafrikaners na regte gefrustreerd en kwaad.
tgt: after more than a decade of electricity shortages, south africans are right to feel frustrated and angry.

src: dit kan soms voel asof daar geen einde in sig is nie.
tgt: at times like this, it can feel like there is no end in sight.

src: die werklikheid is egter dat, alhoewel beurtkrag blyk erger te word, ons reeds verskeie belangrike stappe geneem het om die tekort aan elektrisiteitstoevoer aan te spreek.
tgt: yet, while load shedding appears to worsen, the reality is that we have already taken several important actions to address the shortfall in electricity supply.

src: ons onmiddellike prioriteit is om die elek trisiteitstelsel te stabiliseer.
tgt: our immediate priority is to stabilise the electricity system.

src: eskom sal in staat wees om beurtkrag te verminder na laer vlakke namate die elektrisiteitstelsel en opwekkingskapasiteit herstel word.
tgt: as the system recovers and generation capacity is restored, eskom will be able to reduce load shedding to lower stages.

src: die ooreenkoms wat tussen eskom en vakbonde bereik is, sal belangrike herstelwerk moontlik maak en bykomende eenhede weer laat werk.
tgt: the agreement reached between eskom and labour unions will enable critical repairs and return additional units to operation.

src: die transmissielyn van cahora bassa in mosambiek is herstel en voeg 600mw by tot die netwerk; en medupi se eenheid 6 het in julie weer begin werk, wat n bykomende 720mw toevoeg.
tgt: the transmission line from cahora bassa in mozambique has been restored, adding 600 mw to the grid, and medupi unit 6 returned to service recently adding another 720 mw.

src: daar word verwag dat bykomende eenhede terug aanlyn sal kom, wat verder die huidige tekort sal verlig.
tgt: additional units are expected to come back online, further easing the current shortfall.

src: wetstoepassingsagentskappe werk terselfdertyd hard om sabotasie, diefstal en bedrog by eskom te takel om die gevaar wat dié kriminele optrede vir die elektrisiteitstelsel inhou, aan te spreek.
tgt: at the same time, law enforcement agencies are working hard to tackle sabotage, theft and fraud at eskom to address the threat that these criminal actions pose to the electricity system.

src: die kern van die saak, op die ou einde, is dat ons meer kapasiteit tot die netwerk moet byvoeg.
tgt: in the end, the bottom line is that we need to add more capacity to the grid.

src: dit sal ruimte skep vir eskom om belangrike instandhouding te onderneem en die betroubaarheid van sy vloot te verhoog.
tgt: this will create space for eskom to undertake critical maintenance and increase the reliability of its fleet.

src: dit sal ook n buffer skep sodat ander bronne gebruik kan word as verskeie eenhede op een slag breek.
tgt: it will also create a buffer so that even if several units experience breakdowns at once, other sources can be used.

src: een van die eerste stappe wat ek in 2018 geneem het, was om die verkrygingsprogram vir hernubare energie weer op die been te bring.
tgt: one of the first steps i took in 2018 was to revive the renewable energy procurement programme.

src: die verhoging van die lisensiedrumpel vir nuwe opwekkingsprojekte tot 100mw, bykomend tot die verkryging van nuwe opwekkingskapasiteit deur dié program, beteken dat privaatbeleggers nie n lisensie benodig om opwekkingsfasiliteite tot dié betrokke grootte te bou nie.
tgt: in addition to the procurement of new generation capacity through this programme, the increase of the licensing threshold for new generation projects to 100 mw means that private investors do not require a license to build generation facilities up to this size.

src: dié eenvoudige hervorming het n reuse potensiale beleggings pyplyn tot stand gebring.
tgt: this simple reform has unlocked a massive potential pipeline of investment.

src: eskom het grond langs bestaande kragstasies vir privaatbelegging in hernubare energieprojekte beskikbaar gestel.
tgt: eskom has made land available next to existing power stations for private investment in renewable energy projects.

src: ontwerpveranderings is voltooi om die werksverrigting van medupieenheid 1, 2 en 3 te verbeter en word in eenheid 5 en 6 onderneem.
tgt: design modifications have been completed to improve the performance of medupi units 1, 2 and 3 and are underway in units 5 and 6. while these actions are significant and will bear fruit over the coming months, they are clearly not enough to address the crisis that we face.

src: die afgelope paar weke het dit duidelik gemaak dat ons dringend meer moet doen.
tgt: what the past few weeks have demonstrated is that we need to do more and do so with the utmost urgency.

src: daar is geen rede vir n land soos ons sn – met die vaardighede, vermoëns en hulpbronne wat ons tot ons beskikking het – om n tekort aan elektrisiteit te verduur nie.
tgt: there is no reason why a country like ours – with the skills, capabilities and resources we have at our disposal – should have to endure a shortage of electricity.

src: ons het oor die afgelope paar weke saam met die betrokke ministers en senior beamptes aan n reeks bykomende maatreëls gewerk om alle pogings om ons elektrisiteitstoevoer te verhoog, te versnel.
tgt: over the past few weeks, we have been working with the relevant ministers and senior officials on a range of additional measures to accelerate all efforts to increase our electricity supply.

src: die boodskap is duidelik: dit is nie nou die tyd vir "sake soos gewoonlik" nie.
tgt: the message is clear: this is no time for business as usual.

src: ons moet sterk optree om beurtkrag iets van die verlede te maak.
tgt: we need to act boldly to make load shedding a thing of the past.

src: ons moet nou optree en saam geweld teen vroue hokslaan vukuzenzele unnamed vrouemaand het tragies begin.
tgt: we must act now and together to end violence against women vukuzenzele unnamed it has been a tragic start to women’s month.

src: ons moes weer eens die donker en vieslike sy van ons samelewing in die oë staar.
tgt: we are once more confronted with the dark and ugly side of our society.

src: n groep mans en vroue wat besig was om n musiekvideo by n verlate myn naby krugersdorp te verfilm, is verlede maand deur gewapende aanvallers aangerand wat agt van die vroue bendeverkrag het.
tgt: last month, a group of men and women shooting a music video at a disused mine near krugersdorp were attacked by armed assailants who gang raped eight of the women.

src: dié afskuwelike dade van wreedheid is n belediging vir die regte wat vroue en meisies het om in n vrye en veilige samelewing te leef.
tgt: these horrible acts of brutality are an affront to the right of women and girls to live and work in freedom and safety.

src: terwyl die suidafrikaanse polisiediens die verdagtes in dié misdaad vervolg, moet hulle ook aandag skenk aan die besorgdhede van die gemeenskap in west village, waar die voorval plaasgevind het, wat stel dat hulle deur bendes in die omgewing beleër word.
tgt: while they pursue the suspects in this crime, the south african police service must also pay immediate attention to the concerns of the community of west village, where the incident occurred, who say they are under siege from armed gangs in the area.

src: ons doen n beroep op gemeenskappe om saam met die polisie te werk om te verseker dat dié misdadi gers aangekeer en vervolg word.
tgt: we call upon communities to work with the police to ensure that these criminals are apprehended and prosecuted.

src: ons gemeenskappe moenie misdadigers in hul midde beskerm nie.
tgt: our communities must not shelter criminals in their midst.

src: daar is altyd iemand in die gemeenskap wat iets weet, wat iets gehoor het of selfs ooggetuie was tot iets.
tgt: there is always someone in our communities who knows something, who heard something or who even witnessed something.

src: die probleem lê daarin dat baie van ons kies om stil te bly omdat die oortreder n vriend, genoot of kollega is.
tgt: the problem is many of us choose to keep quiet because the perpetrator is a friend, a partner or a colleague.

src: of ons is bloot te bang en vrees viktimisering.
tgt: or we are just afraid and fear victimisation.

src: dit is belangrik om te onthou dat alle wenke wat deur die sapd se stop misdaadkontaksentrum ontvang word, vertroulik hanteer word.
tgt: it is important to remember that all tipoffs received by the saps crime stop contact centre are treated confidentiality.

src: ek doen n beroep op enigeen wat inligting oor dié misdaad het, om dit by die owerhede aan te meld sodat die misdadigers aangekeer kan word.
tgt: i call on anyone who has information about this crime to report it to the authorities so the perpetrators can be arrested.

src: gegewe die omvang van die probleem in ons land, is dit nie meer moontlik om die verantwoordelikheid om seksmisdade aan te meld, te vermy nie.
tgt: given the size of this problem in our country, it is no longer possible to avoid responsibility for reporting sex crimes.

src: volgens n nuwe wets voorskrif wat onlangs in werking getree het, bykomend tot ons morele verpligting, het ons almal nou n wetsplig om enige kennis, redelike oortuiging of vermoede dat n seksuele oortreding teen n kwesbare persoon gepleeg is, by die owerhede aan te meld.
tgt: according to a new legal provision that has come into effect, in addition to our moral obligation, we all now have a legal duty to report to authorities when we have knowledge, reasonable belief or suspicion that a sexual offence has been committed against a vulnerable person.

src: dit is nou n misdaad om nie só n seksuele oortreding aan te meld nie.
tgt: it is now a crime not to report such a sexual offence.

src: dit is een van drie nuwe wette wat ek vroeër vanjaar geteken het om die stryd teen geslagsgebaseerde misdaad te versterk en groter steun en beskerming aan oorlewendes te verskaf.
tgt: this is part of one of three laws that i signed earlier this year that strengthen the fight against genderbased violence and offer greater support and protection to survivors.

src: dié wette verbreed, onder meer, die omvang van die nasionale register van seks oortreders, maak dit die beoordelingsproses streng er en skep dit bykomende kategorieë van seksoortre dings.
tgt: among other things, the laws expand the scope of the national register of sex offenders, strengthen the vetting process, and introduce additional categories of sex offences.

src: prosesse is onderweg om dié wette in werking te stel.
tgt: processes are underway to put these laws into effect.

src: dit behels die oplei ding van staatsaanklaers en landdrosse, voorskrifte aan sapdamptenare met betrekking tot borgstel ling en die hersiening van klagstate om die nuwe oortredings in te sluit.
tgt: these include training of prosecutors and magistrates, issuing directives on bail to all saps officials, and revising charge sheets to include the newly created offences.

src: ons is vasberade dat al dié boublokke in plek moet wees sodat ons wetstoepas singsowerhede en howe geslagsgebaseerde geweld meer doeltreffend kan ondersoek en vervolg.
tgt: we are determined that all these building blocks are in place so that our law enforcement authorities and courts can investigate and prosecute genderbased violence more effectively.

src: geslagsgebaseerde geweld en vrouemoord is n diepgesetelde probleem in ons samelewing.
tgt: genderbased violence and femicide is a deeprooted societal problem.

src: dit is nie genoegsaam dat oortreders aangekeer, aangekla, skuldig bevind en gevonnis word nie.
tgt: it is not enough for perpetrators to be apprehended, tried, convicted and sentenced.

src: ons moet saamwerk om die faktore wat geslags gebaseerde geweld in ons gemeenskappe aandryf, waaronder patriargale houdings en gebruike, aan te spreek.
tgt: we must work together to address the drivers of genderbased violence in our communities, including patriarchal attitudes and practices.

src: as ons geslagsgebaseerde geweld wil uitroei, sal ons as nasie saam moet werk.
tgt: eradicating genderbased violence demands that we act together as a people.

src: dit beteken die bevor dering van positiewe houdings rondom geslagsgelykheid in ons gemeenskappe, by ons plekke van aanbidding en in ons eie huise.
tgt: this means promoting positive attitudes around gender equality in our communities, at our places of worship and in our own homes.

src: beursgeleenthede vir jongmense kgaogelo letsebe sonia malinga (23) van piet retief in mpumalanga sê dat haar toekoms blink is danksy haar beurs vanaf die shopritegroep.
tgt: bursary opportunities for young people kgaogelo letsebe sonia malinga (23) from piet retief in mpumalanga says being a shoprite group bursary recipient has ensured a promising future for her.

src: malinga het die beurs in 2018 vanaf die suidafrikaanse handelaar ontvang.
tgt: malinga received the bursary from the south african retailer in 2018. she applied for the bursary after finishing high school at hoërskool piet retief.

src: "as kind wou ek aan vanklik n doktor geword het, maar ek het later meer geleenthede begin ondersoek.
tgt: "growing up, i initially wanted to be a doctor, but later i started exploring other options.

src: ek het gelees oor aanvoerkettingen logistieke bestuur en was amper dadelik daartoe aangetrokke.
tgt: i read about supply chain and logistics management and was almost instantly attracted to it.

src: ek onthou hoe ek gesit en kyk het hoe die trokke in en uit my tuisdorp ry en hoe ek gewonder het wie maak seker dat die gehalte en hoeveelhede van die goe dere korrek is en dat dit betyds afgelewer word.
tgt: i remember i used to sit and watch the trucks drive in and out of my hometown and wonder who was ensuring that the quality and quantity of goods were correct and that they arrived at the correct delivery point.

src: dit is hoe ek besef het dat dit my passie is,"sê malinga.
tgt: that’s when i found my passion," says malinga.

src: malinga het n bcomhonneursgraad in lo gistieke bestuur aan die universiteit van johannesburg behaal en in februarie 2021 haar loopbaan by shoprite as leerlingbestuurder by die verspreidingsentrum begin.
tgt: malinga obtained a bcom honours degree in logistics management at the university of johannesburg and started her career with shoprite as a distribution centre trainee manager in february 2021. she was recently promoted to store replenishment analyst.

src: om deel te wees van die shopritegroep het malinga se kennis van die kleinhandelsbedryf uitgebrei.
tgt: being part of the shoprite group has broadened malinga’s knowledge of the retail industry.

src: "dit het my meer geleer van logistieke bestuur en my in staat gestel om deurlopend my vaardig hede te ontwikkel en my loopbaan te bevorder," sê sy.
tgt: "it has taught me even more about logistics management and enabled me to continuously develop my skills and advance in my career," she says.
