src: hoe om aansoek te doenaansoeke vir die shopri tegroep se allesomvat tende buersprogram is nou oop vir die 2023 akademiese jaar.
tgt: how to applyapplications for the shoprite group’s allinclusive bursary programme are open for the 2023 academic year.

src: die beurs wissel van r45 000 tot r70 000 per jaar, gebaseer op die studieveld en tersiêre inrigting.
tgt: the bursary ranges from r45 000 to r70 000 per annum, based on the field of study and institution.

src: studiefooie, boeke, toelae vir verblyf op kampus en terugwerk ooreenkomste is inge sluit.
tgt: it includes tuition fees, books, oncampus accommodation allowances and work back agreements.

src: zoeloegeïnspireerde kos maak kaapstadse restaurant bekend owen mngadi deur trotsheid te toon in haar erfenis by wyse van tradisionele kos, het die restaurateur mmabatho molefe haar eie restaurant, emazulwini, op die wêreldkaart geplaas nadat dit ingesluit is in die 50 nextlys.
tgt: zuluinspired food puts cape town restaurant on the map owen mngadi by showcasing pride in her heritage through traditional food, restaurateur mmabatho molefe has put her restaurant, emazulwini, on the world map after it was included in the 50 next list.

src: hierdie lys bevat 50 van die wêreld se mees opwindende sjefs wat die potensiaal het om eendag die lys van die wêreld se 50 beste restaurante te haal.
tgt: this list names 50 of the world’s most exciting chefs, who have the potential to one day make the prestigious world’s 50 best restaurants list.

src: molefe (27) het haar moderne zoeloerestaurant by die v&a waterfront’s makers landingruimte in kaapstad in 2020 gevestig nadat sy haar werk in die restaurantbedryf verloor het weens die kovid19pandemie.
tgt: molefe (27) established her modern zulu restaurant in cape town at the v&a waterfront’s makers landing space in 2020, after she lost her job in the restaurant industry due to the covid19 pandemic.

src: sy sê haar cuisine isgeïnspireer deur haar grootwordjare in kwazulunatal, waar haar ouma vir hulle tradisionele kos gekook het.
tgt: she says her cuisine was inspired by her upbringing in kwazulunatal where her grandmother used to cook traditional food.

src: sy glo dit het in haar guns getel en haar gehelp om uit te staan in die 50 nextkompetisie.
tgt: she believes that this worked in her favour and helped her stand out from the rest in the 50 next competition.

src: molefe sê emazulwini, wat losweg vertaal kan word as "die hemele", het belangstelling ontlok van suidafrikaners sowel as internasionale besoekers wat opgewonde is om haar zoeloegeïnspireerde kos op die proef te stel.
tgt: molefe says emazulwini, loosely translated as ‘the heavens’, has attracted interest from south africans and international visitors keen to try her zuluinspired food.

src: makers landing, wat ’n spilpunt vir suidafrikaanse kos en kultuur is, is die perfekte venue vir haar, sê sy.
tgt: makers landing, which is a hub for south african food and culture, is the perfect venue for her, she says.

src: emazulwini bied n sewegangvaste spyskaart wat elke seisoen verander.
tgt: emazulwini offers a sevencourse set menu, which changes each season.

src: molefe se kos word pragtig voorgesit en sluit geregte in soos isijingi – pampoenpap, geroosterde pampoen, perskejel en bruinbotter roomys; isibindi nechakalaka – botterbedruipte beeslewer, geellensiechakalaka en uiejus; en iqanda, isibindi noshatini – ‘n tertjie met geroosterde tamatieatjar, hoenderlewer en biltonggerookte eiergeelroom.
tgt: molefe’s food is beautifully served, and includes dishes such as isijingi – pumpkin porridge, roasted pumpkin,peach gel and brown butter ice cream; isibindi nechakalaka – butter basted ox liver, yellow lentil chakalaka and onion jus; and iqanda, isibindi noshatini – tartlet with roasted tomato relish, chicken liver and biltongcured yolk crème.

src: "wanneer jy kaapstad besoek, mag jy dalk nie n ware refleksie van suidafrika kry nie, so ek het besluit om getrou aan myself te bly met tradisionele kos om aan besoekers te wys wat ons eet.
tgt: "when you get to cape town, you may not get a true reflection of what south africa is about, so i decided to stay true to myself with traditional food to show visitors what we eat.

src: ek vertel elke oggend my storie aan myself; my interpretasie van wat zoeloekos is.
tgt: i tell myself every morning i am telling my story; my interpretation of what zulu food is.

src: ek hoop mense aanvaar dit vir wat dit is.
tgt: i hope people embrace it for what it is.

src: ons streef daarna om gewone disse te verhef tot die uitsonderlike.
tgt: we hope to elevate ordinary dishes to the exceptional.

src: kaapstad het n diverse bevolking bo en behalwe internasionale toeriste; hulle kry almal te doen met zoeloekos," sê sy.
tgt: cape town has a diverse population, apart from international tourists; they all get to learn about zulu food," she says.

src: die wêreld se 50 beste restaurante die manier waarop molefe tradisionele kos gemoderniseer het, is wat aan haar n plek op die 50 nextlys besorg het, wat elke jaar 50 mense onder die ouderdom van 35 vier wat die wêreldwye kostoneel help vorm.
tgt: the world's 50 best’s 50 next list it was molefe’s way of modernising traditional food that scored her a spot on the 50 next list, which each year celebrates 50 people aged under 35 who are shaping the worldwide food scene.

src: die kompetisie stel hierdie briljante jong sjefs in staat om hul kookkuns aan die wêreld ten toon te stel.
tgt: the competition enables these brilliant young chefs to show off their cooking to the world.

src: molefe het die toekenningsgeleentheid in junie in bilbao, spanje bygewoon en sê dit was n inspirerende dag vol gesprekvoering met ander smulpape.
tgt: molefe attended the awards ceremony in june in bilbao, spain, and says it was an inspirational day of discussions with other foodies.

src: "ek was gelukkig dat mense van regoor die land en van alle ouderdomme gekom het om ons kos te geniet.
tgt: "i have been fortunate to get people from across the country and all age groups to come enjoy our food.

src: mense is bevooroordeeld oor afval (die inwendige organe van n dier wat vir geregte gebruik word) en ek wil vir hulle wys dat as jy dit reg gaarmaak, dit net so heerlik kan smaak as enige ander vleissnit.
tgt: people are prejudiced against offal (the internal organs of an animal used as food) and i want to show them that if you treat it right, it can taste just as delicious as any other cut of meat.

src: ek wil ook n koptotstertbenadering tot voedsel volg as kampvegter vir n volhoubare manier van eet," sê molefe.
tgt: i also want to promote nosetotail dining, to champion this sustainable way of eating," molefe says.

src: emazulwini het ook die afrikarestaurant van die jaartitel gewen by die vierde jaarlikse luxe restaurant awards vroeër vanjaar.
tgt: emazulwini also won the african restaurant of the year title at the fourth annual luxe restaurant awards earlier this year.

src: ekonomiese heropbouen herstelplan emazulwini verskaf werk aan vier mense en molefe het planne om haar besigheid uit te brei.
tgt: economic reconstruction and recovery plan emazulwini employs four people and molefe has plans to grow her business.

src: sy sê dat suidafrika se ryk erfenis n toeristetrekpleister is.
tgt: she says south africa’s rich heritage is a tourist drawcard.

src: as deel van die ekonomiese heropbouen herstelplan het die regering die toerismesektor geïdentifiseer as een van die kritiese ingrypingsareas en n sleutelaandrywer van ekonomiese herstel.
tgt: as part of the economic reconstruction and recovery plan, the government has identified the tourism sector as one of the critical intervention areas and a key driver of economic recovery.

src: die departement van toerisme, die privaatsektor en ander belanghebbendes het saamgespan om die toerismesektorherstelplan saam te stel, wat sal help om strategiese vennootskappe tussen die regering en die bedryf te vestig om beter besoekerservaringe daar te stel.
tgt: the department of tourism, the private sector and other stakeholders collaborated to develop the tourism sector recovery plan, which will help form strategic partnerships between government and industry to ensure improved visitor experiences.

src: spaar geld: koop btwvrye goedere allison cooper terwyl die stygende lewenskoste in suidafrika sy tol op landsburgers eis, veral diegene in laeinkomstehuishoudings, kan jy wel meer waarde vir jou geld kry wanneer jy btwvrye goedere koop.
tgt: save money: buy zerorated goods allison cooper while the incre asing cost of living in south africa is taking its toll on citizens, especially those from lowincome households, you can ensure that your money goes further when shopping for groceries by buying zerorated goods.

src: btwvrye goedere is sekere basiese voedselsoorte waarop n mens nie belasting hoef te betaal nie, wat beteken dit word teen n laer prys verkoop.
tgt: zerorated goods are certain basic foods that people do not have to pay tax on, which means they are sold at a cheaper price.

src: mens wat kos koop wat op die btwvrye lysie is, kry n bietjie meer waarde vir hul geld, wat hulle help om voedsame kos op die tafel te sit.
tgt: people who buy food off the zerorated list can get a little more for their money, which helps them to put nutritious food on the table.

src: volgens statistieke suidafrika (stats sa), het kos en niealkoholiese drinkgoed (nab) 8.6% meer gekos in junie vanjaar as in junie 2021. stats sa het gesê dat voedselprodukte wat die grootste toename in prys getoon het, brood en graankos (wat mieliemeel insluit), vleis en olie en vette is – wat stapelvoedsel in die meeste huishoudings is.
tgt: according to statistics south africa (stats sa), food and nonalcoholic beverages (nab) cost 8.6% more in june this year than they did in june 2021. stats sa said the food products that have increased the most are bread and cere als (which includes maize meal), meat and oils and fats – all of which are staple foods in many households.

src: brood en graanprodukte het 11.2% toegeneem sedert junie 2021, vanaf 8.4% in mei vanjaar toe die verbruikersprysindeks (vpi) met 1.1% toegeneem het.
tgt: bread and cereal products have increased by 11.2% since june 2021, up from 8.4% in may this year, when the consumer price index (cpi) increased by 1.1%.

src: die maandelikse toename was 2.6%, met n opvallende prystoename in mieliemeel (5.2%), bruinbrood (3.2%) en macaroni (3%).
tgt: the monthly increase was 2.6%, with notable price rises for maize meal (5.2%), brown bread (3.2%) and macaroni (3%).

src: verder het vleispryse met 9.5% toegeneem vanaf junie 2021 tot junie 2022, en kos effens meer as in mei 2022. olies en vette het jaarliks toegeneem met 32.5% vergeleke met 26.9% in mei, toe die vpi toegeneem het.
tgt: in addition, meat prices increased by 9.5% from june 2021 to june 2022., and cost slightly more than they did in may 2022. oils and fats increased annually by 32.5%, compared with 26.9% in may when the cpi increased.

src: die hoë prys van sonneblomolie plaas veral ekstra druk op mense se begrotings.
tgt: the high cost of sunflower oil, in particular, is putting extra strain on budgets.

src: spaar met btwvrye goederebtwvrye goedere is in 1991 deur die regering ingestel om laeinkomstehuishoudings te help.
tgt: save with zerorated goodszerorated goods were introduced by government in 1991 to help lowincome households.

src: sedert die aanvanklike bekendstelling is nog produkte by die lys gevoeg.
tgt: since the initial introduction, more items have been added to the list.

src: ondersteun die polisie om suidafrika veiliger te maak vukuzenzele unnamed daar is toenemende publieke frustrasie en woede oor die vlak van misdaad in ons land.
tgt: support the police to make south africa safe vukuzenzele unnamed there is growing public frustration and anger at the levels of crime in our country.

src: die onlangse roofaanval en bendeverkragting van agt jong vrouens in krugersdorp het landwye woede en ontsteltenis ontlok en het gelei tot roepe om daadwerklike optrede teen gewapende bendes van onwettige myners wat in die area werksaam is.
tgt: the recent robbery and gang rape of eight young women in krugersdorp caused nationwide outrage and led to calls for decisive action against armed illegal mining gangs operating in the area.

src: die suidafrikaanse polisiediens (sapd) moet geloof word vir hul besliste optrede die afgelope drie weke in reaksie op die bendeverkragting en misdadigheid in die area.
tgt: the south african police service is to be commended for its decisive actions over the past three weeks in response to the gang rape and criminality in the area.

src: gemeenskappe het egter met reg uitgewys dat dit nie n hoëprofielmisdaad moet neem om uiteindelik aksie te neem teen misdaad nie.
tgt: however, communities have rightly pointed out that it should not take a high profile crime for action to finally be taken against criminality.

src: die realiteit is dat polisiëring in suidafrika ernstige uitdagings in die gesig staar.
tgt: the reality is that there are serious challenges facing policing in south africa.

src: maar ons werk hard daaraan om dit die hoof te bied.
tgt: but we are working hard to overcome them.

src: soos enige staatsdepartement voel die sapd die gevolge van die land se fiskale krisis, jare van personeeltekort en staatskaping.
tgt: like all government departments, the south african police service is feeling the effects of the country’s fiscal crisis, several years of understaffing and state capture.

src: polisielede werk ook in n gevaarlike omgewing waar hulle dikwels geweld, beserings of die dood in die gesig staar.
tgt: police members also work in a dangerous environment where they often have to face violence, injury or death.

src: misdaad in suidafrika kan nie uitgeroei word sonder n sterk, bekwame en professionele polisiemag nie.
tgt: crime in south africa cannot be eradicated without a strong, capable, professional police force.

src: die kapasiteit van die sapd is een van die kwessies wat uitgelig is in die verslag van die kundige paneel wat die onrus van julie 2021 ondersoek het, en waar ons nou stappe neem om dit op te los.
tgt: the capacity of the saps was one of the issues flagged in the report of the expert panel into the july 2021 unrest, which we are taking steps to address.

src: nadat ons die noodsaaklike stabiliteit in die leierskap van die sapd herstel het, is ons fokus nou daarop gemik om die kapasiteitsgapings te verklein wat gelei het tot die wetstoepassingsagentskappe se onvoorbereidheid om die gebeure van verlede julie te hanteer.
tgt: having restored muchneeded stability to the leadership of the saps, our focus now is on closing capacity gaps that led to our law enforcement authorities being found unprepared to deal with the events of last july.

src: n personeeltekort en n gebrek aan voldoende opleiding het veral n ernstige impak op gemeenskapsen openbareordepolisiëring gehad.
tgt: understaffing and lack of adequate training has had a particularly dire impact on community and public order policing.

src: die regering het befondsing toegestaan vir die werwing van 12 000 nuwe polisierekrute, en die eerste innamegroep ondergaan reeds basiese opleiding.
tgt: government has allocated funding for the recruitment of 12,000 new police trainees, and the first cohort is undergoing basic training.

src: die sapd se eenhede vir openbareorde polisiëring sal n bykomende 4 000 lede in hierdie finansiële jaar ontvang en reëlings word getref vir toepaslike opleiding van hul lede.
tgt: the saps public order policing units will receive an additional 4,000 members this financial year, and arrangements are being made for appropriate training for members.

src: met die lesse wat uit verlede junie se onrus geleer is in gedagte, is ons besig om te werk aan die verbetering van samewerking tussen wetstoepassingsagentskappe en die private sekuriteitsbedryf in die stryd teen misdaad.
tgt: drawing on the lessons of last july’s unrest, we are working to improve cooperation between law enforcement agencies and the private security industry in the fight against crime.

src: ons het die noue samewerking van alle belanghebbendes nodig, insluitend die besigheidswêreld, sodat hulpbronne en misdaadintelligensie gedeel word om sodoende openbare veiligheid te verbeter, sowel as dat daar opgetree word teen misdade wat ekonomiese aktiwiteit ontwrig.
tgt: we need close coordina tion with all stakeholders, including business, so that resources and crime intelligence are shared to both improve public safety and deal with crimes that disrupt economic activity.

src: n voorbeeld is die samewerking tussen transnetvragspoor en die sapd om die diefstal van infrastruk tuur en spoorlynsabotasie te bekamp.
tgt: an example is the colla boration between transnet freight rail and the saps to combat infrastructure theft and line sabotage.

src: hierdie misdade beïnvloed die ekonomie baie ernstig, aangesien maatskappye nie hul goedere na die hawens kan vervoer om uitgevoer te word nie.
tgt: these crimes seriously affect the economy as companies cannot move their products to the ports for export.

src: nog n voorbeeld van samewerking is tussen mynsekuriteit, private sekuriteit en die sapd is die bestryding van diefstal van edelmetale.
tgt: another example of cooperation is between mine security, private security and the saps to fight precious metals theft.

src: weens hierdie gesamentlike pogings sien ons vordering in areas soos mpumalanga en limpopo, wat brandpunte van onstabiliteit was soos wat gesteelde metale na onwettige markte oorsee geneem is.
tgt: as a result of these joint efforts, we are seeing progress in areas like mpumalanga and limpopo that have been flashpoints of instability as stolen metals were moved to illicit markets abroad.

src: die sapd het ook deur middel van sy nasionale ingrypingseenhede begin vordering maak in die bestryding van georganiseerde misdaad, insluitend dwelmsindikate, bendes en onwettige mynbedrywighede.
tgt: through its national inter vention units, the saps has also been making progress in combating organised crime, including drug syndicates, gangs and illegal mining.

src: die sapd is besig om n taakspan op die been te bring om onwettige mynbedrywighede vas te vat, tesame met ander taakspanne wat te doen het met konstruksieterreinafpersing, koperen kabeldiefstal, en diefstal en vandalisme van ekonomiese infrastruktuur.
tgt: the saps is establishing a task team to tackle illegal mining, alongside other task teams dealing with construction site extortion, copper and cable theft, and theft and vandalism of economic infrastructure.

src: benewens die sukses van doeltreffende polisiëring in die aanpak van ekonomiese misdade, gaan die harde werk van die sapd in breër misdade dikwels ongesiens verby.
tgt: besides the successes of effective policing in tackling economic crimes, the hard work of the saps in dealing with broader crime often goes unacknowledged.

src: byvoorbeeld, in die afgelope finansiële jaar het die sapd se misdaadondersoekeenheid 206 lewenslange vonnisse teen 209 aangeklaagdes verseker, waarvan 154 vir moord en verkragting was.
tgt: in the last financial year, for example, saps crime investigations secured 206 life sentences against 209 accused, of which 154 were for murder and rape.

src: die sapd se eenhede vir gesinsgeweld, kinderbeskerming en seksuele oortreders het 356 lewenslange vonnisse verseker teen 266 aangeklaagdes.
tgt: the saps family violence, child protection and sexual offences units secured 356 life sentences against 266 accused.

src: operasies vir die opsporing van verdagtes het tot 13 000 inhegtenisnames gelei.
tgt: suspect tracing operations resulted in over 13,000 arrests.

src: gegewe die hoë vlakke van misdaad in ons samelewing, is daar duidelik baie meer wat nog gedoen moet word.
tgt: given the high levels of crime in our society, there is clearly much more that must be done.

src: maar hierdie syfers toon aan dat baie misdadigers wel inhegtenis geneem en suksesvol vervolg word.
tgt: but these figures do show that many criminals are being arrested and successfully prosecuted.

src: hulle word nie toegelaat om met moord weg te kom nie.
tgt: they are not being allowed to get away with murder.

src: die direktoraat vir prioriteitsmisdaadondersoeke, ook bekend as die valke, het al sy teikens vir die vorige finansiële jaar behaal, wat beteken inhegtenisnames en skuldigbevindings, batebeslaglegging, beperkingsen konfiskeringsbevele en verbeuringsbevele tot die waarde van miljoene rand.
tgt: the directorate for prio rity crime investigation, known as the hawks, achieved all of its targets for the last financial year, resulting in arrests and convictions, asset seizures, restraint and confiscation orders and forfeiture orders to the value of millions of rands.

src: die inhegtenisnames en skuldigbevindings wat deur die valk bewerkstellig is, sluit in onwettige mynaktiwiteite, skade aan brandstofpypleidings, kontantwarooftogte en polisiemoorde.
tgt: the arrests and convictions secured by the hawks included for illegal mining, damage to fuel pipelines, cash in transit heists and for police murders.

src: die valke het begin om saam met die nvg se ondersoekdirektoraat vir gevalle wat voortspruit uit die staatskapingskommissie, te werk.
tgt: the hawks have started work with the npa investigating directorate on cases emanating from the state capture commission.

src: die sapd ondersteun die stryd teen geslagsgebaseerde geweld deur meer slagoffervriendelike vertrekke by polisiestasies in te rig en die verkryging van ongeveer n halfmiljoen bewysinsamelingstelle wat na polisiestasies versprei word.
tgt: the saps has been sup porting the fight against genderbased violence, establishing more victimfriendly rooms at police stations and procuring nearly half a million evidence collection kits to be distributed to stations.

src: polisiëring kan nie slaag sonder die samewerking van gemeenskappe nie.
tgt: policing cannot be suc cessful without the cooperation of communities.

src: om hierdie rede fokus ons op die uitbreiding van die netwerk van gemeenskapspolisiëringsforums om beide polisiëring en gemeenskapsverhoudings te verbeter.
tgt: for this reason, we are focusing on expanding the network of community policing forums to improve both policing and community relations.

src: ons loof die gemeenskappe wat verantwoordelikheid neem om hul omgewing veilig te hou deur middel van straatpatrollies, misdaadbewusmakingsveldtogte en ander aktiwiteite.
tgt: we commend the com munities that are taking responsibility for keeping their areas safe through street patrols, crime awareness campaigns and other activities.

src: deur gebruik te maak van die verslag van die kundige paneel as n grondslag vir organisatoriese hervorming, is ons besig om hulpbronne te herorganiseer en te herprioritiseer, kapasiteit te verbeter en wetstoepassingskapasiteit oral oor te versterk.
tgt: using the report of the expert panel as a basis for organisational reform, we are reorganising and reprioritising resources, improving capacity and strengthening law enforcement capacity across the board.

src: om n polisieman of polisievrou te wees, moet een van die moeilikste en gevaarlikste beroepe in die land wees, sowel as n beroep waar jy onder die meeste druk verkeer, en is dikwels n ondankbare taak.
tgt: being a policeman or policewoman must be one of the most difficult, pressured and dangerous jobs in our country, and often a thankless task.

src: alhoewel die publiek se frustrasie met misdaad verstaanbaar is, is dit jammer dat dit aanleiding gee tot vyandigheid teenoor ons polisie wat voortgaan om ons te dien en te beskerm.
tgt: while public frustration with crime is understandable, it is unfortunate that this should give rise to hostility towards our police, who continue to serve and protect.

src: soos wat die regering werk om die polisie van die nodige hulpbronne, opleiding en begroting te voorsien om hul werk te doen, doen ek n beroep op alle suidafrikaners om hul deel te doen en op te tree om ons strate en gemeenskappe misdaadvry te hou.
tgt: as government works to provide the police with the necessary resources, training and budgets to perform their work, i call on all south africans to join the effort to keep our streets and communities free of crime.

src: nuwe benadering tot die stryd teen korrupsie toon resultate vukuzenzele unnamed die stryd teen kor rupsie benodig beide ferm poli tiese wil en onafhanklike, bekwame misdaadbestry dingsinstellings.
tgt: new approach to fight corruption gets results vukuzenzele unnamed the fight against corruption requires both firm political will and independent, capable crimefighting institutions.

src: tydens my eerste staats rede in 2018 het ek myself daartoe verbind om die gety te draai teen korrupsie in ons staatsinstellings en om bedrog en sameswering in die privaatsektor met dieselfde intensiteit en doelgerigtheid te beveg.
tgt: in my first state of the nation address, in 2018, i made a commitment to turn the tide against corruption in our public institutions and fight fraud and collusion in the private sector with the same intensity and purpose.

src: ons werk sedertdien hard om ons wetstoepassings agentskappe en verwante agentskappe te versterk.
tgt: since then, we have been working hard to strengthen and support our law enforcement and related agencies.

src: ons het die ondersoekdi rektoraat in die nasionale vervolgingsowerheid gevorm om ernstige gevalle van korrupsie aan te spreek en die spesiale tribunaal om die spesiale ondersoekeenheid (soe) in staat te stel om gesteelde fondse makliker te herwin.
tgt: we set up the investigating directorate in the national prosecuting authority to deal with serious corruption and the special tribunal to enable the special investigating unit (siu) to more easily recover stolen funds.

src: ons het ook steun en hulpbronne verskaf aan ander kritiese misdaadbes trydende liggame soos die eenheid vir batebeslagleg ging, die gespesialiseerde kommersiële misdaadeen heid en die direktoraat vir prioriteitsmisdaadonder soeke, bekend as die valke.
tgt: we have also provided support and resources to other critical crimefighting bodies like the asset forfeiture unit, specialised commercial crimes unit and directorate for priority crime investigation, known as the hawks.

src: dié werk is besig om resultate te toon.
tgt: these efforts are producing results.

src: die ondersoekdirek toraat het, deur middel van samewerking met sleutelentiteite in die strafregstelsel, meer as 20 korrupsiesake in die laaste boekjaar op die rol geplaas en 65 verdagtes is aange kla, insluitend verskeie ‘staatskapingsake’ asook ander ernstige sake van korrupsie.
tgt: through collaboration with key entities in the criminal justice system, the investigating directorate has enrolled over 20 corruption cases in the last financial year and 65 accused have been charged.

src: die eenheid vir bate beslaglegging het in die afgelope boekjaar hofbe vele aangevra en ontvang om bates verwant aan korrupsiemisdaad ter waarde van r5.4 miljard te vries, met r70 miljoen wat aan die fonds vir herwonne kriminele bates oorbetaal is.
tgt: in the past financial year, the asset forfeiture unit obtained freezing orders to the value of r5.4 billion relating to corruption offences, with r70 million paid into the criminal assets recovery fund.

src: die soe het in die afge lope agt jaar fondse en bates ter waarde van r2.6 miljard herwin en kont rakte ter waarde van r18 miljard ter syde gestel.
tgt: over the past eight years, the siu has recovered funds and assets to the value of r2.6 billion and set aside contracts to the value of r18 billion.

src: n somtotaal van 119 sake ter waarde van meer as r13 miljard is deur die soe by die spesiale tribunaal op die rol geplaas.
tgt: a total of 119 cases worth more than r13 billion have been enrolled by the siu at the special tribunal.

src: korrupsie is n besondere ingewikkelde misdaad om te vervolg.
tgt: corruption is an extremely complex crime to prosecute.

src: oortreders wend hulself tot uiterstes om hul spoor te bedek.
tgt: perpetrators go to extraordinary lengths to cover their tracks.

src: hulle stig rak maatskappye om hul verdagte transaskies weg te steek, verskuif geld vinnig en gereeld tussen veelvuldige rekeninge, gee misleidende inligting oor hul inkomste aan die belastingowerhede en, in die geval van staatsbeamp tes, gebruik vriende en familielede om vir tenders aansoek te doen om hul betrokkenheid te versteek.
tgt: they set up shelf companies to hide dodgy transactions, rapidly moving monies between multiple accounts, misrepresenting income to the tax authorities, and, in the case of government employees, using friends and relatives to apply for tenders to mask their involvement.

src: dit beteken dat die ower hede se teenaksie net so gesofistikeerd moet wees.
tgt: this means that the response of the authorities has to be just as sophisticated.

src: ons het in 2020 die mul tidissiplinêre fusiesentrum gestig as n operasionele spilpunt om prioriteits finansiële misdaad aan te spreek, insluitend korrupsie.
tgt: in 2020, we established a multidisciplinary fusion centre as an operational hub to address priority financial crimes, including corruption.

src: die sentrum verenig die ondersoekbe kwaamhede van die staat se misdaadvoorkomingsen sekuriteitstrukture met dié van die finansiële intelligensiesentrum, wat intelligensieinligting vir wetstoepassingsagent skappe inwin en opstel vir gebruik in hul ondersoeke.
tgt: the centre brings together the investigative capabilities of government’s crime prevention and security structures and those of the financial intelligence centre, which develops intelligence for law enforcement agencies to use in their investigations.

src: twee jaar sedert die fusie sentrum gestig is, het hul multidissiplinêre benade ring om "die geld te volg" merkwaardige resultate gelewer.
tgt: two years since the fusion centre was established, its multidisciplinary approach to ‘follow the money’ has yielded significant results.

src: die werk van die fusie sentrum het in die afgelope boekjaar 276 ondersoeke na bedrog en korrupsie gesteun.
tgt: in the last financial year, the work of the fusion centre supported 276 fraud and corruption investigations.

src: nagenoeg r659 miljoen is aan die staat terugbesorg danksy die bewaring en herwinning van die misdaadopbreng ste.
tgt: approximately r659 million was restored to the state through preservation and recovery of the proceeds of crime.

src: nagenoeg r613 miljoen se bates in verdagte krimi nele opbrengste is gevries.
tgt: approximately r613 million in suspected criminal proceeds were frozen.

src: die fusiesentrum is aanvanklik gestig om korrupsie met betrekking tot kovid19verwante aankope en verkrygings te ondersoek.
tgt: the fusion centre was initially set up to investigate corruption around covidrelated procurement.

src: hul man daat is intussen uitgebrei om geldwassery, bedrog, wanadministrasie, die finansiering van terrorisme en ander ernstige misdaad in te sluit.
tgt: its mandate is now being expanded to include moneylaundering, fraud, maladministration, terrorist financing and other serious financial crimes.

src: die valke het onlangs sommige van die vordering wat gemaak is deur die antikorrupsietaakmag — wat deel vorm van die fusiesentrum — uitgelig.
tgt: the hawks recently outlined some of the progress that has been made by the anticorruption task team, of which the fusion centre forms part.

src: daar is tussen die 2019 en 2022 boekjare 554 verdag tes in hegtenis geneem vir korrupsie, waarvan 142 skuldig bevind is.
tgt: between the 2019 and 2022 financial years, 554 suspects were arrested for corruption, of which 142 were convicted.

src: nog n finansiële intel ligensiemiddel is die lewenstyloudits wat deur die suidafrikaanse inkomstediens (said) uitgevoer word.
tgt: another vital financial intelligence tool is the lifestyle audits conducted by the south african revenue service (sars).

src: said het verlede jaar 25 lewenstyloudits ter waarde van meer as r450 miljoen voltooi om teenstrydighede tussen verklaarde inkomste en individue se lewenstyl uit te klaar.
tgt: last year, sars completed 25 lifestyle audits to the value of over r450 million to resolve discrepancies between declared income and an individual’s lifestyle.

src: dit is duidelik dat die maatreëls wat ons as admi nistrasie ingestel het om die kapasiteit, bekwaam heid en geloofwaardigheid van die instellings wat betrokke is in die stryd teen korrupsie vrugte afwerp.
tgt: it is clear that the measures we have taken as this administration to restore the capacity, capability and credibility of the institutions involved in the fight against corruption are having a demonstrable impact.

src: die gesinchroniseerde werk van die wetstoepas singsagentskappe slaan misdadigers waar dit die meeste seermaak: in die sak.
tgt: the synchronised work of all the law enforcement agencies is hitting criminals where it hurts most: in their pockets.

src: openbare fondse wat geplunder en herlei is, word herwin en diegene verantwoordelik vir dié misdade word deur ons howe vervolg.
tgt: public funds that were looted and diverted are being recovered and those responsible for these acts are being prosecuted by our courts.

src: om ons harde werk om die gety teen korrupsie te draai, te versterk, kondig ek nuwe aanstellings tot die nasionale teenkorrup sie adviesraad aan.
tgt: to further strengthen our efforts to turn the tide against corruption, i am announcing appointments to the national anticorruption advisory council.

src: die raad sal belang hebbendes regoor die samelewing byeenbring vir oorsig oor die imple mentering van die staat se teenkorrupsiestrategie.
tgt: the council will bring together stakeholders from across society to oversee the implementation of government’s anticorruption strategy.

src: die nuwe liggaam sal die staat adviseer oor kritiese voorkomingsmaatreëls, institusionele bekwaam heid en die hulpbronne benodig vir die voor koming van herhaalde pogings tot staatskaping asook om bedrog en kor rupsie in suidafrika uit te roei.
tgt: the new body will advise government on the critical preventative measures, institutional capabilities and resources needed to prevent a recurrence of state capture and to stamp out fraud and corruption in south africa.

src: wees op die uitkyk vir kinderkanker more matshediso gebrek aan kennis en bewustheid van kinderkanker en die simptome daarvan veroorsaak dat baie suidafrikaanse kinders slegs gediagnoseer word wanneer die siekte reeds in n gevor derde stadium is.
tgt: look out for early signs of childhood cancer more matshediso a lack of awareness of childhood cancer and its symptoms means that many south african children are diagnosed when the disease is at an advanced stage.

src: hoe vroeër kanker diagno seer en behandel word, hoe beter die kanse vir n volle herstel.
tgt: the earlier cancer is diagnosed and treated, the higher the chance of a full recovery.

src: die kinderkankervereni ging childhood cancer foundation south africa (choc) se kommuniska siekoördineerder, taryn seegers, sê dat om die algemene tekens van kanker onder jongmense te ken, jou kan help om n lewe te red.
tgt: childhood cancer foundation south africa (choc) communication coordinator taryn seegers says by knowing the common signs of cancer in young people, you could help save a life.

src: "die tekens en simptome kan moeilik wees om raak te sien tussen die gewone stampe, kneusmerke, groei fases en swaaie in gemoed.
tgt: "the signs and symptoms can be difficult to spot amid the normal bumps, bruises, growth spurts and mood swings.

src: vroeë bespeuring van kinderkanker is egter van sleutelbelang," sê sy.
tgt: however, early detection is key," she says.

src: volgens die kankerver eniging van suidafrika, cansa, word tussen 800 en 1 000 suidafrikaanse kinders jaarliks met kanker gediagnoseer.
tgt: according to the cancer association of south africa (cansa), between 800 to 1 000 south african children are diagnosed with cancer each year.

src: die vereniging beraam egter dat die helfte van die land se kinders wat kanker het, nooit diagnoseer word nie.
tgt: however, the association estimates that half of the children with cancer in south africa are never diagnosed.

src: choc het bewustheidspro gramme in gemeenskappe van stapel gestuur wat ouers en kinders bewus maak van die vroeë waarskuwingste kens waarvoor hulle op die uitkyk moet wees om te help verseker dat kanker so gou as moontlik gediagnoseer word.
tgt: to help ensure cancer is spotted as soon as possible, choc runs awareness programmes in communities, telling parents and children about the early warning signs they must look out for.

src: die vereniging ondersteun kinders en tieners met kanker of lewensgevaarlike bloedsiektes, asook hul gesinne.
tgt: the foundation supports children and teenagers with cancer or lifethreatening blood disorders and their families.

src: "ons streef daarna om vroeë bespeuring en doel treffende behandeling te bevorder.
tgt: "we aim to improve early detection and facilitate effective treatment.

src: choc kan ter enige oomblik meer as 1 500 kinders en tieners onder hul sorg hê en ook psigososiale steun aan meer as 1 500 gesinne lewer," sê seegers.
tgt: at any one time, choc can have over 1 500 children and teenagers in its care, while offering psychosocial support to over 1 500 families," says seegers.

src: sy vertel dat choc in die afgelope boekjaar steun aan 1 724 kinders, 553 tieners en 2 232 volwassenes deur middel van hul kernprogramme kon lewer.
tgt: in the past financial year, seegers says choc was able to serve 1 724 children, 553 teenagers and 2 232 adults through its core programmes.

src: "ons dienste behels emosionele steun tydens die tydperk wanneer hulle kanker het, bemoediging, sorg aan die einde van hul lewens en verliesberading en steun.
tgt: "our services include emotional support through their cancer journey, comfort, endoflife care and bereavement support," says seegers.

src: "st siluan se tekens van kinderkanker s – soek vroeg mediese hulp vir blywende simp tome.
tgt: st siluan’s signs of childhood cancer s – seek medical help early for ongoing symptoms.

src: i – wit kolletjie in die oog, skielike skeelheid of blindheid, of n oogbal wat uitswel.
tgt: i – white spot in the eye, new squint, sudden blindness or bulging eyeball.

src: geen kitsoplossing vir beurtkrag, maar goeie vordering word gemaak vukuzenzele unnamed die voortslepende beurtkrag in die afgelope weke was vir ieder en elke inwoner in die land n bron van beson dere frustrasie en uitdaging.
tgt: no quick fix for load shedding but real progress is being made vukuzenzele unnamed for every person living in this country, the past weeks of load shedding have been extremely frustrating and challenging.

src: die wydverspreide publieke woede is heeltemal te verstane.
tgt: the widespread public anger is wholly justified.

src: met eskom wat gedwing is om weereens beurtkrag te implementeer ter be skerming van die nasionale kragnetwerk moes indi vidue, huishoudings en besighede verlief neem met kragonderbrekings van tot vier ure op n slag.
tgt: with eskom forced to once more implement load shedding to protect the national grid, individuals, households and businesses have had to contend with power interruptions for up to four hours at a time.

src: beurtkrag is veel meer as net ongerieflik — dit hou verreikende gevolge in vir bykans elke deel van ons samelewing, van onderwys tot die verskaffing van gesondheidsdienste.
tgt: it has dire consequences for nearly every part of our society from education to public safety to the provision of health services.

src: beide klein en groot sakeonderne mings verloor inkomste en die energiekrisis is besig om belegging en ons ekono miese herstel te knou.
tgt: large and small businesses alike are losing money and the energy crisis is endangering investment and our economic recovery.

src: daar is n gevoel van wan hoop dat die situasie nie besig is om te verbeter nie en dat daar geen merkbare lig aan die einde van die tonnel is nie.
tgt: there is a sense of despair that the situation does not seem to be improving and that there appears to be no end in sight to this crisis.

src: dog, selfs in die donker nag van beurtkrag, is en moet daar n einde aan ons energiekrisis in sig wees.
tgt: yet, even in the darkness of load shedding there is and must be an end in sight to our electricity crisis.

src: ons is besig om vordering te maak in die implemen tering van die bykomende maatreëls wat ek in julie aangekondig het, alhoewel dit nie dadelik merkbaar sal wees nie.
tgt: we are making progress in the implementation of the additional actions i announced in july, even though the effects may not be immediately felt.

src: gegewe die onvoor spelbaarheid van die dienslewering deur eskom se stelsel steenkoolaange drewe kragstasies sal ons beurtkrag nie oor die kort termyn kan uitskakel nie.
tgt: given the unpredictable performance of eskom’s fleet of coalfired power stations, we will not be able to eliminate load shedding in the short term.

src: dit is ongelukkig die harde werklikheid wat ons in die oë staar met dié situasie, wat n lang geskiedenis het.
tgt: this is the unfortunate reality of our situation, which has had a long history.

src: ons onmiddellike doelwit is egter om die frekwensie en felheid van beurtkrag te verminder deur die onder brekings by kragstasie aan te spreek.
tgt: our goal in the immediate term however is to reduce the frequency and severity of load shedding by addressing power station breakdowns.

src: dit is n merkbare uit daging, gegewe die gemiddelde ouderdom van kragstasies en die gebrek aan voldoende, kritiese en gereelde onderhoud in die verlede.
tgt: this is a significant challenge given the average age of power stations, and that in the past critical maintenance was not undertaken at the necessary intervals.

src: eskom is besig om dringende maatreëls te implementeer om die dienslewering van die onderskeie kragstasies te verbeter, wat die prioriteit is totdat nuwegenerasie energieprojekte op die been gebring word.
tgt: eskom is urgently implementing measures to improve plant performance, which is a priority until new generation power projects are brought online.

src: die kritiese kwessie van steenkoolvoorsiening word aangespreek, insluitend nouer samewerking met transnet met betrekking tot die vervoer van steenkool en die monitering van die konsekwentheid van die lewering van steenkool myne aan kragstasies.
tgt: it is addressing the critical issue of coal supply, including working with transnet on the transportation of coal and monitoring the consistency of the supply from collieries to stations.

src: die swak gehalte van steenkool word ook deur eskom aangespreek, aangesien dit dikwels onderbrekings in kragstasies veroorsaak.
tgt: eskom is also addressing the poor quality of coal, which often leads to plant breakdowns.

src: kundiges met ervaring in die bedryf van kragstasies word herroep om bystand te lewer met aanlegbedryf, bestuur en mentorskap.
tgt: people with experience in running power stations are being brought back to help with plant operation, management and mentorship.

src: samesprekings is onderweg om plaaslike inhoudsvereistes vir spaar onderdele te vergemaklik en om die toerustingver vaardigers te gebruik om onderhoud te onderneem om sodoende te verseker dat kritiese onderhoud sonder vertragings onder neem word.
tgt: to ensure that critical maintenance is undertaken without delays, discussions are underway to ease local content requirements for spare parts and to use the equipment manufacturers to undertake maintenance.

src: eskom het sedert julie gewerk aan die verkryging van noodkrag om die onmiddellike energiete kort aan te spreek en hulle het in die afgelope week kragkoopprogramme vir 1 000 megawatt se nood kapasiteit met maatskappye met bestaande opwekkings kapasiteit geloods en om die invoer van krag vanaf ons buurlande te verseker.
tgt: to address the immediate energy shortfall, eskom has since july worked on procuring emergency power, and in the last week launched power purchase programmes for 1 000 megawatts of emergency capacity from companies with existing generation capacity and to secure imports from neighbouring countries.

src: die staat skenk noukeurige aandag aan die vaardig hede, ervaring en vermoëns van die eskomleierskap om te verseker dat die maat skappy die beste mense op alle vlakke van die orga nisasie het.
tgt: government is giving close attention to the skills, experience and capabilities of the eskom leadership to ensure that the company has the best people at all levels of the organisation.

src: dié ingrypings sal daartoe bydra om die felheid en die frekwensie van beurtkrag te verminder terwyl ons die land se energievoorraad verhoog deur bykomende, nuwe krag tot die energie stelsel te bekom.
tgt: these interventions will help to reduce the severity and frequency of load shedding as we are bringing new power onto the grid over the medium term to increase energy supply.

src: die staat het onlangs kragkoopooreenkomste vir 420 mw met die eerste drie voorkeurbieërs onder bodvenster 5 van die pro gram vir hernubare energie, gesluit.
tgt: recently, government signed power purchase agreements for 420 mw with the first three preferred bidders under bid window 5 of the renewable energy programme.

src: die drie projekte sal na verwagting in oktober 2024 by die netwerk aansluit en voorbereiding is onder weg om ooreenkomste met die oorblywende 22 voor keurbieërs te sluit.
tgt: the three projects are expected to connect to the grid in october 2024, and preparations are underway to sign with the remaining 22 preferred bidders.

src: die hoeveelheid opwek kingskapasiteit wat van bodvenster 6 verkry moet word, sal vanaf 2 600 mw tot 4 200 mw verhoog word.
tgt: the amount of generation capacity to be procured from bid window 6 will increase 2 600 mw to 4 200 mw.

src: die nasionale enrgiekri siskomitee wat ek in julie aangestel het, is besig om aandag te skenk aan die beleidsen wetgewende hervormings wat n meer doeltreffende, mededin gende elektrisiteitsektor sal bewerkstellig.
tgt: the national electricity crisis committee i appointed in july is attending to the legislative and policy reforms that will establish a more efficient, competitive electricity sector.

src: ons het die wysigings wat die lisensiëringsdrumpel vir privaatopwekkingsprojekte verwyder, vir openbare kommentaar gepubliseer.
tgt: we have published for public comment the amendment that removes the licensing threshold for private generation projects.

src: dit sal die weg baan vir belegging in groter projekte op nutsskaal wat spoedig nuwe opwekkingskapasiteit tot die netwerk sal voeg.
tgt: this will pave the way for investment in larger, utilityscale projects that will rapidly add new generation capacity to the grid.

src: die vereiste van omge wingsbemagtigings met betrekking tot oordragin frastruktuur in strategiese areas waar die risiko tot die omgewing laag is, is opge hef.
tgt: the need for environmental authorisations has been waived for transmission infrastructure in strategic corridors where risk to the environment is low.

src: die tydraamwerke vir energieprojekte wat grond gebruiksmagtigings en goedkeuring vir netwerk aansluiting ontvang, is aansienlik verminder.
tgt: the timeframes for energy projects receiving land use authorisations and grid connection approvals has been substantially reduced, as has the national energy regulator’s registration process for generation facilities.

src: ons moet, terwyl ons daaraan werk om die voorsiening van energie te verhoog, ook daarna poog om die vraag na energie te verlaag, veral gedurende spitstye.
tgt: while we work to increase the supply of electricity, we must increase efforts to reduce demand, particularly at peak times.

src: ons moet as landsburgers saamwerk om die druk op die nasionale netwerk te verminder.
tgt: we must come together as citizens to alleviate the pressure on the national grid.

src: dit beteken dat ons elektrisiteit spaarsamig moet gebruik, onwet tige aansluitings moet rapporteer en vir die elektri siteit wat ons gebruik moet betaal.
tgt: this means using electricity sparingly, reporting illegal connections and paying for the electricity we use.

src: sakeondernemings, huishoudings en staatsde partemente wat aan eskom geld verskuldig is, moet dit betaal sodat eskom beter in staat is om die kritiese onderhoud wat nodig is om die ligte aangeskakel te hou, te onderneem.
tgt: businesses, households and government departments that owe eskom must pay up so that eskom is better able to undertake the critical maintenance that is needed to keep the lights.

src: met die voortdurende beurtkrag wat eindeloos blyk te wees, is dit al te maklik om moed op te gee dat ons ooit dié probleem gaan kan oplos.
tgt: as we continue to experience load shedding, there is a great tempation to give up hope that we will ever solve this problem.

src: stamselskenking is pynloos en kan lewens red kgaogelo letsebe mfundo mxolisi ngwenya (30) van durban, kwazulunatal is een van die min swart stamselskenk ers in die land.
tgt: stem cell donation is a painless way to help save lives kgaogelo letsebe mfundo mxolisi ngwenya (30) from durban, kwazulunatal, is one of the few black stem cell donors in the country.

src: die suidafrikaanse been murgregister (sabmr) sê dat meer mense van kleur as skenkers moet registreer aan gesien n pasiënt n veel beter kans het om n gepaste skenk er in hul eie etniese groep te vind.
tgt: the south african bone marrow registry (sabmr) says more people of colour need to register as donors because a patient has the best chance of finding a match in their ethnic grouping.

src: slegs 10% van die 78 000 geregistreerde skenk ers in die land is, volgens die register, swartmense, met 9.9% indiërs/asiërs en 67% blankes.
tgt: according to the registry, only 10% of the 78 000 registered donors are black, while 9.9% are indian/asian and 67% are white.

src: die sabmr sê dat die meeste skenkers stamselle skenk deur middel van n proses genaamd perifere bloedstamselversameling.
tgt: the sabmr says most donors donate through a process called peripheral blood stem cell collection.

src: hulle sê dat dieselfde stam selle wat in jou beenmurg gevind kan word, ook in jou sirkulerende bloed teen woordig is.
tgt: it says the same stem cells found in your bone marrow are also found in your circulating blood.

src: n niesjirurgiese, buitepasiënt prosedure word uitgevoer om dié selle te versamel.
tgt: a nonsurgical, outpatient procedure is done to collect these cells.

src: bloed word deur middel van n naald in een arm getrek en vandaar beweeg dit deur n masjien wat die stamselle verwy der en versamel, waarna die bloed terugvloei in jou liggaam deur n ander naald in jou ander arm.
tgt: blood is removed through a needle in one arm, passed through a machine that collects stem cells and returned through a needle in your other arm.

src: stamselle is belangrik vir die gene sing van bloedsiektes soos leukemie, beenmurggebrek of aplasie.
tgt: stem cells are important to cure blood diseases such as leukaemia, marrow failure or aplasia.

src: ngwenya, n sportsbe stuurder by die durban universiteit van tegnologie, sê hy het aanvanklik in 2012 van stamselskenking gehoor toe die sabmr n promo sieveldtog by n plaaslike kompleks aangebied het.
tgt: ngwenya, a sports manager at the durban university of technology, says he first learnt about stem cell donation in 2012 when the sabmr held a roadshow at a local complex.

src: "ek wou nog altyd bloed skenk en is altyd gretig om te help, so ek het daarvoor gegaan.
tgt: "i have always donated blood and am always eager to help, so i went for it.

src: dit was regtig maklik want hulle het net n wattemonster vanuit my mond geneem en gesê dat ek n oproep kan verwag."
tgt: it was really easy because they just took a swab in the mouth and said i should expect a call."

src: die wattemonster vanuit n potensiële skenker se mond word getoets en hul beson derhede word gestoor sodat hulle gekontak kan word indien hulle as n gepaste skenker vir iemand wat stam selle benodig, geïdentifiseer word.
tgt: the sample taken from a potential donor’s mouth is tested and their details are stored so that they can be contacted if they become a match for someone in need of stem cells.

src: "ek het laasjaar n oproep ontvang met die nuus dat ek n perfekte skenker vir iemand was.
tgt: "last year, i received a call that they had found a perfect match.

src: die proses om stamselle te skenk neem redelik lank en behels onge veer 13 verskillende toetse wat wissel van n volle fisiese ondersoek (om algemene gesondheid te toets) tot bloedtoetse.
tgt: the process to donate is quite lengthy and involves about 13 different tests, ranging from a physical [to check overall health] to blood tests.

src: ek moes myself ook op n daaglikse basis inspuit," vertel hy.
tgt: i also had to inject myself on a daily basis," he says.

src: program vir bemagtiging van slagoffers herstel hoop owen mngadi die thohoyandou slagofferbemagtigings program (tvep) poog om hoop en vertroue in die regstelsel te herstel met intensiewe inisiatiewe wat daarop gemik is om slagoffers van geslagsgebaseerde geweld (ggg) en verkragting by te staan deur hulle van die nodige psigososiale dienste te voorsien.
tgt: victim empowerment programme restores hope owen mngadi the thohoyandou victim empowerment programme (tvep) strives to restore hope and confidence in the justice system through its intensive initiatives aimed at assisting survivors of genderbased violence (gbv) and rape by providing them with psychosocial services.

src: die tvep , wat 20 jaar gelede in limpopo gestig is, is werksaam in die tshilidzinihospitaal en donald fraserhospitaal in die plaaslike thulamelamunisipaliteit.
tgt: founded in limpopo over 20 years ago, the tvep operates in tshilidzini and donald fraser hospitals under the thulamela local municipality.

src: die waarnemende direkteur, fhatuwani manthada, sê die program is daarop gemik om n gesindheid van geen verdraagsaamheid teenoor seksuele aanranding, ggg en kinder mishandeling te vestig onder die inwoners van thohoyandou, aangesien sulke voorvalle veral in hierdie area voorkom.
tgt: its acting director fhatuwani manthada says the programme aims to instil a zerotolerance attitude towards sexual assault, gbv and child abuse among thohoyandou residents, given the fact that these cases are prevalent in the area.

src: hy sê dat misdaadstatistiek in die verlede veral aangedui het dat daar baie verkragtings in thohoyandou voorkom; daarenteen het die tvep het groot vordering gemaak in bewusmaking en die voorsiening van traumaberadingsdienste om die skade te beperk.
tgt: he says in the past, crime statistics indicated that there were many rape cases in thohoyandou, but the tvep has made great strides in raising awareness and providing trauma counselling services to curb the scourge.

src: manthada sê die program is tevrede met die vordering wat gemaak is om inwoners te help om hul regte te verstaan en misdaad aan te meld, met die wêreld wat die veldtog van 16 dae van aktivisme van geen geweld teen vroue en kinders van 25 november tot 10 desember gedenk.
tgt: as the world will be observing the 16 days of activism for no violence against women and children from 25 november to 10 december, manthada says the programme is satisfied with the progress made with encouraging residents to understand their rights and report crimes.

src: "die tvep ontvang tussen 80 en 100 slagoffers van huishoudelike geweld elke maand, terwyl 45 tot 50 verkragtingsgevalle maandeliks aangemeld word," sê manthada.
tgt: "the tvep receives between 80 and 100 victims of domestic violence every month, while 45 to 50 rape cases are reported monthly," says manthada.

src: die program se eenstop sentrums bied n wye verskei denheid dienste aan slagoffers, insluitend toegang tot regshulp, beskerming van slagoffers teen hul aanvallers, monitering van hofsake, asook berading en bemagtiging deur vaardigheidsontwikkeling om sodoende die slagoffers te help om n nuwe begin te maak.
tgt: the programme’s onestop centres offer a wide range of services to victims, including access to legal assistance, protection of victims against perpetrators, court case monitoring, counselling and empowerment through skills development, thus giving the victims a fresh start.

src: manthada sê dat die tvep in noue samewerking met die suidafrikaanse polisiediens, departement van gesondheid en departement van maatskaplike ontwikkeling betrokke is om te voorkom dat die slagoffers sekondêre trauma opdoen tydens die proses om n saak aan te meld.
tgt: manthada states that the tvep works closely with the south african police service, department of health and department of social development to prevent secondary traumatisation of victims in the process of opening a case.

src: "in verkragtingsake kom gesondheidsorgwerkers en die polisie na die tvepsentrums om slagoffers by te staan om kriminele sake teen die oortreders aanhangig te maak en ook om beradingsdienste te verskaf," sê hy.
tgt: "in rape cases, healthcare workers and the police come to the tvep centres to assist victims to open criminal cases against the perpetrators and also provide counselling services," he says.

src: die tvep kan slagoffers tot 14 dae akkommodeer, alhoewel die reëling verleng kan word in gevalle waar die hele familie of kinders betrek word.
tgt: the tvep accommodates victims for up to 14 days, however, the arrangement could be extended in cases that involve the whole family or children.

src: "ons het bemagtigingseenhede wat openbare dialoog voer en mense oor hul regte opvoed.
tgt: "we have empowerment unity that conducts public dialogues and educates people about their rights.

src: ons bedien meer as een miljoen inwoners van thohoyandou en omliggende gebiede.
tgt: we serve more than one million residents from thohoyandou and surrounding areas.

src: ons het dit reggekry om hoop te herstel en mense het nou weer vertroue in die regstelsel weens ons verhouding met die polisie," sê hy.
tgt: we have managed to restore hope and people now have trust in the criminal justice [system] through our relationship with the police," he says.

src: die tvep het ook werk geskep vir 44 mense wat in verskeie departemente werk, waaronder finansies, menslike hulpbronne en evaluasie.
tgt: the tvep has also created employment for 44 people who serve in various departments such as finance, human resources and evaluation.

src: ten spyte van die feit dat die tvep deurlopende finansiering van r90 000 kwartaalliks van die provinsiale departement van gesondheid van limpopo ontvang, is dit wel deur kovid19 geraak aangesien baie skenkers kop uitgetrek het en dit dus die organisasie se operasionele prosesse negatief beïnvloed het.
tgt: despite receiving continuous funding of r90 000 quarterly from the limpopo department of social development, the tvep was affected by covid19 as many funders pulled out, thus negatively affecting the organisation’s operational processes.

src: die reaksiefonds vir slagoffers van geslagsgebaseerde geweld en vrouemoord, wat deur president cyril ramaphosa op die been gebring is tesame met die internasionale vroueforum van suidafrika en maatskaplike vennote, het egter in februarie vanjaar die program ondersteun.
tgt: however, the genderbased violence and femicide (gbvf) response fund, which was launched by president cyril ramaphosa, together with the international women’s forum of south africa and social partners have assisted the programme.

src: die tvep was van die eerste groep organisasies wat hulle teen ggg beywer wat finansiering ontvang het.
tgt: the tvep was among the first batch of the organisations, that fight against gbvf, to receive funding.

src: met die somtotaal van r128 miljoen wat ingesamel is danksy bydraes uit die privaatsektor se multisektorale fonds sal die gbvffonds help met die implementering en bystand van die nasionale strategiese plan vir gggv en dit ondersteun.
tgt: with the sum of r128 million that was raised through contributions by the private sector, multisectoral fund, the gbvf fund will assist and support the implementation of the national strategic plan on gbvf.

src: daar is r250 000 aan die tvep toegeken vir die huidige finansiële jaar en dit sal verdere finansiering vir 2023 ontvang.
tgt: the tvep has been allocated r250 000 for the current year and will receive more funding for 2023. manthada says the funds have enabled the tvep to reach out to more victims and keep the organisation running.

src: manthada sê die fondse het die tvep in staat gestel om na meer slagoffers uit te reik en ook om die organisasie se lopende koste te dek.
tgt: murendeni vhengani (26) is a survivor who was rescued by the tvep from her abusive exboyfriend.

src: sy, tesame met haar vierjarige dogtertjie, het 46 maande by die sentrum deurgebring nadat sy van haar kêrel ontsnap het.
tgt: she spent 46 months months at the centre, with her fouryearold daughter.

src: die sentrum het haar gehelp om ‘n klag teen haar ekskêrel te lê en n beskermingsbevel te verkry.
tgt: the centre assisted her to open charges against him and to file a protection order.

src: "hulle het my met oop arms verwelkom na baie jare van swaarkry.
tgt: "they welcomed me with warm hands after many years of suffering.

src: ek het veilig gevoel.
tgt: i felt safe.

src: ek het weer my selfvertroue herwin," het sy gesê.
tgt: i have regained my confidence," she says.

src: die voorsitter van die gbvffonds, dr. judy dlamini, sê finansiering vir 108 organisasies wat se aansoeke suksesvol was, word tans verwerk.
tgt: the gbvf fund chairperson, dr judy dlamini, says funding for 108 organisations whose applications have been successful are being processed.

src: inligting oor die volgende rondte aansoeke sal spoedig op die gbvffonds se webblad beskikbaar wees: https://gbvf.
tgt: information regarding the next round of applications will soon be available on the gbvf fund website: https://gbvf.

src: aansoeke vir nsfas 2023 open vukuzenzele unnamed die nasionale finan siële hulpskema vir studente (nsfas) se aansoeksiklus vir 2023 het oopgemaak.
tgt: nsfas 2023 applications open vukuzenzele unnamed the national stu dent financial aid scheme (nsfas) 2023 application cycle has opened.

src: die minister van hoër onderwys, wetenskap en innovasie, dr. blade nzimande, het die aankondiging onlangs tydens 'n mediainligtingsessie gemaak.
tgt: higher education, science and innovation minister dr blade nzimande made the announcement recently during a media briefing.

src: minister nzimande het besluit om die aansoeksiklus vanjaar vroeër te open, in teenstelling met laasjaar toe die aansoeksiklus eers later geopen is, om voornemende aan soekers genoeg tyd te gee om hul aansoeke en ondersteunende dokumentasie in te dien.
tgt: minister nzimande says the scheme resolved to open the application cycle early, as opposed to the previous year, in order to give prospective applicants enough time to submit their applications and supporting documents.

src: in sy verslag oor die nsfasfinansiering vir die akademiese jaar van 2022 sê minister nzimande dat n begroting van r43 miljard aan die skema toegeken is vir ontvangers se studiegeld, insluitend kosen reistoelaes en studiemateriaal.
tgt: giving an update report on nsfas funding for the 2022 academic year, minister nzimande says a budget of r43 billion was allocated to the scheme towards the beneficiaries’ tuition fees, including food and travelling allowance, and study material.

src: hy sê dat 985 672 aansoeke ontvang is, waarvan 140 636 aansoeke suksesvol was.
tgt: he says 985 672 applications were received with 140 636 application unsuccessful.

src: van al die aansoeke wat ontvang is, is 739 526 aansoeke voorwaardelik goedgekeur vir finansiering onderhewing aan registrasie by die onderskeie instellings.
tgt: of the applications received, 739 526 applications were provisionally approved for funding pending registration from respective institutions.

src: "[die] meerderheid onsuksesvolle aansoekers het nagelaat om voldoende bewyse vir hul aansoek om finansiering te verskaf, die finansiële kiesbaar heidsdrempel oorskry, reeds die hoogste vlak van kwalifikasie wat deur nsfas gefinansier word, bereik of nie voldoen aan die akademiese roete van die tvetkollegesektor nie," verduidelik minister nzimande.
tgt: "[the] majority of unsuccessful applicants failed to provide sufficient evidence to support their applications for funding; exceeded the financial eligibility threshold; already achieved the highest level of qualification that nsfas funds and being noncompliant to the academic pathways of the tvet college sector," minister nzimande explains.

src: volgens die inligting op die nsfaswebblad, bied nsfas sedert die 2021akademiese jaar nie meer finansiering vir nagraadse kursusse nie.
tgt: according to information on the nsfas website, as of the 2021 academic year, nsfas no longer provides funding for postgraduate courses.

src: dit sluit in nagraadse sertifikate, nagraadse diplomas, honneursgrade, meestersen phdgrade.
tgt: this includes postgraduate certificates, postgraduate diplomas, honours degrees, masters and phd degrees.

src: dit beteken dat die hoogste kwalifikasie wat deur die skema gefinansier word, n baccalaureusgraad is.
tgt: this means the highest qualification that the scheme funds is a bachelor’s degree.

src: verbetering van die aansoekstelselminister nzimande sê in n poging om die aansoekstelsel en proses vanjaar vir voornemende studente te vereenvoudig, het nsfas n aantal verbeteringe aan die stelsel aangebring om n soomlose aansoekervaring te verseker.
tgt: improving the application systemin a bid to improve its appli cation system and process to simplify it for prospective applicants, minister nzimande says this year, nsfas has implemented a number of enhancements to the system to ensure a seamless application experience.

src: hy sê die nsfasaanlynaansoekportaal is herontwerp om meer gebruikersvriendelik te wees en meer ooreen te stem met ander platforms wat reeds deur aansoekers gebruik word, waaronder whatsapp, twitter, facebook en instagram.
tgt: he says the nsfas online application portal was redesigned to be more user friendly and closer to other platforms that prospective applicants are accustomed to such as whatsapp, twitter, facebook and instagram.

src: "die aansoekproses op sigself is ook vereenvoudig en die vrae wat gevra word, kan makliker verstaan word deur die publiek.
tgt: "the application process itself has been simplified and the questions asked are easier to understand by the public.

src: verder kan die aan soekers ook die proses onder breek (pause) en op n latere stadium voortgaan sonder om weer van voor af te begin – iets wat nie voorheen moontlik was nie," sê hy.
tgt: additionally, applicants can pause the process and continue at a later stage without restarting from scratch, something that was not possible in previous cycles, he says.

src: "bo en behalwe hierdie verbeteringe, het nsfas ook bykomende aansoekkanale ontwikkel om voorsiening te maak vir aansoeke uit diverse agtergronde deur in gedagte te hou dat die meeste voor nemende aansoekers jong mense is wat daarvan hou om dinge digitaal te doen," het die minister bygevoeg.
tgt: "over and above the enhancements, nsfas developed additional channels of application to cater for applicants from diverse backgrounds, also keeping in mind that most of the prospective applicants are young people who embrace the digital way of doing things," minister nzimande adds.

src: die nuwe kanale sluit in n selfoontoepassing (app), ussd en whatsapp, waar n mens onder meer aansoek kan doen vir nsfasfinansiering, die aansoekstatus kan volg en aansoeke kan kanselleer – wat normaalweg via die webportaal gedoen moes word.
tgt: the new channels include a mobile app, ussd and whatsapp where one can apply for nsfas funding, track application status and cancel applications, amongst other things.

src: om verder te verseker dat niemand oor die hoof gesien word nie, sê minister nzimande dat nsfas n veldtog gaan loods om seker te maak dat individue wat nie toegang tot tegnologie het om aanlyn aansoek te doen nie, die nodige hulpbronne en ondersteuning sal ontvang om aansoek te kan doen.
tgt: furthermore, to ensure that no applicant is left behind, minister nzimande says nsfas will embark on an outreach campaign to ensure that individuals who do not have access to technological devices that enable them to apply online are given the necessary resources and support to apply.

src: hoe om te kwa lifiseer vir n nsfasbeursjy kwalifiseer vir n nsfasbeurs as jy n suidafrikaanse burger is wat van voornemens is om in 2023 te studeer of as jy reeds aan n openbare universiteit of tvetkollege studeer en aan die volgende vereistes voldoen: jy n ontvanger van ‘n sassatoelaag is.
tgt: how to access nsfas bursaryyou qualify for a nsfas bursary if you are a south african citizen who plans to study in 2023 or you are already studying at a public university or tvet college and you meet the following requirements: you are a sassa grant recipient.

src: julle gesamentlike huishoudelike inkomste nie meer as r350 000 per jaar is nie.
tgt: your combined household income is not more than r350 000 per year.

src: as jy n persoon met n gestremdheid is, moet julle gesamentlike huishoudelike inkomste nie meer as r600 000 per jaar wees nie.
tgt: if you are a person living with a disability, your combined household income should not be more than r600 000 per year.

src: jy 'n student is student is wat voor 2018 aan n universiteit begin studeer het en jou huishoudelike inkomste nie r122 000 per jaar oorskry nie.
tgt: if you are a student who began university studies before 2018 and your household income is not more than r122 000 per year.

src: n miljoen werksen lewensbestaans geleenthede en dit raak net meer vukuzenzele unnamed ons het minder as twee jaar gelede die presidensiële werkskeppingstimulus bekendgestel om werksgeleenthede te skep en mense se lewensbestaan te ondersteun as deel van ons ondersteuning van die ekonomiese herlewing na die kovid19pandemie.
tgt: a million work and livelihood opportunities, and counting vukuzenzele unnamed less than two years ago, we launched the presidential employment stimulus to create jobs and support livelihoods as part of supporting the economic recovery from the covid19 pandemic.

src: die presidensiële werk skeppingstimulus het pas die mylpaal van een miljoen deelnemers bereik sedert dit tot stand gebring is.
tgt: the presidential employment stimulus has just reached the milestone of one million participants since its inception.

src: hierdie prestasie is danksy n gesamentlike poging regoor die regering en die breër gemeenskap, insluitend die privaatsektor, gemeenskapsgebaseerde organisasies en vele ander.
tgt: this achievement is the result of a collaborative effort across government and the wider society, including the private sector, communitybased organisations and many others.

src: die program dra by tot werkskepping terwyl die ekonomie kans kry om te herstel en werk te skep op die skaal waarop ons dit benodig.
tgt: the programme is contributing to employment creation while the economy takes time to recover and create jobs at the scale we need.

src: soos ons ekonomiese groei nastreef om behoorlike en volhoubare indiensneming op n veel groter skaal te bied as wat tans die geval is, sal ons voortgaan om te bou op die sukses van die presidensiële werkskeppingstimulus en sy reikwydte uitbrei.
tgt: as we pursue economic growth to deliver decent and sustainable employment at a much larger scale, we will continue to build on the success of the presidential employment stimulus and expand its reach.

src: dit is nog steeds baie nodig om die herstel van die arbeidsmark aan te vul.
tgt: it is still very much needed to complement recovery of the job market.

src: dit ondersteun ook die ekonomie se herstel op belangrike maniere.
tgt: it also supports economic recovery in important ways.

src: in ‘n situasie waar n gebrek aan werksondervinding n groot struikelblok is om werk te kry, verskaf hierdie programme hoëgehaltewerksondervinding.
tgt: in a context where a lack of work experience is a major barrier to finding work, these programmes are providing highquality work experiences.

src: in die grootste program wat deur die stimulus ondersteun word, byvoorbeeld, is byna 600 000 jongmense as skool assistente in meer as 22 000 skole in elke hoek van die land geplaas.
tgt: in the largest programme supported by the stimulus, for example, nearly 600 000 young people have been placed as school assistants in over 22 000 schools in every corner of the country.

src: die skole se bestuur, onderwysers en ander belanghebbendes stem almal saam dat die bydrae van hierdie skoolassistente die leeromgewing in hierdie skole verbeter het.
tgt: school management, teachers and other stakeholders all agree that the contribution of the school assistants has improved the learning environment in schools.

src: baie mense wat hul eie ondernemings het, se lewensbestaan is ontwrig deur die pandemie.
tgt: many selfemployed people found their livelihoods disrupted by the pandemic.

src: die kreatiewe sektor is veral sleg deur die pandemie getref.
tgt: the creative sector was particularly badly affected.

src: ondersteuning is in hierdie sektor aan mense verskaf om vir hulself en vir ander mense werk te skep.
tgt: in this sector, support was provided to people to create jobs for themselves and others.

src: die flieks, musiek en opvoerings wat nou vervaardig word, sal voortaan in staat wees om n verdere inkomste te verdien uit die verkope van regte, kaartjies en tantième.
tgt: the movies, music and plays produced are now able to generate further income from the sale of rights, tickets and royalties.

src: dit het alles bygedra tot die groei van die sektor.
tgt: all of this has been contributing to the growth of the sector.

src: die presidensiële werk skeppingstimulus het ook volhoubare lewensbestaan ondersteun.
tgt: the presidential employment stimulus has also supported sustainable livelihoods.

src: meer as 140 000 bestaansboere het koop bewyse vir produksieinsette ontvang om hulle te help om voort te gaan met produksie en uit te brei na aanleiding van die ontwrigting van kovid19.
tgt: over 140 000 subsistence farmers have received production input vouchers to assist them to resume and expand production after the disruptions of covid19.

src: een so n begunstigde is die 36jarige phindile ngcoya van richmond in kwazulunatal.
tgt: one such beneficiary is 36yearold phindile ngcoya from richmond in kwazulunatal.

src: sy is een van tien lede van n gesinsboerderykoöperatief en sê die koopbewys wat sy ontvang het, het die nuwe koöperatief gehelp om te oorleef en winsgewend te raak.
tgt: she is one of ten members of a family farming cooperative and says the voucher she received helped the new cooperative survive and become profitable.

src: die presidensiële werk skeppingstimulus ondersteun ook afgestudeerdes met geleenthede wat vir onder andere verpleegsters, weten skaplikes en vakmanne geskep word.
tgt: the presidential employment stimulus is also supporting graduates, with opportunities provided to nurses, science graduates, artisans and others.

src: sesentwintig universiteite help om werklose afgestudeerdes te plaas in n werk wat betrekking op hul kwalifikasies het.
tgt: twenty six universities are helping to place unemployed graduates in work relevant to their qualifications.

src: die departement van wetenskap en innovasie het n reeks innoverende burgerlike wetenskapsprogramme bekendgestel, waaronder die duzi umngenibewaringstrust wat plaaslike jeug in diens neem as "envirochamps" om die gemeenskap te bemagtig om plaaslike waterbronne te rehabiliteer.
tgt: the department of science and innovation has introduced a range of innovative citizen science programmes, such as the duzi umngeni conservation trust, which employs local youth as envirochamps to empower communities to rehabilitate local water sources.

src: nog n program van die departement help entrepreneurs om sakegeleenthede in die groen ekonomie te ontwikkel.
tgt: another programme by the department helps entrepreneurs to develop business proposals in the green economy.

src: openbareindiensnemings programme het ook n direkte positiewe impak op gemeenskappe, aangesien hulle werk skep tot voordeel van die hele gemeenskap.
tgt: public employment programmes also have a direct positive impact on communities because they create work for the common good.

src: in die geval van die presidensiële werkskeppingstimulus sluit dit in die verbetering van leer in skole, die opgradering van informele nedersettings, ondersteuning van slagoffers van geslagsgebaseerde geweld, omgewingsbewaring en innoverende afvalherwinning.
tgt: in the case of the presidential employment stimulus, this includes improving learning in schools, upgrading informal settlements, supporting survivors of genderbased violence, environmental conservation and innovating in wasterecycling.

src: die presidensiële werkskep pingstimulus is op die been gebring weens die toenemende werkloosheidskrisis tydens die kovid19pandemie.
tgt: the presidential employment stimulus was launched in response to the unemployment crisis that was deepened by the covid19 pandemic.

src: alhoewel die pandemie afgeneem het, het werkloosheid nie afgeneem nie.
tgt: although the pandemic may have abated, unemployment has not.

src: die inkomste wat verdien is na aanleiding van die presidensiële werkskeppingstimulusprogramme bied n ekonomiese inspuiting aan kleinen informele ondernemings in plaaslike ekonomieë regoor die land.
tgt: the incomes earned in presidential employment stimulus programmes have been an economic boost to small enterprises and informal businesses in local economies across the country.

src: skoolassistente wat in umgungundlovu in diens geneem is, bestee hul inkomste in umgungundlovu.
tgt: school assistants employed in umgungundlovu are spending their wages in umgungundlovu.

src: dieselfde geld vir putsonderwater.
tgt: the same in putsonderwater.

src: in plaas van die deursypeleffek, word geld direk geplaas in die hande van die gemeenskappe wat dit die nodigste het.
tgt: instead of the ‘trickle down’ effect, money is being put directly into the hands of communities that need it most.

src: daardie geld sirkuleer dan plaaslik en "syfer na bo" in die breër ekonomie.
tgt: that money then circulates locally and ‘trickles up’ into the wider economy.

src: dit is hoekom ons dit n stimulus noem, want die hele ekonomie baat saam met die samelewing daarby.
tgt: that is why we call it a stimulus, because the entire economy benefits along with society.

src: deur middel van die presidensiële werkskeppingstimulus het ons energie, toewyding, kreatiwiteit, innovering en geleenthede ontsluit.
tgt: through the presidential employment stimulus, we have unlocked energy, commitment, creativity, innovation and opportunities.

src: so bou ons in die proses n samelewing wat werk.
tgt: in the process, we are building a society that works.

src: meer as een miljoen mense het direk daarby gebaat.
tgt: over one million people have benefited directly.

src: talle mense in die gesinne en gemeenskappe van hierdie deelnemers het die impak van die stimulus ervaar.
