tgt: many more people, in the families and communities of participants, have felt the impact of the stimulus.

src: ons taak is om die impak van hierdie werk uit te brei en te versterk.
tgt: our task now is to expand and deepen the impact of this work.

src: danksy die presidensiële werkskeppingstimulus het ons nou honderdduisende mense met waardevolle werksondervinding.
tgt: as a result of the presidential employment stimulus, we now have hundreds of thousands of people with valuable work experience.

src: die meeste van hierdie mense kan maklik opgespoor word deur middel van die sayouth.
tgt: most of these people are easy to find through the sayouth.

src: vroeë kinderontwikkeling hou die sleutel tot ons toekoms vukuzenzele unnamed daar is min presi densiële pligte wat so bevredigend is as om die oggend in die geselskap van klein kindertjies deur te bring.
tgt: early childhood development holds the key to our future vukuzenzele unnamed there are few pre sidential activities more fulfilling than spending a morning in the company of small children.

src: ek het onlangs die opening van die little flowervroeëkinderontwikkelingsentrum (vko) bizana in die ooskaap bygewoon waar ek tyd saam met die toe komstige leiers van ons land kon deurbring, vir hulle kon voorlees en na hulle kon luister.
tgt: i recently attended the opening of the little flower early childhood development (ecd) centre in bizana in the eastern cape, where i got to spend time with some of the future leaders of our country, reading to them and listening to them.

src: die sentrum is onlangs deur die ontwikkelings organisasie, impande south africa, ur middel van ondersteuning van die nelson mandelastigting, gebou.
tgt: the centre was recently built by the development organisation impande south africa through the support of the nelson mandela foundation.

src: ek is diep geraak deur die personeel van die sentrum se toewyding om die gemeenskap en sy kinders te ondersteun.
tgt: i was deeply touched by the dedication of the centre’s staff to supporting the community and its children.

src: hulle het my vertel hoedat hulle, in die vroeë dae van die sentrum, gesukkel het om die personeel te betaal en dat die personeel nog steeds kom werk het.
tgt: they told me how in the centre’s earliest days, staff struggled to get paid and yet still came to work.

src: hulle het my ook vertel dat selfs al kan gesinne nie eens r20 vir hulle kind betaal nie, die kinders nie weggewys word nie.
tgt: they also told me that even if families are not able to pay the r20 fee for their child, the children are not turned away.

src: die toewyding van die vkosentrum se personeel is so belangrik omdat vroeëkinderontwikkelingsentrums n kernrol in ons nasie se ontwikkeling speel.
tgt: the commitment of the ecd centre staff is so important because early childhood development centres play a pivotal role in our nation’s development.

src: dié sentrums word in elke landelike gehuggie, dorp en stad in die land aangetref.
tgt: these centres can be found in every village, town and city in the country.

src: die meeste is op die been gebring deur vroue in die gemeen skap wat ouers wou help ondersteun wie se kinders versorg moet word terwyl hulle by die werk is.
tgt: most were started by women in the community to support parents who need their children to be cared for when they are at work.

src: baie van dié sentrums het begin as speelskooltjies en dagsorgfasiliteite.
tgt: many of these centres began as creches and daycare facilities.

src: baie het gevolglik gegroei en uitgebrei om n basiese kurrikulum in hulle aktiwiteite te inkorporeer.
tgt: many have subsequently grown and expanded to incorporate a basic learning curriculum into their services.

src: ons het, as die regering, dit op ons geneem om die standaard van versorging te verhoog en hulpbronne vir vkosentrums beskikbaar te maak om geskikte aktiwiteite vir jong kinders aan te bied om hulle vir formele onderrig voor te berei.
tgt: as government, we have taken up the task to improve the standards of care and make resources available for ecd centres to run suitable activities for young children to prepare them for formal education.

src: ons het in april 2022 die skuif van die vkofunksie van die departement van maatskaplike ontwikkeling na die departement van basiese onderrig voltooi.
tgt: in april 2022, we completed the move of the ecd function from the department of social development to the department of basic education.

src: dit is sodat vroeë kinderontwikkeling kan skakel met die formele skoolkurrikulum en om opleiding, opvoeding en ontwikkeling aan vkosentrums regoor die land, te bied.
tgt: this is to link early childhood development to the formal school curriculum and to provide training, education and development to staff in ecd centres around the country.

src: die wysigingswetsontwerp op basiese onderwys wat tans voor die parlement dien, stel voor dat dit verpligtend moet wees dat alle kinders twee jaar vko moet ontvang voordat hulle graad 1 toe gaan omdat dié grondslagleer noodsaaklik vir n kind se sukses in latere jare is.
tgt: because this foundational learning is key to a child’s success in later years, the basic education laws amendment bill that is currently before parliament proposes that it be compulsory for all children to receive two years of ecd before they enter grade 1. it is at this stage that children should be taught, learn through play and receive at least one meal a day.

src: vroeëkinderontwikkelingsentrums berei nie net ons land se jongste burgers voor om op skool te vorder nie, hulle is ook n belangrike bron van entrepreneurskap en werkskepping.
tgt: early childhood development centres don’t just prepare our country’s youngest citizens to succeed in school; they are also an important source of entrepreneurship and job creation.

src: dié sentrums maak n belangrike deel van die sorgekonomie uit.
tgt: these centres are an important part of the care economy.

src: hulle onderhou lewensbestaan, veral vir vroue, wat bydra tot werkskepping in baie gemeenskappe.
tgt: they sustain livelihoods, especially for women, which contributes to job creation in many communities.

src: toe die kovid19pandemie ons getref het, is vkosentrums swaar getref.
tgt: when the covid19 pandemic struck, ecd centres were hard hit.

src: fasiliteite wat op skoolgeld staatmaak om voor te bestaan, kon nie hulle personeel betaal nie, en baie ouers wat hulle werk verloor het, kon nie hulle kinders se gelde bekostig nie.
tgt: facilities that rely on school fees to keep running were unable to pay their staff and many parents who lost their jobs were unable to keep their children enrolled.

src: die regering het, in reaksie hierop, die vkowerkskeppingstimulusfonds gestig om die vkosentrums te help wat hulle inkomste weens die pandemie verloor het en om hulle in staat te stel om weer op die been te kom.
tgt: in response, government established the ecd employment stimulus relief fund to help ecd centres that had lost income as a result of the pandemic and to enable them to recover.

src: om die jongste landsburgers toe te rus met die gereedskap wat hulle nodig het om n sukses van die lewe te maak, is n verantwoordelikheid wat ons saam moet aanpak.
tgt: preparing our youngest citizens with the tools they need to succeed in life is a responsibility we must collectively shoulder.

src: ons moet alles in ons vermoë doen, as regering, die private sektor en ontwikkelingsorganisasies, om vroeë kinderontwikkeling te ondersteun.
tgt: we must continue to do all we can, as government, the private sector and development organisations, to support early childhood development.

src: vko lewer n reuse bydrae tot die bereiking van ons talle ontwikkelingsmylpale deur die talle waardevolle dienste wat dit bied — of dit nou is om ons kinders op te voed, kindersorg te bied aan ouers wat werk of deur geleenthede vir entrepreneurs te skep.
tgt: with the many valuable services it provides, whether it is educating our children, providing childcare for working parents or creating opportunities for entrepreneurs, ecd makes a huge contribution to the achievement of many of our developmental goals.

src: aangesien die sorgekonomie hoofsaaklik deur vroue aangedryf word, dra sodanige ondersteuning baie daartoe by om vroue te help om finansieel stabiel en onafhanklik te raak, veral in minderbevoorregte gemeenskappe.
tgt: since the care economy is mainly driven by women, such support goes a long way towards helping women, especially in disadvantaged communities, to become financially secure and independent.

src: hoe om water te spaar more matshediso die betroubaarheid van waterverskaffing deur munisipaliteite aan huishoudings regoor suidafrika, is slegs 68%, ongeag die vordering wat deur die departement van water en sanitasie gemaak is om die agterstand van watervoorsiening oor die jare uit te wis. die adjunkminister van water en sanitasie, david mahlobo, sê dit is weens ou infrastruktuur, n gebrek aan werk en onderhoud aan waterskemas, en die swak integrasie tussen be huisingsprogramme en huidige infrastruktuurontwikkelingsprojekte.
tgt: how to save water more matshediso the reliability of water supply by municipalities to households across south africa is only at 68%, despite the strides made by the department of water and sanitation to eradicate water supply backlogs over the years.

src: "dit is n groot bekommernis dat die voorsiening van betroubare waterverskaffing tekens van afname toon," sê hy.
tgt: "it is a major concern that the provision of reliable supply water is showing signs of decline," he says.

src: as n waterskaarsland lê suidafrika onder die 30 droogste lande in die wêreld.
tgt: as a water scarce country, south africa ranks among 30 driest countries in the world.

src: die meeste van die land se water is afkomstig van reën, maar met die opgetekende gemiddelde reënval wat 40% minder is as die jaarlikse wêreldgemiddelde, word die land dikwels deur droogte geraak.
tgt: most of the country’s water comes from rainfall, but with the recorded average rainfall that is 40% less than the annual world average, the country is often affected by drought.

src: die departement het egter goeie waterbesparingswenke vir ons.
tgt: however, the department has water saving tips for you.

src: waterbesparing in jou huis of besigheid draai die kraan toe tussen die kere wat jy jou gesig was, jou tande borsel of skeer.
tgt: saving water in your home or business turn the tap off¬ between washing your face, brushing your teeth or shaving.

src: deur vyf minute op n dag te stort in plaas van te bad, sal slegs n derde van die water gebruik word as wanneer jy sou bad, wat neerkom op die besparing van 400 liter water per week.
tgt: taking a fiveminute shower a day instead of a bath will use a third of the water used bathing in a bath tub, saving up to 400 litres a week.

src: om te stort kan tot 20 liter water per minuut gebruik, terwyl n bad tussen 80 en 150 liter water per bad kan gebruik.
tgt: showering can use up to 20 litres of water per minute, whereas taking a bath can use between 80 and 150 litres of water per bath.

src: as jy verkies om te bad, moet jy nie die bad vol tap nie.
tgt: if you prefer to bath, do not fill up the bathtub.

src: moenie die toilet onnodig spoel nie.
tgt: avoid flushing the toilet unnecessarily.

src: gooi sneesdoekies, insekte en ander afval in die vuilgoeddrom eerder as in die toilet.
tgt: dispose of tissues, insects and other waste in the trash rather than the toilet.

src: jy gebruik elke keer wat jy die toilet spoel 12 liter water.
tgt: every time you flush the toilet, 12 litres of water is used.

src: herstel n lekkende toilet, want dit kan tot 100 000 liter water in n jaar mors.
tgt: fix a leaking toilet otherwise it can waste up to 100 000 litres of water in one year.

src: gebruik "gryswater" om jou toilet te spoel — gebruikte water wat van die bad, die wasmasjien en ander veilige bronne afkomstig is.
tgt: use "grey water" — used water from baths, washing machines and other safe sources to flush your toilet.

src: moenie jou swembad oorvol maak of dit oormatig terugspoel (backwash) nie.
tgt: do not overfill or excessively backwash your swimming pool.

src: ketels moenie tot heel bo volgemaak word nie, maar kook net genoeg water soos wat jy benodig.
tgt: kettles should not be filled to the brim but with just enough water for your needs.

src: dit sal ook jou elektrisiteitsrekening verlaag.
tgt: this will reduce your electricity bill too.

src: gebruik eerder n emmer as n tuinslang om jou motor te was.
tgt: use a bucket rather than a hose to wash your car.

src: as jy n tuinslang moet gebruik, gebruik dan n sproeier voor aan die pyp wat jy tussenin kan toedraai.
tgt: if you have to use a hose, use a sprayer that can be turned off¬ inbetween spraying the car.

src: n tuinslang kan tot soveel as 30 liter water per minuut gebruik.
tgt: using a garden hose could use as much as 30 litres of water per minute.

src: boere moet toesien dat hulle giftige plaagdoders weghou van waterbronne en stroompies af.
tgt: farmers must ensure that they keep toxic insecticides away from water sources and streams.

src: mense in landelike gebiede moenie riviere of rivieroewers as n toilet gebruik nie.
tgt: people living in rural areas should be careful not to use the river or riverbank as a toilet.

src: in die tuin maak jou plante altyd vroeg in die oggend of aand nat wanneer dit koeler is.
tgt: in the garden always water your plants during the early morning hours or in the evening, when temperatures are cooler.

src: laat die water waarin jy eiers gekook het, afkoel en maak jou huisplante daarmee nat.
tgt: every time you boil an egg, save the cooled water for your houseplants.

src: die voedingstowwe wat uit die eierdoppe kom sal goed wees vir die plante.
tgt: they will benefit from the nutrients released from the shell.

src: dakwater kan in n tenk geberg word om die tuin mee nat te maak.
tgt: roof water can also be profitably stored in tanks, for watering gardens.

src: prep kan miv voorkom vukuzenzele unnamed met suidafri ka wat wê reldvigsdag op 1 desember en 16 dae van aktivisme teen geslagsgebaseerde geweld (ggg) vanaf 25 november tot 10 desember gedenk, kyk vuk’uzenzele na die verwantskap tussen ggg en miv/vigs.
tgt: prep can prevent hiv allison cooper as south africa comme morates world aids day on 1 december and 16 days of activism against genderbased violence (gbv), from 25 november to 10 december, vuk’uzenzele explores the relationship between gbv and hiv/aids.

src: die reaksiefonds vir geslagsgebaseerde geweld en vrouemoord (gggv) streef daarna om te verseker dat suidafrika n land kan wees met geen gggv teen vroue, kinders asook die lesbiese, homoseksuele, biseksuele, transgeslagtelike, intergeslagtelike, queer/twyfelende, aseksuele en ander (lgbt qia+) gemeenskap.
tgt: the genderbased vio lence and femicide (gbvf) response fund strives to ensure that south africa is free from gbvf against women; children; and the lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, intersex, queer/questioning, asexual and more (lgbtqia+) community.

src: die fonds is in februarie 2021 deur president president cyril ramaphosa van stapel gestuur om die nasionale strategiese plan vir gggv te implementeer.
tgt: the fund was launched by president cyril ramaphosa in february 2021, to support the implementation of the national strategic plan on gbvf.

src: volgens die fonds se webwerf speel dit n kritieke rol om verandering moontlik te maak, gebaseer op navorsing, bewustheid en praktiese steun aan organisasies wat aktief in die stryd teen gggv is.
tgt: according to the fund’s website, it plays a critical role in making change happen, based on research, awareness and practical support to organisations actively engaged in the fight against gbvf.

src: een van die organisa sies wat deur die fonds ondersteun word, is die kwazulunatalgebaseerde gugu dlaministigting, wat r250 000 ontvang het.
tgt: one of the organisations supported by the fund is the kwazulunatal based gugu dlamini foundation, which received r250 000 from the gbvf in 2022. executive director of the gugu dlamini foundation, mandisa mabaso, established the foundation in 2010 after her mother – the late gugu dlamini – was stoned to death in 1998 in durban for disclosing her hivpositive status.

src: "die stigting het ten doel om plaaslike staatsbestuur te versterk om sodoende die reaksie op gggv te verbe ter, wat noodsaaklik is om die mivpandemie in suidafrika onder beheer te kry," sê mabaso.
tgt: "the foundation aims to strengthen local governance to improve the gbvf response, which is essential to achieving hiv epidemic control in south africa," says mabaso.

src: "dit het ook ten doel om miv/vigsinfeksies te vermin der, toegang tot sorg te verbeter en gesondheidsprognoses van vroue en mans met miv/vigs en wat daardeur geraak word, te verbeter," voeg sy by.
tgt: "it also aims to reduce hiv/aids infections, increase access to care and improve health outcomes for females and males infected and affected by hiv/aids," she adds.

src: die befondsing wat die stigting ontvang lewer steun aan 522 255 vroue en meisies en 900 mans en seuns vanuit gesinne wat deur ggg en huishou delike geweld geraak word; mense wat met gestremdhede leef wat misbruik word; en die lgbtqia+ gemeenskap, sê mabaso.
tgt: the funding that the foundation receives assists 522 255 women and girls and 900 men and boys from families affected by gbv and domestic violence; abused persons living with disabilities; and the lgbtqia+ community, says mabaso.

src: vrouens wat slagoffers van ggg is in gebiede waar daar groot druk weens hoë getalle mivgevalle is, het volgens unaids, n 50% groter kans om miv op te doen.
tgt: according to unaids, in areas of high hiv burden, women who are victims of gbv face up to a 50% higher chance of acquiring hiv .

src: redes hiervoor sluit in verkragting en mans wat weier om kon dome te dra.
tgt: some of the reasons for this are rape and the refusal by men to use condoms.

src: wat is prep?
tgt: what is prep?

src: een van die maniere om mivinfeksie te verhoed is preblootstellingprofilakse oftewel prep .
tgt: one of the ways to prevent hiv infection is by taking preexposure prophylaxis (prep), which is a medicine taken daily by hivnegative people who are at high risk of being exposed to hiv , through sexual contact or injection drug use.

src: dit is medisyne wat daagliks deur mivnegatiewe mense geneem word wat by wyse van seksuele kontak of die gebruik van dwelms of medisyne via n spuitnaald, n hoë risiko dra om aan miv blootgestel te word.
tgt: in august, health minister, dr joe phaahla said that south africa has the highest oral prep initiation in subsahara.

src: minister joe phaahla het in augustus gesê dat suidafrika die hoogste verbruik van orale prep in subsahara afrika het.
tgt: he said that 70%, or 2 419, of south africa’s public primary healthcare facilities have integrated oral prep into their routine package of services.

src: "n persoon wat prepbehandeling ontvang hoef nie dit vir die res van hul lewens te neem nie; hulle kan kies om dit elke keer as hulle die risiko dra om miv op te doen te neem, maar vir prep om doeltreffend te wees, moet dit elke dag [tydens die hoërisikotydperk] geneem word," bevestig mabaso.
tgt: "a person on prep does not have to take it for the rest of their lives, they can choose to take it every time they are at risk of being infected with hiv .

src: dit moet ook in oorleg met ander beskermingsmetodes, soos kondome vir vroue en vir mans, gebruik word omdat prep n persoon nie teen ander seksueeloordraagbare siektes beskerm nie en ook nie n voor behoedmiddel is nie.
tgt: it should also be used with other protective methods, such as female and male condoms, because prep does not protect a person against other sexually transmitted infections and it is not a contraceptive.

src: mabaso sê dat prep van hulp kan wees in gevalle waar n paartjie n baba wil hê; prep kan help om die mivnegatiewe persoon en die ongebore baba teen mivinfeksie te beskerm.
tgt: mabaso says that in cases where a couple wants to have a baby, prep can assist to prevent hiv infection of the hivnegative partner and the unborn baby.

src: (sahpra) het intussen, vroeër vanjaar, die gebruik van n vaginale ring as n prepproduk goedgekeur.
tgt: meanwhile, earlier this year, the south african health products regulatory authority approved the use of a vaginal ring as a prep .

src: die ring bevat n antiretrovirale medisyne genaamd dapivirine en moet elke maand vervang word.
tgt: the ring contains an antiretroviral drug called dapivirine and must be changed every month.

src: daarbenewens, n nuwe prepproduk — n inspuiting wat vir twee maande hou — wag op goedkeuring.
tgt: in addition, a new prep – an injection that lasts for two months – is awaiting approval.

src: sodra dit goedgekeur is, sal mense nie meer hoef te onthou om elke dag n pil te drink nie.
tgt: once approved, people will no longer have to remember to take a pill each day.

src: veilige seksdie stigting het ten doel om mivinfeksies te verminder deur die bevordering van die gebruik van kondome en die beoefening van veilige seks.
tgt: safe sex the foundation also aims to reduce hiv infections by promoting the use of condoms and safe sex.

src: "ons doen n beroep op kinders en die jeug om te wag voordat hulle seksueel aktief raak totdat hulle gereed is om meer ingeligte en gesonder keuses te maak", sê mabaso.
tgt: "we urge children and youth to delay engaging in sexual intercourse until they are ready to make more informed and healthier choices," says mabaso.

src: "ons bevorder ook veilige seks deur die gebruik van kondome te benadruk asook om slegs met een persoon in n seksuele verhouding te wees.
tgt: "we also promote safer sex by emphasising condom use and only having one partner at a time.

src: die misbruik van dwelms — veral dwelms wat ingespuit word — word teen sterkste afgeraai aangesien dit die risiko verhoog om met miv besmet te word", voeg sy by.
tgt: the abuse of drugs – especially those that are injected – is strongly discouraged as it increases the risk of being infected with hiv ," she adds.

src: wat mivpositiewe mammas wat borsvoed moet weet vukuzenzele unnamed met suidafrika wat wêreldvigsdag op 1 desember gedenk, het die kwazulunatal departement van gesondheid aanbeveel dat mivpositiewe moeders hul babas vir ses maande lank uitsluitlik borsvoed.
tgt: what hiv positive breastfeeding moms should know vukuzenzele unnamed with south africa observing world aids day on the 1st of december, the kwazulunatal department of health has advised hiv positive mothers to consider breastfeeding their babies exclusively for six months.

src: dit is, volgens die departement, belangrik dat mivpositiewe vrouens wat borsvoed voedingsopsies met hul mivberaders bespreek.
tgt: according to the depart ment, if you are an hiv positive breastfeeding mother, it is important to discuss feeding choices with your hiv counsellor.

src: indien jy die besluit neem om te borsvoed, maak seker dat jy uitsluitlik borsvoed vir die eerste ses maande.
tgt: if you choose to breast feed, be sure to breastfeed exclusively for the first six months.

src: navorsing het getoon dat babas n bitterskraal kans het om miv vanaf borsmelk op te doen indien die moeder uitsluitlik borsvoed.
tgt: research has shown that the baby has very little chance of getting hiv from breastmilk if the mother exclusively breastfeeds.

src: gedurende jou swangerskap en die maande wat jy borsvoed is dit belangrik om kondome tydens seksuele omgang te gebruik om nuwe infeksies te vermy.
tgt: during the months that you are pregnant, and breastfeeding, be sure to use a condom during sexual intercourse to prevent any new infection.

src: die departement beveel uitsluitlike borsvoeding streng aan aangesien dit die baba help om n sterk immuniteitstelseltel ontwikkel, asook n hegter band tussen moeder en baba smee.
tgt: the department strongly recommends exclusive breastfeeding because it helps the baby develop a stronger immune system, and a stronger bond between mother and baby.

src: borsvoeding verminder ook die moeder se risiko om borskanker te ontwikkel.
tgt: breastfeeding also reduces the mother’s risks of developing breast cancer.

src: mites en feite oor borsvoeding daar is verskeie mites oor borsvoeding.
tgt: breastfeeding myths and facts there are several myths associated with breastfeeding, the department debunked these myths by answering the following frequently asked questions by mothers who are hiv positive and those who are not hiv positive.

src: die departement het dié mites ontluister deur die volgende vrae te beantwoord wat gereeld deur beide moeders wat mivpositief is en nie mivpositief is nie, gevra word.
tgt: question: my neighbour said that i should get some medicine to clean my baby's stomach.

src: is dit belangrik?
tgt: is this important?

src: antwoord: kolostrum, wat die eerste soort borsmelk is wat deur die melkkliere vrygestel word nadat jy geboorte geskenk het, maak die mekonium in die baba se magie skoon.
tgt: answer: colostrum, which is the first form of breastmilk that is released by the mammary glands after giving birth, cleans the meconium from the stomach.

src: jy sal nie enige ander medisyne benodig om jou baba se magie skoon te maak nie, aangesien borsmelk skoon is en inderwaarheid n voering in die magie vorm wat dit teen bakterieë beskerm.
tgt: you will not need any medicines for further cleaning as breastmilk is clean, and actually lines the stomach, protecting it from bacteriaquestion: in the first few days, if i do not have enough milk, can i give water or other milk as well?

src: antwoord: die kolostrum is al wat die baba benodig.
tgt: answer: the colostrum is all the baby needs.

src: al wat jy hoef te doen, is om die baba gereeld te borsvoed sodat jou melk inkom — dit is hoe jy baie melk produseer.
tgt: you just need to feed the baby often so that the milk will come in you make lots of milk that way.

src: vra die vroedvrou om jou baba binne die eerste halfuur na geboorte vir jou te gee sodat jy jou baba dadelik kan begin borsvoed.
tgt: ask the midwife to give you your baby within the first half hour after birth, so you can put the baby to the breast.

src: die baba sal vinniger leer hoe om te soog en dit sal jou help om meer melk te produseer.
tgt: the baby will learn quickly how to suckle and this will help you to make more milk.

src: vraag: ek borsvoed, maar my baba is nie tevrede daarmee nie.
tgt: question: i am giving breastmilk, but the baby is not satisfied.

src: moet ek formulemelk gebruik as aanvulling?
tgt: do i need to give formula as well?

src: antwoord: nee, jy kan meer melk produseer deur die baba meer gereeld te borsvoed.
tgt: answer: no, you can make more milk by feeding the baby more often.

src: laat die baba toe om aan een bors te drink totdat hy of sy versadig is om te verseker dat die baba die agtermelk drink, wat die melk is wat jou baba teen die einde van n voeding inneem.
tgt: allow the baby time to drink until satisfied on one breast to make sure the baby gets hindmilk which is the is the milk your baby gets at the end of a feed.

src: hoe meer gereeld die baba borsvoed, hoe meer melk word geproduseer.
tgt: the more the baby suckles, the more milk is made.

src: vraag: my baba wil so gereeld borsvoed dat ek dalk nie genoeg melk het nie?
tgt: question: my baby wants to feed so often maybe i don't have enough milk?

src: antwoord: die baba groei moontlik baie vinnig en het dus meer melk nodig.
tgt: answer: maybe the baby is growing quickly, and so needs more milk.

src: deur gereeld te borsvoed, kan jy genoeg melk vir sy of haar behoeftes produseer.
tgt: by feeding often, you can make enough milk for their needs.

src: die melk sal nie opdroog nie.
tgt: the milk will not run out.

src: laat ekstra tyd toe vir die baba om te borsvoed — moenie die baba van jou bors verwyder nie.
tgt: allow extra time for the baby to suckle don't pull the baby off the breast.

src: indien n baba meer as ses nat doeke per dag het, gereeld gevoer word (minstens 812 maal per dag) en minstens 500g gewig per maand optel, beteken dit dat jy genoeg melk produseer.
tgt: if a baby has more than six wet nappies every day, is being fed often (at least 812 times every day), and the baby is gaining at least 500g every month, then you are making enough milk.

src: vraag: wat moet ek doen as my baba gereeld huil?
tgt: question: if my baby cries often, what do i do?

src: antwoord: troos jou baba deur hul meer gereeld te borsvoed.
tgt: answer: comfort your baby by putting them to the breast more often.

src: babas moet na aan hul moeders gekoester word.
tgt: babies need to be close to their mothers.

src: jy kan hiermee help deur n kamer met jou baba te deel.
tgt: mothers and babies sharing the same room will encourage this.

src: indien jou baba honger, dors of omgekrap is, sal borsvoeding help om hom of haar te vertroos.
tgt: if your baby is hungry, thirsty or upset, suckling at the breast will satisfy them.

src: dit is onwaarskynlik dat jy jou baba sal oorvoed indien jy slegs borsmelk gee.
tgt: it is unlikely that you will overfeed your baby when giving breastmilk only.

src: vraag: is dit goed om vir my baba ander vloeistowwe te gee om te drink?
tgt: question: is it good to give other drinks?

src: antwoord: nee, ander vloeistowwe kan lei tot siektes soos diarree en longontsteking.
tgt: answer: no, adding other drinks means that the baby is more likely to get diseases like diarrhoea and pneumonia.

src: daarbenewens, indien die baba ander vloeistowwe sou inneem, sal hy of sy nie voldoende soog nie, wat kan veroorsaak dat jy dan nie genoeg melk produseer nie.
tgt: also, if the baby has other drinks, they won't suckle as often and you won't make enough milk.

src: vraag: het my baba nie in warm weer water nodig nie?
tgt: question: doesn't the baby need water when it is hot?

src: werksyfers toon ons ekonomie is op pad na herstel vukuzenzele unnamed suidafrikaners moes oor die afgelope paar jaar stadige groei en stygende werkloosheid in die oë staar.
tgt: jobs figures show our economyis on the road to recovery vukuzenzele unnamed over the last few years, south africans have had to contend with slow growth and rising unemployment.

src: dit is vererger deur n verpletterende pandemie, onluste en pogings tot opstande in julie 2021, en vroeër vanjaar, vloede wat verwoesting in dele van kwazulunatal, die ooskaap en noordwes gesaai het.
tgt: this has been worsened by a devastating pandemic, an attempted insurrection unrest in july 2021, and, earlier this year, severe floods in parts of kwazulunatal, eastern cape and north west.

src: te midde hiervan was daar ook n dreigende ener giekrisis wat skade aan die ekonomie berokken en huishoudings en sakeon dernemings laat klippe kou het.
tgt: amidst all this, the energy crisis has loomed large, causing damage to the economy and hardship for households and businesses.

src: tog, selfs te midde van dié reuse uitdagings, het ons samelewing en ekonomie getoon dat dit hulle volhard en dít dui daarop dat ons ekonomie besig is om tekens van herstel te toon.
tgt: yet, even amidst these formidable challenges, our society and economy has proven to be resilient.

src: statistieke suidafrika het n afname in die werkloos heidskoers vir die tweede kwartaal van 2021 getoon.
tgt: statistics south africa recorded a decline in the unemployment rate for the second quarter of 2021. significantly, their measurement shows that the actual number of people employed rose from 14.5 million people in the fourth quarter of 2021 to 15.5 million in the second quarter of 2022. this is an encouraging increase of muchneeded jobs over the first half of this year.

src: dié werkskepping het meestal plaasgevind in sektore soos gemeenskapsen maatskaplike dienste, handel, finansies en, merk baar, die boubedryf.
tgt: these jobs were mainly created in sectors such as community and social services, trade, finance and, notably, construction.

src: daar moet natuurlik nog baie gedoen word indien ons n noemenswaardige duik in ons land se hoë werkloosheidskoers wil maak.
tgt: of course, much more needs to be done if we are to make a significant dent in our country’s high unemployment rate.

src: dié syfers toon terselfdertyd dat die prioriteitsgebiede van die ekonomiese herbouen herstelplan — soos massa indiensname in die staatsdiens, ekonomiese hervorming en infra struktuurontwikkeling — n impak op werkskepping het.
tgt: at the same time, these figures indicate that the priority areas of the economic reconstruction and recovery plan – such as mass public employment, economic reform and infrastructure development – are having an impact on job creation.

src: met infrastruktuurontwikkeling en belegging wat een van die herstelplan se sleutelprioriteite is, is die groei in werkskepping in die konstruksiesektor veral bemoedigend.
tgt: with infrastructure development and investment being one of the key priorities of our recovery plan, the growth in jobs in the construction area is particularly encouraging.

src: die begroting van februarie 2022 het n 30% toename van r812 miljard in besteding op openbare infrastruktuur oor die vol gende drie jaar getoon, in vergelyking met r627 mil jard oor die afgelope drie jaar.
tgt: the february 2022 budget outlined a 30% increase in spending on public infrastructure over the next three years to r812 billion, compared to r627 billion over the past three years.

src: die raad vir ontwikke ling van die boubedryf het onlangs gemeld dat daar n toename was in die infrastruktuurprojekte wat aangedryf word deur ondernemings in staatsbe sit, soos transnet en eskom, maar ook in die metros en deur die departement van openbare werke en infra struktuur.
tgt: the construction industry development board recently noted that there has been an increase in infrastructure projects driven by stateowned enterprises like transnet and eskom, but also in the metros and through the department of public works and infrastructure.

src: ons het in junie vanjaar gesien hoe ons ekonomie terugkeer na prepande miese groeivlakke danksy n redelike positiewe bbp in die eerste kwartaal van die jaar.
tgt: in june, this year we saw our economy return to prepandemic growth levels owing to a fairly positive gdp outcome in the first quarter of the year.

src: ons doelwit is natuurlik om n noemenswaardige skuif van dié lae basis af te maak en daarom gaan ons voort met ons fokus op strukturele hervorming wat groei aanspoor.
tgt: naturally the objective is to move significantly off this low base, which is why we are continuing with our focus on structural reforms that drive growth.

src: die staat het onlangs n voorgestelde wysiging gepubliseer om die lisensiëringsdrempel vir elektrisiteitsopwekkingsfasiliteite af te skaf en belegging in groter, nuts bedryfskaalprojekte aan te moedig om sodoende blitsvinnig nuwe opwekkingskapasiteit tot die nasionale kragnetwerk by te voeg.
tgt: government recently published a proposed amendment to remove the licensing threshold for electricity generation facilities and encourage investment in larger, utility scale projects to rapidly add new generation capacity to the grid.

src: dit verteenwoor dig n groot mylpaal in ons pogings om die land se ener gielandskap te hervorm, wat n kritieke voorvereiste is vir ekonomiese groei en die lok van beleggings in ons land.
tgt: this represents a major milestone in our efforts to transform the country’s energy landscape, a critical prerequisite for economic growth and attracting investment.

src: ons, as die regering, het sedert die nasionale ener gieplan vanjaar in julie aangekondig is, in vennootskap met verskeie belanghebbendes gewerk aan die implementering daarvan asook aan beleids hervorming.
tgt: since the national energy plan was announced in july this year, we have been working as government in partnership with various stakeholders on implementation and policy reform.

src: sedert ons in julie 2021 die lisensiëringsdrumpel na 100 megawatts verhoog het, is meer as 500 mw privaat hernubare kragopwekkingsprojekte geregistreer, met n pyplyn van meer as 6 000 mw van projekte in verskillende fases van ont wikkeling.
tgt: since we raised the licensing threshold to 100 megawatts in june 2021, more than 500 mw of private renewable power generation projects have been registered, with a pipeline of over 6,000 mw of projects at various stages of development.

src: die strukturele her vormingsproses gaan voort om vordering aan te meld as steun vir ekonomiese groei en die lok van beleggings.
tgt: the structural reform process continues to register progress in support of economic growth and attracting investment.

src: ekonomiese groei en werkskepping kan nie plaas vind sonder om die moeilike dog noodsaaklike struktu rele hervormings wat die sakeen beleggingsklimaat sal verbeter, te onderneem nie.
tgt: economic growth cannot be realised and jobs cannot be created without undertaking the difficult but necessary structural reforms that will improve the business and investment climate.

src: dit is die rol van die staat.
tgt: this is government’s role.
